column3: de bzhin du spyod pa dang gnas pa la mkhas shing rab tu mkhas par  'gyur ro ;; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896326#896335#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_914;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_915;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_916# 'dul ba las kyang snang zhing / / +tshes nyid dang yang mi 'gal ba  de sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin gyi de las gzhan dag ni bka' ma yin no zhes gsungs so // /

column3: ji ltar spyod pa dang gnas pa na 'jig rten gyi brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las sems zag pa dang bral bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896334#896348#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_915;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_916# tshes nyid dang yang mi 'gal ba  de sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin gyi de las gzhan dag ni bka' ma yin no zhes gsungs so // / +de la phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa yod do zhes bshad pa ni mdo sde'i mtshan nyid ni theg pa chen po las chos thams cad rang bzhin med do zhes bshad pas na mdo sde las kyang  mi 'byung ste mdo sde dang mi mthun no // /

column3: dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos de ltar spyod cing de ltar gnas pa de la brgya la res 'ga' zhig dran pa nyams pa las  sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa 'dod chags nye bar sdud pa 'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896349#896359#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_916;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_917# de la phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa yod do zhes bshad pa ni mdo sde'i mtshan nyid ni theg pa chen po las chos thams cad rang bzhin med do zhes bshad pas na mdo sde las kyang  mi 'byung ste mdo sde dang mi mthun no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896359#896369#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_917;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_918# gzhung gang las ltung ba snga bdun 'chad pa'i gzhung de ni 'dul ba yin te / /

column3: zhe sdang nye bar sdud pa 'am / / +gti mug nye bar sdud pa dag skye bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896370#896377#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_918;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_919;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_920;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_921# 'dul ba las kyang sangs rgyas dang  chos dang  dge 'dun med do zhes smras na ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad la / / +theg pa chen po la sangs rgyas med / /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#898884#898884#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1221# zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas med chos med  dge 'dun med do zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni thams cad nas thams cad du med par ston pa ni ma yin gyi kun tu brtags pa'i mtshan nyid med pa la dgongs nas med ces gsungs pa yin pa las sgra ji bzhin du brtags na thams cad nas thams cad du med par gzung nas nyes pa rnam pa gsum thob  par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de la dran pa nyams pa chung du byung yang de yang de myur du zad pa dang yongs su  gtugs par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896378#896394#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_920;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_921;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_922;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_923# chos med / / +dge 'dun med do zhes 'byung bas 'dul ba la mi snang ste / /
column5: 0.010#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2944031#2944031#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10518;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10519# sa drug pa la ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba / / +ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed la sogs pa lugs bzhin pa dang  ma rig pa 'gags  pas 'du byed 'gag pa la sogs pa lugs las bzlog pa la rtogs pa'i mtshan ma yod pas / /
column6: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2957448#2957451#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_12351# ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa la sogs pa lugs las bzlog pa'i rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba la dkar po'i phyogs su rtog pa ni rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2957434#2957434#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_12350# yang na ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed la sogs pa lugs bzhin pa'i rten  cing 'brel te 'byung ba la nag po'i phyogs su rtog pa ni rtog pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: dper na lcags kyi gong bu 'am / / +lcags kyi tsha tsha 'bar zhing me rab tu 'bar ba dag la 'ga' zhig gis chu'i thigs pa chung ngu gnyis gsum gtor na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896391#896409#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_923;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_924# ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed la sogs pa lugs bzhin du 'byung ba dang  ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag pa la sogs pa lugs  las bzlog pa ste / /

column3: dge slong dag chu'i thigs pa chung ngu ltung ma thag tu yang myur du yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur  ro ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896410#896421#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_924;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_925;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba rnams ni chos nyid yin par bshad na theg pa chen po las chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung zhes bshad bas chos nyid dang yang 'gal te / /

column3: dge slong dag de bzhin du 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de la dran pa nyams ba chung ngu byung yang de yang myur du yongs su zad cing gtugs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896420#896438#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_925;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_927# de bas na theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin no zhes rgol lo // / +de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959052#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914118#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2998# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943293#943295#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981739#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889761#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892210#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907094#907095#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2117# byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid du rang bzhin bstan par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897141#897141#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# skur pa btab na ngan song du lhung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba dang  skrag na yang rgyu gang gi sa skrag pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915711#915711#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3202# phyin ci log de skyon yin pas spang dgos bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904921#904921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1899# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod kyang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhi'i skyon dang ldan na skyon des bsgribs pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i  spyod pa la 'jug par mi nus par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column24: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981019#981019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11612# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhin rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911264#911265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2624# sems  can gyi don gyi phyir dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pas / / +skyo ba'i 'jigs pa med par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column26: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916652#916653#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3328# de bas na bdag dang chos med par yang mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang   'khor bar skye rung bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column27: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912824#912825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column28: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925102#925103#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column29: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904476#904476#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1848# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column30: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922745#922745#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4127# de yang spong ba'i yan lag gi rgyu dang  rang bzhin dang  las gsum dang ldan na spong ba'i yan lag yongs su smin pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column31: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#975450#975451#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10944# de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa dang ldem po dag la phyi nang du yod bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis rtsom  mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column32: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889222#2889223#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3020# byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje la phye na du yod pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i dmigs pa bya ba'i yul gang yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa  gnyis rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column33: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar spyod cing de ltar gnas pa de la rgyal po 'am gnyen  rnams 'ongs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896439#896454#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_927;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_928# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de skad du rgol ba'i nyan thos dag la 'di skad gang khyed  kyis mdo sde las mi 'byung ba dang  'dul ba la mi snang ba dang  chos nyid dang 'gal ba de sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes smras na / /

column3: skye skyes bu dag khyed ci'i phyir mgo bregs shing lag na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim rnams su rgyu zhing gos ngur smig grang mo 'dis lus yongs su gdung bar byed / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896453#896462#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_927;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_928# de skad du rgol ba'i nyan thos dag la 'di skad gang khyed  kyis mdo sde las mi 'byung ba dang  'dul ba la mi snang ba dang  chos nyid dang 'gal ba de sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes smras na / / +ci nyan thos sde bco brgyad las thams cad yod par smra ba'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma  yin nam zhes smra'am / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896463#896477#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_928;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_929# ci nyan thos sde bco brgyad las thams cad yod par smra ba'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma  yin nam zhes smra'am / /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2363569#2363569#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6175# thams cad nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang  so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes par bye brag med pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2929584#2929584#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8587# yongs su shes pa'i mdo sde las yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o // /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#532980#532980#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10877;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10878# rgya cher bshad pa ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +mdo sde pa dag ni chos rtag tu gnas par shes pa'i phyir / /

column3: kye skyes bu khyod 'dod pa rnams la yongs spyod bzhin du 'dug la sbyin ba dag byin /// /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896478#896487#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_929;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_930;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_931# 'on te 'phags pa sam byi ti'i mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin no zhes bya ste / / +ci phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin no zhes bya'am / /

column3: bsod nams dag gyis shig ces 'dod pa rnams la 'dod par byed na / / +dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896488#896498#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_930;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_931;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_932# ci phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin no zhes bya'am / / +gal te thag pa chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa'i mdo  sde dang 'dul ba dang chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin no zhes bya na ni / /

column3: ci 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de la rgyal po 'am gnyen rnams kyis 'dod pa spyad pa'i phyir bos pa na de bslab pa gtong zhing nyams par  byed dam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896499#896508#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_931;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_932# gal te thag pa chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa'i mdo  sde dang 'dul ba dang chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin no zhes bya na ni / / +de ltar nyan thos kyi gzhung sde bco brgyad rnams kyang phan tshun nang thams cad 'gal bas na thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896509#896517#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_933;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_934# de ltar nyan thos kyi gzhung sde bco brgyad rnams kyang phan tshun nang thams cad 'gal bas na thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin par 'gyur ro // /

column3: btsun pa ma lags so // / +'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa thams cad la sdug bsngal ba'i chos can dang  kun 'byung ba dang  mi snang ba dang  ro myang pa dang  nyes dmigs dang  nges par 'byung ba ji lta ba bzhin yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis mthong  bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896516#896525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_933;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_934# de ltar nyan thos kyi gzhung sde bco brgyad rnams kyang phan tshun nang thams cad 'gal bas na thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin par 'gyur ro // / +ji ltar 'gal zhe na / / +thams  cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung las stong pa nyid dang yang dag par smra ba'i mdo sde bshad pa 'phags pa sam byi ti rnams sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin par khas mi len la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896526#896542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_934;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_935# thams  cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung las stong pa nyid dang yang dag par smra ba'i mdo sde bshad pa 'phags pa sam byi ti rnams sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin par khas mi len la / /

column3: 'dis 'dod pa rnams la sol ba'i phung po lta bur mthong bar gyur cing / / +'dis 'dod pa rnams de ltar mthong ba dang  'dod pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin shes pa dang  'dod pa rnams mthong ba na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896543#896553#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_935;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_936;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_937# thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung las srid pa bar ma do bshad la dge 'dun chen po pa rnams kyis sangs     // /

column3: 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa dang  'dod pa la zhen pa  dang ; / +'dod pa la dga' ba dang  'dod par bying ba dang  'dod pa la nges pa dang  'dod pa la zhen pa dang  de sems yongs su gtugs shing mi gnas pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896554#896569#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_937;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_938# de ltar sde pa bco brgyad rnams kyi mdo sde yang nang phan tshun mi mthun pa dang  'dul ba yang nang mi mthun pa dang  chos nyid kyang nang mi mthun pas thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin par  'gyur ro // /

column3: spyod lam dang gnas pa la mkhas shing rab tu mkhas par gyur la / / +'di de ltar spyod pa dang gnas pa la  mkhas shing rab tu mkhas par gyur na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896567#896577#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_937;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_938# de ltar sde pa bco brgyad rnams kyi mdo sde yang nang phan tshun mi mthun pa dang  'dul ba yang nang mi mthun pa dang  chos nyid kyang nang mi mthun pas thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin par  'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896578#896585#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_938# 'on te thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung las yang rang nyid kyi mdo sde rnams kyang phan tshun mthun pa dang  'dul ba rnams kyang nang mthun pa dang  chos nyid kyang nang mi 'gal ba de sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no zhe na ni de lta na / /

column3: ji ltar spyod pa dang gnas pa na 'jig rten gyi brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las sems zag pa dang bral bar gyur pa dag rgyal po 'am gnyen rnams kyis 'dod pa spyod pa'i phyir bos pa na bslab pa so sor btang zhing nyams  par byed pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896584#896593#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_938;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_939;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_940;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_941# 'on te thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung las yang rang nyid kyi mdo sde rnams kyang phan tshun mthun pa dang  'dul ba rnams kyang nang mthun pa dang  chos nyid kyang nang mi 'gal ba de sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no zhe na ni de lta na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896593#896603#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_939;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_940;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_941;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_942;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_943;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_944;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_945# bdag gi nyid las  'byung ba dang / / +rang gi 'dul bas mthong ba'i phyir // / +zab cing rgya yang cha bas na // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896604#896613#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_943;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_944;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_945# ces bya ba smos te / / +theg pa chen po yang / / +lang kar gshegs pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa mdo sde nang mthun pas na bdag  nyid kyi mdo sde las 'byung ba dang  nyon mongs pa 'dul bar byed pa la 'dul ba zhes bya la / /

column3: dge slong dag legs so legs so // / +dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de'i sems yun ring po nas dben pa la gzhol ba dang  dben ba la bab pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896614#896637#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_945;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_946;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_947# lang kar gshegs pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa mdo sde nang mthun pas na bdag  nyid kyi mdo sde las 'byung ba dang  nyon mongs pa 'dul bar byed pa la 'dul ba zhes bya la / /
column5: 0.015#TD4048E.TXT.r#1689189#1689189#TD4048E.TXT.r_758# dam pa ma yin pa'i  chos mnyan pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang  dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.016#TD4049E.TXT.r#2309609#2309613#TD4049E.TXT.r_3743# rtsa ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang  mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa dang  mtshan mar snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang  mtshan mar 'gyur ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang  mtshan mar snang ba 'gyur ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang   gzhan gyis bstan pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  tshul bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa dang  mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  rnam par gyeng ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o // /
column7: 0.016#TD4018E.TXT.r#3075215#3075219#TD4018E.TXT.r_9245;TD4018E.TXT.r_9246# lta ba thams cad la spros pa la rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po mtha' gnyis su lhung bar byed pas zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa la sogs par lta ba'i rnam par rtog pa ste / /
column8: 0.016#TD4019E.TXT.r#2493562#2493562#TD4019E.TXT.r_11284# de nyid kyis gzung ba dang  'dzin pa'i dngos por rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa  rgyub rgyu ba mthong zhes pa ste / /
column9: 0.018#TD4054E.TXT.r#998837#998837#TD4054E.TXT.r_1223# rnam par rtog pa gsum ni rang  bzhin gyis rnam par rtog pa dang  rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  mngon par dpyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o // /
column10: 0.021#TD4025E.TXT.r#2179600#2179600#TD4025E.TXT.r_2091;TD4025E.TXT.r_2092# ye shes ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  de'i rjes las thob pa'i 'jig rten pa'o // /
column11: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1145567#1145567#TD4047E.TXT.r_3551# rnam par rtog pa spangs pas spros pa 'gag par 'gyur bas 'khor bar gnas par yang mi 'gyur la / /
column12: 0.024#TD4053E.TXT.r#2968424#2968425#TD4053E.TXT.r_554# rnam par rtog pa gsum ni rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa dang  rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  mngon par spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o // /
column13: 0.025#TD4053E.TXT.r#2983118#2983118#TD4053E.TXT.r_2521;TD4053E.TXT.r_2522# bden pa rnams la bzod pa    dang shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +rnam par rtog pa ni mngon par rtogs pa la zhugs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes pas ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du rnam par rtog cing goms par byed pa'o // /
column14: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1045790#1045791#TD4054E.TXT.r_8658;TD4054E.TXT.r_8659# gzung ba'i mtshan ma ji skad bstan pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +mtshan mar  gyur pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni / /
column15: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2437007#2437007#TD4019E.TXT.r_3950;TD4019E.TXT.r_3951# bcas shing 'khrul ba nyid yin pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang mi 'dra bar bstan pa'o // / +de yang ji ltar tha mal ba rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa rang gi rang bzhin la ltos te rang rig pa mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin kyang sgra don spyi'i rnam pa tha dad pa lta bur snang zhing zhen pa  pas de nyid rtog pa'i bdag nyid yin zhing / /
column16: 0.028#TD4018E.TXT.r#3061368#3061370#TD4018E.TXT.r_7447# mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid de ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dbu ma'i ye shes so // /
column17: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2563728#2563728#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3456;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3457# nyer bsdogs dag gis rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni srog gcod  pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dag gi sa sun ma phyung ba zhes bya ba'i don to // / +rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa la sogs pas so // /
column18: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3124267#3124267#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4581# de la rang gi mtshan nyid ni rgyu mtshan dang  ming dang  rnam par rtog pa dang  de  bzhin nyid dang  yang dag pa'i shes pas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo nyid yongs su ma grub pa chos la bdag med pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: dben pa la 'bab pa / / +thar pa la gzhol ba / / +thar pa la bab  pa ; / +thar pa la 'bab pa / /

column3: dge slong dag dper na chu bo gang g'a'i chu yun ring  por shar phyogs su gzhol ba / /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896694#896716#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_955;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_956;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_957# spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir zhes smras pa la / / +de'i phyir rtog ge pa'i spyod yul ma yin par tshigs su bcad    pa zhas bya ba la gong du theg pa chen po bsgrub pa'i skabs su spyod yul ma yin par bsgrub pa'i phyir zhes smos pa la / /
column5: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912955#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896433#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959054#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889761#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column10: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column12: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column14: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943295#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column17: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: bslab pa btang nas nyams par byed pa 'di ni gnas med de / / +gzhan du na rgyal po 'am gnyen de dag phongs shing     // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste / / +nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896885#896898#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_973;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_974;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_975;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_976# don dam pa'i chos mi dpyad pas theg pa chen po rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +skyo ba     // / +can zhes bya ba la theg pa chen po la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum la sogs pa 'bum phrag grangs med pa bshad pas tshig dang spobs pa zad par mi 'gyur la / /

column3: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: btsun pa dge slang dgra bcom  pa zag pa zad pa la stobs du zhig mchis / /

column3: sh'a ri'i bu rnam pa brgyad de / / +brgyad gang zhe na / / +sh'a ri'i bu dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa de'i sems yun ring po nas dben pa la gzhol ba / /

column3: thar pa la 'bab pa yin / / +mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba / / +mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa / / +mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab pa yin no // /

column3: 'dod pa rnams sol ba'i phung po lta bur mthong ba yin te / / +'dis 'dod pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid mthong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896950#896959#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_984;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_985# rtog ge'i chos rnams ni byis pa rnams kyis shes par bya ba yin pas theg pa chen po ni rtog ge pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: ji ltar 'dod  pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin shes shing 'dod pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mthong nas / /

column3: 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  'dod pa la zhen pa dang  'dod pa la dga' ba dang  'dod pa la nges pa dang  'dod pa la zhen pa dang  de la sems yongs su gtugs te mi gnas pa yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896969#896988#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_987;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_988;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_989;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_990;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_991# thabs min de ltar ma bstan pa // / +zhes smos pa la / / +nyan thos rgol te / / +nyan thos kyi theg pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i thabs ma yin pas / /

column3: 'dis  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi legs par bsgoms pa yin / / +yang dag par spong ba bzhi legs par bsgoms pa yin / /
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsgoms  pa legs par bsgoms pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#276005#276008#TD4026E.TXT.r_192;TD4026E.TXT.r_193# rgya che'i phyir dang zab pa'i phyir // / +yongs su smin dang rnam mi rtog / /

column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896989#896996#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_991;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_992;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_993# theg pa de la yun ring du spyad kyang 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad na de ltar  theg pa chen po 'di ji ltar na bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi thabs su 'gyur ro zhes brgal lo // /
column7: 0.027#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520079#2520079#TD4020E.TXT.r_55;TD4020E.TXT.r_56# de phyir de ni de yul min // / +rgya che'i phyir dang zab pa'i phyir // /

column3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: langs te song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes gsungs so // / +mdo las 'di skad du zhes bya ba la / /

column3: 'di nas go rims las bzlog ste brtsis pa'i lnga    pa dang  dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sol ba'i phung po lta bu'i mdo las go rims las bzlog ste bgrangs pa'i gsum pa las 'byung ba bstan zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897017#897028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_998;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_999;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1000;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1001# bla na med pa'i byang  chub thob par bya ba'i thabs ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +rgya che ba'i don dang  zab pa'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897029#897050#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1000;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1001;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1002;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1003;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1004;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1005;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1006# de la sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang  mngon par shes pa dang  stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ni rgya che ba'i chos so // / +gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa ni zab pa'i chos so // /
column6: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893055#2893055#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3573;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3574# de la zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pas ni bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs so // / +chos sbyin pas ni ye shes kyi tshogs sogs so // /
column7: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#138394#138396#TD4035E.TXT.r_2324;TD4035E.TXT.r_2325# de la spu gri'i sos gtams pa'i lam gang yin pa dang  nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can gang yin pa dang  lcags kyi shing shal ma li'i tshal gang yin pa de lhag pa gcig tu bsdus pas na  lhag pa bzhir 'gyur ro // / +de la grang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi ni / /
column8: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324603#2324603#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1666# theg pa chen po la skur ba 'debs pa'i sems can mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir de la mos par mi 'gyur te / /
column9: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906424#906425#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2048;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2049;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2050# sa  dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang  stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'byung bas rgya che ba'o // / +yang na ye shes kyi tshogs 'byung bas zab pa'o // / +bsod nams kyi tshogs 'byung bas sgra che ba'o // /
column10: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#141407#141409#TD4035E.TXT.r_2797;TD4035E.TXT.r_2798# de dag de ltar gnas pas dran pa brjed par 'gyur ro // / +dran pa brjed par gyur pas sems can de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1192785#1192786#TD4047E.TXT.r_10219;TD4047E.TXT.r_10220# byams pa nyid sgom par byed pa de ni zhes bya ba ni de dag thams cad bde bar gyur cig ces yid la byas nas chos la dmigs pas sgom par byed kyi sems can du mos pas ni ma  yin no // /
column12: 0.024#TD4001E.TXT.r#1973632#1973633#TD4001E.TXT.r_151;TD4001E.TXT.r_152# 'di dag thams cad ni phan tshun rang bzhin tha dad na ji ltar mi 'dra ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong bas chos mthong bar 'gyur ro // / +ji ltar mi 'dra ba'i chos mthong bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur te / /
column13: 0.025#TD4039E.TXT.r#1829689#1829689#TD4039E.TXT.r_1809# de dag gi ni de ltar rang gi don la yang bslus par 'gyur la pha rol smra ba rnams kyis kyang tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang  log par bzung ba'i chos de dang bcas par  yang smod par 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.026#TD4043E.TXT.r#366537#366537#TD4043E.TXT.r_1425# de'i 'og tu sems can  dmyal ba'i srung ma rnams ni sprul pa lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sems can ma yin par sems can dag lta bur snang ba la bya'o // /
column15: 0.026#TD4019E.TXT.r#2420394#2420394#TD4019E.TXT.r_1700# brtags pa la de ltar blos ma shes na chos can du bzhag pa'i ldog pa de nyid tshad mas ma grub pas de la rten pa'i phyogs kyi chos ma grub par 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.028#TD4000E.TXT.r#2796272#2796272#TD4000E.TXT.r_242;TD4000E.TXT.r_243# mos pa ni chen po ni zab cing rgya che ba'i chos la mos pa'i phyir ro // / +tshogs chen po ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dpag tu med    pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2312128#2312128#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_148# 'di ltar shes pa gsum gyis gzhan gyi dbang bkag pa'i phyir ni mthong ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i SHES PA DANG LDAN PAR 'gyur la / /
column18: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323963#2323963#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1595# rigs kyi sa'i  byang chub sems dpa' mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhes gsungs pa'i don de ji lta bu yin zhes dris pa dang / /
column19: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1361734#1361734#TD4037E.TXT.r_6142;TD4037E.TXT.r_6143# nyan thos dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la don bya ba'i sbyor ba ni rnams la don bya ba'i sbyor ba ni rnam pa lngas 'bras bu yod par 'gyur te / /
column20: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2883577#2883577#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_2185# dmigs pa'i chos dang  bsgrub pa'i chos dang  de rnam par dag pa'i chos so // /
column21: 0.029#TD4032E.TXT.r#1934084#1934085#TD4032E.TXT.r_2302;TD4032E.TXT.r_2303# dam pa'i chos ched cher mi 'dzin pa la sogs pas chos la ser sna byed par 'gyur ro // / +chos la ser sna byed pas kyang gzhan rnams la chos 'chad par mi byed pas de'i phyir / /
column22: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2149487#2149487#TD4029E.TXT.r_3777# snying rjes yongs su bzung ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni mi zad par 'gyur ro // /

column15: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1352334#1352334#TD4037E.TXT.r_4877;TD4037E.TXT.r_4878# byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang mthu mnyam pas / / +dge ba mi spyoms pas yon tan dang mthu ston par mi byed pa'o // /
column16: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323963#2323963#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1595# rigs kyi sa'i  byang chub sems dpa' mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhes gsungs pa'i don de ji lta bu yin zhes dris pa dang / /
column17: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1361734#1361734#TD4037E.TXT.r_6142;TD4037E.TXT.r_6143# nyan thos dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la don bya ba'i sbyor ba ni rnams la don bya ba'i sbyor ba ni rnam pa lngas 'bras bu yod par 'gyur te / /
column18: 0.029#TD4032E.TXT.r#1934084#1934085#TD4032E.TXT.r_2302;TD4032E.TXT.r_2303# dam pa'i chos ched cher mi 'dzin pa la sogs pas chos la ser sna byed par 'gyur ro // / +chos la ser sna byed pas kyang gzhan rnams la chos 'chad par mi byed pas de'i phyir / /

column3: gleng  gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897051#897066#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1005;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1006;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1007;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1008# de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen po dag thos nas / / +dad pa'i sgo nas sems can dge ba la    'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1040237#1040237#TD4054E.TXT.r_7862# gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i dbang du bya ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i 'phen pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis de gnyi gar rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.017#TD4053E.TXT.r#2994566#2994566#TD4053E.TXT.r_3998# rab tu rtogs pa'i khyad par ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i dbang du byas pa'i chos la sbyor ba'i 'phen pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis de gnyi ga rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.019#TD4064E.TXT.r#425264#425264#TD4064E.TXT.r_1347;TD4064E.TXT.r_1348# bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang  so so rang gis  rig pa dang  dpe med pa'i phyir ro // / +dge ba ni rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa'i bde ba dang  zag pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378085#2378085#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8047# bdag nyid mtshungs pa'i phyir med pa'i chos ni yod par 'gyur la / /
column9: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2162381#2162381#TD4029E.TXT.r_5508# gang zag dang chos su lta ba'i gnyen po'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.023#TD4032E.TXT.r#1946137#1946143#TD4032E.TXT.r_4071;TD4032E.TXT.r_4072# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis zhes bya ba ni 'khor  ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos gnyis brjod du med par rtogs pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te / /
column11: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2924636#2924636#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7869;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7870;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7871# skad cig ma phyi ma rnams kha dog dang  dbyibs la sogs pa skad cig ma snga ma dang 'dra ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung bas na / / +de dag gis skad cig mar ma shes so // / +don de nyid  gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir / /
column12: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893011#2893011#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3568# dge ba la gzhag pa'i sgo nas sems can smin par  bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936397#936398#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5991# dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column14: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981540#981540#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11677# chos rnams kun rdzob tu yod par zad kyi don dam par ni thams cad nas thams cad du med do zhes  lta ba dang  chad par gyur pas skur ba btab pa'i phyir skrag par 'gyur pa'i gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.027#TD4013E.TXT.r#621803#621805#TD4013E.TXT.r_1508# de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dang  mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su zin pa'i phyir bsod nams shin du khyad par du 'phags par rig  par bya'o // /
column16: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1994038#1994038#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2203# shes rab zhan pas dge ba la sogs pa'i chos la ma byang ba'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2905415#2905415#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5252# sa dgu pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pas sems can la chos bstan pa'i sgo nas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir / /
column18: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938918#938918#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6321# so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /
column19: 0.028#TD4032E.TXT.r#1932240#1932240#TD4032E.TXT.r_2012;TD4032E.TXT.r_2013# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas bsam par rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir / / +gang zag dang chos la nor ba'i gnyen por ma nor ba'i bdag nyid mthong ba'i lam bskyed par bya'o // /
column20: 0.029#TD4048E.TXT.r#1690526#1690526#TD4048E.TXT.r_968;TD4048E.TXT.r_969# rnam par smin pa dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dag phan tshun du rkyen du gyur pas 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos de dag ni rgyu mtshan dang lta ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid do // /
column21: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908652#908652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2322# de ltar lung dam pa dang rgyud dam par  bsgrubs pas na rang bzhin dam pa rtogs pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes de la don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o // /
column22: 0.029#TD4051E.TXT.r#1250651#1250651#TD4051E.TXT.r_2595;TD4051E.TXT.r_2596;TD4051E.TXT.r_2597# dge ba sgrib pa dang bcas pa yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba ste / / +de dang ldan pa'o // / +de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma spangs pa'i phyir sgrib pa dang bcas pa'o // /
column23: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#937383#937383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6121;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6122# chos kyi sku'i rgyu mthun pa  las rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku byung nas sar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'i theg pa chen po'i chos rnams kyi longs spyod rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rjes las thob pa dag la 'jig rten pa'i ye shes la     // /
column24: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2081060#2081060#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14934;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14935# gzhan dag na re mthong ba'i chos la zhen pa rnams 'dod  pa'i bde ba la 'dun pa bzlog nas bsam gtan gyi bde ba la sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir te / / +tshe phyi ma'i bde ba mthong ba'i chos la rag las pa'i phyir ro // /
column25: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#287144#287144#TD4026E.TXT.r_2091;TD4026E.TXT.r_2092# grogs po ngan pa ste log par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i phyir ro // / +bdag nyid mos pa la ni dge ba'i  rtsa ba nyam chung ba'o // /
column26: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1167738#1167738#TD4047E.TXT.r_6863# chos la ser sna byed pa gzhom pa'i don dang  ma 'ongs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i  phyir dang  sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#587093#587093#TD4068E.TXT.r_2059;TD4068E.TXT.r_2060# gyeng ba gzhan dag kyang rnam par gyeng ba'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o // / +shes  bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /

column3: dge slong dag gang zag ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / +rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba'i gang zag dang  rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'gro ba'i gang zag dang  bdag nyid du gnas pa'i gang zag dang   brgal zhing pha rol tu phyin pa'i gang zag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897066#897082#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1007;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1008;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1009# zab pa'i chos bsgoms pas ni bdag nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur te / / +de ltar bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don du 'gyur ba'i chos zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis theg pa chen po 'di las bstan pa'i phyir / /

column7: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378085#2378085#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8047# bdag nyid mtshungs pa'i phyir med pa'i chos ni yod par 'gyur la / /

column15: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1127647#1127653#TD4047E.TXT.r_911;TD4047E.TXT.r_912;TD4047E.TXT.r_913# dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung zhing dbang po rnon  po rnams kyis zab cing rgya che ba shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde'i don thos nas rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro // / +sems rab tu dga' bar gyur pas dam pa'i chos thos pa de nyid bdag por byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la mos par 'gyur zhing / /
column16: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245127#245127#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3988# bdag gis lan cig tsam  sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags par gyur na yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa lta ci smos zhes bdag nyid brtan par theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par gyur to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column17: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938918#938918#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6321# so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /

column21: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2149487#2149487#TD4029E.TXT.r_3777# snying rjes yongs su bzung ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni mi zad par 'gyur ro // /
column22: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#939544#939544#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6406# so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column24: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1161896#1161896#TD4047E.TXT.r_5984# rig pa'i gnas lnga po 'di dag la sbyor ba goms par ma byas par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes byas nas rig pa'i  gnas lngas bsdus pa'i chos tshol bar byed cing / /
column25: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2081060#2081060#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14934;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14935# gzhan dag na re mthong ba'i chos la zhen pa rnams 'dod  pa'i bde ba la 'dun pa bzlog nas bsam gtan gyi bde ba la sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir te / / +tshe phyi ma'i bde ba mthong ba'i chos la rag las pa'i phyir ro // /
column26: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1167738#1167738#TD4047E.TXT.r_6863# chos la ser sna byed pa gzhom pa'i don dang  ma 'ongs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i  phyir dang  sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#587093#587093#TD4068E.TXT.r_2059;TD4068E.TXT.r_2060# gyeng ba gzhan dag kyang rnam par gyeng ba'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o // / +shes  bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /

column3: rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba'i gang zag gang zhe na / / +'di na 'dod pa la brten zhing sdig pa'i las byed pa'i gang zag rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897080#897094#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1008;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1009;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1010# de ltar bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don du 'gyur ba'i chos zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis theg pa chen po 'di las bstan pa'i phyir / / +theg pa chen po 'di bla  na med pa'i byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i thabs yin no // /

column3: 'di ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba'i gang zag ces bya'o // / +rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'gro ba'i gang zag gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897093#897114#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1010;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1011# gang 'de la skrag par 'gyur ba de'i phyir gnas ma yin pa la skrag par 'gyur ba'i nyes pa dang  rgyu la tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba dang  rigs med pa dang  nyan thos kyi rigs can dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs  can dag gi gang zag gang dag stong pa nyid 'chad pa'i theg pa chen po'i chos 'di la skrag ste 'di bdud kyis bshad pa yin no zhes bshad pa de dag la / /

column3: 'di  ni 'dod pa la brten kyang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa'i gang zag rnams te / / +'di ni rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'gro ba'i gang zag ces bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897114#897128#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1010;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1011;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1012;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# gang 'de la skrag par 'gyur ba de'i phyir gnas ma yin pa la skrag par 'gyur ba'i nyes pa dang  rgyu la tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba dang  rigs med pa dang  nyan thos kyi rigs can dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs  can dag gi gang zag gang dag stong pa nyid 'chad pa'i theg pa chen po'i chos 'di la skrag ste 'di bdud kyis bshad pa yin no zhes bshad pa de dag la / / +theg pa chen po 'di dga' bar bya ba'i gnas yin gyi skrag par bya ba'i gnas ma yin ba la skrag bas na gnas ma yin ba la skrag pa zhes  bya ste ; /

column3: bdag nyid du gnas pa'i gang zag gang zhe na / / +gang zag 'ga' zhig 'di na dgon pa 'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897121#897132#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1011;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1012;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# theg pa chen po 'di dga' bar bya ba'i gnas yin gyi skrag par bya ba'i gnas ma yin ba la skrag bas na gnas ma yin ba la skrag pa zhes  bya ste ; /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897173#897174#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1018;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1019;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1016;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1017# 'jigs par bya ba'i gnas ma yin pa la 'jigs nas skur pa btab na gnas ma yin pa la skrag pa zhes bya ste / / +de ltar skrag ste skur pa btab ste / /

column3: shing drung ngam / / +khang pa stong bar song nas 'bad pa dang   spangs pa dang  bsgom pa dang  lan mang du byas pa'i rgyu dang  yang dag pa'i yid la byed pa'i rgyus ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa na tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs shing mi skye ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba la reg par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897133#897141#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# skur pa btab na ngan song du lhung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba dang  skrag na yang rgyu gang gi sa skrag pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897142#897151#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1014;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1015;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1016# skur pa btab na ngan song du lhung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba dang  skrag na yang rgyu gang gi sa skrag pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897152#897160#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1014;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1015;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1016;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1017# 'gro ba gnas ma yin la skrag pa gdung byed pa // / +zhes bya ba la / / +'gro ba'i sgras ni rigs med pa dang  nyan thos kyi rigs can dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can la byas so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897371#897376#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1049;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1050;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1051# 'og nas tshigs su bcad pa las 'byung ba bzhin du yid la byas nas theg pa chen po la skrag par mi 'gyur te / / +mi skrag pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column8: 1.788#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943295#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3966# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922398#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4080# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896433#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959054#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889761#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925285#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925471#925471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916653#916653#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3328# de bas na bdag dang chos med par yang mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang   'khor bar skye rung bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column27: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918789#918790#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3600# rgyu gang gis mngon par shes pa drug thob par 'gyur ba'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom  ste ; /

column3: de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing  'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi ldog cing mi 'ong ba 'di ni bdag nyid du gnas pa'i gang zag ces bya'o // /
brgal zhing pha rol tu phyin pa'i gang zag gang zhe na / / +'di la gang zag dgon pa 'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897173#897184#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1018;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1019;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1020;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1021# 'jigs par bya ba'i gnas ma yin pa la 'jigs nas skur pa btab na gnas ma yin pa la skrag pa zhes bya ste / / +de ltar skrag ste skur pa btab ste / /

column3: shing drung ngam / / +khang pa stong par song nas 'bad pa dang  spangs pa dang  lan mang du byas pa dang   yang dag pa'i yid la byas pa'i rgyus ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa na zag pa zad cing zag pa las sems rnam par grol ba dang  shes rab rnam par grol ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897183#897195#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1020;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1021;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1022;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1023;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1024# ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal myong bar byed pas gdung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya'o // / +ci'i phyir ngan song gsum du gdung bar byed na de'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897195#897206#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1022;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1023;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1024;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1025# bsod nams ma yin phung po cher 'phel ba // / +zhes smos te / / +theg pa chen po la skur pa btab na  bsod nams ma yin pa'i tshogs 'phel bar 'gyur bas ngan song du skye'o // /

column3: bdag gi skye ba zad do // / +tshangs par spyod pa bsten to // / +bya ba byas so // / +byed pa byas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897205#897214#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1024;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1025;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1026# theg pa chen po la skur pa btab na  bsod nams ma yin pa'i tshogs 'phel bar 'gyur bas ngan song du skye'o // / +dus ji srid cig tu ngan song du gnas snyam pa la yun ring du zhes smos te / /

column3: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi     // / +shes so zhes mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pa phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs te gnas pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba la reg par gyur pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897215#897237#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1025;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1026;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1027;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1028;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1029;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1030# dus ji srid cig tu ngan song du gnas snyam pa la yun ring du zhes smos te / / +bskal pa grangs med par ngan song du gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'di ni 'gro zhing pha rol du 'gro ba'i gang zag ces bya'o // /
ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // / +'dod khams 'di na gang dag 'ga' zhig ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897238#897249#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1029;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1030;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1031;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1032# nyes pa dang  gang gi rgyus ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba dang  dus ji srid cig tu ngan song du gnas pa dang gsum mo // / +'gro ba gnas ma yin la skrag pa gdung byed pa // /

column3: 'dod pas gyengs shing 'dod la chags ma bral // / +srid par bya zhing yang yang skye ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897250#897259#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1032;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1033# bsod nams ma yin phung po  cher 'phel zhes bya bas ngan song gsum du skye ba'i rgyu gang yin pa bstan to // /

column3: dga' bar 'gyur ba rgyun phyogs 'gro ba yin // / +de nyid 'dod dang sdug bsngal spangs pa ni // / +rgyun las bzlog phyogs 'gro ba'i gang zag brjod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#276081#276084#TD4026E.TXT.r_205;TD4026E.TXT.r_206# bsod nams ma yin phung chen bsags byas yun ring du // / +rigs med grogs ngan sngon dge ma bsags blo ma sbyangs // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897260#897273#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1033;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1034;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1035;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1036# yun ring du zhes bya bas dus ji srid du ngan song du gnas pa bstan to // /

column3: 'di na  gang zhig nyon mongs lnga spangs te // / +mi 'phrogs chos ldan slob pa yongs su rdzogs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897274#897287#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1036;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1037;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1038;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1039# rigs med grogs ngan dge sngon ma bsags blo ma  sbyangs ; / /

column3: sems la dbang thob dbang po mnyam gzhag pa // / +thams cad bdag nyid gnas pa zhes brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897286#897296#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1038;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1039;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1040;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1041# de la rgyu rnam pa bzhis theg pa chen bo la skrag par 'gyur te / / +byang chub sems dpa'i rigs med na yang theg pa chen po la skrag ste / /

column3: mchog dang mchog min mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun // / +med dang mi snang skyon bcas rig gyur cing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897295#897308#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1040;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1041;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1042;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1043# 'di ni rgyu gcig go // / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bshes gnyen ngan pas zin pa dang theg pa chen po la skrag par 'gyur  te ; /

column3: thams cad kun las de dag rnam par grol // / +'jig rten mthar byas pha rol 'gro zhes brjod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897307#897320#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1042;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1043;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1044;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1045# 'di ni rgyu gnyis pa'o // / +tshe rabs ston gzhan na theg pa chen po rtogs par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ma bsags na yang skrag par 'gyur te / /

column3: de phyir dge slong dran pa legs bzhag ste // / +'dod dang sdug bsngal bsten pa spong bar gyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897321#897339#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1044;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1045;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1046;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1047# 'di ni rgyu gsum pa'o // / +theg pa chen po'i chos mnyan pa dang bsam pa la sogs pas tshe snga phyi blo ma sbyangs na yang  theg pa chen po la skrag par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.022#TD4009E.TXT.r#322820#322821#TD4009E.TXT.r_398;TD4009E.TXT.r_399;TD4009E.TXT.r_400# mgo rmongs par byed ma nus su zin kyang nyes pa'i sgrib pas de byang chub kyi sems las nyams par 'gyur te / / +'di ni rgyu gnyis pa'o // /

column3: zhes gsungs so // / +lam ni bzhi ste zhes bya ba la / / +gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o // /
de nas bcom  ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te / / +dge slong dag lam ni rnam pa bzhi ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897340#897350#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1047;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1048# skrag pa'i rgyu smras nas mi skug pa'i rgyu bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba la gong du theg pa chen po la skrag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni rigs med ba la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi yin no zhes bshad nas / /

column3: mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam yang yod / / +mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam yang yod / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897351#897360#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1047;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1048;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1049# skrag pa'i rgyu smras nas mi skug pa'i rgyu bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba la gong du theg pa chen po la skrag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni rigs med ba la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi yin no zhes bshad nas / / +da ni rgyu gang la brten na theg pa chen  po la mi skrag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu bstan te / /

column3: mngon par shes pa bul la sla ba'i lam yang yod / / +mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam  yang yod / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897361#897370#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1048;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1049;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1050# da ni rgyu gang la brten na theg pa chen  po la mi skrag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu bstan te / / +'og nas tshigs su bcad pa las 'byung ba bzhin du yid la byas nas theg pa chen po la skrag par mi 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1823434#1823434#TD4039E.TXT.r_1050# med pa rnams ngo tsha ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  tshegs chung ngus bsod nams kyi las byed du gzhug pa'i phyir dang  bag med pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis le lo can rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba dang  sems can long ba dang  'on pa dang  smyon pa dang  sems 'khrugs pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang  de bzhin gshegs pa khyim gang du gshegs pa de dag tu lha dang  klu dang  gnod sbyin dang  lha ma yin dang  nam  mkha' lding dang  mi'am ci dang  lto 'phye chen po mtha' yas pa rags pa rnams spro bar 'gyur la 'tshe bar ni mi byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#845391#845391#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12982;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12983# 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te / / +byed rgyu'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'di la bdag po'i 'bras bu khas blang bar bya ste / /

column3: mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam gang zhe na / / +'di na kha cig nye bar len pa'i phung po lngas 'dzem zhing gnod la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897377#897385#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1050;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1051;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1052# mi skrag pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // / +de las gzhan dang gzhan med ces bya ba la / /
column5: 0.019#TD4026E.TXT.r#315080#315080#TD4026E.TXT.r_7419;TD4026E.TXT.r_7420# nyan thos kyi  theg pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang  theg pa chen po'o // / +de la ltos pa'i rigs pa ni / /
column6: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897140#897141#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# skur pa btab na ngan song du lhung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba dang  skrag na yang rgyu gang gi sa skrag pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943295#943295#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894818#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912953#912954#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: ring du byed cing smod par byed de / / +lnga gang zhe na / / +gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po dang  tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed dang  rnam par shes  pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lngas 'dzem zhing gnod la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897384#897395#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1052;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1053# nyan thos  rnams kyis kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang  theg pa chen po ste theg pa gsum yod par 'dod pas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897395#897416#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1053;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1054;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1055;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1056# theg pa chen po yod par khas blangs na de ltar na ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ma gtogs pa'i theg pa chen po gzhan med pas na theg    pa chen po spong zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang skrag par bya ba'i gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: dper na skyes bu gzhon nu legs par khrus byas shing legs par byugs shing bskus pa skra dang kha spu bcos shing gos dkar po gon pa dang  sbrul gyi ro 'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897417#897431#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1055;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1056;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1057;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1058;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1059# nyan thos kyi theg ba nyid theg pa chen po yin te / / +shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa theg pa chen po ma yin no zhes smra na / /

column3: khyim bya'i ro 'am / / +mi'i ro'i kha 'am / / +mgo bo la reg na shin tu 'dzem zhing gnod la thag ring du byed cing smod par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897430#897447#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1057;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1058;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1059;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1060;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1061;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1062# de lta na ni sangs rgyas  las ma gtogs pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba gzhan med par 'gyur te / / +ci'i phyir zhe na / / +kun kyang theg pa chen po la zhugs pas kun sangs rgyas su gyur pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2331972#2331973#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2496# mdo 'di ni go rims las bzlog nas kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang  gzhan yang mi shes pa kun shes pa'i dbang  po bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la ni 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i go rims yod pa ma yin na / /

column3: de bzhin du de nye bar len pa'i phung po lngas 'dzem zhing gnod pa dang  ring du byed cing smod par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897448#897458#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1061;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1062;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1063# zab cing zhes bya ba la / / +thams  cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i lam sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang  gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste / /

column3: de nye bar len pa'i phung po lngas bdag nyid nyon mongs shing snyon rmongs par byed pa dang  khur lci  bas mnan no snyam zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897459#897474#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1062;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1063;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1064;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1065# thams  cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i lam sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang  gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste / / +'phags pa rnams kyis thugs su chud par zad de / / +so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du mi chud do zhes de ltar tshul bzhin du yid la  byas nas theg pa chen po skrag pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897677#897679#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1083;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1082# 'phags pa rnams kyi yul gzhan gyi dbang dang  yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin med pa ma yin no zhes de ltar  tshul bzhin yid la byas nas theg pa chen po la skrag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: da ltar bdag 'chi ba la thug gi bar du byas so zhes rig nas / / +de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la 'dzem zhing smod pa dang  rjes su mi mthun te de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la 'dzem zhing gnas pa dang  smod pa dang rjes su mi mthun pa 'di ni de'i dka'  ba zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897475#897482#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1065# rjes song phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan du yod pa la sogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa bshad pa de dang dus gcig tu theg pa chen po yang bshad de dus mnyam du byung bas dus mnyam du gsungs par 'dra  ba la ; /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897483#897490#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1065# rjes song phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan du yod pa la sogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa bshad pa de dang dus gcig tu theg pa chen po yang bshad de dus mnyam du byung bas dus mnyam du gsungs par 'dra  ba la ; /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897490#897503#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1065;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1066# rjes song phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan du yod pa la sogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa bshad pa de dang dus gcig tu theg pa chen po yang bshad de dus mnyam du byung bas dus mnyam du gsungs par 'dra  ba la ; /
column7: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894873#894873#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_756# gal te nyan thos dag gang gi tshe mnyan du yod pa la sogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa de'i tshe theg pa chen po ma bshad kyi / /

column3: de'i dbang po lnga bul ba'i rang bzhin du gyur la / / +chung ngu dang bul bar 'jug pa ste / / +'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897501#897518#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1066;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1067;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1068# nyan thos kyi theg pa la skrag par mi bya na theg pa chen po la ci'i phyir skrag par bya ba'i rigs zhes de ltar tshul bzhin du yid la byas nas dpyad na theg pa chen po'i chos la skrag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: dad pa'i dbang po dang  brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang  dran pa'i dbang po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang  shes rab kyi dbang po bul ba'i rang bzhin du gyur cing chung ngu  dang bul bar 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ltar zag pa zad pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ches bul bar thob par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897519#897531#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1068;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1069# gal te theg pa chen po'i nang  nas stong pa dang med pa 'ba' zhig bshad na ni skrag par bya ba'i gnas kyang yin no // /
column5: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#973207#973207#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10644;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10645# bsam pa'i chos yang  dag par ston pa'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa'o zhes bya ba la / / +phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang  sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa bsam pa'i chos zhes bya ste / /

column3: 'di ni mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam zhes bya'o // / +mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897532#897550#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1069# stong pa 'ba' zhig bshad par ma zad kyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos sna tshogs dang  lam sna tshogs kyang bshad pas na stong par bshad pa'i bka' 'di  la yang dgongs pa 'ga' zhig yod do zhes ji ltar tshul bzhin du bsams na theg pa chen po la skrag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'di na kha cig nye bar len pa'i phung po lngas 'dzem  zhing gnod la ring du byed cing smod par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897544#897556#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1069;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1070# stong pa 'ba' zhig bshad par ma zad kyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos sna tshogs dang  lam sna tshogs kyang bshad pas na stong par bshad pa'i bka' 'di  la yang dgongs pa 'ga' zhig yod do zhes ji ltar tshul bzhin du bsams na theg pa chen po la skrag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897630#897638#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1079;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1080;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1081# ched mi che na bcom ldan 'das kyis lan cig  tsam bshad de phyis mi gsung pa'i rigs so zhes / / +ji ltar tshul bzhin du bsams na theg pa chen po la skrag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#296368#296370#TD4026E.TXT.r_3748# gzod ma nas dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir dang  don phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pa'i sgo nas theg pa chen po la lta ba drang por byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2017007#2017007#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5694;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5695# zhes bya bar go ba de bzhin du 'dir yang phra rgyas kyi don ni mthun pa'i don du rtogs par 'gyur ro // / +yang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas ji ltar zhe na / /

column3: de nye bar len pa'i phung po lngas bdag nyid nyon mongs shing nyon mongs par byas pa dang  khur lci bas mnan pa dang  bdag da ltar 'chi ba la thug gi bar du byas so snyam du ri gnas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897555#897564#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1069;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1070;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1071;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1072# stong pa 'ba' zhig bshad par ma zad kyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos sna tshogs dang  lam sna tshogs kyang bshad pas na stong par bshad pa'i bka' 'di  la yang dgongs pa 'ga' zhig yod do zhes ji ltar tshul bzhin du bsams na theg pa chen po la skrag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +mang po'i sgo nas rtag tu ston dang ldan // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897565#897575#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1072;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1073;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1074# mang po ni lang kar gshegs pa dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i     // /

column3: de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la 'dzem zhing smod pa dang rjes  su mi mthun te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897576#897584#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1074;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1075;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1076# sgo zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid ston pa'i rnam grangs la bya la / / +stong pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir / /

column3: de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la 'dzem zhing smod pa dang rjes su mi mthun pa 'di ni de'i dka' ba zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897583#897596#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1075;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1076;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1077# stong pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir / / +ma byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang dngos po med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam grangs du mas bstan  to ; / /

column3: de'i dbang po lnga rnon por gyur cing mgyogs par 'jug ste / / +'di lta ste / / +dad pa'i dbang po dang  brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang  dran pa'i dbang po dang  ting nge  'dzin gyi dbang po dang  shes rab kyi dbang po rnon por gyur cing myur du 'jug pa de'i phyir 'di ltar zag pa zad pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ches myur ba thob par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897593#897604#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1076;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1077;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1078# ma byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang dngos po med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam grangs du mas bstan  to ; / / +rtag tu zhes bya ba ni lan cig bstan par ma zad kyi rgyun ma chad par bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897605#897613#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1078# de ltar stong pa nyid de mdo sde thams cad kyi nang nas rnam grangs du mas rgyun ma 'chad par bstan pas na stong pa 'di dgos pa che zhing ched che bar mngon te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897613#897626#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1078;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1079;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1080# de ltar stong pa nyid de mdo sde thams cad kyi nang nas rnam grangs du mas rgyun ma 'chad par bstan pas na stong pa 'di dgos pa che zhing ched che bar mngon te / /

column3: 'di ni mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam zhes bya'o // / +mngon par shes pa bul la sla ba'i lam gang zhe na / /
column4: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#969962#969967#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10217;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10218# de bas rnal 'byor bsgom pa  rnams kyang don med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar na bshad pa don med par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.008#TD4047E.TXT.r#1162619#1162620#TD4047E.TXT.r_6088;TD4047E.TXT.r_6089# de dag gis lus dpen par  gnas pa thob na sems pa la bde bar 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no // / +ji ltar thos pa'i don rnams yid la byed pa'i sbyor bas sems pa dang  sngon dang phyi ma mi 'gal bas 'grang bar byed pa ni gzhal bar 'dod pa'o // /
column6: 0.009#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#944995#944995#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7065# mngon pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur na chos dang don rnams gzhan la ma nor bar bshad pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#944281#944282#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6972# phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnams la the tshom gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por ni mdo sde'i sde snod bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#898068#898071#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1120;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1121# gang gi tshe sa bcu'i 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de rang gis rig pa med par theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin par ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#976779#976780#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11118;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11119# ma nges pa'i rigs can dag theg pa chen po spyod pa dang dbye bar  'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to // / +theg pa'i mchog bshad pa ni theg pa chen po bstan pa'o zhes bya ba la / /
column10: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#463591#463591#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1849# 'di ltar yi ge ni legs pa  brjod pas 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur la don ni skyon med pas bzhin zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe'o // /
column11: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478074#478074#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3653# 'dir bstan bcos de dag las bshad pa'i don yang mdor bsdu na bshad pa rnam pa lngar 'gyur te / /
column12: 0.022#TD4015E.TXT.r#1971802#1971802#TD4015E.TXT.r_811;TD4015E.TXT.r_812# de yang bsngo bas    bzang ba'i bsod nams khyad par du 'phags pa 'di thob par 'gyur ba'o // / +'gyur ro zhes bya bar bstan pa ni de dag gi don grub pa'i rnam par dbye bar yongs su 'gyur ba ste / /
column13: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977882#977882#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11217# yang na rjes su bsngags  pa de dag rim gyis thob par nges pa med kyi 'chol bar 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1196419#1196420#TD4047E.TXT.r_10725# rton pa bzhi po dag la zhes bya ba ni don rnam pa bzhis rton pa rnam pa bzhi la ji ltar rton par rigs par 'gyur zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column15: 0.024#TD4019E.TXT.r#2498246#2498247#TD4019E.TXT.r_11939;TD4019E.TXT.r_11940# don gyi rnam par snang yang bden pa'i don med de / / +rgyas par sngar bstan pa bzhin no // /
