column5: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2326242#2326242#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1875;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1876# 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang  nyan thos bye brag med pa'o zhes  bshad de / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: chos ma yin pas ma yin pa dang  chos kyis bsod snyoms dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i rkyen sman dang  'tsho ba'i yo byad dag tshol  bar byed kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900382#900392#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1396;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1397# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920928#920929#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914541#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3966# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922396#922398#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4080# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896433#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959054#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925684#925685#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4482# sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes rgya cher bstan nas da don de nyid mjug bsdu zhing ji  ltar sems can yongs su smin par byas pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900164#900165#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1362# 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs su song bas 'phags so zhes glengs pa la kun tu 'gro ba'i don rgyas par bshad par bya ba'i  tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897141#897141#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# skur pa btab na ngan song du lhung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba dang  skrag na yang rgyu gang gi sa skrag pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906651#906652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905351#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#928754#928754#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4916# da ni gnas yongs su gyur pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa drug rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: chos ma yin pas ma yin pa ste / / +'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o zhes log pa'i 'tsho ba la log pa'i 'tsho ba zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di ni 'di'i yang dag pa'i lta bar 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900391#900407#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1396;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1397;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1398;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1399;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1400# khas blangs pa'i don de yang khyad  par rnam pa gsum gyis rig par bya ste / /

column3: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba la yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o zhes mthong ba 'di ni 'di'i yang  dag pa'i lta bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900408#900415#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1398;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1400;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1399# dga' ba mang pos byang chub mchog tshol zhing // / +nyan thos dag dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song na bdag mya ngan las 'das pa thob  par shog shig ces khas len na / /

column3: de de ltar shes nas log pa'i 'tsho ba spang ba'i phyir 'bad par byed cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900416#900423#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1400;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1401# nyan thos dag dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song na bdag mya ngan las 'das pa thob  par shog shig ces khas len na / /
column5: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902451#902453#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1624# byang chub sems dpa' rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni / / +sangs rgyas gang la skyabs su song ba'i sangs rgyas de'i rang bzhin nyid grub par bya ba'i phyir skyabs su 'gro bar khas len te / /

column3: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba nye bar bsgrub pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i rtsol ba byed cing / / +de dran pa dang ldan bzhin du log pa'i 'tsho ba spong zhing yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba bsgom pa 'di ni 'di'i yang dag  pa'i dran pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900424#900441#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1401;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1402;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1403# byang chub sems dpa' rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba ni sangs rgyas gang la skyabs su song ba'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi rang bzhin thob par shog shig ces khas len cing byang chub tu sems bskyed de / /
column5: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#927586#927586#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4756# 'dir ni 'jig rten pa dag rgyal po dang rkun po la sogs pas 'jigs nas ri la sogs pa la skyabs su 'gro ba dang  nyan thos pa dag 'khor ba'i skye rgan 'chi la sogs pas 'jigs nas bdag bskyab pa'i phyir dkon  mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i gang zag de dag pas gang zag gang sangs rgyas gang la skyabs su song pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid thob par byas nas bdag nyid sems can kun gyi skyabs su gyur cig ces dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de  skyabs gzhan pas mchog tu gyur pa yin te / /

column3: lam gyi yan lag gsum pa 'di dag ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i rjes su 'jug pa ste / / +'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900442#900449#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1402;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1403;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1404# 'dis ni smon lam gyi khyad par  bstan to // / +ci'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid thob par bya bar sems bskyed ce na dga' ba mang po'i phyir te / /

column3: lta ba dang  rtsol ba dang  dran pa'o // / +dge slong dag de la yang dag pa'i lta ba sngon du 'gro ba las dge ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900450#900467#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1403;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1404;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1405# ci'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid thob par bya bar sems bskyed ce na dga' ba mang po'i phyir te / / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan thos nas dga' ba dang dad pa skyes te / /
column5: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2868965#2868965#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_107# dper na dgras longs spyod dang dge ba sna tshogs kyi bgegs dang bar chad byed pa de bzhin du las gsum gyi sgo nas dge ba spyad pa la  theg pa ngan par bsngos na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan thob pa la sogs pa la bgegs su 'gyur bas na dgra dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba  gang zhe na ; / +'dun pa'i brtson 'grus dang  mi 'da' ba dang  pha rol gnon pa dang  spong ba dang  rtsol ba dang  mi 'gong ba dang  chog par mi 'dzin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshol ba zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900467#900479#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1405;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1406;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1407;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1408# yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas de  bdag gis thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na / / +gang yang dran pa dang  rjes su dran pa  dang ; / +so sor dran pa dang  mi brjed pa'i dran pa dang  mi brjed pa dang  mi rmongs pa dang  rab tu ma rmongs pa dang  ma rmongs pa'i chos can dang  sems kyi mngon par brjod pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900480#900488#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1408# sems bskyed nas kyang sangs rgyas de thob par bya ba'i phyir mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa'i gtang bar bya ba dka' ba spyod pa'i sgo nas mos pas spyod pa'i sa yan chad  sa bcu man chad skyo ba med par khas len te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900489#900497#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1408;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1409# sems bskyed nas kyang sangs rgyas de thob par bya ba'i phyir mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa'i gtang bar bya ba dka' ba spyod pa'i sgo nas mos pas spyod pa'i sa yan chad  sa bcu man chad skyo ba med par khas len te / /

column3: 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o // / +yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / / +gang    yang sems gnas pa dang  rab tu gnas pa dang  mngon par gnas pa dang  rang bzhin du gnas pa dang  mi gyeng ba dang  yang dag par sdud pa dang  zhi gnas dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  sems rtse gcig pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900498#900508#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1408;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1409;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1410;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1411# sems bskyed nas kyang sangs rgyas de thob par bya ba'i phyir mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa'i gtang bar bya ba dka' ba spyod pa'i sgo nas mos pas spyod pa'i sa yan chad  sa bcu man chad skyo ba med par khas len te / / +'dis bsgrub pa'i khyad par bstan to // / +rim par sangs rgyas kun mtshungs 'gro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900508#900519#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1411;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1412# zhes bya ba la de ltar sa bcu man chad rim gyis bsgrubs nas / /

column3: 'di ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o // / +de  la yang dag pa'i lta ba las yang dag pa'i rtog pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900518#900527#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1412;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1413# sangs rgyas kyi sar sangs rgyas par gyur pa dang  sangs rgyas kun dang sku mnyam pa dang   gsung mnyam pa dang  thugs mnyam pa dang  tshogs mnyam pa thob par 'gyur te / /

column3: yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900528#900539#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1412;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1414;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1415# sangs rgyas kyi sar sangs rgyas par gyur pa dang  sangs rgyas kun dang sku mnyam pa dang   gsung mnyam pa dang  thugs mnyam pa dang  tshogs mnyam pa thob par 'gyur te / / +'dis ni 'bras bu'i khyad par bstan to // /

column3: dge  slong dag sems yang dag par mnyam par gzhag pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ltar 'dod chags dang  zhe sdang dang  gti mug las sems yang dag par grol bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900538#900547#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1414;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1415;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1416;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1417# sku gsum brnyes pas na sku mnyam mo // / +ye shes bzhi brnyes pas na thugs mnyam mo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900548#900557#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1416;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1417;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1418;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1419# tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping ka'i dbyangs kyis so sor yang dag     // / +par rig pa bzhis ston pas na gsung mnyam mo // /

column3: de ltar sems rnam par grol ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos dag gi skye ba zad do // / +tshangs par spyod pa bsten to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900558#900567#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1418;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1419;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1420# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par brnyes pas na tshogs mnyam mo // / +khas blangs mchog tu blo ldan de rig bya // /

column3: bya ba byas so // / +byed pa byas so // / +srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa'i shes par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900566#900578#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1419;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1420;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1421# khas blangs mchog tu blo ldan de rig bya // / +zhes bya ba la blo ldan ni byang chub sems dpa' la bya ste / /

column3: dge slong dag de la slob pa'i lam ni yan lag rnam pa brgyad dang ldan la / / +dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa kun shes pa la bstan pa'i  mi slob pa ni yan lag bcu dang yang dag par ldan no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900577#900593#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1421;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1422# khyad par rnam pa  gsum dang ldan pa las na byang chub sems dpa'i khas blangs pa las ni nyan thos kyi khas blangs pa dag pas mchog tu gyur par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#687765#687766#TD4083E.TXT.r_436# snying rjer ro gcig pa'i dang ba chan po dang ldan pa dang  sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan la reg par 'dod pa'i bsam pas zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.017#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1401408#1401409#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_199# don bzhin yin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste de'i phyir don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par ston pas don bzhin ston pa'o khyad par du byas so // /
column7: 0.019#TD4010E.TXT.r#2246651#2246651#TD4010E.TXT.r_2023;TD4010E.TXT.r_2024# gzungs kyi sgo dang  dga' ba dang  bde ba gang lha yul gyi dga' ba dang bde ba thob po zhes bya bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyis reg pa'i mthu khyad par du  'phags par rig par bya'o // / +de dag nyid kyi don tshigs su bcad pas so sor bstan pa'i phyir / /
column8: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#277022#277022#TD4026E.TXT.r_369;TD4026E.TXT.r_370# 'di ltar skyo ba med par dka' ba spyod pa'o // / +thob pa'i khyad par ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas thams cad  dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o // /
column9: 0.023#TD4051E.TXT.r#1241929#1241930#TD4051E.TXT.r_1322# nus pa'i khyad par gang las  bdag dang  chos dang  bya ba'i mngon par brjod par 'byung ba'o // /
column10: 0.023#TD4079E.TXT.r#757389#757393#TD4079E.TXT.r_116;TD4079E.TXT.r_117# mngon  par 'dod pa ma yin pa sgra ji bzhin pa'i yi ge'i don ni ma yin no // / +de bzhin gshegs pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pas tshad mar snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pas nges par mdzad pa'i don tshad ma yin gyi gzhan gyis log par bsams pa ni ma yin no // /
column11: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#511148#511148#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8065# rtogs par dka' ba mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba gcig pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /
column12: 0.024#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3107282#3107282#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2190# ngas  ni don dam pa rtog ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /
column13: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#152883#152884#TD4035E.TXT.r_4888;TD4035E.TXT.r_4889# brnyas shing nyan pa na ston pas na dus ma yin pa'o // / +snga ma dang phyi ma'i don 'brel pa med pas  na ma 'brel pa'o // /
column14: 0.024#TD4018E.TXT.r#3081335#3081335#TD4018E.TXT.r_10082;TD4018E.TXT.r_10083# 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i bshad pa ye shes dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'i le'u  gsum pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos dpyad pa'i 'og tu rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i chos thor bu dpyad pa bcva lnga pa'o //// / +thams cad mkhyen pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por dgongs pa'i bsdu ba'i don ni 'di yin te / /
column15: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1040239#1040239#TD4054E.TXT.r_7862# gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i dbang du bya ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i 'phen pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis de gnyi gar rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1127124#1127124#TD4047E.TXT.r_830# kun nas slong ba dang  de'i rgyu mthun pa'i khyad par yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bzhir bstan par rigs par bya ste / /
column17: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1159987#1159987#TD4047E.TXT.r_5726# rigs dang ldan pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i ris su lhung ba dus gzhan du gyur pa  na rgyud yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par dang ldan pas mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir 'phen pa'i rgyu yin no // /
column18: 0.025#TD4049E.TXT.r#2303349#2303350#TD4049E.TXT.r_2742;TD4049E.TXT.r_2743;TD4049E.TXT.r_2744# zhugs pa'i chos la gnas pa'am / / +snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par gyi lam gang yin pa'o // / +yang yon tan khyad par can rnams mngon par bsgrub pa'am / /
column19: 0.026#TD4025E.TXT.r#2165601#2165601#TD4025E.TXT.r_12;TD4025E.TXT.r_13# de la thos pa dang bsams  pa las byung ba'i shes pas phigs par dka' ba'i phyir nas brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin so so rang gis rig par bya ba'i don rdo rje lta bur rig par bya'o // / +de thob pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam ston par byed pas na don de brjod pa'i yi ge gang yin pa de dag ni gnas zhes brjod do // /
column20: 0.026#TD4019E.TXT.r#2433684#2433684#TD4019E.TXT.r_3530# zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni dri ba'i don so sor re rer dngos po'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba dang ldan zhing / /
column21: 0.026#TD4013E.TXT.r#612015#612015#TD4013E.TXT.r_277;TD4013E.TXT.r_278# bde bar gshegs pa de dag la so so re  re la bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdul phra rab kyi grangs snyed kyi lus rnams kyis phyag 'tshal zhing mngon du phyogs nas bstod do zhes bya ba yin no // / +de ltar rang 'khrungs pa dang  rang 'khrungs ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa grangs med pa yang bstan  la ; /
column22: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#135716#135716#TD4035E.TXT.r_1897;TD4035E.TXT.r_1898# rnam pa bcu'i phyir te / / +rjes su 'brel ba'i skye bo'i don dang  dmigs pa myong ba'i don dang  dmigs pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don dang  dmigs pa mngon par 'du byed  pa'i don dang  chos de dag nyid dus tha dad pa'i don dang  sgrib pa med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa dang bral ba'i don dang  mi rtag pa dang ma bral ba'i don dang  rtag pa phyin ci ma log pa'i don dang  bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i don dang  tshor ba dang bral ba ma    yin pa'i don dang  tshor ba dang bral ba'i don dang  nang dang phyi'i skye mched rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba de dag ni / /
column23: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#993276#993276#TD4054E.TXT.r_261# sgra gang 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams  kyis nye bar blangs pa rna ba'i dbang po'i gzung ba'i don gang yid du 'ong ba'am / /
column24: 0.027#TD4018E.TXT.r#3082741#3082741#TD4018E.TXT.r_10242# de yang de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid ma yin par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column25: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2486010#2486010#TD4019E.TXT.r_10302;TD4019E.TXT.r_10303# gzugs ni gzhig cing gzhom du rung ba'i mtshan nyid de / / +de ni mtshan nyid med par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang 'gal lo zhe na / /
column26: 0.028#TD4010E.TXT.r#2256434#2256434#TD4010E.TXT.r_3313;TD4010E.TXT.r_3314# rtog pa'i bye brag gis  'jug par bya ba la zhugs pas gong nas gong du shin tu 'das pa'i khyad par ro // / +rdo rje'i tshig ni mi phyed pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas pas na rdo rje'i tshig go // /
column27: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368693#2368693#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6860# de la gsum du bsgyur ba ni snga ma'i yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes par byed pa 'di nyid la gsum du bsgyur ba zhes bya ste / /
column28: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1046972#1046972#TD4054E.TXT.r_8861# yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i rgyu dang  yongs  su shes pa dang  yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  de rab tu shes pa'o // /
column29: 0.029#TD4019E.TXT.r#2482215#2482215#TD4019E.TXT.r_9752;TD4019E.TXT.r_9753# de yang chos thams cad kyi nang du 'dus pas ma skyes par yang khas blangs pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi tshig 'gal bas dam bcas pa las nyams pa'o // / +dam bcas pa'ang zhes pa la sogs pas don de nyid rgyas par ston  te ; / /
column30: 0.029#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529846#1529846#TD4061E.TXT.r_2360# tha dad par smos pa ni khyad par dang khyad par med par sbyin pa'i dbye bas yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: yan lag rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i slob pa'i lam gang zhe na / / +slob pa yang dag pa'i lta pa dang ldan ba dang  slob pa'i yang dag pa'i rtog ba dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang  dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang yang dag par ldan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900594#900609#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1422;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1423;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1424# yang khas blangs pa'i khyad par du sangs rgyas sras kyi mchog tu skyes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gzhan gyis bstan to  zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900609#900619#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1423;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1424;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1425;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1426# gong du yon tan rnam pa gsum gyis khyad par khas blangs pa khyad zhugs par bstan nas / / +da yang tshigs su bcad pa gzhan gyis khas blangs pa de khyad zhugs par ston te / /

column3: slob pa'i lam ni yan lag brgyad po 'di dag dang yang dag par ldan no // / +dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa kun shes pa la brten pa'i mi slob pa'i yan  lag bcu dang yang dag par ldan pa gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900618#900638#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1425;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1426;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1427;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1428# de yang ji ltar zhe na / / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams kyang  sangs rgyas kyi sras zhes bya mod kyi / /

column3: mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dang  mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang      // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900634#900648#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1427;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1428;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1429# de dag gsung las skyes pa'i sras zhes bya'i thugs las skyes pa'i sras zhes mi bya'o // / +bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sras rnams ni thugs las skyes pa'i sras yin pas sras kyi mchog tu skyes pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang  mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa dang yang dag par ldan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900645#900658#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1428;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1429;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1430# bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sras rnams ni thugs las skyes pa'i sras yin pas sras kyi mchog tu skyes pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa kun shes pa la brten pa'i mi slob pa'i lam ni yan lag bcu po 'di  dag dang yang dag par ldan no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520417#2520427#TD4020E.TXT.r_109;TD4020E.TXT.r_110;TD4020E.TXT.r_111;TD4020E.TXT.r_112# sangs rgyas sras kyi mchog tu legs  par gang skyes pa // / +sems dang shes rab dang ni tshogs ldan snying rje ni // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900657#900668#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1429;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1430;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1431;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1432# sangs rgyas kyi sras  kyi mchog tu skyes pa'i sgo nas kyang khas blangs pa'i khyad zhugs par ston to // / +sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras mchog tu ni gang skyes pa // /
column6: 0.012#TD4026E.TXT.r#277049#277051#TD4026E.TXT.r_372;TD4026E.TXT.r_373# sangs rgyas sras kyi mchog tu legs par gang skyes pa // / +sems dang shes rab dang ni tshogs ldan snying rje 'di // /

column3: dge slong dag de la yang dag pa'i lta bas log pa'i lta ba spong bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900669#900676#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1431;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1432;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1433# sems dang shes rab dang ni tshogs ldan snying rje dang / / +sa bon ma dang mngal gnas ma ma mtshungs pa med // /
column5: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#277060#277060#TD4026E.TXT.r_374;TD4026E.TXT.r_375# sa bon  ma dang mngal nas ma ma mtshungs pa med // / +blo ldan de ni khas len mchog tu shes par bya // /

column3: log pa'i lta ba la brten nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900677#900685#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1433;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1434;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1435# de ni khas blangs mchog tu blo ldan shes par bya // /

column3: yang dag pa'i lta ba spangs nas yang dag pa'i lta ba la brten nas dge ba'i chos rnam pa  du ma bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900684#900694#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1434;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1435;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1436# zhes bya ba la / / +'di ltar 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i sras kyang yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang  'khor los sgyur pa'i rigs mi gcod par gnas pa yin te / /
column5: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2774356#2774357#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10245;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10246;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10247# bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro // / +bzhi gang zhe na / / +tshul khrims dang ldan par gnas pa dang  so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang  cho ga phun sum tshogs pa dang  spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang  kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam dag la  yang 'jigs par lta ba dang  bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te / /

column3: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang dag pa'i  rnam par grol ba dang  yang dag pa'i shes pas log pa'i lta ba spong bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900695#900712#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1435;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1436;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1437;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1438;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1439# 'di ltar 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i sras kyang yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang  'khor los sgyur pa'i rigs mi gcod par gnas pa yin te / / +bzhi gang zhe na / /

column3: log pa'i lta ba la brten nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900713#900720#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1438;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1439# de las bon phun sum tshogs pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyis sa bon dang khu ba gzhag gi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no // / +ma phun sum tshogs pa yang sa bon de yang btsun mo dam pa la gzhag gi bran mo ngan pa la sogs pa la mi bzhag pa'o // /

column3: yang dag pa'i shes pas spangs nas yang dag pa'i shes pa la brten nas dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma bsgom  pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900721#900739#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1439;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1440;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1441;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1442# ma phun sum tshogs pa yang sa bon de yang btsun mo dam pa la gzhag gi bran mo ngan pa la sogs pa la mi bzhag pa'o // /

column3: dge slong dag de la gang yang mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos nyi shu dang  gang yang dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos nyi shu po de dag gcig tu bsdams nas bzhi bcu pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po dge sbyong ngam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900740#900748#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1441;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1442;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1443# mngal gyi gnas kyang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan la sogs pas nyams par yang ma byas pa'o // / +de ltar na zhag dang zla ba la sogs pa tshang nas mngal yongs su rdzogs te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900749#900756#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1442;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1443# de ltar na zhag dang zla ba la sogs pa tshang nas mngal yongs su rdzogs te / / +bde bar skyes nas kyang gal  te ma mas bkru ba dang  nu ma snun pa la sogs pa zhal ta legs par byed pa'i lag tu song ste / /

column3: bram ze 'am / / +lha 'am / / +bdud dam / / +tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang gis kyang ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900757#900769#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1443;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1444;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1445# bde bar skyes nas kyang gal  te ma mas bkru ba dang  nu ma snun pa la sogs pa zhal ta legs par byed pa'i lag tu song ste / /
column5: 0.020#TD4079E.TXT.r#759133#759133#TD4079E.TXT.r_432;TD4079E.TXT.r_433# nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de nyid las skyes nas 'jug par 'gyur te / / +'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mngon du byas pa dang  'gog pa'i     // /
column6: 0.023#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2577963#2577966#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_5259;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_5260;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_5261# lta ba mchog tu  'dzin pa la sogs pa ni de la dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro // / +bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rigs kyang rgyas par 'gyur te / /
column7: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912163#912163#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2727;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2728# sems can gyi don byed pa rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bskul nas don byed par 'gyur la / / +byang chub sems dpa' lhag par ngo tsha bar bya ba yin no    zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2578246#2578246#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_5284;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_5285# dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur    ro ;; / +bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rigs ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba la rgyas par 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1127441#1127441#TD4047E.TXT.r_881;TD4047E.TXT.r_882# gang skyes na gtan du 'jug la phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba la / / +rgyu rnam pa bzhis sems de ldog par 'gyur te / /

column3: dge slong dag gang kha cig 'di ltar ngas bzhi bcu pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po bstan pa la phyir bzlog cing khro bar bya'o snyam du sems na de la gzhan gyis chos  kyis smra zhing rjes su smra ba'i smad pa'i gnas kyi chos bcu 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900770#900777#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1444;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1445;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1446# rim gyis skyes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs mi gcod par gnas par 'gyur ro // / +de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtshungs pa med pa rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par sangs  rgyas kyi sras su skyes pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900777#900787#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1445;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1446;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1447;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1448# de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtshungs pa med pa rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par sangs  rgyas kyi sras su skyes pa / / +de nyan thos la sogs pa'i khas blangs pa pas khas blangs pa'i mchog tu rig par bya ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900787#900805#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1447;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1448;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1449;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1450# mtshungs pa med pa rnam pa bzhi ni / / +sa bon mtshungs pa med pa dang  ma mtshungs pa med pa dang  mngal gyi gnas mtshungs pa med pa dang  mam mtshungs pa med  pa'o ; / /

column3: bcu gang zhe na / / +yang dag pa'i lta ba smad cing log pa'i lta ba rjes su bsngags la gang yang dge sbyong dang bram ze log par lta zhing log pa'i lam du zhugs pa de dag khyed kyis mchod cing khyed kyis    bsngags so zhes gzhan gyis chos smra zhing rjes su smra ba'i smad pa'i gnas kyi chos 'di lta bu dang po 'ong bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900805#900814#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1449;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1450;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1451# theg pa chen po la brten pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba'i sa bon ni byang chub kyi sems te / / +de yang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas pas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sa bon du 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900814#900823#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1450;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1451;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1452# de yang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas pas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sa bon du 'gyur te / / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi  rigs can nam / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900823#900836#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1451;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1452;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1453;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1454# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi  rigs can nam / / +rigs med pas sems bskyed na ni sa bon du mi 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.018#TD4027E.TXT.r#555019#555019#TD4027E.TXT.r_449;TD4027E.TXT.r_450# byang chub kyi sems  de'i gnas ni byang chub sems dpa'o // / +byang chub kyi sems bskyed de / /

column3: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i  dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang  yang dag pa'i shes pa smad cing log pa'i shes pa rjes su bsngags pa gang yang dge sbyong dang bram ze log par shes shing log par zhugs pa de dag khyed kyis mchod cing khyed kyis rab tu bsngags so zhes  gzhan gyis chos kyis smra zhing rjes su smra ba'i smad pa'i gnas kyi chos 'di lta bu bcu pa 'ong bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900837#900848#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1454;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1455# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mar 'gyur gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan mar gyur na sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcod par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900849#900863#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1455;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1456;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1457# de la yang bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs mngal gyi gnas lta bu dang ldan na 'tshang rgya ste ci'i phyir zhe na / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900863#900872#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1456;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1457# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba'i rten du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro // / +bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs kyang de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa ser sna la sogs  pas dri ma can du ma byas na gdod 'tshang rgya ba'i rten du 'gyur gyi / /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900873#900882#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1457;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1458# bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs kyang de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa ser sna la sogs  pas dri ma can du ma byas na gdod 'tshang rgya ba'i rten du 'gyur gyi / /
column8: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#939859#939861#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6433;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6434;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6435# sangs rgyas du ma med do zhes thog ma'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba gang yang med de / / +ci'i phyir zhe na / / +bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ma bsags par  'tshang rgya bar ni mi rigs la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi chogs kyang de'i lung 'bogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan med du mi rung bas sangs rgyas de'i lung 'bogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan yang dgos la / /
column9: 0.019#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889638#2889639#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3077# snying rje'i dbang gis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyu bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.024#TD4029E.TXT.r#2123774#2123774#TD4029E.TXT.r_469# de yang gal te sangs rgyas kyi rigs can kho na zhig sems skyed par byed kyi rigs med pa dang ma nges pa'i rigs can yang ma yin pa dang  sa bon de'i ma yang gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu  phyin pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin pa dang  gal te yang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa mngal gyi gnas yin pa dang  de la yang gal te mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur ba'i chos rnams kyis bar chad ma byas te / /

column3: gang yang re zhig dge sbyong dang bram ze dus dang lo bgrang ba med par smra zhing rtog pa mi dge ba'i chos byas shing byas pa de dang de dag chad pa dang  'jig pa dang nyams par dogs pa de dag kyang  bzhi bcu pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po bstan pa la zhe sdang dang 'jigs pa la gtogs par phyir bzlog pa dang khro bar bya ba mnyam du mi sems so zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900883#900898#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1457;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1458;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1459# bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs kyang de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa ser sna la sogs  pas dri ma can du ma byas na gdod 'tshang rgya ba'i rten du 'gyur gyi / / +mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dri ma can du gyur pa'i rten du mi 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900899#900906#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1459;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1460;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1461# de ltar sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skyes nas kyang gal te snying rje chen pos ma ma byas te mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar ma ltung bar 'khor ba nas byang chub sems dpa'i     // / +spyod pa rgyun ma bcad na 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900907#900915#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1460;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1461;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1462# spyod pa rgyun ma bcad na 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te / / +de ltar yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par skyes pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcod par gnas pa yin no // /

column3: rnam grol gnyis zhes bya ba la / / +sa dang byis pa thog dang ni // / +rigs dang tshul khrims sdug bsngal dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900916#900925#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1461;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1462;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1463;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1464;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1465# de ltar yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par skyes pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcod par gnas pa yin no // / +de ni mngon par skyes pa'i khyad par gyis // /

column3: pha la brten  nas 'joms pa dang / / +log pa nyid ni brgyad pa yin // / +zhes bya ba sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa'i pha la brten nas zhes bya ba'i mdo las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa 'di nyid du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skabs su shes rab nyon mongs bstan phyir zhes bya bar bris zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900924#900940#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1463;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1464;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1465;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1466;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1467# zhes bya ba la / / +yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par skyes pa ni / / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas las 'phags par skyes pa yin pas mngon par skyes pa'i khyad par can yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900940#900957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1467;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1468;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1469# lus kyi khyad par gyis khyad par can du byas pas khas len pa de nyid kyi khyad par tshigs su bcad pa gzhan gyis bstan to zhes bya ba la / /

column3: 'o na mdo las stag gi byang chub kyi bu dag ces bya ba la / / +tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo kron dhi nas ljongs rgyu zhing ro can par phyin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900958#900974#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1468;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1469# yon tan rnam  pa bzhi dang ldan par skyes pa de nyid legs par skyes pa zhes bya ste / / +legs par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten pa brgya byin la sogs pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i lus pas kyang lus khyad zhugs par 'thob pas khas len ba de khyad par du 'phags par  bstan pa de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /

column3: ro can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi shing sha pa'i tshal na gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900975#900983#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1469;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1470# legs par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten pa brgya byin la sogs pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i lus pas kyang lus khyad zhugs par 'thob pas khas len ba de khyad par du 'phags par  bstan pa de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /

column3: de nas ro can pa dang kron dhi pa rnams kyis thub pa chen po 'phags pa kun dga' bo kron dhi  nas ljongs rgyu zhing ro can du phyin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900984#901001#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1470;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1471;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1472;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1473# sna tshogs mtshan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan cing // / +sems can thams cad smin bya'i phyir ni de stobs thob // /
column5: 5.960#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520447#2520449#TD4020E.TXT.r_114;TD4020E.TXT.r_115# sems can thams    cad smin par byed stobs thob // / +sangs rgyas bde chen mtha' yas zhi ba rnyed // /
column6: 5.960#TD4026E.TXT.r#277125#277128#TD4026E.TXT.r_385;TD4026E.TXT.r_386# sems can thams cad smin par byed stobs thob // / +sangs rgyas bde chen mtha' yas zhi ba rnyed // /

column3: ro can gyi grong gi byang phyogs kyi shing sha pa'i tshal na gnas so zhes thos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901000#901010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1472;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1473;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1474# sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba bde chen mtha' yas rnyed // / +sems can thams cad bskyab phyir thabs chen bshams pa shes // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901227#901235#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1496;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1497# yang legs  par skyes pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod par tshigs su bcad pa gzhan gyis bstan to zhes bya ba la yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par skyes pa ni legs par skyes pa ste / / +dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sras yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal  po'i rigs rgyun mi gcod pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcod par gnas pa'i tshigs su bcad ba rtsom mo // /

column3: thos nas 'dus shing nye bar 'dus / / +tshogs shing rab tu tshogs te rab tu tshogs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der nye bar song ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901011#901030#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1474;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1475;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1476# zhes bya ba la  dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sras su skyes na yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i lus kyi khyad par 'thob ste / /

column3: nye bar song nas 'phags pa     // / +kun dga' bo'i zhabs la phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901031#901040#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1476# mi phal pa dang mi 'dra ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i lus thob ba dang  rgyal phran gzhan tshar gcod pa'i ldan pa thob pa dang  rgyal po'i srid kyi longs spyod kyi  bde ba thob pa dang  rgyal srid kyi gtsug lag dang  rig pa'i gnas thams cad la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyang thob bo // /

column3: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ro can pa dang kron dhi pa rnams la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4010E.TXT.r#2238893#2238896#TD4010E.TXT.r_1015# mdor na mi gang ting nge 'dzin pa des ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku dang chos thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro  zhes bya ba yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4010E.TXT.r#2249114#2249118#TD4010E.TXT.r_2317# byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi gdung  rgyud mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs nas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku chen por gyur nas / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901041#901054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1476;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1477# mi phal pa dang mi 'dra ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i lus thob ba dang  rgyal phran gzhan tshar gcod pa'i ldan pa thob pa dang  rgyal po'i srid kyi longs spyod kyi  bde ba thob pa dang  rgyal srid kyi gtsug lag dang  rig pa'i gnas thams cad la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyang thob bo // /
column7: 0.010#TD4013E.TXT.r#612937#612939#TD4013E.TXT.r_367# skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku snying po lta bur gyur pa / /
column8: 0.014#TD4042E.TXT.r#1680778#1680778#TD4042E.TXT.r_534# de la gzugs bzang ba ni skyes  bu chen po'i mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rig par bya ste / /
column9: 0.016#TD4053E.TXT.r#2996387#2996390#TD4053E.TXT.r_4235# mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po  rnams ni gang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi dbang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa'i gzugs kyi skus 'dul ba rnams la kun du ston to // /
column10: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#967982#967984#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10002# dper  na rin po ches lus mdzes par byed pa dang 'dra bar mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kyang mdzes par byed pas na mtshan nyid rin po che dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977483#977484#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11176# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa longs spyod yang phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i sku'i mthu yang phyag gi tshigs gcig la spos kyi glang po du ma'i mthu dang ldan pa'o zhes bsngags te / /
column12: 0.025#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1746018#1746020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5981# de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par brgyan pa nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid can byon pa / /

column3: stag gi byang chub kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom  pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo bzhi gsungs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901052#901068#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1477;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1478# de dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi sras su skyes pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i lus thob pas na  gzugs bzang po'i khyad par dang ldan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#967982#967984#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10002# dper  na rin po ches lus mdzes par byed pa dang 'dra bar mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kyang mdzes par byed pas na mtshan nyid rin po che dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977483#977484#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11176# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa longs spyod yang phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i sku'i mthu yang phyag gi tshigs gcig la spos kyi glang po du ma'i mthu dang ldan pa'o zhes bsngags te / /
column7: 0.014#TD4010E.TXT.r#2284737#2284740#TD4010E.TXT.r_6923# thogs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i  de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par byang chub nas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgya cus brgyan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thun mong ma yin pa nges par sgrub par 'dod pas ji skad gsungs pa'i lus kyi sdom pa bsgom par  bya'o ; / /
column8: 0.017#TD4042E.TXT.r#1680777#1680778#TD4042E.TXT.r_534# de la gzugs bzang ba ni skyes  bu chen po'i mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rig par bya ste / /
column9: 0.028#TD4010E.TXT.r#2261883#2261883#TD4010E.TXT.r_4059;TD4010E.TXT.r_4060# ting nge 'dzin 'di lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'o // / +mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la sogs pa yon tan gyi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das yid la bya ba'o zhes bya bar / /
column10: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#967583#967583#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9953# gzugs kyi phung po las mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'grub par byed pa'i rgyu chos yin te / /
column11: 0.028#TD4010E.TXT.r#2230926#2230926#TD4010E.TXT.r_140;TD4010E.TXT.r_141# srog chags gsod pa dang  ma byin par len pa dang  mi tshangs par spyod pa mi dge ba'i lam spangs pas lus brgyan pa dang  brdzun du smra ba dang  phra ma dang  tshig  'khyal ba dang  ngag rtsub po med pas ngag brgyan pa dang  brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba yongs su spangs pas sems brgyan pa'o // / +yang na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni lus kyi rgyan yin no // /

column3: bzhi gang zhe na / / +tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo dang  sems yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo dang  lta ba yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo dang  rnam par grol ba  yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901140#901148#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1486;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1487# dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i sras su skyes pa de longs spyod kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs pa bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sras su skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpas kyang / / +nyon mongs pa dang shes  bya'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bde ba ye shes dang  theg pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang  stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur te / /

column3: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa zhes  bya ba nas bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste / /

column3: don sems shing 'jal ba dang nye bar rtog par byed pa de lta de ltar chos rnams lhag par rig cing lhag par rig pa dang  yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901462#901471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1516;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1517;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1518# dper na dbang bskur ba thob pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sras nyes pa byed pa rnams tshar gcod cing chad pas gcod par yang nus la legs par byed pa rnams phan gdags shing bya dga' byin pa de bzhin du dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang    chub sems dpa' rnams kyang tshul khrims la gnas shing yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la phan 'dogs shing gzengs bstod par yang nus la bslab pa la mi gnas shing skyon dang ldan pa rnams la tshar gcod cing chad pas gcod par yang nus te / / +'dis ni tshar gcod cing phan 'dogs  par byed pa bstan to // /
column5: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#277293#277293#TD4026E.TXT.r_408;TD4026E.TXT.r_409# de dang chos mthun par byang chub sems dpa' yang 'od zer dag gis dbang  bskur ba thob pa dang  ye shes thogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang dang ldan pa dang  sangs rgyas rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du ston pa'i rnam pa shes pa dang  bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bas nyes pa dang ldan pa dang yon tan dang ldan pa rnams tshar bcad pa dang phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid do // / +yang khas len pa'i khyad par de nyid blon po chen po lta bur tshigs su bcad pa gzhan gyis ston te / /

column3: ji lta ji ltar chos rnams lhag par rig cing lhag par rig pa dang  yang  dag pa'i shes rab kyis mthong ba de lta de ltar chos rnams la don gyi shugs rnyed pa dang  chos kyi shugs rnyed pa dang  chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901472#901484#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1518;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1519;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1520# yang khyad par de blon po chen po lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa gzhan gyis bstan te zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901485#901493#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1519;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1520;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1521;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1522# theg pa chen po'i tshul du khas blangs pa'i khyad par de blon po chen po'i tshul dang 'dra bas bstan te / / +de la don rnam pa bzhi byed pa ni blon po chen po'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4004E.TXT.r#106803#106803#TD4004E.TXT.r_225;TD4004E.TXT.r_226# bstan pa'i tshul du bstan pa ste //// / +de ni bsdus pa'i khyad par las don la khyad par med de zhes 'chad pas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang 'khor rnams dga' ba skyes pa ni / /

column3: gzhan gyi sgra dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las yang dag pa'i lta ba ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / /

column3: skyes pa 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang  yangs par 'gyur zhing / / +lta ba'i phung po yongs su ma rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang  yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing rtsol ba dang  brtson 'grus dang  spro ba dang  rtsom pa dang  mi gtong ba dang   sems yongs su 'dzin te / /
