column5: 0.011#TD4019E.TXT.r#2433683#2433684#TD4019E.TXT.r_3529;TD4019E.TXT.r_3530# re rer mtshan dang rab ldan zhing // / +zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni dri ba'i don so sor re rer dngos po'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba dang ldan zhing / /
column6: 0.013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904069#904071#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1805# nyon thos kyi rigs kyis ni bdag gi don tsam sgrub par zad kyi gzhan gyi don mi sgrub pas dge ba don chen po'i rgyu mi byed la byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis ni bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga'i don sgrub pas dge ba'i don chen po'i rgyu byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.014#TD4035E.TXT.r#135716#135719#TD4035E.TXT.r_1897;TD4035E.TXT.r_1898# rnam pa bcu'i phyir te / / +rjes su 'brel ba'i skye bo'i don dang  dmigs pa myong ba'i don dang  dmigs pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don dang  dmigs pa mngon par 'du byed  pa'i don dang  chos de dag nyid dus tha dad pa'i don dang  sgrib pa med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa dang bral ba'i don dang  mi rtag pa dang ma bral ba'i don dang  rtag pa phyin ci ma log pa'i don dang  bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i don dang  tshor ba dang bral ba ma    yin pa'i don dang  tshor ba dang bral ba'i don dang  nang dang phyi'i skye mched rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba de dag ni / /
column8: 0.016#TD4026E.TXT.r#288150#288155#TD4026E.TXT.r_2279;TD4026E.TXT.r_2280# gal te gzung ba'i don las  'dzin pa'i don tha mi dad par mthong ba'am // /
column9: 0.016#TD4049E.TXT.r#2294154#2294157#TD4049E.TXT.r_1252# byed pa po med pa'i don ni rten cing 'brel  par 'byung ba'i don dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba'i don dang  sems can med pa'i don dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi don dang  gyo ba med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa'i don dang  skad cig pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bur    mthun pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu so sor nges pa'i don ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1006014#1006019#TD4054E.TXT.r_2518# rkyen so so las kun du skye ba'i don dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las 'byung ba'i don dang  sems can med pa'i don dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi don dang   gyo ba med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa'i don dang  skad cig ma'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu mthun pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i don dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu so sor nges pa'i don ni rkyen so so la kun du skye ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.018#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595022#1595022#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_26# don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par ston pas na don bzhin ston pa'o // /
column12: 0.018#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1401407#1401407#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_199# don bzhin yin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste de'i phyir don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par ston pas don bzhin ston pa'o khyad par du byas so // /
column13: 0.019#TD4018E.TXT.r#3081335#3081335#TD4018E.TXT.r_10082;TD4018E.TXT.r_10083# 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i bshad pa ye shes dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'i le'u  gsum pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos dpyad pa'i 'og tu rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i chos thor bu dpyad pa bcva lnga pa'o //// / +thams cad mkhyen pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por dgongs pa'i bsdu ba'i don ni 'di yin te / /
column14: 0.020#TD4042E.TXT.r#1679263#1679263#TD4042E.TXT.r_369;TD4042E.TXT.r_370# yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu dang  log par bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu'o // / +de la tshig gi don kyang rnam pa bzhis brjod par bya ste / /
column15: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#152882#152884#TD4035E.TXT.r_4887;TD4035E.TXT.r_4888;TD4035E.TXT.r_4889# chos log par ston pa'i dus na ma bsams shing legs par ma brtags par ston pas na ma brtags pa'i tshig smra ba yin no // / +brnyas shing nyan pa na ston pas na dus ma yin pa'o // / +snga ma dang phyi ma'i don 'brel pa med pas  na ma 'brel pa'o // /
column16: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894383#894383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_715;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_716# stong pa zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang tshig gzhan la don gzhan 'byung bas brtag dka' ba'i phyir dka' ba'o // / +don rnams kyang rtogs par dka' bas na zab pa'o // /
column17: 0.021#TD4019E.TXT.r#2477992#2477993#TD4019E.TXT.r_9219;TD4019E.TXT.r_9220# lan gyi don ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i don la yang dag pa'i dngos por brtags shing / / +brtags pa'i don la rgyun chags su zhen pa'i tshul gyis phyin ci log gi rnam par rtog pa rgyun chags su 'byung ba'o // /
column18: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1443678#1443678#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5101;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5102# shes  pas ni yid do zhes bya ba ni yid ces pa'i skad kyi byings 'di ni shes pa'i don yin no // / +dmigs pa rnam par shes pas na rnam par shes pas na rnam par shes pa'o // /
column19: 0.024#TD4036E.TXT.r#60849#60850#TD4036E.TXT.r_8981# de ltar bden pa 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid so sor rig nas shes bya yongs su tshol ba'i don dang  yang dag pa yongs su tshol ba'i don dang  sgo bzhis rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang  mya ngan las 'da' bar  'gro ba'i phyir bgrod pa gcig pa'i don gyis lam la lam dang  rigs pa dang  sgrub pa dang  nges par 'byin pa'i sgo nas kun du rtog par byed de / /
column20: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2495365#2495365#TD4019E.TXT.r_11536;TD4019E.TXT.r_11537# rnam par gzhag pa tsam du snga ma ltar skyon med pa'o // / +dge ba dang mi dag ba'i rgyur gyur pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni de 'dra ba'i las kun nas slong bar byed pa ste / /

column3: snga ma dang phyi ma'i 'du shes dang  'og mas steng 'og gi 'du shes  su gyur cig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900368#900374#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1392;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1393;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1394# snying rjes sems can gyi don bya ba la dga' bas na mya ngan    las 'das pa la yang yon tan du mi lta zhes bya ba'i don to // / +khas blangs pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901750#901759#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1549;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1550;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1551# skad cig ma re re la yang breng ma chad par byed pas na rgyun ma chad par  byed pa zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902185#902186#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1598;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1599;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1600# 'di zhi bar byed pas na rab tu zhi ba'o zhes pa ni sa dang por chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro bar shes nas bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i ye shes kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi 'jigs pa lnga rab tu zhi bar byed pas na ye shes la rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o // / +zil gyis gnon pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +kun tu 'gro ba la sogs pa'i don gsum bshad nas zil gyi sa gnon pa'i don rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom ste / /

column3: 'dun pa ma bsgribs shing ma gyogs la 'dun pa snang ba dang bcas shing lhan cig par gyur pa dang  'di ltar bdag gi 'dun pa mun pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur cig ces 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dben pa la gnas pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901758#901769#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1550;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1551;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1552# rtogs pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +kun tu 'gro ba'i don dang khas len pa'i don bstan nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901770#901786#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1552;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1553# da ni rtogs pa'i don rgya cher bstan par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad ba rtsom mo // /
column6: 1.788#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#928748#928749#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4915;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4916# skyabs bla    na med pa'i don bstan nas / / +da ni gnas yongs su gyur pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa drug rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.017#TD4019E.TXT.r#2503437#2503437#TD4019E.TXT.r_12648;TD4019E.TXT.r_12649# de ltar dris pa dang lan dag gi sgo nas brjod par bya ba'i de kho na nyid rgyas par bstan nas / / +da ni dri ba'i don sngar bstan pa rnams bstan par    bya ba dang  bstan pa rnams tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas bsdus te bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'khor gyi gtso bos sngar bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pas slar yang bstod cing / /
column8: 0.019#TD4019E.TXT.r#2409248#2409250#TD4019E.TXT.r_237;TD4019E.TXT.r_238# de ltar dgos pa'i  don bstan nas / / +bsdus pa'i don rnam pa lngas shes par bya ste / /

column3: 'dod  chags dang bral ba la gnas pa / / +'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spangs pas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901785#901795#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1553;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1554# theg pa chen po 'dir skyabs su song na don mdor na gang zag dang chos la bdag  med par rtogs par 'gyur la zhib tu ni yon tan rnam pa brgyad rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: ji ltar na 'dun pa zhum pa yin zhe na / / +le lo dang lhan cig par gyur pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901796#901803#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1554;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1555# bsod nams phung chen zhes bya ba la / / +dang po nyid du zab cing rgya che ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la mos ba'i shugs kyis dad pa chen po byung ba'i tshe na ni nam mkha'i khams dang sems can    gyi mtha' ji tsam pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang thob par 'gyur te / /

column3: de ltar na 'dun pa zhum pa yin no // / +ji ltar na 'dun pa rab tu bzung ba yin zhe na / / +'dun pa gang rgod ba dang lhan cig par gyur pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901804#901824#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1555;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1556;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1557# dang po nyid du zab cing rgya che ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la mos ba'i shugs kyis dad pa chen po byung ba'i tshe na ni nam mkha'i khams dang sems can    gyi mtha' ji tsam pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang thob par 'gyur te / /

column3: de ltar na 'dun pa rab tu bzung ba yin no // / +ji ltar na 'dun pa nang du bsdus pa yin zhe na / /
'dun pa gang rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur cing nang du kun 'gog pa dang lhan cig par gyur la lhag mthong dang mtshungs par mi  ldan pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901825#901840#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1556;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1557# 'di ni yon tan rnam pa gcig go // / +srid gsum bla na zhes bya ba ni de ltar mos nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dus na ni 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang  gzugs  med pa'i khams kyi sems can kun las 'phags par 'gyur te / /

column3: ji ltar na phyi rol du rnam par gyengs pa yin zhe na / / +'dun pa gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la gyengs shing rnam par 'phros pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901841#901853#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1557;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1558;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1559# srid gsum bla na zhes bya ba ni de ltar mos nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dus na ni 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang  gzugs  med pa'i khams kyi sems can kun las 'phags par 'gyur te / /

column3: de ltar na 'dun pa phyi rol du rnam par gyengs pa yin no // / +ji ltar na snga ma dang phyi ma'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901854#901864#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1559# srid pa'i bde ba dang zhes bya ba la bdag dang gzhan gyi don bu las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis skye ba ni ma yin gyi shes bzhin du ni srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i dus na lha dang mi'i  longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te / /

column3: 'di  na dge slong so sor rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid legs par rab tu bzung zhing yid la byed pa bsten cing so sor rig pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901863#901874#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1559;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1560;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1561# srid pa'i bde ba dang zhes bya ba la bdag dang gzhan gyi don bu las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis skye ba ni ma yin gyi shes bzhin du ni srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i dus na lha dang mi'i  longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +'dug cing gnas pa la nye bar rtog pa dang  'dug cing gnyid log pa dang  mdun du 'gro ba dang  phyi nas 'gro ba la nye bar rtog pa de bzhin du dge  slong so sor rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid legs par rab tu bzung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901875#901883#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1561;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1562# sdug bsngal phung po rab zhi zhes bya ba la gang gi phyir sa dang po khong du chud pa na chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid du rtogs so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901883#901892#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1561;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1562;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1563;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1564# sdug bsngal phung po rab zhi zhes bya ba la gang gi phyir sa dang po khong du chud pa na chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid du rtogs so // / +de ltar rtogs pas na bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob ste / /
column6: 0.010#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2879326#2879328#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1634;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1635# byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po thob pa'i tshe na chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid rtogs te / / +bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob pas / /

column3: yid la byed pa bsten cing so sor rig pa ste / / +'di ltar na sngon dang phyi ma'i 'du shes su 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901893#901907#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1563;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1564;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1565;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1566# dga' ba'i mchog kyang rnyed do // / +de bas na sa dang po'i nges pa'i tshig tu'ang sa rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: 'di na dge slong lus 'di la spyi bo nas rkang mthil gyi bar du skra dang  klad pa dang  pags pa'i mthar thug par ji    ltar gnas pa dang  ji ltar smon pa mi gtsang ba'i rdzas rnam pa du mas yongs su gang bar so sor rtog par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901908#901916#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1565;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1566# dang po nyid du bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa'i nyes pa rnyed pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid tu rtogs pa des bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug  bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar byed do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901916#901926#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1566;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1567# de ltar chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid tu rtogs pa des bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug  bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar byed do // /
column6: 0.027#TD4025E.TXT.r#2168340#2168340#TD4025E.TXT.r_376# chos kyi dbyings  kun tu 'gro ba'i don du rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: lus 'di la skra yang yod / / +ba spu dang  kha dang  so dang  rdul dang  dri ma dang  pags pa dang  sha dang  rus pa dang  chu ba dang  rtsa dang  mchin  pa dang  gla ba dang  rgyu ma dang  gnye ma dang  pho ba dang  long ka dang  lto ba dang  mcher pa dang  rdul dang  mchi ma dang  mchil ma dang  snabs dang  mkhris pa dang  bad kan dang  rnag dang  khu ba dang  klad pa dang  klad rgyas dag 'dzag pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901927#901936#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1567;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1568# de'i tshe na bdag nyid 'jigs pa lnga las 'das pas na bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po zhi'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901936#901947#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1568;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1569# bdag bzhin du sems can rnams kyi 'jigs pa lnga yang med par byed pas na sems can gyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po yang zhi bar byed / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901948#901959#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1569;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1570# 'jigs pa lnga ni 'tsho  ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang  tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i 'jigs pa dang  'khor gyi 'jigs pa dang  ngan 'gror ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang  'chi 'pho'i 'jigs pa ste / /
column7: 0.018#TD4037E.TXT.r#1339466#1339477#TD4037E.TXT.r_3226# klong dang chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs pa dang  rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang  chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang  phyir rgol bas 'jigs pa dang  rje bo dang bdag po'i 'jigs pa dang  'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang  mi snyan pa'i 'jigs pa dang  'khor  du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa dang  mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa dang  ro langs kyi 'jigs pa las kyang srung bar byed do // /
column8: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#685768#685768#TD4083E.TXT.r_195;TD4083E.TXT.r_196# chu'i glong dang chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs pa dang  rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang  chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa     // / +dang  phyi rol pa'i 'jigs pa dang  rje bo dang bdag po'i 'jigs pa dang  'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang  mi snyan pa'i 'jigs pa dang  'khor gyi nang du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa dang  mi ma yin pa dang ro langs kyi 'jigs pa la sogs pa las  kyang yongs su srung bar byed do // /
column9: 0.028#TD4032E.TXT.r#1960574#1960574#TD4032E.TXT.r_6378;TD4032E.TXT.r_6379# de las 'jigs pa byang bas na 'jigs pa ste / / +de las mi  'dod pa'i 'bras bu'o // /

column3: zhes de ltar na steng dang 'og gi 'du shes su 'gyur ro // / +ji ltar na bdag gi sems ma bsgribs shing ma gyogs la sems snang ba dang bcas shing lhan cig par gyur pa dang  ji ltar bdag gi sems mun pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur cig ces bya bar 'gyur zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901960#901968#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1569;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1570;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1571;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1572# 'jigs pa lnga ni 'tsho  ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang  tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i 'jigs pa dang  'khor gyi 'jigs pa dang  ngan 'gror ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang  'chi 'pho'i 'jigs pa ste / / +'di ni yon tan bzhi pa'o // / +blo mchog bde ba dang zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901969#901977#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1572;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1573# sa brgyad la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob  pa'i dus na lhun gyis grub pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po thob pas na / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901978#901987#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1572;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1573;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1574;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1575# sa brgyad la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob  pa'i dus na lhun gyis grub pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po thob pas na / / +chos mchog bde ba thob pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: 'di na dge slong snang ba'i  'du shes legs par rab tu bzung ste / / +yid la byed de ston cing so sor rig pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901986#902004#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1574;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1575;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1576;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1577;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1578# 'di ni yon tan lnga pa'o // / +de la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la lhun gyis grub par gnas pa'i dpe yang rgya mtsho'i gru bo ches bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: nyin mo ji lta bar mtshan mo de bzhin / / +mtshan mo ji lta bar nyin mo de bzhin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#277404#277412#TD4026E.TXT.r_421;TD4026E.TXT.r_422# chos mang phung po mchog rab rtag pa'i sku ste dge ba'i tshogs // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901998#902005#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1575;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1576;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1577;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1578# de la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la lhun gyis grub par gnas pa'i dpe yang rgya mtsho'i gru bo ches bstan pa lta bu'o // / +blo mchog     // / +bde ba dang zhes bya ba la / / +chos chen phung po mchog rab rtag pa'i sku ste dge ba'i tshogs // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902026#902031#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1581;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1579;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1580;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1582# de nas sa bcu 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sar chen po'i phung po mchog rab rtag pa'i sku dge ba'i  tshogs kyang 'thob ste / /

column3: sngon ji lta bar phyis de bzhi na / / +phyis ji lta bar sngon de bzhin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520542#2520545#TD4020E.TXT.r_127;TD4020E.TXT.r_128# chos mang phung po mchog rab rtag pa'i sku ste dge ba'i tshogs // / +bag chags bzlog cing srid dang zhi las rnam par grol bar 'thob // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902006#902013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1578;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1579# chos chen phung po mchog rab rtag pa'i sku ste dge ba'i tshogs // /

column3: steng du ji lta bar 'og tu de bzhin / / +'og tu ji lta bar steng du  de bzhin no zhes bdag gi sems ma bsgribs shing ma gyogs la sems snang ba dang bcas shing lhan cig par gyur pa dang  'di ltar bdag gi sems mun pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur cig ces bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902031#902047#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1581;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1582;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1583;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1584;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1585;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1586# de nas sa bcu 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sar chen po'i phung po mchog rab rtag pa'i sku dge ba'i  tshogs kyang 'thob ste / / +'di ni yon tan drug pa'o // /

column3: 'di ltar na bdag gi sems ma bsgribs shing ma gyogs la sems snang ba dang bcas shing  lhan cig par gyur pa dang  'di ltar bdag gi sems mun pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur cig ces bya bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902048#902062#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1585;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1586;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1587# srid zhi rnam par grol ba yang 'thob ste / / +'di ni yon tan brgyad pa'o // /

column3: 'di na dge slong bdag gi dpyod pa zhum pa dang  rab tu bzung ba dang  nang du bsdus pa dang  phyi rol du rnam par gyengs par ma gyur cig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902061#902076#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1587;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1588# chos kyi sku de gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis 'byung  ba'i 'byung gnas yin pas chos chen phung po zhes bya'o // /

column3: snga ma dang phyi ma'i 'du shes  dang  steng dang 'og gi 'du shes su gyur cing / / +bdag gi sems ma bsgribs shing ma gyogs la sems snang ba dang bcas shing lhan cig bar gyur pa dang  'di ltar bdag gi sems mun pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur cig ces brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang  sems kyi ting nge 'dzin     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902077#902084#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1588;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1589# chos chen sku ste nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku dang  'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi phul du gyur pas mchog rab ces bya'o // / +chos kyi sku de 'khor ba'i mtha' dang  sems can gyi mtha' dang  nam mkha'i mtha'i bar du gnas pas rtag pa'i sku zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902085#902112#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1589;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1590;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1591;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1592# chos kyi sku de 'khor ba'i mtha' dang  sems can gyi mtha' dang  nam mkha'i mtha'i bar du gnas pas rtag pa'i sku zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.006#TD4050E.TXT.r#1104088#1104090#TD4050E.TXT.r_989# yang ji ltar 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gcig la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spangs pa dang  mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dge ba'i bag chags rgyas par  rten gnas gyur 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.017#TD4052E.TXT.r#2853168#2853170#TD4052E.TXT.r_1446;TD4052E.TXT.r_1447;TD4052E.TXT.r_1448# mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags dang  srid pa'i yan lag gi bag chags dang  'jig tshogs la lta ba'i bag chags so // / +mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags ni rgyu'i rkyen yin te / /
column8: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1006735#1006737#TD4054E.TXT.r_2624;TD4054E.TXT.r_2625# mngon par 'du byed pa las byung ba'i len pa'i rnam par shes pa ni tshe de'i 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa kun du spyod pa'i bag chags bsgos par rig par bya'o // / +dge ba'i bag chags ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa     // /
column9: 0.019#TD4053E.TXT.r#2973005#2973008#TD4053E.TXT.r_1138;TD4053E.TXT.r_1139# tshe de'i 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i bag chags bsgos par rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.025#TD4053E.TXT.r#2972137#2972137#TD4053E.TXT.r_1033;TD4053E.TXT.r_1034# snga logs su byung ba'i bag chags kyis rgyu'i rkyen to // / +des yongs su bsgos pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i las rnams yang srid par mngon     // /
column11: 0.026#TD4019E.TXT.r#2436104#2436105#TD4019E.TXT.r_3860# de dang tha mi dad pa zag pa med pa'i chos kyi sa bon ni sngar  bstan pa ltar rgyun 'gag par mi 'gyur la las kyi mtshan nyid de 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pas bsgos pa'i bag chags zag pa dang bcas pa'i sa bon ni ci rigs par 'gags pa'o // /
column12: 0.026#TD4066E.TXT.r#2114532#2114533#TD4066E.TXT.r_1756;TD4066E.TXT.r_1757;TD4066E.TXT.r_1758# mngon par 'du byas pa de dag 'gag pa na kun  gzhi rnam par shes pa la rnam par smin pa'i bag chags so // / +rgyu mthun pa'i bag chags gso bar byed do // /
column13: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1025179#1025180#TD4054E.TXT.r_5655;TD4054E.TXT.r_5656;TD4054E.TXT.r_5657# pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba kun du mi 'byung bas / / +de spangs sa ma ma spangs par khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir te / /
column14: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#930165#930165#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5098# bdag dang sems can gyi don du 'khor pa'i mtha' dang sems can gyi mtha' bar du mdzad pas rgyun mi 'chad pa'o // /
column15: 0.028#TD4050E.TXT.r#1101897#1101900#TD4050E.TXT.r_694;TD4050E.TXT.r_695# de yang sa bon med par skye bar  'gyur te zhes bya ba ni rgyu med par skye ba'o // / +bag chags de gnas dang bcas par zhes bya ba ni sems dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags so // /
column16: 0.028#TD4053E.TXT.r#2972402#2972402#TD4053E.TXT.r_1059# len pa ni yang srid pa len pa'i phyir sems  can rnams kyi rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa dang bcas par byed ces bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba bye brag can du yang srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi bag chags nges par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.028#TD4051E.TXT.r#1241931#1241931#TD4051E.TXT.r_1322# nus pa'i khyad par gang las  bdag dang  chos dang  bya ba'i mngon par brjod par 'byung ba'o // /

column3: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa / / +'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa / /
column4: 0.019#TD4050E.TXT.r#1104089#1104089#TD4050E.TXT.r_989# yang ji ltar 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gcig la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spangs pa dang  mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dge ba'i bag chags rgyas par  rten gnas gyur 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1006735#1006736#TD4054E.TXT.r_2624;TD4054E.TXT.r_2625# mngon par 'du byed pa las byung ba'i len pa'i rnam par shes pa ni tshe de'i 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa kun du spyod pa'i bag chags bsgos par rig par bya'o // / +dge ba'i bag chags ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa     // /
column6: 0.021#TD4052E.TXT.r#2853169#2853170#TD4052E.TXT.r_1446;TD4052E.TXT.r_1447;TD4052E.TXT.r_1448# mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags dang  srid pa'i yan lag gi bag chags dang  'jig tshogs la lta ba'i bag chags so // / +mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags ni rgyu'i rkyen yin te / /
column7: 0.021#TD4053E.TXT.r#2973005#2973007#TD4053E.TXT.r_1138;TD4053E.TXT.r_1139# tshe de'i 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i bag chags bsgos par rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2709365#2709366#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1000;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1001# 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i rkyen gyi sa bon dang ldan par skye ba'i  bag chags bsags pa'i sa bon dang ldan pa ni ma yin no // / +gal te bag chags bsags pa'i sa bon dang ldan par skye ba ma yin na / /

column3: 'gog pa la gnas pa / / +rnam par spong ba yongs su bsgyur ba dag sgom par byed do // / +ji ltar dpyod pa  zhum pa yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902113#902122#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1591;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1592;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1593;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1594# chos la bdag med par rtogs pas ni shes bya'i bag chags spangs pas bag chags thams cad las kyang bzlog  pa'o ; / / +sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dus na mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pas srid zhi rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: dpyod pa gang le lo dang lhan cig par gyur pa ste / / +de ltar na dpyod pa zhum pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902123#902131#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1592;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1593;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1594;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1595# sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dus na mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pas srid zhi rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste / / +srid pa ni 'khor ba ste / / +'khor ba las rnam par grol zhing 'khor pa la'ang mi gnas so // /

column3: ji ltar na dpyod pa rab tu bzung ba yin zhe na / / +dpyod pa gang rgod pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902132#902141#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1594;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1595;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1596# 'khor ba las rnam par grol zhing 'khor pa la'ang mi gnas so // / +zhi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste mya ngan las 'das pa las rnam par grol zhing  mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: ji ltar na dpyod pa nang du bsdus pa yin zhe na / / +dpyod pa gang rmugs pa dang  gnyid  dang lhan cig par gyur cing nang du kun du 'gog pa dang lhan cig par gyur la lhag mthong dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902142#902150#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1595;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1596;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1597# zhi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste mya ngan las 'das pa las rnam par grol zhing  mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de la shes rab dang ldan pas ni 'khor ba na gnas kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pas mi gos pas na 'khor ba na mi gnas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902151#902162#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1596;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1597;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1598# de la shes rab dang ldan pas ni 'khor ba na gnas kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pas mi gos pas na 'khor ba na mi gnas so // / +snying rje dang ldan pas nyan thos bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zhugs pa'i phyir mya ngan  las 'das pa la mi gnas pas so // /
column6: 0.016#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#768863#768866#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_328;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_329# de'i phun sum tshogs pa ni 'gro ba la bla na med pa'i don sgrub par mdzad pa'o // / +'khor ba ni 'gro ba'i kun tu chags pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang  brgal bar dka' ba'i phyir  'dam lta bu yin te zhes bya ba la / /
column7: 0.020#TD4048E.TXT.r#1695584#1695584#TD4048E.TXT.r_1760;TD4048E.TXT.r_1761# gang nyon mongs pa yongs su btang ba dang    bcas pas 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba'i gnas te gnas gyur pa'o // / +de la 'khor ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid de kun nas nyon mongs pa'i char gtogs pa'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901196#901199#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1493;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1494# thabs ni shes rab dang snying rje'o // / +de la shes rab dang ldan pas 'khor ba na gnas kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pas mi gos / /
column9: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1874712#1874712#TD4039E.TXT.r_6962;TD4039E.TXT.r_6963# de la chos thams cad ni 'di rnams yin te / / +rab tu 'byung bar bya ba dang  mya ngan las  'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos la 'dun pa dge ba ste / /
column10: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#977609#977609#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11187;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11188# cung zad de dag la phan pa byas na lta ci smos zhes cung zad de dag la phan pa byas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa skye zhing dge ba la yang 'jug par  'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +ma nges par dbye ba'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por nyan thos chen po rnams sangs rgyas su lung bstan par bshad pa dang  theg pa gcig tu bshad pa'o zhes bya ba la / /
column11: 0.029#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172003#2172003#TD4025E.TXT.r_843;TD4025E.TXT.r_844# mya ngan las 'das pa la brten pa'i  bsam ba can yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i rigs can bzhin du 'khor ba la mi gnas la / / +snying rje chen pos sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su ma btang bas ni gzhan la phan pa'i phyir / /

column3: 'di ltar na dpyod pa nang du bsdus pa yin no // / +ji ltar dpyod pa phyi rol du rnam par gyengs pa yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902163#902172#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1597;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1598# snying rje dang ldan pas nyan thos bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zhugs pa'i phyir mya ngan  las 'das pa la mi gnas pas so // / +'di zhi bar byed pas na rab tu zhi ba'o zhes pa ni sa dang por chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro bar shes nas bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i ye shes kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi 'jigs pa lnga rab tu zhi bar byed pas na ye shes la rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: dpyod pa gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la rjes su  gyengs shing rnam par 'phros pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902173#902182#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1598;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1599# 'di zhi bar byed pas na rab tu zhi ba'o zhes pa ni sa dang por chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro bar shes nas bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i ye shes kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi 'jigs pa lnga rab tu zhi bar byed pas na ye shes la rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'di ltar na dpyod pa phyi rol du rnam par gyengs pa yin no // / +ji ltar na sngon dang phyi ma'i 'du shes zhes bya ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902181#902194#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1598;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1599;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1600# 'di zhi bar byed pas na rab tu zhi ba'o zhes pa ni sa dang por chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro bar shes nas bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i ye shes kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi 'jigs pa lnga rab tu zhi bar byed pas na ye shes la rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o // / +zil gyis gnon pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column5: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901754#901758#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1549;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1550;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1551# skad cig ma re re la yang breng ma chad par byed pas na rgyun ma chad par  byed pa zhes bya'o // / +rtogs pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column6: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900369#900370#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1392;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1393;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1394# snying rjes sems can gyi don bya ba la dga' bas na mya ngan    las 'das pa la yang yon tan du mi lta zhes bya ba'i don to // / +khas blangs pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa ZHES BYA BA LA / /

column3: snga ma bzhin du 'di ltar bdag sems mun pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i bar du'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902192#902203#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1600;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1601# kun tu 'gro ba la sogs pa'i don gsum bshad nas zil gyi sa gnon pa'i don rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom ste / /

column3: dge slong dag de ltar rdzu 'phrul  gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902204#902212#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1600;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1601# kun tu 'gro ba la sogs pa'i don gsum bshad nas zil gyi sa gnon pa'i don rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom ste / / +theg pa chen po la skyabs su song na dge ba rnam pa bzhis nyan thos la sogs pa zil gyis  gnon par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: dge slong dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa dag bstan par bya'o zhes ngas ji skad bshad pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902213#902226#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1601;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1602;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1603# theg pa chen po la skyabs su song na dge ba rnam pa bzhis nyan thos la sogs pa zil gyis  gnon par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +blo ldan dge ba rgya ches nyan thos mang po zil gyis gnon // /

column3: zhum pa dang  rab tu bzung ba dang  nang du bsdus pa dang  phyi rol du rnam par gyengs pa la sogs  pa ji ltar 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rgyas par bshad pa de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang  sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la yang thams cad rgyas par go bar bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902227#902247#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1602;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1603;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1604;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1605;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1606# blo ldan dge ba rgya ches nyan thos mang po zil gyis gnon // / +don chen mtha' yas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad cing mi zad pas // /
column5: 0.019#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520562#2520562#TD4020E.TXT.r_129;TD4020E.TXT.r_130# blo ldan nyan thos tshogs bcas dge ba rgya chen don chen dang / / +mtha' yas rtag rgyun mi 'chad zad mi shes pas zil gyis gnon // /

column3: de ltar na shes par byed par 'gyur ro // / +mdo las ji ltar na sems nang du bsdus pa yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902246#902256#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1605;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1606;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1607;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1608;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1609# dge ba'i 'jig rten ma yin de yang smin par byed // / +phun sum  tshogs pa rnyed pa phung po zhi bas mi zad pa // /

column3: gang gi tshe sems zhum par  gyur pa'o zhes bya ba la / / +gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902257#902265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1607;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1608;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1609# zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis bshad de / / +blo dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba nas mos pas spyod pa'i sa 'jig rten gyi chos mchog  man chad kyi 'jig rten pa'i dge ba ni nyan thos kyi dge ba ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs 'ba' zhig tu 'jug pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don du 'khor bar 'jug pa'i rgyu yang byed pas rgya che ba'i phyir nyan thos thams cad zil gyis gnon to // /

column3: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te / / +bsod snyoms kyi phyir mnyan yod du zhugs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902263#902277#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1609# byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba nas mos pas spyod pa'i sa 'jig rten gyi chos mchog  man chad kyi 'jig rten pa'i dge ba ni nyan thos kyi dge ba ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs 'ba' zhig tu 'jug pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don du 'khor bar 'jug pa'i rgyu yang byed pas rgya che ba'i phyir nyan thos thams cad zil gyis gnon to // /

column3: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir re    zhig nam ma nangs kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902278#902293#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1609;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1610# byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba nas mos pas spyod pa'i sa 'jig rten gyi chos mchog  man chad kyi 'jig rten pa'i dge ba ni nyan thos kyi dge ba ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs 'ba' zhig tu 'jug pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don du 'khor bar 'jug pa'i rgyu yang byed pas rgya che ba'i phyir nyan thos thams cad zil gyis gnon to // /
column5: 2.384#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902306#902307#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1611# don che ba'i phyir nyan thos thams cad zil gyis gnon to zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: bdag cag gzhan mu stegs can gyi kun du rgyu de dag gi kun dga' ra bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902294#902304#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1610;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1611# sa dang po nas sa bdun man  chad kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba ni bla na med pa'i byang chub par byed pa'i phyir don che ba ste / /

column3: de nas gzhan mu stegs can gyi kun du rgyu de dag gis dge slong rab tu mang po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902305#902319#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1610;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1611;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1612# sa dang po nas sa bdun man  chad kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba ni bla na med pa'i byang chub par byed pa'i phyir don che ba ste / / +don che ba'i phyir nyan thos thams cad zil gyis gnon to zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 2.384#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902285#902285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1609# byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba nas mos pas spyod pa'i sa 'jig rten gyi chos mchog  man chad kyi 'jig rten pa'i dge ba ni nyan thos kyi dge ba ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs 'ba' zhig tu 'jug pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don du 'khor bar 'jug pa'i rgyu yang byed pas rgya che ba'i phyir nyan thos thams cad zil gyis gnon to // /

column3: khyed cag gi dge sbyong goo ta ma nyan thos rnams la  'di ltar dge slong dag tshur shog / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902317#902328#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1612;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1613# sa brgyad pa yan chad ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub ba la gnas pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams  yongs su smin par byed / /

column3: sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa / / +shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902329#902336#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1613# 'bru rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i tshe mang du 'phel ba dang 'dra ba de yan chad dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pas stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang  ma 'dres pa dang  sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa 'phel bar 'gyur te / /

column3: gnod pa'i phyogs mya ngan las 'das par mi 'jug pa dag spongs la / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi pa rnams la sems legs par gzhag cing gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902337#902348#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1613;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1614# 'bru rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i tshe mang du 'phel ba dang 'dra ba de yan chad dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pas stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang  ma 'dres pa dang  sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa 'phel bar 'gyur te / /

column3: byang chub  kyi yan lag bdun bsgom par gyis shig ces nyan thos rnams la chos ston pa thos nas bdag cag 'di ltar khyed cag tshur shog / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902348#902362#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1614;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1615# des na rtag tu  sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad cing dam pa'i chos 'chad pa rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pas kyang nyan thos rnams zil gyis gnon to zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902789#902789#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1666# zhes bya ba la de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sa rim bas bsgrubs nas sangs rgyas kyi sar mngon par  sangs rgyas nas stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa dang ma 'dres pa dang byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#932729#932729#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5490;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5491;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5492# da tshigs su bcad pa bcu gcig gis zag pa med pa'i  dbyings de 'byor pa dang  bde ba dang  skyid pa dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa lnga pa dang ldan par ston to zhes bya ba'i don to // / +nyan thos rnams kyi 'byor pas ni // / +'jig rten pa yi zil gyis gnon // /

column3: sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa / / +shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902360#902370#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1614;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1615;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1616;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1617# des na rtag tu  sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad cing dam pa'i chos 'chad pa rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pas kyang nyan thos rnams zil gyis gnon to zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de nas sangs rgyas kyi sar stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang  ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rnyed     // /
column5: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910893#910893#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2578# sangs rgyas kyi chos ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sar gtogs pa'i yon tan la bya'o // /
column6: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902789#902789#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1666# zhes bya ba la de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sa rim bas bsgrubs nas sangs rgyas kyi sar mngon par  sangs rgyas nas stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa dang ma 'dres pa dang byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur te / /

column3: gnod pa'i phyogs mya ngan las 'das par mi 'jug pa dag spongs  la ; / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnams la sems legs par gzhag cing gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902368#902380#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1615;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1616;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1617;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1618# de nas sangs rgyas kyi sar stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang  ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rnyed     // / +pa yang phung po zhi ba ste / /

column3: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgoms shig ces nyan thos rnams la chos ston na / / +'di ltar na dge sbyong goo ta mas chos bstan pa dang bdag cag gis chos bstan pa la khyad par dang  bsam pa  dang  tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902381#902388#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1617;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1618;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1619;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1620# phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das par zhugs kyang zad cing mthar thug par mi 'gyur te / / +mi zad ba'i phyir yang nyan thos rnams zil gyis gnon to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902389#902400#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1619;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1620# skyabs su 'gro ba bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba  la ; / +gong du ni theg pa chen por skyabs su song bde kun 'gro ba la sogs pa'i khyad par bzhi dang ldan pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs su 'gro bas khyad zhugs so zhes bstan nas / /

column3: de skad ces smras pa dang  dge slong rab tu mang po de dag cang mi smra bar gyur to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902399#902408#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1620;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1621# gong du ni theg pa chen por skyabs su song bde kun 'gro ba la sogs pa'i khyad par bzhi dang ldan pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs su 'gro bas khyad zhugs so zhes bstan nas / /

column3: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po de dag gzhan mu stegs can gyi kun du rgyud de dag gis bshad pa la mngon par dga' bar yang mi byed khro bar yang mi byed par stan las langs  te song ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902405#902417#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1620;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1621# gong du ni theg pa chen por skyabs su song bde kun 'gro ba la sogs pa'i khyad par bzhi dang ldan pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs su 'gro bas khyad zhugs so zhes bstan nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902418#902429#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1621;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1622# da ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu dang las dang ldan pa dang   rab tu dbye ba bstan pa las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /

column3: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po de dag mnyan yod du bsod snyoms spyad cing zas kyi bya ba byas nas zos pa'i 'og tu lhung bzed bkrus te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902428#902444#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1622# de ni de'i dngos 'dod phyir ni khas len zhes bya ba nyan thos dag dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni bdag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar gyur cig ces bdag yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i phyir skyabs su 'gro  ba'o ; / /

column3: chos gos dang lhung bzed mtha' cig tu bzhag ste / / +rkang pa bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902445#902456#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1622;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1624# de ni de'i dngos 'dod phyir ni khas len zhes bya ba nyan thos dag dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni bdag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar gyur cig ces bdag yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i phyir skyabs su 'gro  ba'o ; / /
column5: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900422#900424#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1401# byang chub sems dpa' rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba ni sangs rgyas gang la skyabs su song ba'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi rang bzhin thob par shog shig ces khas len cing byang chub tu sems bskyed de / /

column3: nye bar song nas  bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te / / +phyogs gcig tu 'dug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902455#902465#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1624;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1625# sangs rgyas gang la skyabs su song ba'i sangs rgyas de'i rang bzhin nyid grub par bya ba'i phyir skyabs su 'gro bar khas len te / /

column3: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong rab tu mang po de dag gis gzhan mu stegs can gyi kun du rgyu de dag dang lhan cig ji srid du gtam gzhan brjod pa de thams cad rgyas par bcom ldan 'das la gsol     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902463#902486#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1624;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1625;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1626;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1627;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1628# sangs rgyas gang la skyabs su song ba'i sangs rgyas de'i rang bzhin nyid grub par bya ba'i phyir skyabs su 'gro bar khas len te / / +sangs rgyas 'di sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa de bzhin du bdag  kyang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig ces khas len te / /

column3: de skad ces gsol ba dang  dge slong rab tu mang po de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902487#902497#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1626;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1627;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1628;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1629# de ltar khas len pa ni rang bzhin no // / +snying rje'i phyir yang rig par bya // / +zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas grub par gyur cig ces khas len pa yang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la  snying rje'i rgyus khas lan te / /

column3: dge slong dag gzhan mu stegs can gyi kun du rgyu de skad smra ba de dag la 'di skad brjod par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902498#902512#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1628;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1629;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1630;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1631# zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas grub par gyur cig ces khas len pa yang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la  snying rje'i rgyus khas lan te / / +snying rje ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i rgyu yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: gang gi tshe sems bying ba dang  bying bar dogs pa  de'i tshe byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhig bsgom pa'i dus yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902511#902523#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1631;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1632# de ltar skyabs su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin dang rgyu bskyed nas sa bcu rim gyis bsgrubs nas sangs rgyas kyi sar ye shes bzhi'i bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa  'thob pa ste / /

column3: gang zhig bsgom pa'i dus ma yin / / +gang gi tshe rgod pa dang  rgod par dogs pa de'i tshe byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhig bsgom pa'i dus yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902524#902544#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1631;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1632;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1633;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1634;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1635# de ltar skyabs su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin dang rgyu bskyed nas sa bcu rim gyis bsgrubs nas sangs rgyas kyi sar ye shes bzhi'i bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa  'thob pa ste / / +de ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i 'bras bu'o // /

column3: gang zhig bsgom pa'i dus ma yin zhes dge slong dag gzhan mu stegs can gyi kun du rgyu  de dag la 'di skad du dris pa na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902544#902552#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1635;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1636;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1637# sangs rgyas su grub nas sems can la phan par byed pa dang bde bar byed pa dang  dka' ba spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i lam yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907714#907717#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2195;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2196# 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du sems  can thams cad zang zing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan btags te / / +tshe 'dir mi dge ba las bzlog cing dge ba la gzhag pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god do snyam du sems pa ni byang chub kyi sems de dag gi bsam ba'o // /

column3: phan tshun 'dri bar 'gyur / / +gtam gzhan nye bar 'god par 'gyur / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902553#902570#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1636;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1637;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1638;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1639# tshe 'dir zang zing    rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan btags te / / +mi dge ba las bzlog cing dge ba la bzhag pa ni phan par byed pa'o // /

column3: khro ba dang  zhe sdang dang  nga rgyal dang  'tshig pa dang  gnod pa dang  mi bzod pa byed par 'gyur / /
kha rog par gnas par 'gyur / / +yi mug par 'gyur / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902569#902578#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1638;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1639;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1640# tshe rabs gzhan du lha dang mi'i longs spyod dang mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa ni bde bar byed pa'o // / +sems can gyi don du lus dang srog la phangs pa med par mgo dang rkang  lag la sogs pa gtong ba ni dka' ba byed pas mi skyo ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: phrag pa bcum pa dang   kha 'og tu bltas pa dang  spobs pa med par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902577#902586#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1639;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1640# sems can gyi don du lus dang srog la phangs pa med par mgo dang rkang  lag la sogs pa gtong ba ni dka' ba byed pas mi skyo ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: sems shing gnas par 'gyur te / / +de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +dge slong dag ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang  bdud dang bcas pa dang  tshangs pa dang  dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten  na de bzhin gshegs pa'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902585#902594#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1640;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1641;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1642# theg pa kun gyis 'byung zhing so sor 'brang zhing rtag tu yon tan ldan // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902595#902607#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1642# theg pa gsum gyi thabs kyis sems can rnams khams gsum las bsgral bar bya ba'i sems can so so nas sdug cing phongs pa  rnams kyi skyabs dang mgon rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'i yon tan dang ldan te / /

column3: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa'i dus ma yin te / / +de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +dge slong dag sems zhum pa dang zhum par dogs pa na chos 'di dag gis zhum pa nyid mngon par sgrub par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902638#902647#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1646;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1647;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1648;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1649;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1650# brda dang chos nyid  thob pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi skyabs su 'gro ba mchog // / +ces smos te / / +byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs su 'gro ba phye na rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: dge slong dag dper na me chung  ngu cher 'bar zhing 'bar bar 'dod pa 'ga' zhig shing rlon pa dang  rtsva rlon pa dang  lci ba rlon pa dag bcug na dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems / /

column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902657#902669#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1650;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1651# de la mkhan po dang slob dpon las blangs pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni brdas thob pa zhes bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpas sa dang po thob nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid rtogs te dge ba'i bshes gnyen lam brten phar smon lam chen po bcu la sogs pa ni chos nyid kyis thob pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: de dag gis mi de phal cher gsod par 'gyur ram / / +btsun pa de bzhin no // / +de bzhin du gang gi tshe sems zhum pa dang zhum par dogs pa de'i tshe shin tu sbyangs    pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dag bsgom pa'i dus ma yin te / /

column3: de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +gang gi tshe zhum pa dang zhum par dogs pa de'i tshe chos 'di dag gis zhum pa nyid mngon par 'grub  par byed pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: gang gi tshe rgod pa dang rgod par dogs pa de'i tshe chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i dus ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902713#902724#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1657;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1658;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1659# skyabs su 'gro ba sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis tshigs su bcad pa  zhes bya ba la gong du skyabs su 'gro ba'i yon tan dang rang bzhin la sogs pa bshad nas / /

column3: de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +dge slong  dag rgod pa dang rgod par dogs pa na chos 'di dag gis phal cher rgod pa nyid mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902725#902737#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1658;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1659;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1660;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1661# da ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste / / +sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa sgrub pa de nyan thos dag kyang skyabs su song nas / /

column3: dge slong dag dper na dga' zhig me 'bar bar gyur pa dag gsad par 'dod nas shing skam po dang  rtsva skam po dang  lci ba skam po dag 'jug par byed na / /

column3: gang las 'di'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba yin zhes bya ba la / / +bcom  ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520636#2520640#TD4020E.TXT.r_138;TD4020E.TXT.r_139;TD4020E.TXT.r_140# de ni dpag med yon tan tshogs 'phel 'gyur // / +'gro ba 'di  la snying rje'i bsam pas khyab // / +mtshungs med 'phags chen chos kyang rgyas par byed // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#277730#277736#TD4026E.TXT.r_465;TD4026E.TXT.r_466;TD4026E.TXT.r_467# de ni dpag med yon tan tshogs 'phel 'gyur // / +'gro ba 'di la snying rje'i bsams pas khyab // /

column3: de nas lha sbyin gyi phyogs pa'i dge slong zla ba ma'i bu tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gang na der nye bar song ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903008#903032#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1690;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1691;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1692;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1693;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1694# mtshungs med 'phags chen chos kyang rgyas par byed // / +ces smras pa'i tshigs su bcad pas // /

column3: nye bar song nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang lhan cig ces bya ba nas / /
phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas zhes bya    ba'i bar du ste / / +de nas lha sbyin gyi phyogs pa dge slong zla ba ma'i bu la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903033#903051#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1694;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1695;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1696# sangs rgyas la sogs pa la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can dang rigs med pa kun gyis theg pa chen po la skyabs su // /

column3: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces smras so // / +zla ba ma'i bu lha sbyin dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam dag ston par byed dam // /

column3: ston par byed do // / +zla ba ma'i bu lha sbyin ji lta ji ltar dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam ston  par byed ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903063#903076#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1697;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1698;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1699# nges pa yod dam zhen / / +lan du nges pa yod de / /

column3: dge slong dag gtam gang gi phyir dge slong sems kyis sems rnam par gyur na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903077#903086#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1699# sangs rgyas kyi rigs can rnams skyabs su song na  ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang yon tan gyi tshogs rnams 'phel bar 'gyur gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can dang  rigs med pa la sogs pas theg pa chen po'i tshul du skyabs su song yang yon tan de dag 'thob par mi 'gyur te / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +lnga po dag las bdag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral lo zhes lung bstan par bya'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di ltar lha sbyin dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam ston par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903087#903097#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1699;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1700;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1701# sangs rgyas kyi rigs can rnams skyabs su song na  ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang yon tan gyi tshogs rnams 'phel bar 'gyur gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can dang  rigs med pa la sogs pas theg pa chen po'i tshul du skyabs su song yang yon tan de dag 'thob par mi 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903097#903108#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1701;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1702;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1703# ba'i skabs kyi rjes la rigs kyi skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column6: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907022#907023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2110# sems bskyed pa la sogs pa la yang rigs yod na 'dod pa 'byung ste gang la rigs yod pa de  gdon mi za bar bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bar 'gyur bas na rigs kyi skabs kyi rjes la sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column7: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#941224#941224#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6618# de bas na byang chub kyi skabs kyi rjes la mos pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /

column3: zla ba ma'i bu gang gi phyir dge slong sems kyis sems rnam par rgyal bar gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903105#903117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1702;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1703# yang na ma nges pa'i rigs can dag theg pa chen por skyabs su song na don chen po de 'thob ste / /

column3: sems 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur cing zhe sdang dang bral ba dang  rmongs pa dang bral zhing ma chags pa'i chos can dang  mi sdang ba'i chos can dang  ma rmongs pa'i chos can dang  'dod pa'i srid pa dang   gzugs kyi srid pa dang  gzugs med pa'i srid par phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can gyi dge slong des bdag gi skye ba zad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903118#903128#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1703;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1704# ma nges pa'i rigs can la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mthar phyin du bsgral na gdod don chen po de  'thob kyi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903128#903144#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1704;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1705# byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa las nyan thos la sogs pa'i bshes gnyen gyis drangs nas theg pa gzhan du yang 'tshang rgya bas gcig tu nges pa ni med do // /

column3: tshangs par spyod pa bsten to // / +bya ba byas so // / +byed pa byas so // / +srid pa 'di la gzhan mi shes so zhes lung ston na mdzes par 'gyur ro zhes lha sbyin 'di ltar dge slong  rnams la chos kyi gtam ston par mi byed dam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903143#903154#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1705;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1706# yang na rigs 'di ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang  pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang mngon par 'tshang  rgya bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba can zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903155#903166#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1706;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1707;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1708# de bcas na rigs ni chos de dag thams cad kyi sa bon yin no // /
column6: 0.012#TD4029E.TXT.r#2124350#2124350#TD4029E.TXT.r_548;TD4029E.TXT.r_549# rigs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon yin no // / +sa bon med par yang 'bras bu ma mthong ste / /

column3: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ma yin no // / +de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus dge slong rnams la bos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903167#903177#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1708# de bas na rigs ni gong du skyabs su 'gro ba dang 'og nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs ba 'byung ba'i chos rnams kyi  rgyu yin bar bstan pa'i phyir skyabs kyi rjes la rigs kyi skabs bshad par 'brel to // /

column3: tshe dang ldan pa dag gang gi phyir dge slong sems kyis sems rnam par rgyal zhing sems 'dod chags dang bral ba yin / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi shar  gyi kun dga' ra ba na ri dags kyi ma'i gnas na bzhugs te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903437#903449#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1734;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1735# 'di ni sems can gyi khams na sems can gyi rang bzhin dang  sa bon tha dad de sems can gyi rang bzhin phye na  dpag tu med ba zhig yod de ji ltar zhe na / / +'di ltar sems can kha cig ni 'dod chags la spyod pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig zhe sdang la spyod pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig gti mug la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang  kha cig nyan thos kyi rigs kyi rang bzhin can kha cig ni rang sangs     // /

column3: kun 'byung ba ni gang / / +rab tu skye ba ni gang / / +rkyen gyi rnam pa ni gang zhig lags / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903446#903457#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1735;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1736;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1737# 'di ltar sems can kha cig ni 'dod chags la spyod pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig zhe sdang la spyod pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig gti mug la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang  kha cig nyan thos kyi rigs kyi rang bzhin can kha cig ni rang sangs     // /

column3: dge slong nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag ni 'dun pa'i rtsa  ba can ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903456#903465#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1735;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1736;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1737;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1738# 'di ltar sems can kha cig ni 'dod chags la spyod pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig zhe sdang la spyod pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig gti mug la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang  kha cig nyan thos kyi rigs kyi rang bzhin can kha cig ni rang sangs     // / +rgyas kyi rigs kyi rang bzhin can / / +kha cig theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi rang bzhin can te rang bzhin mi mthun pa tshad med pa zhig yod do // /

column3: 'dun pa las kun 'byung ba / / +'dun pa dang 'dra ba / / +'dun pa las rab tu skye ba dag yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903466#903474#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1737;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1738;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1739;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1740# kha cig theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi rang bzhin can te rang bzhin mi mthun pa tshad med pa zhig yod do // / +gal te sems can thams cad kyi rigs gcig tu zad na / /

column3: btsun pa legs so zhes dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903473#903484#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1738;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1739;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1740# gal te sems can thams cad kyi rigs gcig tu zad na / / +la la 'dod chags la dga' ba'i rang bzhin / / +la la zhe sdang  la sogs pa la dga' ba'i rang bzhin du tha dad par ci'i phyir 'gyur te sems can gyi rang bzhin tha dad par tshad med pa dag snang bas na rigs gcig tu ma zad kyi theg pa che chung gsum char gyi rigs so so na yod do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: slar yang bcom ldan 'das la yongs su dri ba dris pa / / +btsun  pa phung po gang yin pa de nyid nye bar len pa'i phung po yin nam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903485#903494#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1740# la la zhe sdang  la sogs pa la dga' ba'i rang bzhin du tha dad par ci'i phyir 'gyur te sems can gyi rang bzhin tha dad par tshad med pa dag snang bas na rigs gcig tu ma zad kyi theg pa che chung gsum char gyi rigs so so na yod do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'on te phung po dag las gzhan zhig nye bar len pa yin zhe na / / +dge slong phung po gang yin pa de nyid kyi nye bar len pa ma yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903495#903506#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1740;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1741;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1742# la la zhe sdang  la sogs pa la dga' ba'i rang bzhin du tha dad par ci'i phyir 'gyur te sems can gyi rang bzhin tha dad par tshad med pa dag snang bas na rigs gcig tu ma zad kyi theg pa che chung gsum char gyi rigs so so na yod do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: phung po dag dang phung po las gzhan yang nye bar len pa ma yin mod kyi / / +'on  kyang 'dun pa'i 'dod chags te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903507#903516#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1742;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1743# sems can rnams kyi mos  pa dang dad pa yang mi mthun zhing tha dad de / /

column3: 'di tsam ni nye bar len pa zhes bya'o // / +btsun pa legs so zhes dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903515#903532#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1743;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1744;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1745# dper na kha cig mngar ba la dad kyang skyur ba la ma dad pa dang  kha cig skyur ba la dad kyang kha ba la ma dad pa yod pa ltar / /

column3: slar yang bcom ldan 'das la yongs su dri ba dris pa / / +btsun pa phung po dag las phung po rab tu dbye bar  gdags pa rnyed lags sam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903531#903544#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1744;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1745;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1746# dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan nam ma bstan kyang rung / / +kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa nyid la dad kyi ji ltar byas kyang  theg pa chen bo la ma dad pa la sogs pa dad pa tha dad pa dag snang ngo // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / +dge slong rnyed de / / +ji ltar kha cig ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur kyang ci ma rung / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903545#903553#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1745;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1746;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1747# kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa nyid la dad kyi ji ltar byas kyang  theg pa chen bo la ma dad pa la sogs pa dad pa tha dad pa dag snang ngo // / +gal te rigs gcig tu zang de rigs du mar med na ci'i phyir mos pa tha dad pa du mar 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903554#903562#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1746;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1747# gal te rigs gcig tu zang de rigs du mar med na ci'i phyir mos pa tha dad pa du mar 'gyur te / / +mos pa tha dad par snang bas na rigs gcig tu ma zad kyi rigs rnam pa gsum du yod par mngon no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na tshor ba 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dang  'du shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dang  'du  byed 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dang  rnam par shes pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903562#903573#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1747;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1748;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1749;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1750;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1751# mos pa tha dad par snang bas na rigs gcig tu ma zad kyi rigs rnam pa gsum du yod par mngon no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: dge slong 'di ltar na phung po rab tu dbye bar gdags par 'gyur ro // / +btsun pa legs so zhes dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903574#903581#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1749;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1750;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1751# bsgrub pa tha dad dbye ba dang / / +zhes bya ba la / / +nyan thos kyi rigs can gyi gang zag kha cig theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rkyen gyi dbang gis theg pa chen po'i rigs can dang 'dra bar theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa dang dad pa skyes kyang sa  dang pha rol tu phyin pa kha cig gis bsgrub nus la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903582#903592#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1751# nyan thos kyi rigs can gyi gang zag kha cig theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rkyen gyi dbang gis theg pa chen po'i rigs can dang 'dra bar theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa dang dad pa skyes kyang sa  dang pha rol tu phyin pa kha cig gis bsgrub nus la / /

column3: slar yang  bcom ldan 'das la yongs su dri ba dris pa / / +btsun pa ji tsam gyis na phung po phung po zhes tshigs bla dags su gyur ce na / /

column3: dge slong 'di na gzugs gang ci yang rung ba 'das pa'am / / +ma 'ongs pa'am / / +da ltar byung ba'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903606#903613#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1753# dper na 'phags pa sh'a ri'i sras po lta bu theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgral nas bskal pa nyi shur theg pa chen po'i chos spyod pa las phyis mu stegs can gyis mig blangs pa dang  byang chub  sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub ma nus nas btang ste nyan thos kyi theg par mya ngan las 'das pa lta bu'o // /

column3: dge slong 'di tsam gyis na phung po zhes bya ba'i tshigs bla dags  su 'gyur ro // /
