column3: dge  slong dag rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid ni kun du 'bar ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906481#906489#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2052;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2053;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2054;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2055;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2056# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi mthus zab cing rgya che ba'i theg pa chen po'i don ma rtogs shing mi shes par yang thos pa tsam  gyi sgo nas dad pa dang mos pa rgya che zhing rlabs chen po 'byung bas na / / +mi shes par ni dad 'gyur shin tu rgya che ba // / +zhes bya'o // /

column3: chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang  yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang  yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis 'byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906490#906502#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2055;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2056;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2057# legs par bsgrub la bzod ces bya ba la / / +sems can gyi don du mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa btang ba'i dka' ba spyad pa dang  sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa ni  legs par bsgrub pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: sdug bsngal ba 'am / / +bde ba yang ma yin / / +sdug  bsngal ba yang ma yin pa dang yang kun du 'bar ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906503#906510#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2057;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2058;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2059# rigs kyi mthus de dag thams cad kyang bsgrub nus pas na legs par bsgrub bzod ces bya'o // /

column3: gang gis kun du 'bar zhe na / / +'dod chags kyi me 'bar ba dang  zhe sdang gi me dang  gti mug gi me kun du 'bar ba dang  skye ba dang  rga ba dang  na ba dang  'chi ba dang  mya ngan dang  smre sngags 'don pa dang  sdug    bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba dang  'khrug pa dang  sdug bsngal kun du 'bar ba'o zhes nga smra ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906511#906535#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2057;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2058;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2059;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2060;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2061;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2062# rigs kyi mthus de dag thams cad kyang bsgrub nus pas na legs par bsgrub bzod ces bya'o // / +phun sum tshogs pa'i mtha' dang zhes bya ba la / / +de ltar theg pa chen po'i chos la yang mos / /
column5: 0.019#TD4015E.TXT.r#1968777#1968777#TD4015E.TXT.r_357;TD4015E.TXT.r_358# ma lus par bkrus nas ring du byed pas ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa kun du spyod pa ni nan tan du bya ba'o // / +bsod nams dang ye shes la sogs pa'i tshogs  bsags pas mi zad pa'i mdzod yang dag par dmigs pa rnam pa bcu pa gang gsungs pa ni srid pa thams cad du ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column6: 0.020#TD4012E.TXT.r#1591119#1591119#TD4012E.TXT.r_455# bsod nams dang ye  shes kyi tshogs la sogs pa'i chogs thob pas mi zad pa'i mdzod rnyed pa ste 'di ni rnam pa bcu pa'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4012E.TXT.r#1588507#1588507#TD4012E.TXT.r_67;TD4012E.TXT.r_68# zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +bsod nams dang ye shes la sogs pa tshogs bsgrubs pas mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu rnyed par gang gsungs pa / /
column8: 0.028#TD4046E.TXT.r#2199429#2199429#TD4046E.TXT.r_478;TD4046E.TXT.r_479# bslab pa'i dngos po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa bsdus  pas na tshul khrims kyi phung po'o // / +bsod nams dpag tu med pa'i tshogs bsdus pas na bsod nams kyi phung po'o // /
column9: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#202309#202309#TD4035E.TXT.r_13486# skyes bu dam pa rnams dang  sangs rgyas rnams dang  sangs  rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba dang  gal te tshul khrims dang  zang zing gi sbyin pas bsdus pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang  chos kyi sbyin pas bsdus pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyis / /

column3: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no // / +chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam  par grol lo zhes gsungs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906536#906545#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2061;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2062;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2063# shes kyi tshogs phun sum tshogs par bsgrubs pa'i mjug tu bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gnyis las khyad par du gyur pa thob par 'gyur te / / +'di yang rigs rgya che ba dang  mthu rgya che ba las 'thob po zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906545#906559#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2062;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2063;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2064;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2065# 'di yang rigs rgya che ba dang  mthu rgya che ba las 'thob po zhes bya ba'i don to // / +bla na med  pa'i byang chub kyi phun sum tshogs pa de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na / /

column3: bstan pa mchog / / +mi 'khrul phyir dang phan pa dang / / +zhes bya ba la / / +bcom ldan 'das n'a len dra aa mras kun du bskor ba'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906558#906573#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2064;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2065;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2066# de'i phyir rnam gnyis mchog ste zhes bya ba smos te / / +bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi phun sum tshogs pa de'ang phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gnyis las khyad par du gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de nas khyim bdag nya pa'i bu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906574#906583#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2066;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2067# phun sum tshogs pa gnyis ni brgya byin  la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa dang  nyan thos la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'o // /

column3: nye  bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906582#906592#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2066;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2067# phun sum tshogs pa gnyis ni brgya byin  la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa dang  nyan thos la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'o // / +de dag de ltar 'gyur zhes byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi rigs de ni theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa skye ba dang  bsgrub pa la skyo ba med pa dang  mthar byang chub  chen po'i phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te / /

column3: phyogs gcig tu 'dug go // / +phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag nya pa'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906590#906609#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2067;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2068;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2069;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2070# de dag de ltar 'gyur zhes byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi rigs de ni theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa skye ba dang  bsgrub pa la skyo ba med pa dang  mthar byang chub  chen po'i phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te / /

column3: btsun pa n'a len dra 'byor brgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba 'di na  bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa mang du mchis lags te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906610#906619#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2069;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2070;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2071# de yi rang bzhin yon tan ldan pa byang chub chen po'i rigs rgyas shes par bya // / +zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs de ni gong du bshad pa'i tshul ltar na rang bzhin gyis yon tan dang ldan pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams 'ga' zhig mi'i chos las bla mar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul dag bstan du bcug na legs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906620#906632#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2070;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2071;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2072;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs de ni gong du bshad pa'i tshul ltar na rang bzhin gyis yon tan dang ldan pa zhes bya ste / / +de ltar  rang bzhin gyis yon tan dang ldan pas rigs de shin tu rgya che ba dang  mthu che bar bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904628#904628#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1865;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1866# 'di ni mtshan ma bzhi pa'o // / +rigs rab tu dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la gong du bsdus pa'i don las rab tu dbye ba zhes smos pa la / /
column6: 0.029#TD4018E.TXT.r#3060726#3060726#TD4018E.TXT.r_7361;TD4018E.TXT.r_7362;TD4018E.TXT.r_7363# dad pa'i dge slong gis ni dad pas sbyin pa la longs spyod par mi rigs so // / +ma dad pas ni rigs so zhes so // / +der don khyad par du  bshad par bya'i / /

column3: bram ze dang  khyim bdag 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dag gis mthong nas 'di lta bu'i n'a len dra  phal cher bcom ldan 'das la dad par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906633#906644#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2072;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# rigs kyi 'bras bu'i khyad par du tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: khyim bdag gi bu nga 'di ltar dge slong dag khyed cag bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ong ba rnams la mi'i chos las bla mar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul dag ston cig ces nyan thos rnams la chos mi ston gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906645#906659#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2074;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2075# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906659#906675#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2074;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2075;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2076;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2077# shin tu yangs pa'i yon tan byang chub shing skyes pas // / +stug pos bde zhing sdug bsngal zhi bas dmigs pa'i phyir // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906923#906927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2100;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2101;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2098;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2099;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2102# gong du rigs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +shin tu yangs pa'i yon tan byang chub  shing skyes pas // /
column7: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914116#914118#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2998# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922921#922921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4152# dgu pos bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu po de nyid yon tan dang  bdag nyid chen po bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914541#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925285#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925471#925471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921190#921190#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3922# dad pa yongs su smin to zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896433#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column27: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959054#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column28: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column29: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981019#981019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11612# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhin rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column30: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2949165#2949165#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11222# brtan pa dang ldan par bya ba ni bdag yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched du    grang ba dang  tsha ba la sogs pa'i phyi'i sdug bsngal dang  bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa nang gi sdug bsngal byung bas mi skyo zhing mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir / /
column31: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2891611#2891611#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3382;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3383# de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje'i rgyus sems can thams cad  la sdug par byed pa sdug pa gzhan dang khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir // / +tshigs su bcad pa gsum rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column32: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#177878#177878#TD4035E.TXT.r_9310# sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir dang   gcig tu nges par bde zhing gnod pa med pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar bya ba'i phyir ni bsgom pa'o // /
column33: 0.028#TD4039E.TXT.r#1854797#1854797#TD4039E.TXT.r_4654# rnam pa dgus sdug bsngal zhing 'dug pa'i yang srid par skye ba'i shing phyi ma la bskyed pa'i phyir mi mkhas pas  tshe 'di la gsar du las byas pa gang yin pa de ni de'i sdug bsngal gyi shing gzhon nu lta bu yin te / /
column34: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2881069#2881069#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1857# sems can sdug bsngal ba dang brel ba dang  phongs pa rnams kyi  sdug bsngal bsal bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa gtong bar byed pas slong ba'i zhing dang sdug bsngal gyi zhing la gtong bar byed kyi yon tan gyi zhing la mi gtong ngo // /
column35: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1221565#1221565#TD4047E.TXT.r_14221;TD4047E.TXT.r_14222# bya ba  mngon du gyur pa na don mthun par bstan pa'i phyir / / +sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang dag dang mtshungs par byed do zhes bya ba'o // /
column36: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2777577#2777577#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10670# gzhan yid ches pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba dang  yon tan bstsags pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba dang  dam pa rnams las chos mnyan pa dang  gdams ngag las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba dang  sdig pa mang du byed pa dang  sems kyi  rgyud dge ba las thag ring du byed pa dang  gyo'i mi mnyam pa'i gnod pas sems sdug bsngal zhing reg par mi gnas pa dang  gzhan las sdug bsngal gyi chos rnams kyi dogs pa 'byung ba dang  'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba dang  'gyod bzhin du 'chi  ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba dang  lus zhigs te shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'o // /

column3: 'on kyang 'di ltar dge slong dag dge ba ni  gsang bar bya zhing sdig pa ni mthol bar bya'o zhes nyan thos rnams la chos ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906665#906680#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2075;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2076;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2077;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2078;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2079# stug pos bde zhing sdug bsngal zhi bas dmigs pa'i phyir // /
column5: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906936#906942#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2102;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2103;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2104# stug po bde zhing sdug bsngal zhib dmigs pa'i phyir // / +bdag dang gzhan la phan bde bya bas 'bras bu bas // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla mar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul la nyes dmigs ci zhig yang dag par rjes su gzigs na 'di ltar dge slong dag dge ba ni gsang bar bya zhing sdig pa ni mthol bar bya'o zhes nyan  thos rnams la chos ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906681#906690#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2077;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2078;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2079;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2080# rtsa ba bzang  po bzhin du rigs 'di mchog yin no // / +zhes bya ba la / / +rtsa ba bzang po ni rtsa ba brtan pa dang  rtsa ba ma rul ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906691#906705#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2080# dper na rtsa ba bzang po'i shing las sdong po dang  me tog la sogs pa brtan zhing bzang po 'byung ba dang  yal ga dang  'dab ma la sogs pa sdug cing mdzes pa 'byung ba dang     de'i rgyus grib ma bsil ba yod pa dang  'bras bu phun sum tshogs pas gzhan la phan pa byed pa bzhin du byang chub kyi rigs 'di las kyang de dang mthun pa'i yon tan dag 'byung bas byang chub kyi rigs 'di ni shing gi rtsa ba bzang po dang 'dra'o // /

column3: khyim bdag gi bu cho 'phrul ni rnam pa gsum ste / / +gsum gang zhe na / / +rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang  kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang  rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906706#906715#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2080# dper na rtsa ba bzang po'i shing las sdong po dang  me tog la sogs pa brtan zhing bzang po 'byung ba dang  yal ga dang  'dab ma la sogs pa sdug cing mdzes pa 'byung ba dang     de'i rgyus grib ma bsil ba yod pa dang  'bras bu phun sum tshogs pas gzhan la phan pa byed pa bzhin du byang chub kyi rigs 'di las kyang de dang mthun pa'i yon tan dag 'byung bas byang chub kyi rigs 'di ni shing gi rtsa ba bzang po dang 'dra'o // /

column3: khyim bdag gi bu rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na / / +khyim bdag gi bu 'di na dge     // / +sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa dum nyams su myong bar byed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906716#906731#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2080;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2081# dper na rtsa ba bzang po'i shing las sdong po dang  me tog la sogs pa brtan zhing bzang po 'byung ba dang  yal ga dang  'dab ma la sogs pa sdug cing mdzes pa 'byung ba dang     de'i rgyus grib ma bsil ba yod pa dang  'bras bu phun sum tshogs pas gzhan la phan pa byed pa bzhin du byang chub kyi rigs 'di las kyang de dang mthun pa'i yon tan dag 'byung bas byang chub kyi rigs 'di ni shing gi rtsa ba bzang po dang 'dra'o // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang  mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ba dang  snang ba dang mi snang bar shes pa dang mthong ba nyams su myong bar byed pa dang   rtsig pa dang  ra ba dang  rdo ba dang  ri la lus kyis thogs pa med par 'gro ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906732#906755#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2081;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2082# dper na shing rtsa ba bzang po las sdong po sbom zhing bskams  pa dang sungs ba med pa 'byung ba dang  me tog sna tshogs pa 'byung ba de bzhin du / /

column3: nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no // / +sa la yang byi'u zul du byed de / / +'di lta ste / / +chu la bya ba bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906756#906765#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2082# rigs de las kyang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang  ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rgya chen me tog dang 'dra bar 'byung ba dang  zad la mi skye ba'i ye shes kyang byang chub chen po cis kyang mi tshugs pa shing sdong lta bu skyes  pas na shing gi rtsa ba ma zad par shes par bya'o // /

column3: chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste / / +'di lta ste / / +sa la bya ba bzhin no // / +nam mkha'  la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906766#906776#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2082;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2083# rigs de las kyang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang  ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rgya chen me tog dang 'dra bar 'byung ba dang  zad la mi skye ba'i ye shes kyang byang chub chen po cis kyang mi tshugs pa shing sdong lta bu skyes  pas na shing gi rtsa ba ma zad par shes par bya'o // /

column3: dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no // / +nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba 'di dag lag pas nom zhing nyug pa dang  tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur bar byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906777#906785#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2083;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2084;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2085# dper na shing rtsa ba bzang po las yal ga dang 'dab ma stug po yod pas grib ma'i bsil ba dang ldan pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906785#906798#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2083;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2084;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2085;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2086# dper na shing rtsa ba bzang po las yal ga dang 'dab ma stug po yod pas grib ma'i bsil ba dang ldan pa'i phyir / / +sems can rnams kyi tsha ba'i sdug bsngal ni sel / / +bsil ba'i bde ba thob pa de bzhin du / /

column3: dge sbyong ngam / / +bram ze dag rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma nyi ma dang zla ba  lag pas nom zhing nyug pa'i bar du byed pa dag dad pa'i khyim bdag gam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906797#906814#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2086;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2087;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2088# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di las  kyang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i yal ga dang 'dab ma stug po byung bas sems can gyi bde ba stug po rgya che ba ni thob par byed pa mthong / /

column3: khyim bdag gi bu 'ga' zhig gis mthong ste / / +mthong nas ma dad pa'i khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi bu dag la 'di skad du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906812#906822#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2087;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2088# sdug bsngal stug po mi bzad pa ni zhi bar byed par mthong bas rtsa ba bzang pho dang 'dra'o // /

column3: kye skyes bu shes par gyis shig / / +'di na dge sbyong ngam / / +bram ze rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma gcig  tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang  nyi ma dang zla ba lag pas nom zhing nyug pa'i bar du byed pa dag ngas mthong ngo zhes smra'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906823#906832#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2088# dper na rtsa ba bzang po'i shing la 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yod pas  sems can gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi rigs 'di las kyang bdag la phan pa la dang bde bar bya ba dang  gzhan la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bas na rtsa ba bzang po dang 'dra'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906833#906849#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2088;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2089;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2090# dper na rtsa ba bzang po'i shing la 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yod pas  sems can gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi rigs 'di las kyang bdag la phan pa la dang bde bar bya ba dang  gzhan la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bas na rtsa ba bzang po dang 'dra'o // /

column3: de 'di skad du / / +kye skyes bu khyod kyis 'di na dge sbyong ngam / / +bram ze rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyi ma dang zla ba la nom zhing nyug pa'i bar du byed pa mthong ba de la ngo mtshar ba ci zhig  yod ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906848#906860#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2089;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2090;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2091# de la shing rtsa ba bzang na sdong po la sogs pa 'gyel bar mi 'gyur bas rtsa  ba bzang po nyid bdag gi don to // / +yal ga dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu rgya che zhing stug pas ni gzhan la phan par byed pas gzhan gyi don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906861#906869#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2090;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2091# yal ga dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu rgya che zhing stug pas ni gzhan la phan par byed pas gzhan gyi don to // / +de bzhin du byang chub kyi rigs la yang shin tu yangs pa'i yon tan gyi byang chub kyi shing skyes pa ni bdag gi don to // /

column3: kye skyes bu gan dha ra pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod do // / +de 'ga' zhig gis bzung zhing bcangs na rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyi ma dang zla ba la nom zhing nyug pa'i bar du byed pa yod do zhes smra na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906870#906879#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2091;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2092;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2093# de bzhin du byang chub kyi rigs la yang shin tu yangs pa'i yon tan gyi byang chub kyi shing skyes pa ni bdag gi don to // / +stug pos bde  zhing sdug bsngal zhi ba dmigs pa ni gzhan gyi don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906879#906896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2092;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2093;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2094;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2095# stug pos bde  zhing sdug bsngal zhi ba dmigs pa ni gzhan gyi don to // / +bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: khyim bdag gi bu 'di ji snyam du sems / / +gnas dang po 'di la dad pa'i khyim bdag gam  khyim bdag gi bu dag ma dad pa'i khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi bu'i nye bar brjod pa nyan snyam sems sam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906896#906911#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2095;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2096;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2097;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2098;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2099# rigs de las bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bas na byang chub kyi rigs kyi yon tan     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907021#907034#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2110;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2111;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2112# sems bskyed pa la sogs pa la yang rigs yod na 'dod pa 'byung ste gang la rigs yod pa de  gdon mi za bar bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bar 'gyur bas na rigs kyi skabs kyi rjes la sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912360#912368#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2754;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2755# bskyed pa lhag par bya ba'i skabs rdzogs so //// / +sems bskyed pa'i skabs kyi rjes la sgrub pa'i skabs bshad par cis 'brel zhe na / /
column7: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#978176#978182#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11252;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11253;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11254# chos bshad pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +bshad pa'i skabs kyi rjes la / /

column9: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918192#918192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3523;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3524# de kho na'i skabs bshad pa  rdzogs so //// / +de kho na'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / /
column10: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925978#925978#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4528;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4529# yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / /
column11: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920422#920425#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3823;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3824;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3825# mthu'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +mthu'i skabs bshad pa'i  rjes la / /

column3: btsun pa de bzhin no // / +khyim bdag gi bu mi'i chos las bla mar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul la nyes dmigs 'di lta bu ngas yang dag par rjes su gzigs nas 'di ltar nyan thos    rnams la / /
column4: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906658#906658#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2074# shin tu yangs pa'i yon tan byang chub shing skyes pas // /

column3: dge slong dag dge ba ni gsang bar bya zhing sdig pa ni mthol bar bya'o zhes chos ston par mdzad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906928#906939#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2101;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2102;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2103;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2104# shin tu yangs pa'i yon tan byang chub  shing skyes pas // / +stug po bde zhing sdug bsngal zhib dmigs pa'i phyir // /

column3: khyim bdag gi bu kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na / / +khyim bdag gi bu 'di na dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig ni rgyu mtshan nam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906940#906952#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2103;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2104;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2105# bdag dang gzhan la phan bde bya bas 'bras bu bas // / +rtsa ba bzang po bzhin du rigs 'di mchog yin no // /

column3: yongs su brjod pa la kun brjod par bya ste / / +yid  ni 'di lta bu'o // / +yid ni gzhan du'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906953#906960#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2105;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2106# zhes bshad de ji ltar rtsa ba bzang po'i shing dang rtsa ba bzang po nyid rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o // /

column3: snga bar byas pa dang  snga bar brjod pa yang kun brjod la / / +gsang bar byas pa dang  gsang bar brjod pa kun yang rjod par byed la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906961#906974#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2106;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2107# de la yal  ga dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa rgya chen po yod pas ni 'gro ba mang po'i longs spyod du gyur pas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'das pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba kun yang rjod par byed cing / / +thag ring po yang  kun brjod la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906975#906984#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2106;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2107;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2108;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2109# de la yal  ga dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa rgya chen po yod pas ni 'gro ba mang po'i longs spyod du gyur pas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs ba zhes bya'o // / +de bzhin du rang bzhin la gnas pa'i rigs yod na / /

column3: thag nye bar yang kun brjod cing / / +sems kyang kun brjod la sems las byung ba yang kun rjod par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906985#907003#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2108;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2109;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2110# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don gnyis 'grub par 'gyur ro // / +de la rnam pa gnyis 'grub pa yang rigs 'ba' zhig yod pa tsam gyis mi chog gi rigs la brten nas sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bsgrubs na 'dod pa 'grub kyi sems ma bskyed na ni mi 'grub bo // /

column3: gang cung zad brjod pa de thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi / / +gzhan du yang ma yin pa dang  rgyu mtshan nam yongs su brjod pa las kun rjod par mi byed mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907004#907014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2109;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2110# de la rnam pa gnyis 'grub pa yang rigs 'ba' zhig yod pa tsam gyis mi chog gi rigs la brten nas sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bsgrubs na 'dod pa 'grub kyi sems ma bskyed na ni mi 'grub bo // / +sems bskyed pa la sogs pa la yang rigs yod na 'dod pa 'byung ste gang la rigs yod pa de  gdon mi za bar bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bar 'gyur bas na rigs kyi skabs kyi rjes la sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /

column3: 'on kyang lha dang mi rnams las thos nas yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes kun rjod par byed de zhes bya ba nas / /
column4: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912445#912448#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2769;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2770# sgrub  ba la gnas nas gdod bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'grub kyi sgrub pa med na mi 'grub pas sems bskyed pa'i rjes la sgrub pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column5: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912560#912563#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2779;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2780;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2781# bla na med pa'i byang chub la ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid lta bur dmigs pas / / +sems bskyed pa'i rjes la bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column6: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2898308#2898309#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4251# brtan pa de yang ngo tsha shes pa las  'byung zhing 'grub par 'gyur bas na ngo tsha ba'i rjes la brtan pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column7: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#947052#947052#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7306# de bas na dmigs pa rnyed pa'i rjes la yid la byed pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column8: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951600#951603#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7874# de'i phyir de kho na nyid tshol ba'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na nyid la sgyu ma lta bur yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par  'brel to // /
column9: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951061#951064#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7799# mdo las sems mnyam par gzhag pa thob na de kho na nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung bas yid la byed pa'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column10: 0.019#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2869113#2869114#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_130;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_131# thabs dang ldan pa'i las kyi skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs bshad pa'i 'brel ba    ci yod ce na / /
column11: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#978280#978281#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11267# de bas na bshad pa'i skabs kyi rjes la bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column12: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943875#943875#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6922;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6923;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6924# chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs las ZHES BYA BA LA / / +mos pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel pa ci yod ce na / /
column13: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#978222#978224#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11260# de bas na bshad pa'i skabs kyi rjes la bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column14: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#903097#903097#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1701# ba'i skabs kyi rjes la rigs kyi skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column15: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920538#920538#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3841;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3842# de'i phyir mthu'i 'og tu yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // / +yang na gang la bslab par bya ba'i  rnam pa bdun bshad pa las mthu'i rjes la bdag yongs su smin pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba smos pas na de bshad pa'i skabs su bab pa'i phyir / /
column16: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951518#951519#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7863# de kho na tshol ba'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na la sgyu ma lta bur yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column17: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920491#920493#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3836# de'i phyir yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pas ni mthu'i rjes la yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column18: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#941224#941226#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6618;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6619# de bas na byang chub kyi skabs kyi rjes la mos pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column19: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936026#936026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5945# chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag ba la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi'o zhes bya ba la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs kyi rjes la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column20: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906910#906910#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2097;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2098;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2099# rigs kyi skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +rigs kyi skabs kyi rjes la / / +sems bskyed pa'i skabs bshad par cis 'brel zhe na / /
column21: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2905842#2905842#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5315# yang dag pa'i spong ba'i skabs kyi rjes la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i skabs bshad pa 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /

column3: thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du dang  rgyu mtshan dang yongs su brjod pa las kun rjod par yang mi byed la lha dang mi rnams las thos nas kun rjod par yang mi byed  mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907035#907047#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2111;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2112;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2113# yang na sems bskyed pa'i rang bzhin ni 'di ltar gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa'i mtshan nyid do // / +smon lam 'debs pa de yang  bdag nyid bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa dang  sems can gyi don byed par 'dod pa'i phyir smon lam 'debs te / /

column3: 'on kyang yongs su rtog pa dang  yongs su dpyod pas sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi yid yid kyis rnam par shes nas yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907048#907063#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2112;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2113;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2114# smon lam 'debs pa de yang  bdag nyid bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa dang  sems can gyi don byed par 'dod pa'i phyir smon lam 'debs te / / +sems can gyi don bya ba'i thabs ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas pa thob pa'o // /

column3: snga ma bzhin du thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi / / +gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907062#907071#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2114;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2115# de bas na sems can gyi thabs su gyur pas bla na med pa'i byang chub bsgrubs na byang chub tu  sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bsgrub pa'o // /

column3: dge  sbyong ngam bram ze rgyu mtshan nam / / +yongs su brjod pa las yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes kun rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907070#907085#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2115;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2116# de la yang rigs dang bcas pa'i stobs kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed na ni sems can de ldog pa med pa'i chos su 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir rigs kyi rjes la sems bskyed pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /

column3: snga ma bzhin du thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi / / +gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907086#907095#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2115;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2116;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2117# de la yang rigs dang bcas pa'i stobs kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed na ni sems can de ldog pa med pa'i chos su 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir rigs kyi rjes la sems bskyed pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // / +sems bskyed    pa'i mtshan nyid du tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /

column3: dad pa'i khyim bdag gam / / +khyim bdag gi bu dag gis mthong ste / / +mthong  nas ma dad pa'i khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi bu de dag la 'di skad du kye skyes bu dag shes par gyis shig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907093#907110#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2117;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2118;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2119;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2120# byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid du rang bzhin bstan par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896431#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959053#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'di na dge sbyong ngam / / +bram ze rgyu mtshan nam yongs su brjod pa las yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes kun brjod ces bya ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907111#907131#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2119;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2120;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2121;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2122;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2123# don chen po dga' thob pa che // / +byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ste // / +don gnyis dang ni sems bskyed pa'o // /

column3: thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi / / +gzhan du yang ma     // / +yin pa ngas mthong ngo zhes smras pa dang  kye skyes bu khyod kyis dge sbyong ngam bram ze rgyu mtshan nam yongs su brjod pa las yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes kun brjod ces bya ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907131#907146#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2123;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2124# byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid ni spro ba che ba'i mtshan nyid dang  rtsom pa che ba'i mtshan nyid dang  don che ba'i mtshan nyid dang  thob pa che ba'i mtshan nyid dang  don gnyis la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907147#907156#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2124;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2125# gong du bshad pa  rnams bsgrub par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed pa'i sems las byung bas sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i sems las gyo ba'i rang bzhin la sems bskyed ba zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.011#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1987852#1987853#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1314# sems gzhan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems las gzhan pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o // /
column7: 0.022#TD4071E.TXT.r#399505#399506#TD4071E.TXT.r_62;TD4071E.TXT.r_63;TD4071E.TXT.r_64# de ni de la dmigs pa yang yin la sems kyang yin pas de la dmigs pa'i  sems te / / +'jug par byed pa'i sems so // / +de las skyes pas na de la dmigs pa'i sems las skyes pa yin te // /
column8: 0.023#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2786685#2786686#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11923# dman pa'i sems nyid dang  kun nas shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang  don gzung ba'i sems nyid dang  don legs par gzung ba'i sems nyid dang  gus pa'i sems nyid do // /
column9: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#777595#777599#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1773;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1774# 'dir yang sems bcas pa smos pa ni 'di sems gyengs pa med pas na sems ma gyengs pa ste / /

column11: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3103183#3103184#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1680# kun dga' bar byed pa dang  slong mo pa rnams kyi mjug thogs su sbyin par  bya'o snyam du sems shing sbyin par bya ba'i dngos pos kun tu dga' bar byed pa dang  da ni khyod la sbyin par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba tshig kun tu rjod par byed pa dang  dngan dus byed pa na khro bas kun nas slong ba'i tshig rtsub po rjod par mi byed pa dang  slong mo pa la mngon sum dang lkog nas  mi smod mi sgrogs pa dang  sbyin par bya ba'i chos mi 'dogs na yang legs par shad kyis sbyangs te gtong bar byed pa dang  slong mo pa la mngon sum du smod par mi byed / /
column12: 0.026#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1983901#1983901#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_744# sdom pa'i sems pa'i sems las sems gzhan dang ldan par ma bsdams par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2784444#2784444#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11606;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11607# gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su mi slob pa'i sems kyang 'byung la / / +slob pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su mi slob pa'i sems kyang 'byung ngo // /
column14: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#855576#855577#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14549;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14550# 'byung ba'i sems ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'jug pas    ZHES BYA BA LA / / +'byung ba'i sems ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems rgyun chad pa'i sems te / /
column15: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2127555#2127555#TD4029E.TXT.r_976# de la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis sems drug po rtsa ba'i sems dang rjes su dpyod pa'i sems dang  rnam par dpyod pa'i sems dang  nges par 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sdom pa'i sems dang  re ba'i sems zhes 'chad par  'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2374194#2374194#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7529;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7530# 'di ltar thos pa las byung  ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems dang  bsams pa las byung ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems so // / +rnam par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las dgongs te de skad bstan pa yin na ni zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag  par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3103103#3103104#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1674# mngon par dga' ba rnam pa bdun po slong mo pa ma 'ongs pa nas sems mngon par dga' ba dang  slong mo 'ongs pa na mthong ma thag tu sems rab tu dga' ba dang  sbyin pa sbyin par  byed pa na yid bde ba'i sems dang  mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang  ngoms mi shes pa'i sems dang  rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pa med pa'i sems dang  byin nas 'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyis / /
column18: 0.029#TD4061E.TXT.r#1542902#1542902#TD4061E.TXT.r_4112# de las ji skad gsungs she na de'i phyir shes ldan rgyal ba'i sras dag ma chags pa'i sems dang  zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang  las su rung    ba'i sems dang  rnam par ma rmongs pa'i sems dang  zhi ba'i sems dang  rtsub pa med pa'i sems dang  rgyud gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang  dge ba'i sems dang  bye brag phyed pa'i sems dang  gus pa'i sems dang  mos pa'i sems dang  legs par rnam  par gnas pa'i sems dang  le lo med ba'i sems dang  gzung ba'i sems dang  phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sgrub pa'i sems dang  don la lta ba'i sems dang  skyon yid la mi byed pa'i sems dang  don la rton pa'i sems  dang ; /

column3: gzhan du ma yin pa mthong ba la ngo mtshar ba ci zhig yod / / +kye  skyes bu rtog byed ces bya ba'i rig sngags yod de gang zhig gis bzung zhing bcangs nas rgyu mtshan nam yongs su brjod pa las yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes kun rjod par byed ces bya ba nas thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes smra na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907155#907166#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2125# spro ba che ba ni go cha'i brtson 'grus kyis theg pa chen po'i chos la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos rnams mnyan ba dang  bsam pa la sogs  pa'i sgo nas rtogs par bya'o zhes sems spro zhing mi ldog pa dang  sems can gyi don du bskal pa grangs med par mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa gtong ba'i dka' ba spyod pa la spro zhing mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa dang bo la spro ba che ba zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907167#907174#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2125# spro ba che ba ni go cha'i brtson 'grus kyis theg pa chen po'i chos la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos rnams mnyan ba dang  bsam pa la sogs  pa'i sgo nas rtogs par bya'o zhes sems spro zhing mi ldog pa dang  sems can gyi don du bskal pa grangs med par mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa gtong ba'i dka' ba spyod pa la spro zhing mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa dang bo la spro ba che ba zhes bya'o // /

column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907185#907193#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2125;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2126# spro ba che ba ni go cha'i brtson 'grus kyis theg pa chen po'i chos la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos rnams mnyan ba dang  bsam pa la sogs  pa'i sgo nas rtogs par bya'o zhes sems spro zhing mi ldog pa dang  sems can gyi don du bskal pa grangs med par mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa gtong ba'i dka' ba spyod pa la spro zhing mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa dang bo la spro ba che ba zhes bya'o // / +rtsom pa che ba ni de ltar go cha'i brtson 'grus brtsams  nas go cha brtsams shing khas blangs pa bzhin du sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ji ltar go cha ba go zhing khas blangs pa bzhin du zab cing rgya che ba'i chos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ni chos nyan pa dang  sems pa goms pa la 'jug / /

column3: khyim bdag gi bu 'di ji snyam du sems / / +gnas  gnyis pa 'di la dad pa'i khyim bdag gam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907192#907203#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2126# rtsom pa che ba ni de ltar go cha'i brtson 'grus brtsams  nas go cha brtsams shing khas blangs pa bzhin du sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ji ltar go cha ba go zhing khas blangs pa bzhin du zab cing rgya che ba'i chos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ni chos nyan pa dang  sems pa goms pa la 'jug / /
