column3: btsun pa de bzhin no // / +khyim bdag gi bu mi'i chos las bla mar gyur pa'i kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul la nyes dmigs  'di lta bu ngas yang dag par rjes su gzigs nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907221#907230#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2127;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2128# sems can gyi don du ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa dang dka'  ba spyad pa rnam ba sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir rtsom pa che ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: dge slong dag dge ba ni gsang bar bya zhing sdig pa ni mthol bar bya'o zhes nyan thos rnams la chos ston par mdzad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907229#907242#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2127;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2128;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2129# sems can gyi don du ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa dang dka'  ba spyad pa rnam ba sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir rtsom pa che ba zhes bya'o // / +sems bskyed pa de'ang bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba dang  gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pas na don che ba'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477335#477335#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3560# sems  can rnams kyis yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems gdul ba'i phyir sbyor ba'i shes pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol ba'o // /
column6: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1400115#1400115#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_53;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_54# che ba'i bdag nyid de rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no // / +de shes par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.028#TD4010E.TXT.r#2239987#2239987#TD4010E.TXT.r_1158# bla na med pa'i sems ni dri ma med pa'i sems bskyed nas mchod par byas pa'o // /

column3: khyim bdag gi bu rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na / / +khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba nas rgyas par gnas rnam pa gsum rnams la ston pa'i yongs su dag pa btsal bar bya'o zhes de'i dpe tshul khrims kyi phung po'i bsam gtan dang  mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po'i mdo lnga ba'i stod kyi cha  las 'byung la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907243#907251#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2128;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2129# sems bskyed pa de'ang bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba dang  gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pas na don che ba'o // / +de ltar sems bskyed nas mjug tu 'bras bu bla na  med pa'i byang chub thob pas na thob pa che ba zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907252#907265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2129;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2130# de ltar sems bskyed nas mjug tu 'bras bu bla na  med pa'i byang chub thob pas na thob pa che ba zhes bya'o // / +byang chub kyi sems de yang sems gyo zhing 'gul bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid sems las byung BAS SEMS PA ZHES BYA BAS bskyod nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas na byang chub sems dpa'i sems zhes bya ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907265#907280#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2130;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2131;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2132;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2133# byang chub kyi sems de yang sems gyo zhing 'gul bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid sems las byung BAS SEMS PA ZHES BYA BAS bskyod nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas na byang chub sems dpa'i sems zhes bya ste / /
column7: 0.021#TD4071E.TXT.r#407411#407412#TD4071E.TXT.r_1281# ci ste pha rol po gang gis na skyon der 'gyur bar 'gog pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su mi gyo ba la sogs pa'i sems mngon du 'gyur ba de ji ltar mi mngon zhe na zhes smra bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas lung gis bsgrub pa'i phyir / /
column8: 0.023#TD4097E.TXT.r#2224337#2224337#TD4097E.TXT.r_2908;TD4097E.TXT.r_2909# bsgribs pa'i sems mngon du  byed pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems mngon du byed pa'o // / +sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa med pa'i sems mngon du byed pa ni srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa pa'i zag pa med pa'i sems mngon du byed pa'o // /
column9: 0.024#TD4071E.TXT.r#399504#399504#TD4071E.TXT.r_62;TD4071E.TXT.r_63;TD4071E.TXT.r_64# de ni de la dmigs pa yang yin la sems kyang yin pas de la dmigs pa'i  sems te / / +'jug par byed pa'i sems so // / +de las skyes pas na de la dmigs pa'i sems las skyes pa yin te // /
column10: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912554#912557#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2778;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2779;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2780# de la yang bdag dang gzhan gyi don dang  de kho na'i don dang  mthu dang  yongs su smin par byed pa dang  bzhi la ni rgyu'i mtshan  nyid lta bur dmigs la / / +bla na med pa'i byang chub la ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid lta bur dmigs pas / /
column11: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1319767#1319767#TD4037E.TXT.r_541# kha na ma tho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tshe 'di pa dang  tshe gzhan pa dang  zhi bar  byed pa'o // /
column12: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2317840#2317840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_829# de las mngon pa'i nga rgyal    can gyi nyan thos ni gang zag la bdag med tsam gyi shes pa dang  chos bdag med pa la log par mngon par zhen pa'i shes pas dag par rtog pa gang yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2374187#2374192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7529# 'di ltar thos pa las byung  ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems dang  bsams pa las byung ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems dang  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i so sor brtag pa'i sems so // /
column14: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#124936#124937#TD4035E.TXT.r_20# rtog pa yang med la  dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa dang  mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa dang  mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa dang  sems yod pa'i sa dang  sems med pa'i sa dang  thos pa las byung ba'i sa dang  bsams pa     // /
column15: 0.026#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2784489#2784491#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11611;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11612# de bzhin  du sa gong ma sa lhag ma rnams kyi dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su sa gong ma pa'i sems dag kyang skye bar blta bar bya'o // / +'dod pa na spyod pa'i lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su yang gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems 'byung ste / /
column16: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2538713#2538713#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_535# kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems  la ltos pa'i phyir dang  mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems kyi rnam par rig byed kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir nyid dang ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyas par byas pa'i 'byung ba chen po las skyes pa ma yin no // /
column17: 0.026#TD4007E.TXT.r#416209#416209#TD4007E.TXT.r_176# de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par med pa shes bzhin du mdun du byas nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang  sngo bar byed pa'i sems dang  gang du bsngo bar bya ba'i bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang don dam  pa'i mtshan ma cung zad du yang mi 'dzin par sems can gyi ched du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bsngo ba'am / /
column18: 0.027#TD4009E.TXT.r#328940#328940#TD4009E.TXT.r_1271;TD4009E.TXT.r_1272# byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni zad zing med pa'i sems kyis byang chub 'thob pa'i dbang du byas pa'o // / +de ltar yang  dag par sgrub pa'i rab tu byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi khyad par brjod pa'i phyir dpe bstan pa mdzad do // /
column19: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2784292#2784293#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11587;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11588# mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i sems la yang 'byung ste / / +mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa pa'i sems la ni shin tu sbyangs par lhag par rig par bya'o // /
column20: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2784443#2784443#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11606;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11607# gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su mi slob pa'i sems kyang 'byung la / / +slob pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su mi slob pa'i sems kyang 'byung ngo // /
column21: 0.028#TD4066E.TXT.r#2113144#2113145#TD4066E.TXT.r_1542;TD4066E.TXT.r_1543# de dag gi gong na khang khyim lta bur 'du shes med pa'i sems can lha rnams kyi gnas yod pa der skyes pa'i 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o // / +sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos brtan pa ma yin pa rnams gang 'gog pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'di'i rang bzhin nges par bzung ba ste / /
column22: 0.029#TD4013E.TXT.r#613426#613427#TD4013E.TXT.r_417# de ltar na bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir thabs kyi khyad par pha rol mi dpogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i spyod pas  'thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'di ni dad pas bskyed pa'i sems kyis thos pa'i tshe yang sems kyi rgyun rnam par dag par byed na rtag tu byed pas nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bsgrub pas lta smos kyang ci dgos / /

column3: smad kyi cha ni mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par tshangs pa'i bar du gyo sgyu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba der bris zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907279#907292#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2132;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2133;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2134;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2135# sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i sems bskyed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +byang chub kyi sems de ci las dmigs nas sems skye zhe na // /
column5: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907306#907307#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2135# don gnyis ni bdag nyid byang chub chen po thob par bya bar dmigs pa dang  sems  can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don bya bar dmigs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: ston pa la / / +yid mgyogs 'gro ba zhes bya ba la / / +bcom ldan 'das shar sha pa'i grong khyer gyi tsan dan gyi khang pa na bzhugs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907293#907307#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2134;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2135# de nyid don gnyis la dmigs nas sems skye ste / / +don gnyis ni bdag nyid byang chub chen po thob par bya bar dmigs pa dang  sems  can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don bya bar dmigs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na  klu'i rgyal po nag po dang  goo ta ma zhes bya ba gnyis gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907308#907320#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2135;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2136# don gnyis ni bdag nyid byang chub chen po thob par bya bar dmigs pa dang  sems  can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don bya bar dmigs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das shar sha pa'i grong khyer na chos ston gyis nyan pa'i phyir 'gro'o zhes gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907318#907334#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2136;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2137;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2138;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2139# de yan chad kyis mdor na byang chub kyi sems de yon tan gsum dang ldan pa dang  don gnyis la dmigs pa yin par bstan to // /
column5: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2159599#2159604#TD4029E.TXT.r_5116;TD4029E.TXT.r_5117# de la sgrub pa'i yon tan ni rnam pa gsum ste / / +rgyu mthun pa'i yon tan dang  bral ba'i yon  tan dang  sems can la mngon du phyogs pa'i yon tan no // /

column3: de nas klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang  chu bo lnga brgya nas byung ste shar sha pa'i grong khyer du 'ong ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das    kyi chos rnams la mi brjed pa'i dran pas klu'i rgyal po nag po dang  goo ta ma gnyis shar sha ba'i grong khyer du 'ongs na grong khyer gzhig cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba gzigs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907334#907343#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2138;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2139;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2140# skyes bu byed pa'i yon  tan dang  don byed pa'i yon tan dang  'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan no // / +don gnyis ni byang chub kyi don la dmigs pa dang  sems can gyi don la dmigs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907344#907352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2140;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2141;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2142# de la spro ba che zhing rtsom pa che // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907353#907362#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2141;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2142# zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis kyis skyes bu byed pa'i yon tan bstan te / / +dang po  sems bskyed pa na yang sems kyi shugs drag tu bskyed la phyis sgrub pa'i tshe na yang dka' ba spyod pa thams cad de bzhin du bsgrub pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po la bos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907363#907371#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2142;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2143# dang po  sems bskyed pa na yang sems kyi shugs drag tu bskyed la phyis sgrub pa'i tshe na yang dka' ba spyod pa thams cad de bzhin du bsgrub pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1196424#1196425#TD4047E.TXT.r_10725;TD4047E.TXT.r_10726# rton pa bzhi po dag la zhes bya ba ni don rnam pa bzhis rton pa rnam pa bzhi la ji ltar rton par rigs par 'gyur zhes dris pa'i don to // / +don 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni don lhur len par gyur pas nyan par byed kyi yi ge sbyar ba lhur len pa ni ma yin no // /
column6: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1226741#1226741#TD4047E.TXT.r_14958# dri ma'i  don dang mi mthun pa'i don 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir thob par bya ba la gegs byed pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya bas bstan to // /
column7: 0.029#TD4051E.TXT.r#1234216#1234216#TD4051E.TXT.r_283;TD4051E.TXT.r_284# gang na mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod pa de na gnyen po yod pa'i phyir gnas ni yin no / / +rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i don ni kun gzhi'i don no // /

column3: mood gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin  gshegs pa'i glo bur ba'i bsod snyoms dag zung shig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907370#907381#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2142;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2143;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2144;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2145# dang po  sems bskyed pa na yang sems kyi shugs drag tu bskyed la phyis sgrub pa'i tshe na yang dka' ba spyod pa thams cad de bzhin du bsgrub pa'i phyir ro // / +don chen po zhes bya bas don chen po'i yon tan bstan te / /

column3: de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +mood gal gyi bu chen po glo bur gyi bsod snyoms ni rnam pa lnga ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907382#907393#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2145;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2146# thob pa che zhes bya bas 'bras bu yongs su  'dzin pa'i yon tan bstan te mthar bla na med pa'i byang chub len pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: lnga gang zhe na / / +glo bur du lhags pa dang  mgron po dang  nad pa dang  nad gyog dang  las byed pa rnams kyi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907391#907408#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2145;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2146;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2147;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2148;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2149# thob pa che zhes bya bas 'bras bu yongs su  'dzin pa'i yon tan bstan te mthar bla na med pa'i byang chub len pa'i phyir ro // / +don gnyis zhes bya bas gnyis la dmigs pa bstan te / /

column3: 'don  'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid las byed pa yin no // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das dang  mood gal gyi bu thabs cig tu klu'i rgyal po nag po dang  goo ta ma gnyis gang na ba der gshegs shing nye bar gshegs te bka' stsal pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907408#907425#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2149;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2150# byang chub kyi sems kyi  mtshan nyid nas byang chub kyi sems la phyen du yod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i 'chad de / /

column3: klu'i dbang po dag shur pa ri'i grong khyer mi snang bar 'gyur  ba de ltar bsam par gyis shig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907426#907435#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2150;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2151# byang chub kyi sems la phyen mos pa'i sems bskyed pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sems bskyed pa dang  rnam par smin pa'i sems bskyed pa dang  sgrib pa spangs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang phyen rnam pa  bzhi yod do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /

column3: de gnyis kyis smras pa / / +btsun pa dad pa'i shugs de 'dra bas bdag cag der 'ongs na gang yang bdag srog chags grog sbur yan chad la yang gnod par mi nus na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907436#907452#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2150;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2151;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2152;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2153# byang chub kyi sems la phyen mos pa'i sems bskyed pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sems bskyed pa dang  rnam par smin pa'i sems bskyed pa dang  sgrib pa spangs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang phyen rnam pa  bzhi yod do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // / +sems bskyed de ni mos pa dang / /

column3: shur sha pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal / / +de nas bcom  ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar rtsom pa na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907451#907467#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2153;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2154;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2155# mos bas spyod pa'i sa drod dang  spyi bo dang  bzod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog gi tshe na sems bskyed pa ni theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba rtogs nas sems bskyed pa ni ma    yin gyi theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba la dang pa'i sgo nas sems bskyed bas na / /

column3: klu de dag so so nas 'di snyam du kye ma bcom ldan 'das bdag gi chu gsol bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907466#907482#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2153;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2154;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2155;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2156;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2157;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2158# mos bas spyod pa'i sa drod dang  spyi bo dang  bzod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog gi tshe na sems bskyed pa ni theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba rtogs nas sems bskyed pa ni ma    yin gyi theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba la dang pa'i sgo nas sems bskyed bas na / / +mos pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa / / +gal te gcig gi chu 'thungs na gzhan dag mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis thabs kyi  rnam pa zhig bya'o zhes dgongs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907483#907490#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2157;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2158;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2159;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2160# gzhan gyi sgra ni sa dang po yan chad sa bdun pa man chad kyi sa la bya ste / / +sa bdun po de dag gi sems  pa la ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907491#907498#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2159;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2160# ci'i phyir zhe na / / +gang bdag yin pa de bzhin gzhan gang yin pa de bdag ces gzhan du mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po la bos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907497#907510#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2160;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2161# gang bdag yin pa de bzhin gzhan gang yin pa de bdag ces gzhan du mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: mood gal gyi bu chu lnga brgya gang du 'dus pa de las chu lhung bzed gang khyer la shog shig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907504#907509#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2160;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2161# gang bdag yin pa de bzhin gzhan gang yin pa de bdag ces gzhan du mnyam pa nyid kyi sems thob pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907510#907520#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2161;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2162;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2163;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2164# gzung  pa dang 'dzin pa'i dri ma dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir dag pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: btsun pa de bzhin no zhes tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las  mnyan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907521#907530#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2164;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2165;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2166# sa brgyad pa dang  sa dgu pa dang  bcu par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la rnam par smin pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ste / /

column3: chu bo lnga brgya gang du 'dus pa de las chu lhung bzed gang blangs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907531#907541#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2165;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2166;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2167;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2168# ci'i phyir zhe na / / +sa de dag la rnam  par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa thob pas / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste / / +nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das la chu lhung bzed bkang nas phul ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis blangs te gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907538#907557#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2166;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2167;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2168;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2169;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2170;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2171;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2172# sa de dag la rnam  par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa thob pas / / +sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la yang / / +brtsal 'bad med par lhun gyis grub par spyod pas na / /

column3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mood gal     // / +gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te / / +sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag pha dang  ma dag ni bu la dka' ba byed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907558#907572#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2172;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2173;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2174# sangs rgyas  kyis kun tu 'od kyi dus na zad pa dang  mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems skyes pa la ni sgrib pa med pa'i sems skyes pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: gsos skyed par byed cing 'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston pa ste / / +phrag pa gcig la pha / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907571#907580#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2174;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2175# de'i tshe byang chub kyi sems de ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa ma lus par spangs pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir  ro ; / /

column3: phrag pa gnyis pa la ma khyer te / / +lo 'khor ba  brgyar gnas pa dang  gang yang sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang  mu tig dang  bee d'urya dang  dung dang  shel dang  gser dang  dngul dang  sa le sbram dang  aasma garbha dang  mu sa la garbha dang  lo he ta r'a ga dang  dung gyas su 'khyil pa la sogs  pa 'di lta bu rnams kyis phyug par byas kyang bus pha dang ma la phan pa byas pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907581#907590#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2175;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2176;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2177# de bas na 'phags pa ga ya'i rtse mo'i mdo las kyang / / +lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni rgyu las yang dag par 'byung ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907591#907602#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2176;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2177;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2178;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2179# lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni rgyu las yang dag par 'byung ba'o // / +sems bskyed PA GNYIS PA NI YE shes las yang dag par 'byung ba'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907603#907620#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2178;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2179;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2180;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2181# sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni spong ba las yang dag par 'byung  ba'o ; / / +sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni 'bras bu las yang dag par 'byung ba'o zhes gsungs so // /

column3: gang gis pha dang ma ma dad pa dad pa phun sum tshogs par byed cing 'dul ba dang  rab tu 'god pa dang  rab tu 'jog par byed cing tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims phun sum  tshogs pa dang  ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang  shes rab 'chal ba shes rab phun sum tshogs par byed cing 'dul ba la rab tu 'god pa dang  rab tu 'jog par byed na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907621#907630#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2181;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2182;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2183# byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnam pa bzhir phye ba la bzhin po de dag gi rtsa ba ni gang / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907631#907642#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2183;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2184;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2185;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2186# zhes don bcu gcig dris pa dang  de bzhin du lan btab pa la gdon mi zab zhes bya ba ste / /

column3: 'di tsam gyis bus pha dang ma la phan ba byas pa  yin no zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907641#907657#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2184;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2185;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2186;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2187# de las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad pa ston to // / +de yi rtsa ba snying rjer 'dod // /

column3: bdag gis ma la phan pa cung zad kyang ma byas kyis da bdag gis ma gang du skyes pa bsam par bya'o zhes des bsams pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes par mthong zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907657#907667#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2187;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2188# byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi'i rtsa ba gang zhen zhes dris pa dang  de'i  lan du byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi'i rtsa ba ni snying rje yin par 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes snying rjes sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o snyam du sems pa ste / /

column3: gang gis 'dul zhe na / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar  mthong nas / / +de 'di snyam du bdag thag ring po nas 'ongs par gyur la bdag gis don 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs par bya'o zhes / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907666#907675#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2187;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2188;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2189# byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi'i rtsa ba gang zhen zhes dris pa dang  de'i  lan du byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi'i rtsa ba ni snying rje yin par 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes snying rjes sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o snyam du sems pa ste / / +des sems can thams cad bsdus nas gnas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907676#907683#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2189# gal te snying rje rtsa bar gyur pa med na ni sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub  kyi sems rnams kyang mi skyed kyi nyan thos bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par 'jug par 'gyur te / /

column3: des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // / +btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong dag pha dang ma bu la dka' ba byed pa ste zhes  gsungs na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907684#907697#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2189;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2190;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2191;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2192# gal te snying rje rtsa bar gyur pa med na ni sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub  kyi sems rnams kyang mi skyed kyi nyan thos bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par 'jug par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.028#TD4032E.TXT.r#1954189#1954189#TD4032E.TXT.r_5315# byang chub chen por yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni byang chub    chen po bzhin du mi zad par 'gyur ro // /

column3: bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bar 'os te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907698#907706#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2191;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2192;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2193;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2194;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2195# byang chub kyi sems de bzhi'i bsam pa gang ji ltar zhe na / / +de'i phyir / / +rtag tu sems can phan par sems // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste de gdul bar mdzad du gsol / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907705#907714#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2193;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2194;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2195;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2196# rtag tu sems can phan par sems // / +zhes bya ba smos te / / +'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du sems  can thams cad zang zing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan btags te / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / +mood gal gyi bu gang gi rdzu 'phrul    gyis 'gro bar bya / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902550#902554#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1635;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1636;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1637# sangs rgyas su grub nas sems can la phan par byed pa dang bde bar byed pa dang  dka' ba spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i lam yin no // / +tshe 'dir zang zing    rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan btags te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907713#907730#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2195;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2196;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2197# 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du sems  can thams cad zang zing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan btags te / /
column6: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911957#911958#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2705# gzhan gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni sems can gzhan tshe 'dir mi dge ba las bzlog cing dge ba la bzhag pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa dang  thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bzhag pa ni gzhan gyi phyir zhes bya'o // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po ri rab kyi steng du zhabs 'jog cing gshegs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907731#907738#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2196;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2197;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2198# tshe 'dir mi dge ba las bzlog cing dge ba la gzhag pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god do snyam du sems pa ni byang chub kyi sems de dag gi bsam ba'o // / +byang chub kyi sems de dag ci la mos shen / /

column3: zhag bdun gyis 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin to // / +mood gal gyi du bu chen po thag ring po nas 'ong ba bu mo  bzang mos mthong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907737#907755#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2197;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2198;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2199;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2200;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2201# byang chub kyi sems de dag ci la mos shen / / +de'i  phyir chos la mos zhes smos te / /

column3: mthong nas rings par de'i drung du 'ongs te smras pa / / +yun ring mo zhig na bu mthong ngo yun ring mo zhig na bu mthong ngo zhes smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907753#907769#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2200;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2201;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2202;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2203# theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba la dad de / / +de ni byang chub kyi sems de dag gi mos pa'o // /

column3: de na skye bo mang bo'i tshogs dag 'di skad du gzhon nu ma 'di rab tu byung ba rgan po 'di'i mar ji ltar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang  de dag la  'phags pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos bdag gi phung po 'di gsos shing bskyed pa des na 'di ma zhes bya'o zhes smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907770#907788#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2203;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2204;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2205;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2206# de'i phyir ye shes tshol  bar dmigs pa de bzhin no zhes bya ba smos te / / +de'i ye shes ni theg pa chen po'i ye shes te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907789#907800#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2206;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2207;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2208;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2209# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po'i chos nyan pa dang  sems pa dang  bsgom pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas tshol ba nyid  byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.007#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2954054#2954055#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11840# gang zag dang chos su lta ba'i gnyen po'i ye shes  ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la bya ste / /
column7: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406622#2406622#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11295# de ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang  me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rdzogs par  longs spyod pas dgongs pa ro gcig pa 'dres pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang spyod yul dang bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column8: 0.020#TD4013E.TXT.r#621803#621805#TD4013E.TXT.r_1508# de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dang  mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su zin pa'i phyir bsod nams shin du khyad par du 'phags par rig  par bya'o // /
column9: 0.020#TD4061E.TXT.r#1522634#1522638#TD4061E.TXT.r_1343;TD4061E.TXT.r_1344# shes rab kyis so sor 'bigs par byed pa ni bdag gis mngon sum du byas so zhes 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi rjes las thob pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis nges par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#954310#954311#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8224# rtog pa yang ma yin mi rtog pa yang ma yin pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes las thob pa'i dag pa'i 'jig rten pa'i ye shes la bya ste / /
column11: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1028865#1028865#TD4054E.TXT.r_6255# de kho na sngon ma shes pa kun shes par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pas mi shes ba kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes brjod par bya'o // /
column12: 0.023#TD4029E.TXT.r#2131415#2131418#TD4029E.TXT.r_1471;TD4029E.TXT.r_1472# sangs rgyas kyi sa ni chos lnga po chos kyi dbyings dang  me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes  dang ; / +so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus par 'byung bas / /
column13: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1220011#1220012#TD4047E.TXT.r_14002;TD4047E.TXT.r_14003# de spangs ma thag nyid du de'i gnyen po'i ye shes 'thob par bstan pa'i phyir / /
column14: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2908148#2908148#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5641# shes rab kyis ni sa dang por rtogs pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ji ltar thob par bya zhes dmigs par byed pa'i phyir / /
column15: 0.025#TD4025E.TXT.r#2169836#2169836#TD4025E.TXT.r_573;TD4025E.TXT.r_574# ji ltar rang nyid 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pas ye shes kyi mdud pa chen po bsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes so sor mngon par shes shing / / +de  bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob pa bzhin du de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam bstan pas 'du shes kyis byas pa'i 'ching ba thams cad log par byed do // /
column16: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2162382#2162383#TD4029E.TXT.r_5508# gang zag dang chos su lta ba'i gnyen po'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225771#225771#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1520;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1521# de ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste / / +ye shes de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par nus par 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ye shes shes rab kyi grogs yin par bstan pa ste /// /
column18: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2952592#2952593#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11668# gang zag dang  chos la bdag med par chud pa'i ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rnyed pa'i phyir lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gang zag ces bya'o // /
column19: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#937383#937383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6121;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6122# chos kyi sku'i rgyu mthun pa  las rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku byung nas sar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'i theg pa chen po'i chos rnams kyi longs spyod rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rjes las thob pa dag la 'jig rten pa'i ye shes la     // /
column20: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#933996#933997#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5657# de la ye shes kyi sgras ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes dang  so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes la bya ste / /
column21: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936398#936398#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5991# dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column22: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2506842#2506842#TD4019E.TXT.r_13126;TD4019E.TXT.r_13127# zhes pa ni gnas gtsang ma'i lha la sogs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gnyid kyis bslad pa'i gnas skabs na yang don ji lta ba bzhin snang ba'i mngon par shes  pa ste / / +de ltar mngon shes rnam pa bzhi'o // /
column23: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1157715#1157715#TD4047E.TXT.r_5392# da ni mi shes pa dang  the tshom za ba'i shes pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs  yang dag pa'i ye shes nye bar sgrub pa'i phyir ye shes su gyur pa bstan pa'i phyir / /
column24: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905451#905452#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1943# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis kyang chos rnams la rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la phyin ci ma log par shes par byed pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes gsal zhing 'od dang bcas pa'i  gnas su gyur pas na gser chen po dang 'dra'o // /
column25: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#286195#286195#TD4026E.TXT.r_1907# me long lta bu'i ye shes dang   mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang  so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes so // /
column26: 0.029#TD4032E.TXT.r#1920463#1920463#TD4032E.TXT.r_111;TD4032E.TXT.r_112# ci'i phyir bstan bcos 'di bshad ce na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir te / / +chos la bdag med pa bstan pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes bskyed pa dang  de goms pas bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs  pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa ma lus par spangs pa thob par 'gyur ro // /

column3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu ma bzang mo'i bsam pa dang  bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen par mdzad nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907799#907817#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2207;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2208;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2209;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2210;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2211# byang chub kyi sems de dag gi theg ba gang zhe na / / +de'i phyir / /

column3: 'phags pa'i bden pa  bzhi mthong ba de lta bu'i chos bstan par mdzad de / / +gzhon nu ma bzang mos thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mtho ba nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907818#907835#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2211;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2212;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2213;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2214# mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas nas dang po ji ltar thob par bya zhes bya ba dang  sa bcu ba thob pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi sa ji    ltar thob par bya zhes 'dod pa ni byang chub kyi sems de dag gi theg pa yin te / /

column3: de bden pa mthong nas ched du brjod pa lan gsum du ched du brjod pa  snga ma bzhin du lha dang mi la bkod do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907836#907853#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2213;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2214;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2215;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2216;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2217# byang chub kyi sems de dag gi rten gang zhe na / / +de'i phyir / / +sdom pa rgya chen de yi rten // /
column5: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1338170#1338170#TD4037E.TXT.r_3077;TD4037E.TXT.r_3078# sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims  so ; / / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa ris bdun po dge slong dang  dge slong ma dang  dge tshul dang  dge tshul ma dang  dge bsnyen dang  dge bsnyen ma'i tshul khrims gang yin pa ste / /

column3: yang smras pa / / +shin tu rkyen mang ldan pa'i ngan song ngam // / +'jigs su rung las khyed kyi mthu yis bsgral // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907853#907861#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2217;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2218# byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang  sdom  pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba sdud pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi sems de dag gi rten yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2877269#2877269#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1364;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1365# sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims so // / +de la sdom  pa zhes bya bas sdom pa'i tshul khrims bstan / /

column3: mtho ris 'gro ba'i bsod nams sgo phye zhing // / +mya ngan 'das pa'i lam ni bdag gis thob // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907860#907872#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2217;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2218;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2219;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2220# byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang  sdom  pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba sdud pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi sems de dag gi rten yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +byang chub kyi sems de dag gi bar du gcod pa gang zhe na / /

column3: khyod la  brten nas bdag skyon rnam dag cing // / +bdag gi mig ni shin tu rnam dag gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907873#907882#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2219;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2220;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2221# de'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams skye ba la bar du gcod pa'o  zhes bya ba smos te / / +byang chub kyi sems de ni bdag dang gzhan la phan par sems pa yin / /

column3: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin gyur cing // / +'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i gnas thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907883#907893#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2221;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2222# sems de dang mi mthun pa ni bdag 'ba' zhig mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar sems pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la bya ste / /

column3: skye rga 'chi ba'i 'khrug dang bral gyur cing // / +lha dang lha min mi yi 'gro bas mchod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907894#907904#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2222;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2223# theg pa chung du'i sems bskyed par  gyur pa nyams su blangs te ma spangs na byang chub kyi sems mi 'byung bas de ni bar du gcod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908023#908023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2244;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2245# khams gsum nas 'byung ba dang  bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad cing sbyor na 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyur bas na 'byung bar byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yin no zhes bya  ba'i don to // / +byang chub kyi sems de dag gi mthar thug pa gang zhe na / /

column3: skye  ba stong du mthong ba rnyed dka' ba // / +thub pa mthong ba 'bras bu bcas par gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907905#907915#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2223;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2224;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2225;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2226;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2227# byang chub de dag gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang zhe na / /

column3: btsun pa bdag ni mngon par 'phags so // / +mngon par 'phags so // / +ded nas bzung ste bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907914#907927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2225;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2226;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2227;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2228;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2229# bsod nams ye shes rang bzhin te // / +zhes bya ba smos te / / +byang chub kyi sems ni rnam pa gnyis  te ; /
column5: 0.028#TD4032E.TXT.r#1920694#1920694#TD4032E.TXT.r_151;TD4032E.TXT.r_152;TD4032E.TXT.r_153# 'dis mtshon par byed pas mtshan nyid do // / +de yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid do // /

column3: bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /// / +dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsngo zhing skyabs su 'gro zhing mngon par dang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907928#907944#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2229;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2230;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2231# de la snying rje'i mtshan nyid ni sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du sems pa ste / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po dang thabs cig tu bsod snyoms bzhes par gnang bar mdzod cig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907945#907959#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2231;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2232;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2233;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2234;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2235;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2236;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2237# shes rab kyi mtshan nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa yin pas sems can gang yang mya ngan  las 'das pa med do snyam du sems pa ste / / +de ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin no // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste / / +gzhon nu ma bzang mos bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po bde bar bzhugs par rig nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907958#907973#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2234;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2235;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2236;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2237# de'i phyir / / +dge ba 'phel ba legs pa'o // / +zhes bya ba smos te / /

column3: gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag gis rang gi lag nas 'drim par byed / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907972#907981#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2237;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2238;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2239# byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa las nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa dang  sems can  gyi khams ji tsam pa dang  'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam gyi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: stobs par byed de / / +lan du mar bsod pa'o // / +bza' ba dang bca' pa  dag gis brims shing bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gsol bar rig nas lag pa gnyis kyis lhung bzed gyu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907980#907989#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2237;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2238;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2239;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2240# byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa las nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa dang  sems can  gyi khams ji tsam pa dang  'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam gyi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro // / +de ni byang chub kyi sems kyi legs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907990#908001#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2239;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2240;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2241;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2242;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2243;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2244# byang chub kyi sems de dag gi 'khor ba las ji ltar 'byung zhe na / / +de'i phyir / / +rtag tu pha rol phyin pa sbyar //// /
column6: 0.014#TD4018E.TXT.r#3081578#3081578#TD4018E.TXT.r_10106# 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha  rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i mdo sder sbyar ro // /

column3: stan dma' ba cig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug par gyur to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908000#908014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2241;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2242;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2243;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2244# rtag tu pha rol phyin pa sbyar //// / +de ni 'byung bar brjod pa'o // / +zhes bya ba smos te / / +khams gsum nas 'byung ba dang  bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad cing sbyor na 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyur bas na 'byung bar byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yin no zhes bya  ba'i don to // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan te / / +tshe dang ldan pa  mood gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed blangs nas bkrus te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908009#908023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2244;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2245# khams gsum nas 'byung ba dang  bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad cing sbyor na 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyur bas na 'byung bar byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yin no zhes bya  ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907904#907904#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2222;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2223# theg pa chung du'i sems bskyed par  gyur pa nyams su blangs te ma spangs na byang chub kyi sems mi 'byung bas de ni bar du gcod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +byang chub de dag gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang zhe na / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / +mood gal gyi bu 'gro bar bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das gshegs shig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908024#908034#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2245;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2246;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2247;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2248;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2249;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2250# byang chub kyi sems de dag gi mthar thug pa gang zhe na / /

column3: gang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis / / +bcom ldan 'das kyi'o // / +gang yang rgyal  byed kyi tshal du phyin pa de lta bu'i dgongs pa mdzad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908033#908046#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2247;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2248;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2249;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2250;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2251# so so rang gi sbyor ba yis // / +de ni sa yi mthar thug ste // / +zhes bya ba smos te / / +sa bcu re re nas rdzogs par thob pa la sa'i mthar thug pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das phyin tam / / +mood gal gyi bu phyin to // / +de nas tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908047#908062#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2251;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2252;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2253;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2254# de ltar sa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba yang sa dang po la  spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar te / / +sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs nas sa dang po mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming ci lags / / +mood gal gyi bu yid mgyogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908063#908080#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2253;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2254;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2255;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2256# sa bcu pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar te / / +ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa dang  sa bcu pa mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di ltar zab pa bdag gis rnam par mi shes te / / +gal te rnam par shes par ma gyur na yang bdag gi lus til gyi phye ma tsam du gyur kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bzlog par mi bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908081#908094#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2256;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2257;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2258;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2259# rnam pa bcu gcig dris pa las de bzhin du lan btab pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa rnam pa bzhi gdon mi za ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: da bdag gis ci bya ste bud shing  tshig ba bzhin du gyur to zhes gsungs so // / +sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908095#908108#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2258;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2259;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2260# byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnam pa gnyis yod do // / +brda'i dam bca' bar sems bskyed pa dang  don dam ba'i byang chub kyi sems so // /

column3: bzhi las 'phros pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa 'di nyid du sems can gyi gnas dgu'i skabs su bris shing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908107#908122#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2260;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2261# de la brda'i dam bca' bar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni so so'i skye bo'i dus na sems bskyed pas na mos pas spyod pa'i sa 'jig rten chos mchog  man chad kyi tshe sems bskyed pa la bya ste / /

column3: mdzod kyi gnas gsum par    srid pa bar ma bsam par sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes yang dag par bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908123#908136#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2261;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2262;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2263# de yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed na bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par 'gyur pas sems bskyed pa'i rigs zhes bskul ba'am / /
column5: 0.018#TD4026E.TXT.r#278204#278205#TD4026E.TXT.r_566;TD4026E.TXT.r_567# mang po  dang  'od gsal ba dang  dri ma med pa dang  las su rung ba'o // / +de dang chos mthun par byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa'i gnas dang  ye shes kyi gnas dang  nyon mongs pa'i dri ma med pa'i gnas dang  mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i mthu'i  gnas yin ta / /
column6: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2722661#2722661#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2913# 'jig rten pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mthar thug pa'i rjes la so so'i bdag nyid la sems can gyi brda bsal ba'i chos la dmigs  shing mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len chung ngu dang bral ba'i sems dang por skye ba dang  de'i rjes la so so'i bdag nyid la chos kyi brda bsal ba'i chos la dmigs shing / /

column3: ston min sprul pa po dang bcas // / +zhes bya ba la / / +phran tshegs kyi sde snod las don gyi sde tshan bcu pa las mdo 'di ltar 'don te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908137#908151#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2262;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2263;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2264# bdag nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste / / +de yang mkhan po dang slob dpon la sogs pas sems bskyed pa'i tshig ji skad brjod pa bzhin du tshig byung ba na sems bskyed pa ni brda'i dam bca' bar sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de nas mnyan yod na gnas  pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag 'di snyam du rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis rab tu byung ba rnams dang rab tu byung ba rnams su rtsod cing 'thab pa dang mtshang 'bru ba dang chad pas gcod pa dag byung bar gyur / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908152#908172#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2263;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2264;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2265;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2266;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2267# de yang mkhan po dang slob dpon la sogs pas sems bskyed pa'i tshig ji skad brjod pa bzhin du tshig byung ba na sems bskyed pa ni brda'i dam bca' bar sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // / +de la don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni sa dang po yan chad kyi dus nas skye'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4026E.TXT.r#278813#278814#TD4026E.TXT.r_679;TD4026E.TXT.r_680# grogs stobs rgyu stobs rtsa ba'i stobs // /
column6: 0.029#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520969#2520969#TD4020E.TXT.r_221;TD4020E.TXT.r_222# grogs stobs rgyu stobs rtsa ba'i stobs // / +thos stobs dge ba goms pa las / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das la gus pas 'dri ba'i nus pa med do snyam mo // / +de nas bcom  ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gi sems thugs kyis mngon par mkhyen nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908173#908192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2266;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2267;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2268;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2269;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2270;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2271# thos pa'i stobs dang thos goms stobs // / +brtan dang mi brtan skye bar gsungs // / +sems bskyed gzhan gyis bstan pa'o // /

column3: mgo bregs shing chos gos bgos pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sprul pa zhig sprul par mdzad  do ;; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908191#908200#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2270;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2271;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2272# grogs stobs zhes bya ba'i tshig dang  sems bskyed gzhan gyis bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis su sbyar te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908201#908209#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2271;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2272# sems  bskyed pa gang mkhan po'am slob dpon nam / / +dge ba'i bshes gnyen la la zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed na phan pa dang legs pa rgya chen po 'byung bas sems bskyed pa'i rigs so zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni grogs kyi stobs kyis sems bskyed pa  zhes bya'o // /

column3: chos nyid kyis nyan thos rnams kyis sprul pa sprul nas / / +nyan thos rnams smra na sprul pa yang smra bar byed la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908210#908219#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2272;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2273# dge ba'i bshes gnyen la la zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed na phan pa dang legs pa rgya chen po 'byung bas sems bskyed pa'i rigs so zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni grogs kyi stobs kyis sems bskyed pa  zhes bya'o // /

column3: nyan thos rnams mi smra na sprul pa yang mi smra bar 'gyur zhing / / +sprul pa gcig smra na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908220#908228#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2272;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2273# dge ba'i bshes gnyen la la zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed na phan pa dang legs pa rgya chen po 'byung bas sems bskyed pa'i rigs so zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni grogs kyi stobs kyis sems bskyed pa  zhes bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod pas rigs kyi mthus shugs kyis bskul nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni rgyu'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: thams cad smra zhing / / +gcig mi smra na thams cad kyang mi smra bar  'gyur ro ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908229#908237#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2273;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2274;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2275# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod pas rigs kyi mthus shugs kyis bskul nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni rgyu'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sprul pa sprul par mdzad pa na / / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri bar mdzad pa na sprul pa lung ston par byed la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908238#908255#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2274;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2275;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2276# rgyu dang rigs dag ni don gcig go // / +tshe rabs snga ma la theg pa chen po'i chos don zab cing rgya che ba rtogs par 'gyur  ba dang ; /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908394#908397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2292;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2291# theg pa chen po rtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams  bsags pas byang chub kyi rigs brtas par gyur nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni rtsa ba'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: sprul pa dri bar mdzad na bcom ldan 'das lung ston par mdzad do // / +de nas sprul pa de stan las  langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar zhing phyag byas nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908256#908273#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2276;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2277;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2278# byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pas rigs brtas par gyur nas byung chub tu sems bskyed pa ni rtsa ba'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1664699#1664699#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11211;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11212# rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di bdun dang ldan pa'i dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am / / +rigs kyi  bu mo'i bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column6: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1126071#1126071#TD4047E.TXT.r_689;TD4047E.TXT.r_690# des ni rigs  las gzhan pa ni de'i rgyur mi rigs so zhes gsal bar bstan pa yin no // / +rnyed par dka' bas na bskyed par dka' ba ste dus yun ring pos bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang  dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong du mas thob pa yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de'i tshe don gyi sde tshan 'di las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa / / +phrag dog lhan cig mya ngan smre sngags 'don // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908274#908286#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2277;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2278;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2279# tshe rabs snga ma la theg pa chen po'i chos nyan pa dang  bsam pa dang  bsgom  pa bya ste / / +ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas tshe 'dir byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni thos pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: 'thab rtsod 'di dag gang gis  rab tu bskyed // / +phra ma dang bcas nga rgyal lhag nga rgyal // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908287#908298#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2279;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2280# yang na de bzhin gshegs pas lang kar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde de dang de dag bshad pa na lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'gro ba mang po byang chub tu sems  bskyed pa ni thos pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'di dag gang gis bskyed pa bdag 'dri'o // / +phrag dog lhan cig mya ngan smre sngags 'don // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908297#908308#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2279;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2280;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2281# yang na de bzhin gshegs pas lang kar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde de dang de dag bshad pa na lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'gro ba mang po byang chub tu sems  bskyed pa ni thos pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // / +tshe 'di la dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po las chos thos pa yang lan grangs mang du mnyan te / /

column3: 'thab dang rtsod pa 'di dag dga' bas bskyed // / +phra ma dang bcas nga rgyal lhag nga rgyal // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908309#908318#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2280;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2281;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2282# tshe 'di la dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po las chos thos pa yang lan grangs mang du mnyan te / / +chos dang don shes kyis mthong nas sems bskyed pa ni thos ba goms pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'di dag dga' bas rab tu     // / +bskyed pa yin // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908319#908326#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2281;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2282# chos dang don shes kyis mthong nas sems bskyed pa ni thos ba goms pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // / +de ltar brda'i  dam bcas par sems bskyed pa rnam pa lnga las grogs kyis sems bskyed pa ni mi brtan pa'i mtshan nyid du skye bar gsungs pa ste / /

column3: gcig cig smra bar gyur ba na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dpe ni lung ring po'i mdo las tshangs pa'i sprul pa de dag lha'i dbang po'i phang par 'dug ste so so nas gtam smras so zhes bya ba la  sogs pa 'byung ngo //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908327#908341#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2282;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2283;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2284;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2285;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2286# de ltar brda'i  dam bcas par sems bskyed pa rnam pa lnga las grogs kyis sems bskyed pa ni mi brtan pa'i mtshan nyid du skye bar gsungs pa ste / / +phyi nas de la ldog pa yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908342#908355#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2284;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2285;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2286;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2287# rgyu'i stobs dang thos pa'i stobs dang thos bgoms pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa ni brtan pa'i mtshan nyid du     // / +gsungs pa ste / / +de dag la slar ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908356#908363#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2287;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2288# gzhan gyis bstan pa la sems bskyed pa ni gzhan gyis go bar byas pa las brdas yi dam 'dzin pa zhes BYA'O ZHES BYA BA LA / /

column3: gang gi phyir de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa gtad de / / +bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gsung rab bsdu ba byas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908364#908375#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2288;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2289;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2290# mkhan po 'am slob dpon nam dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'ba' zhig gis  'di snyam du sems la / /

column3: dgra bcom pa lnga brgya  po de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang  'phags pa 'od srungs chen po la bstan pa yongs su gtad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908376#908388#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2290;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2291;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2292# go bar byas pas 'di bzhin du brjod na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni brdas yi dam 'dzin pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de ltar bya ba ma lus par byas te / / +ri bya rkang mo'i steng du 'dzegs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dar khrod pa'i na bzas lus dang bsil byed dang lhung bzed gtums  te ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908396#908406#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2292;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2293# theg pa chen po rtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams  bsags pas byang chub kyi rigs brtas par gyur nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni rtsa ba'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: ri gsum gyis bsgribs te / / +bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i gsung rab kyi bar du nyams par ma gyur cing des rang gi 'khor rnams la rig par byed par 'gyur ro zhes byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908407#908414#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2292;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2293;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2294# theg pa chen po rtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams  bsags pas byang chub kyi rigs brtas par gyur nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni rtsa ba'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa zhes bya'o // / +don dam pa'i sems bskyed tshigs su bcad bzhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908415#908429#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2293;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2294;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2295# don dam pa'i sems bskyed tshigs su bcad bzhes bya ba la / / +gang gi tshe gang zag dang chos la bdag med par rtogs nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'gro  ba'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud de gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis spangs nas gzung ba la yang mi rtog / /

column3: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byams pa 'jig rten du  byung ba de'i tshe nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang lhan cig sa phyogs der gshegs te ri gsum po dag rnam par bsal te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908428#908444#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2294;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2295;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2296;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2297# gang gi tshe gang zag dang chos la bdag med par rtogs nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'gro  ba'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud de gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis spangs nas gzung ba la yang mi rtog / / +'dzin pa la yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyes pas na don dam pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917524#917524#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3436;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3437;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3438# mnyam par song ba zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dngos po la stong par mthong ba de bzhin du nang gi dngos po la yang stong par mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +gzung ba la yang mi rtog / / +'dzin pa la yang mi rtog pas mi rtog pa'i ye shes zhes bya ste / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i phyag gis rus pa'i tshogs bsnams te chos ston par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908443#908459#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2296;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2297;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2298# de yangs dang bo thob pa'i tshe na don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye'o // / +don dam  pa'i byang chub kyi sems de rgyu dang yon tan dang rang bzhin la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: chos ston ba thos nas nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dgra bcom  pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes phren tshegs las / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908460#908469#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2298;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2299# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes de la ci'i phyir don dam ba'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya zhe na / /

column3: dbyangs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sman gyi gzhi'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa las rgyas par 'don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908468#908482#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2298;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2299# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes de la ci'i phyir don dam ba'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya zhe na / / +lung dam pa la mnos pa dang  rgyu dam pa bsgrub pa dang  rang bzhin  dam pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o zhes bstan par 'dod nas / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236418#236418#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2879# yongs su mi nyams pa'i phyir dang  khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir mi gyo ba zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#175065#175065#TD4035E.TXT.r_8860;TD4035E.TXT.r_8861# shes pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i phyir te / / +des na sems med pa'i sa zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4068E.TXT.r#577524#577524#TD4068E.TXT.r_894;TD4068E.TXT.r_895# ma brjed pa ni sngon myong ba'i dngos po sems la bzung ba de med par ma gyur cing brjed pa dang chung za bar ma gyur pa ni ma brjed ba zhes bya'o // / +ma brjed pa'i don nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir / /
column8: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1992129#1992129#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1910;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1911# sems dge ba ni  gnod pa med pa'i sems sam phan 'dogs pa'i sems te / / +log par ma zhugs pa'i phyir dge ba zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.029#TD4009E.TXT.r#326298#326298#TD4009E.TXT.r_900# byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'i gnas te mi slu ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba las mdzod kyi gnas bdun pa  phal cher mdo dang sbyar ba rdzogs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908480#908497#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2299;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2300;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2301;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2302# lung dam pa la mnos pa dang  rgyu dam pa bsgrub pa dang  rang bzhin  dam pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o zhes bstan par 'dod nas / /

column3: 'di ltar mdo las lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang zhes bya ba la / / +lam gyi tshogs kyi bslab pa'i sgo'i mdo gsum pa dang bzhi pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas drug pa 'di nyid du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908498#908519#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2301;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2302;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2303# ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS pa tshigs su bcad ba gcig smos te / / +shes bya thams cad thugs su chud pas na RDZOGS ZHES BYA BA LA DE yang phyin ci ma  log par thugs su chud nas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o // /

column3: de'i tshe de mi slob dgra bcom // / +zhes bya ba la / / +tshig le'ur byas pa dang  yang tshul khrims dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin zhes bris zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908518#908533#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2303;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2304;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2305# mos pas spyod pa'i sar bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang  me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thad nas dam pa'i chos nyan    pa rnams bsams pa rnams bsgoms par byas pa ni / /

column3: sems yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo zhes bya ba la / / +stag gi byang chub kyi bu dang  nyan thos kyi rnam par bshad pa sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu gcig pa'i  tha ma las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas drug par bshad zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908534#908543#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2305;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2306;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2307# zhes smos te 'dis ni lung dam pa mnos bar bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908544#908560#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2306;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2307;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2308;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2309# bsod nams ye shes tshogs rab bsags // / +zhes bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa drug las / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan mi dge ba dag kyang zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la / / +tshangs pa'i tshogs kyi sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po'i mood gal gyi bu dang sbas pa'i mdo las 'di ltar 'don te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908560#908572#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2309;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2310# bsam gtan dang shes rab gnyis ni ye shes kyi tshogs la brtson 'grus gnyis ka'i tshogs te de gnyis kyang bsgrubs zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917032#917035#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3367;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3368;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3369# yang na bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa bsgrubs pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so // / +bsam gtan dang shes rab bsgoms pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs so // /
column6: 0.024#TD4068E.TXT.r#578573#578574#TD4068E.TXT.r_1008;TD4068E.TXT.r_1009# de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug las sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa gsum ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so // / +bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis ni  ye shes kyi tshogs so // /

column3: de'i tshe na sde dpon nye dga' 'khor der 'dus par gyur cing tshogs te 'dug par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908573#908584#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2310;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2311# yang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pas mchod pa ni bsod  nams kyi tshogs la dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa byas pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs te de gnyis kyang bsgrubs zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de nas sde dpon nye dgas chen por grags pa'i bram ze 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908585#908602#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2310;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2311;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2312;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2313;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2314;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2315# yang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pas mchod pa ni bsod  nams kyi tshogs la dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa byas pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs te de gnyis kyang bsgrubs zhes bya ba'i don to // / +'dis ni rgyu dam ba bsgrub pa bstan to // /

column3: 'char byed khyed cag 'ong ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na de ltar bsam gtan dang bsam  gtan gyi tshul gyis mngon par dga' ba bden nam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908603#908617#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2315;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2316;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2317# de ltar rdzogs pa'i  sangs rgyas la yang rab bsnyen byas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas chos rnams la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te / /
column5: 0.013#TD4020E.TXT.r#2520987#2520988#TD4020E.TXT.r_224;TD4020E.TXT.r_225;TD4020E.TXT.r_226# gzhan gyis bstan pa'i sems bskyed bshad // / +rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab bsnyen byas // /
column6: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#278915#278915#TD4026E.TXT.r_698;TD4026E.TXT.r_699# rdzogs pa'i rgyas rab bsnyen byas // / +bsod nams ye shes tshogs rab bsags / /

column3: sde dpon de de bzhin te / / +de de bzhin no // / +bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gyi tshul gyis sdom par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908616#908627#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2316;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2317;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2318;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2319# 'dis ni rang bzhin dam pa khong du chud par bstan to // / +de la chos ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa bstan pa dang gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis  la bya ste / /

column3: dus gcig gi tshe bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma chu bo can byi kun dze ka'i spyil bu na bzhugs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908626#908639#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2317;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2318;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2319;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2320;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2321# de la chos ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa bstan pa dang gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis  la bya ste / / +de dag la gzung ba'i mtshan nyid la yang mi rtog / / +'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid du yang mi rtog rtag par yang mi rtog mi rtag par yang mi rtog pa ni / /

column3: de'i tshe bcom ldan  'das goo ta ma des bdag la bsam gtan thams cad ni bsngags shing bsam gtan thams cad kyi rab tu bsngags pa gsung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908640#908655#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2320;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2321;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2322# chos la mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyes ba zhes bya ste / / +don du rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa la bya'o // /
column5: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936396#936398#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5991# dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.019#TD4079E.TXT.r#758928#758929#TD4079E.TXT.r_387;TD4079E.TXT.r_388# spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad nub pas de la dmigs pa'i phyir ro // / +dam pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes yin la / /
column7: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938918#938918#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6321# so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /
column8: 0.021#TD4068E.TXT.r#587093#587093#TD4068E.TXT.r_2059;TD4068E.TXT.r_2060# gyeng ba gzhan dag kyang rnam par gyeng ba'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o // / +shes  bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /
column9: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2899388#2899388#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4415;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4416# byang chub che la rab mos zhes bya ba ni rab tu mos pa med pa na skyo bas skyo ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / / +byang chub chen po la mos pas skyo ba med pa'i rang bzhin du bshad pa de gal te 'dod pa dang mos pa ni skyo ba med pa'i rgyu yin no / /
column10: 0.026#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2060381#2060381#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_11902;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_11903# nyon mongs pa can ni nyon mongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir rang bzhin rnam par grol bas kyang / / +rnam par grol ba ma yin la so so'i skye ba'i rgyud la skye ba'i  phyir rgyud rnam par grol bas kyang rnam par grol ba ma yin no // /
column11: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155287#1155287#TD4047E.TXT.r_5020;TD4047E.TXT.r_5021# legs par bslabs pa ni las de la mkhas par byas pas de lta bu'i rang bzhin ston pa'o // / +bcol ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir / /
column12: 0.028#TD4053E.TXT.r#2989841#2989841#TD4053E.TXT.r_3397;TD4053E.TXT.r_3398# dbang 'byor pa dam pa ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas sbyin pa la sogs pa  yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +yongs su bzung ba dam pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1033636#1033636#TD4054E.TXT.r_6965;TD4054E.TXT.r_6966# dbang 'byor pa dam pa ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas sbyin pa la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +yongs su bzung ba dam pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro // /
column14: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897060#897061#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1006;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1007# dad pa'i sgo nas sems can dge ba la    'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +zab pa'i chos bsgoms pas ni bdag nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur te / /
column15: 0.029#TD4013E.TXT.r#621803#621804#TD4013E.TXT.r_1508# de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dang  mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su zin pa'i phyir bsod nams shin du khyad par du 'phags par rig  par bya'o // /
column16: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#593191#593191#TD4068E.TXT.r_2737;TD4068E.TXT.r_2738# de gnyi ga la tha snyad mkhas par bya ba'i phyir ni yi ge'i tshogs bstan pa'o // / +so so'i skye bo'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /
column17: 0.029#TD4013E.TXT.r#617398#617398#TD4013E.TXT.r_963# de'i stobs ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir thams cad du thogs pa med par shes pa'o // /

column3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chen por grags pa'i bram ze 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so // /

column5: 0.026#TD4079E.TXT.r#758928#758929#TD4079E.TXT.r_387;TD4079E.TXT.r_388# spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad nub pas de la dmigs pa'i phyir ro // / +dam pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes yin la / /

column3: 'char byed khyod 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das  goo ta ma des bdag la bsam gtan thams cad bsngags shing bsam gtan thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa gsung ngo zhes ma smra shig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908673#908683#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2323;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2324;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2325# don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems des dang po'i tshe thob nas dga' ba'i mchog skye bar 'gyur te / / +der dga' ba'i mchog skyes pas sa dang po yang ming du sa rab tu dga'  ba zhes btags so // /
