column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910847#910859#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2573;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2574;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2575;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2576# dper na sprin chen po las sa gzhi dang lo tog la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'byor pa sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du thabs dang shes  rab zung du 'brel ba'i thabs dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems las kyang dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'chi 'pho ba bstan pa dang lhums su gshegs pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa'i bar dag 'byung ba dang  'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang mtho ris dang  mya ngan las 'das  par 'gyur ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bas sprin dang 'dra'o // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cad mi gsung bar gnang bar mdzad do / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910860#910869#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2574;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2575;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2576# de'i phyir de ltar yon tan phyug // / +ces bshad pa la / / +gong du bshad pa ltar dpe rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi tshul gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems de yon tan gyis phyug pa yin te de bas na dad pa  dang dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems de bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das  kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas song ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910870#910877#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2576# gong du bshad pa ltar dpe rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi tshul gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems de yon tan gyis phyug pa yin te de bas na dad pa  dang dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems de bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910877#910887#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2576;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2577;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2578# gong du bshad pa ltar dpe rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi tshul gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems de yon tan gyis phyug pa yin te de bas na dad pa  dang dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems de bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla ba gsum du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis chos gos dang  bsod snyoms dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i  rkyen sman dang  'tsho ba'i yod byad kyis nye bar gnas par byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910888#910901#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2576;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2577;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2578;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2579;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2580# gong du bshad pa ltar dpe rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi tshul gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems de yon tan gyis phyug pa yin te de bas na dad pa  dang dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems de bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // / +sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi tshogs zhes bya ba la / / +sangs rgyas kyi chos ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sar gtogs pa'i yon tan la bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910902#910915#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2579;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2580;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2581;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2582;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2583# tshogs kyi sgras     // / +ni sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa la bya'o // /
column6: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#902362#902363#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1615# de nas sangs rgyas kyi sar stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang  ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rnyed     // /

column3: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dbyar zla ba gsum 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910916#910927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2583# dper na chu klung 'bad rtsol med par rang gi ngang gis 'bab pa de bzhin du bgrod pa gcig pa'i dus na yang rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pas bdag dang gzhan  gyi don la 'bad rtsol med par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910927#910939#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2583;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2584;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2585# dper na chu klung 'bad rtsol med par rang gi ngang gis 'bab pa de bzhin du bgrod pa gcig pa'i dus na yang rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pas bdag dang gzhan  gyi don la 'bad rtsol med par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: phyogs    gcig tu 'dug pa dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910938#910954#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2584;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2585;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2586;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2587# bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gang gi tshe na rtogs she na / / +de'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob na bgrod pa gcig ste zhes smos te / /

column3: khyim bdag legs so legs so de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla ba gsum du chos gos dang  bsod snyoms dang   mal cha dang  stan dang  na ba'i rkyen sman dang  'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis nye bar gnas par byas kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910951#910964#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2586;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2587;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2588# sa brgyad pa thob pa'i tshe chos thams cad ma skyes pa'o zhes mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910964#910975#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2587;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2588;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2589# de'i tshe rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa rnyed pas bgrod pa gcig pa zhes bya'o // / +bgrod pa gcig pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir sa der song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bya ba byed pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes smos te / /
column6: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2931095#2931095#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8755;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8756# lung bstan pa thob pa dang zhes bya ba la sa brgyad pa thob pa'i dus na rtsol ba dang 'bad pa thams cad las 'das nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa thob ste / / +de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa  thob pa yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar du bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: khyim bdag ma 'ongs pa na mtho ris 'grub par byed pa skal pa khyad par can gyi rnam par smin pa bde ba can gong mar 'gro bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920733#920733#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3860;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3861# bzod pa dang ni zhes  bya ba la ; / +bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshe / /
column5: 0.022#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2768228#2768231#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9462# de dag gis de na sems can la phan gdags pa'i bya ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rgya chen po ma mthong ba'i phyir te / /

column3: khyim bdag 'di tsam kyis dga' bar mi bya ste / / +'on kyang dus dang dus su rab tu dben pa'i bde ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910986#910999#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2589;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2590;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2591# sa brgyad pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam par  mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la lhun gyis grub pa nyid du byed par 'dra ste / /

column3: gnas pa de ltar bslab par bya'o // / +de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song  ngo ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911000#911011#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2590;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2591;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2592;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2593# tha dad pa med pas na bgrod pa gcig pa'o zhes bya'o // / +sems ma bskyed pa la smad par tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +gong  du byang chub kyi rgyu dang rang bzhin la sogs pa yang bshad / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911012#911020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2593# dpe'i sgo nas yon tan che bar yang brjod nas byang chub kyi sems dam pa de ma bskyed na skyon yod pa dang bden pa bzhi ma thob par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'khor 'dus pa de na tshogs shing 'dug par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911021#911032#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2593;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2594# dpe'i sgo nas yon tan che bar yang brjod nas byang chub kyi sems dam pa de ma bskyed na skyon yod pa dang bden pa bzhi ma thob par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 5.960#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916912#916914#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3355# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes des byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar chos la bdag med par rtogs nas sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925473#925473#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#928753#928753#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4916# da ni gnas yongs su gyur pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa drug rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#939992#939992#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6448# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2891612#2891612#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3382;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3383# de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje'i rgyus sems can thams cad  la sdug par byed pa sdug pa gzhan dang khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir // / +tshigs su bcad pa gsum rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905063#905063#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1910# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod na rigs gsum la yod pa de la  'khor ba na so so'i skye bo phal pa byed kyang yon tan rnam pa bzhi 'thob par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#975450#975451#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10944# de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa dang ldem po dag la phyi nang du yod bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis rtsom  mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889222#2889223#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3020# byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje la phye na du yod pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i dmigs pa bya ba'i yul gang yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa  gnyis rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981059#981059#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11617# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2891481#2891483#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3364;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3365# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma chags mi gnas par bstan pa'i phyir / / +tshigs su bcad pa gcig rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2931208#2931208#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8768# de ngo mtshar du bya ba ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914118#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2998# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981019#981019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11612# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhin rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905351#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column27: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column28: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column29: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column30: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892211#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song nas ring du lon par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911031#911041#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2593;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2594;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2595;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2596# dpe'i sgo nas yon tan che bar yang brjod nas byang chub kyi sems dam pa de ma bskyed na skyon yod pa dang bden pa bzhi ma thob par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +pha rol don sems de thabs rnyed // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911041#911057#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2595;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2596;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2597;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2598;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2599# dgongs  chen don mchog de nyid thob // / +cher 'os sems bskyed spangs pa yis // /
column6: 5.960#TD4020E.TXT.r#2521192#2521194#TD4020E.TXT.r_279;TD4020E.TXT.r_280# gzhan don sems dang de yi thabs rnyed dang / / +dgongs chen don dang  de nyid mchog mthong bas // /
column7: 5.960#TD4026E.TXT.r#279546#279548#TD4026E.TXT.r_825;TD4026E.TXT.r_826# gzhan don sems  dang de yi thabs rnyed dang / / +dgongs chen don dang de nyid mchog mthong bas // /

column3: btsun pa ngo mtshar ro  zhes bya ba nas 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin las brtsams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911058#911065#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2599;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2600# theg pa chen po byang chub kyi sems de byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pas bskyed par 'os pas cher 'os sems bskyed pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: khyim bdag legs so legs so zhes bya ba nas / / +snga ma bzhin du de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911064#911074#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2599;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2600;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2601# theg pa chen po byang chub kyi sems de byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pas bskyed par 'os pas cher 'os sems bskyed pa zhes bya ste / / +nyan thos  dang rang sangs rgyas gang gis byang chub kyi sems de spangs nas yang skyes na de dag gis bde ba bzhi spangs shing / /

column3: gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa'i bde ba lus kyis mngon sum  du byas shing bsgrubs te gnas pa de'i tshe chos lnga yongs su spong zhing chos lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911075#911098#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2600;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2601;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2602;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2603;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2604# nyan thos  dang rang sangs rgyas gang gis byang chub kyi sems de spangs nas yang skyes na de dag gis bde ba bzhi spangs shing / / +bde ba bzhi dang bral nas / / +zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa 'ba' zhig tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.025#TD4015E.TXT.r#1971978#1971978#TD4015E.TXT.r_835;TD4015E.TXT.r_836# 'don pa dang  ston pa dang  yid kyis mos pa dang  klog pa dang  'dzin pa dang  bsgom pa la skrag pa'i shugs kyis nyin mtshan du yid ma du byed na mtshams med pa yang myur du ma  lus par yongs su zad pa ste rtsa nas 'byin pa'o // / +pha rol gyi ni rnam pa gnyis te / /
column6: 0.028#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1067902#1067902#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2507;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2508# de gzugs la dmigs par yang 'gyur la / / +de la dmigs pa'i  pha rol gyi sems 'dzin pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro // /

column3: chos lnga yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na / / +gang yang 'dod pa nye bar sdud pa'i yid bde ba yongs su spong ba dang  gang 'dod pa nye bar sdud pa'i yid mi bde ba yongs su  spong ba dang  gang yang mi dge ba nye bar sdud pa'i yid bde ba yongs su spong ba dang  gang mi dge ba nye bar sdud pa'i yid mi bde ba yongs su spong ba dang  gang mi dge ba nye bar sdud pa'i btang snyoms yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911096#911109#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2604;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2605;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2606;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2607;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2608# de'ang spangs pa phun sum    tshogs pa dang  ye shes phun sum tshogs pa la bzhag pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911109#911117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2606;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2607;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2608;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2609# nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'o // / +ye shes kyang rnam pa gnyis te / / +gang zag pa la bdag med par khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang  chos  la bdag med par khong du chud pa'i ye shes so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911118#911133#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2608;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2609;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2610# gang zag pa la bdag med par khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang  chos  la bdag med par khong du chud pa'i ye shes so // / +byang chub sems dpa' dag pha rol gyi don la sems pa las bde ba mchog skye ste / /
column7: 0.015#TD4053E.TXT.r#2994563#2994563#TD4053E.TXT.r_3998# rab tu rtogs pa'i khyad par ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i dbang du byas pa'i chos la sbyor ba'i 'phen pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis de gnyi ga rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2954052#2954054#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11839;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11840# gang zag dang chos su lta ba'i gnyen po'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / / +gang zag dang chos su lta ba'i gnyen po'i ye shes  ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la bya ste / /
column9: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2952587#2952591#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11667;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11668# sa dang po thob pa'i dus na gang zag la yod par lta ba dang  chos la yod par lta ba'i gnyen por gyur pa / / +gang zag dang  chos la bdag med par chud pa'i ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rnyed pa'i phyir lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gang zag ces bya'o // /
column10: 0.018#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2909088#2909088#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5768;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5769# de chos la bdag med par khong du chud pas chos la mnyam pa nyid  shes so // / +gang zag la bdag med par khong du chud pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes so // /
column11: 0.019#TD4018E.TXT.r#3087695#3087696#TD4018E.TXT.r_10858# des byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba thob nas mu stegs can dang ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad las rnam par  log pa yin te zhes pa ni mu stegs can rnams rtag pa dang  gcig pa dang  bdag dang  bdag gi dang  phyi rol gyi don la mngon par chags pas chos dang gang zag la bdag med par thar pa'i rgyu mi shes te rtag pa'i bdag tu chags pa'i phyir // /
column12: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1214183#1214183#TD4047E.TXT.r_13224# de ni mi phyed pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa ye shes zhes bya ba la ye shes yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni ye shes yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos bcu dang ldan pa nyid de / /
column13: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1776149#1776149#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9644# 'di ni chos gang dag mngon par  shes pa dang yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos de dag mngon par shes shing yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o // /
column14: 0.025#TD4009E.TXT.r#336464#336464#TD4009E.TXT.r_2175# bdag med pa dang  sems can med pa dang  gso ba med pa dang  gang zag med pa'i chos rnams la  mos pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni gang zag la bdag med par mos pa'o // /
column15: 0.028#TD4018E.TXT.r#3080240#3080240#TD4018E.TXT.r_9953# thams cad mkhyen pas gang dag gi bdag med pa de dag gi rang bzhin med pa'o zhes de ltar chud par mi bya bar chos dang gang zag la bdag med par khyad par du bstan pa'o // /
column16: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#769775#769775#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_477# spangs pa dang ye shes phun  sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas bdag la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin la / /
column17: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2131418#2131418#TD4029E.TXT.r_1471;TD4029E.TXT.r_1472# sangs rgyas kyi sa ni chos lnga po chos kyi dbyings dang  me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes  dang ; / +so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus par 'byung bas / /

column3: chos lnga po 'di dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro // / +chos lnga po     // / +bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911134#911153#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2610;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2611;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2612;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2613# byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba de ni bde ba de yang mi 'thob bo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de thabs rnyed ces bya ba la / /

column3: dga' ba dang  rangs pa dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  bde ba dang  ting nge 'dzin no // / +sh'a ri'i bu de de bzhin te / /
gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa'i dga' ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing bsgrubs  te gnas zhes bya ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911154#911166#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2613;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2614# pha rol gyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs rnyed pa las byang chub sems dpa' bde ba mchog skye ste pha rol gyi don gyi thabs dang shes rab bo // /

column3: snga ma bzhin du ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes gsungs so // / +mdo las kyang lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911167#911175#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2614;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2615# gang gi byang chub kyi sems de spangs pa des bde ba yang mi 'thob BO ZHES BYA BA'I DON to // /

column3: lam gyi tshoms kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgo'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mdo dang po las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas  gnyis par / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911176#911199#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2615;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2616# dgongs chen don mchog ces bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i chos zab  mo ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba dang  pha bsad pa dang ma bsad pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dgongs pa zab mo ci las dgongs nas bshad pa'i don rtogs pa las byang chub sems dpa' rnams bde ba mchog skye ste / /

column3: dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs // / +zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang  mdo las lus shin tu sbyangs pa zhes kyang 'byung ba ma yin nam zhes bya bar bris pa blta bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911200#911208#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2615;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2616;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2617;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2618# dgongs chen don mchog ces bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i chos zab  mo ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba dang  pha bsad pa dang ma bsad pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dgongs pa zab mo ci las dgongs nas bshad pa'i don rtogs pa las byang chub sems dpa' rnams bde ba mchog skye ste / / +byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa de ni bde ba de yang mi 'thob bo zhes bya ba'i  don to ; / /

column3: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na zhes bya ba la / / +skye mched drug gi tshogs  kyis bsdus pa'i sdom dang po'i lam zhes bya ba'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa'i tha ma las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas dang por / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911209#911216#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2616;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2617;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2618;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2619;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2620# byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa de ni bde ba de yang mi 'thob bo zhes bya ba'i  don to ; / / +de nyid mthong ZHES BYA BA LA / / +de nyid ni chos la bdag med pa la bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911216#911229#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2619;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2620;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2621# chos la bdag med pa mthong ba las byang chub sems dpa' rnams bde ba skye ste / / +byang chub kyi sems spangs pas ni bde ba de yang mi 'thob bo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: zag bcas zag pa med chos rnams // / +zhes bya bar bris zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911230#911243#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2621;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2622# sems bskyed pa dang bsngags bas ngan 'gro  dang yongs su skyo bas mi 'jigs pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2891462#2891463#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3360;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3361;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3362# snying rje chags pa med pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste // / +zhes bya ba la / / +snying rjes zin pa'i byang chub  sems dpa' rnams // /
column6: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2125977#2125977#TD4029E.TXT.r_762# ngan 'gro dang yongs su skyo bas 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa bsngags par tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba ni sems bskyed pa dang dus mnyam pa nyid na  sems de 'gro ba thams cad kyis bsngags par bya ba yin te / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par sgyur ba'i mdo las zhes bya ba la / / +lam gyi tshogs kyi  dbang po'i sgo'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum par / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911243#911257#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2622;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2623# don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems de yang yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa dang  yon tan legs pa yod pas don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas ngan song gsum du skye ba'i 'jigs pa yang med / /

column3: nang gi skyon dang chos mtshungs phyir // / +zhes bya bar bstan cing / / +'dir sdug bsngal gyis dbang po 'gags so zhes bya bar bshad zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911258#911271#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2622;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2624;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2625# don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems de yang yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa dang  yon tan legs pa yod pas don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas ngan song gsum du skye ba'i 'jigs pa yang med / / +sems  can gyi don gyi phyir dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pas / /
column5: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905351#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943293#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981739#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889762#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892210#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896432#896432#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959053#959053#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904921#904921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1899# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod kyang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhi'i skyon dang ldan na skyon des bsgribs pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i  spyod pa la 'jug par mi nus par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column17: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916652#916652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3328# de bas na bdag dang chos med par yang mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang   'khor bar skye rung bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904476#904476#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1848# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912824#912824#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925102#925102#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: rnam par sgyur ba'i mdo las bsam gtan bzhi pa  na bde ba'i dbang po 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#279607#279612#TD4026E.TXT.r_834;TD4026E.TXT.r_835# blo ldan sems mchog skyes ma thag tu yang // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911273#911285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2625;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2626;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2627# blo ldan sems mchog skyes ma thag tu yang // / +mtha' yas nyes pa byed las sems rab bsdams // /

column3: bde ba yang spangs te zhes bya ba la / / +bsam gtan bzhi pa'i dbang du byas nas mdo de dang de las 'don pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911284#911293#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2626;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2627;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2628;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2629;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2630# mtha' yas nyes pa byed las sems rab bsdams // / +bde dang sdug bsngal la yang rtag tu dga' //// /

column3: de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub  pas bde ba yang ma yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911294#911304#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2628;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2629;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2630;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2631;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2632# dge ldan snying rje gnyis ni rtag par 'phel // / +zhes bya ba la / / +blo ldan ni byang chub sems dpa' la bya ste / /

column3: sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par btang snyoms yongs su dag par bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so zhes 'byung / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911303#911312#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2631;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2632;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2633# bdag med pa gnyis khong du chud pa'i ye shes yod pas so // / +sems mchog ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bya ste / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan gsum ni skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir gyo ba dang bcas par gsungs zhes bya ba lung bar ma'i sdom gyi tshigs    su bcad pa gnyis pa'i dang po'i mdo las te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911311#911320#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2632;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2633;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2634# sems mchog ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bya ste / / +sa dang por don dam  pa'i byang chub kyi sems de skyes nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911320#911331#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2634# chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid du mthong ma thag tu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can mtha' yas pa rnams la lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas srog gcod pa dang  ma byin par len pa la sogs pa nyes  par byed pa las sems bsdams te / /
column6: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#574563#574563#TD4068E.TXT.r_519# byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni bdag gi lus dang srog la yang phangs pa med par lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas rnam pa thams cad du gzhan la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#574575#574575#TD4068E.TXT.r_520# sdom pa med pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas  rnam pa thams cad du gzhan la gnod pa byed par zhugs pa ste / /

column3: mdo dum bu mdzod kyi gnas gsum par / / +bzhi pa gyo ba med pa yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911332#911339#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2634# chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid du mthong ma thag tu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can mtha' yas pa rnams la lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas srog gcod pa dang  ma byin par len pa la sogs pa nyes  par byed pa las sems bsdams te / /

column3: zhes bya bar bshad pa blta bar bya'o // / +mdo las rlung med pa'i mar me dper mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911340#911352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2634;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2635;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2636# chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid du mthong ma thag tu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can mtha' yas pa rnams la lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas srog gcod pa dang  ma byin par len pa la sogs pa nyes  par byed pa las sems bsdams te / /

column3: phung po las / / +dbyu gu gsum dang gong bu gsum // / +lu hi ta yi rnam bshad gnyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911350#911360#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2635;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2636;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2637# de phan chad mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'o // / +ji ltar sdig pa mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pas na byang chub sems dpa' de ngan song gsum du skye ba'i 'jigs pa med do // /

column3: zhes bya ba'i lu hi ta'i mdo dang po la rlung med pa'i mar me'i dpe 'di ltar 'don te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911361#911370#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2636;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2637;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2638# ji ltar sdig pa mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pas na byang chub sems dpa' de ngan song gsum du skye ba'i 'jigs pa med do // / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams lha dang mi la sogs pa'i longs spyod kyi bde ba  myong ba'i tshe na yang yid bde ba la / /

column3: lu hi ta gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos bde ba yang spangs shing / / +sdug bsngal ba yang spangs te zhes bya ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911371#911379#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2638;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2639;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2640# ngan song la sogs pa dang  sems can gyi don du mgo dang rkang lag la sogs gtong ba sdug bsngal myong ba'i dus na yang yid bde ste / /

column3: bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa de'i tshe sems  mtho bar mi 'gyur zhing dma' bar mi 'gyur bar mngon par gnas shing mi gyo ba thob ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911380#911404#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2638;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2639;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2640;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2641;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2642;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2643# ngan song la sogs pa dang  sems can gyi don du mgo dang rkang lag la sogs gtong ba sdug bsngal myong ba'i dus na yang yid bde ste / / +ci'i phyir zhe na / / +rtag tu dge ba'i chos 'phel bar byas pa dang  rtag tu snying rje nyid 'phel bar bya ba'i  phyir / /
column5: 0.022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1997063#1997064#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2717;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2718# ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i dus dag tu mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro // / +de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba la / /
column6: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910138#910138#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2494;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2495# sems can sdug bsngal las 'byin par  byed pa'i phyir ro // / +byams pas ni bde ba'i dus na yang sems can mi 'dor te sems can bde ba la 'jog par byed pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: dper na khang pa'am khang pa'i khyams su mar me bzhag pa dud 'gro'am bya'am mis ma bskul zhing ma bskyod pa de srid du mi mtho mi dma' bar mi 'gyur bar mngon par gnas shing mi gyo ba thob po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911400#911423#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2642;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2643;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2644# de la dge ba 'phel bar byas pas lha dang mi la sogs pa'i bde ba myong ba'i dus na yang longs spyod la gnas pa'i phyir bde ba'o // /
column5: 0.022#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2558445#2558446#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_2692# de'i rgyu med par byas pas longs spyod kyis phongs par byas pas de la gnod pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2003369#2003369#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3662;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3663# rdzas kyi dbang gis gzi byin can du gyur na de'i rgyu med par byas pa'i phyir te / / +longs spyod kyis  phongs par byas pas de la gnod pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1161841#1161841#TD4047E.TXT.r_5978# byang chub sems dpa' dbul por gyur na yang tshogs chung dus longs spyod bsgrub pa'i phyir dang  longs spyod kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i bya bas phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i dbang du byas nas smras pa / /
column8: 0.024#TD4051E.TXT.r#1268112#1268112#TD4051E.TXT.r_5309# de gzugs kyi skur snang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs par snang ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.025#TD4009E.TXT.r#326401#326401#TD4009E.TXT.r_914;TD4009E.TXT.r_915;TD4009E.TXT.r_916# gzhan dag la phan 'dogs par 'jug pa'i phyir ro // / +snying rje bas ni  snying rje nyid do // / +snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches par 'khor bar sbyor ba na sems can gyi don bya ba la gzhol ba gzhan la phan pa 'grub pa'i phyir sems rab tu dga' ba ni dga' ba'o // /
column10: 0.025#TD4010E.TXT.r#2230764#2230764#TD4010E.TXT.r_122# de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos nyan pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir 'gro ba zhes bya ba ste / /
column11: 0.025#TD4046E.TXT.r#2205495#2205496#TD4046E.TXT.r_1285# byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'grub par  byed pa'i phyir dang  lha dang mi'i 'gro ba 'grub par byed pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi don mang po'i 'bras bu 'grub par byed pa'i phyir / /
column12: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1179253#1179253#TD4047E.TXT.r_8370# de yang sa re re la ji ltar 'tsham pa'i mtshan 'grub  par byed pa'i phyir dang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'grub par byed pa'i phyir dang  lha dang mi'i 'gro ba 'grub par byed pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi don mang po'i 'bras bu 'grub par byed pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhir rig par bya ste / /
column13: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1355049#1355049#TD4037E.TXT.r_5218# sdug bsngal rnam pa drug ni ngan song gi rgyu rten pa'i phyir rgyu'i sdug bsngal dang  ngan song du skyes pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i sdug bsngal dang  longs spyod las  brtsams te yongs su tshol ba'i sdug bsngal dang  bsrung ba'i sdug bsngal dang  chog mi shes pa'i sdug bsngal dang  med par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal te / /
column14: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#856781#856781#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14711;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_14712# khams gsum gyi ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang  'dod par gtogs pa gzugs med par gtogs pa'i dge ba dang mi slob pa'o // / +de la  'dod par gtogs pa'i dge pa'i sems mngon du gyur na 'dod par gtogs pa'i dge pa kho na rnyed de / /

column3: lu hi ta  gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos bsam gtan can bde ba yang spangs shing zhes bya ba nas bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa de'i sems kyang de'i tshe mtho bar mi 'gyur zhing dma' bar mi 'gyur bar mngon par gnas shing mi gyo ba thob po zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911424#911441#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2643;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2644;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2645;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2646# snying rje 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir sems can gyi don du ngan song gsum du grang ba dang tsha ba la  sogs pa mang po myong yang skyo ba med pas na sdug bsngal gyi dus na yang bde'o // / +mi bya bar bsdams par tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /

column3: yang ting nge 'dzin thams  cad mdor bsdus te zhes bya ba la / / +gleng gzhi ni ma nyan du yod pa na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911442#911451#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2646# gang du don dam pa byang chub kyi sems skyes ma thag tu mtha' yas pa'i nyes pa byed pa las sems bsdams  so zhes mdo tsam du bstan pa de ji ltar bsdams pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis zhib tu bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa gsum ste / / +rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa cam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang  rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes  gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911452#911463#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2646;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2647;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2648;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2649# gang du don dam pa byang chub kyi sems skyes ma thag tu mtha' yas pa'i nyes pa byed pa las sems bsdams  so zhes mdo tsam du bstan pa de ji ltar bsdams pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis zhib tu bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +nam zhig lus dang srog la mi lta zhing // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911464#911471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2649;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2650# byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas ches sems can pha rol po gces shing phongs par 'dzin te / /

column3: yang stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang zhes bya ba la / / +gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o // / +ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa gsum ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911472#911480#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2649;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2650# byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas ches sems can pha rol po gces shing phongs par 'dzin te / / +sems can gyi don zhib tu gyur nas lus la yang mi lta ste lus gtong ba dang srog la yang mi lta ste srog kyang 'dor ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang  mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes gsungs so // / +lam yang gzings  lta bur gdon mi za bar dor bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911481#911495#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2650;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2651;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2652;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2653# sems can gyi don zhib tu gyur nas lus la yang mi lta ste lus gtong ba dang srog la yang mi lta ste srog kyang 'dor ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'di lta ste chu bo gangg'a chus yongs su gang zhing rgyas te bya rog btung du rung ba tsam du gyur la gru 'am gzings med par rgyun phyogs dang bzlog phyogs dang pha rol dang tshu rol gyi 'gram du brgal bar mi nus pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911496#911505#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2653;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2654# gzhan yang sems can mi dge ba las bzlog cing dge ba la gnas pa dang  bla na  med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911506#911523#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2654;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2655;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2656;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2657;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2658# bskal pa grangs med par mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa gtong ba'i dus su sdug bsngal gyis kyang skyo ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: gang bdag gis rtsa     // / +shing dang  'dab ma dang  lo ma mang po dag bsdus te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911524#911531#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2656;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2658;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2657# nyes pa byas pa'i las la ga la 'jug // / +de ltar gzhan gyi don du lus dang srog la yang mi lta zhing sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su len pa de sems can gzhan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de la srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byas pas de'i lan du srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byed pa dang  bdag  gi don dang sems can gzhan la srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byed pa la gang zhig 'jug ste / /

column3: gzings byas pa / / +gzings la brten cing gzings la gnas te lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol pas pha rol du 'gro bar bya'o zhes de de ltar rnam par dpyad nas rtsva dang  shing dang  'dab ma dang  lo ma mang  po dag bsdus te gzings byas nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911532#911546#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2658# de ltar gzhan gyi don du lus dang srog la yang mi lta zhing sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su len pa de sems can gzhan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de la srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byas pas de'i lan du srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byed pa dang  bdag  gi don dang sems can gzhan la srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byed pa la gang zhig 'jug ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911546#911555#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2658;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2659# de ltar gzhan gyi don du lus dang srog la yang mi lta zhing sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su len pa de sems can gzhan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de la srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byas pas de'i lan du srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byed pa dang  bdag  gi don dang sems can gzhan la srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byed pa la gang zhig 'jug ste / /

column3: gzings la brten cing gzings la gnas te / / +rgyun las bzlog phyogs su lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol bas bde bar pha rol tu phyin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911556#911571#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2658;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2659;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2660;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2661# de ltar gzhan gyi don du lus dang srog la yang mi lta zhing sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su len pa de sems can gzhan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de la srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byas pas de'i lan du srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byed pa dang  bdag  gi don dang sems can gzhan la srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa byed pa la gang zhig 'jug ste / / +cung zad kyang mi 'jug go zhes bya ba'i don to // / +sems mi ldog par tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so zhes bya ba la / /

column3: de nas skyes bu de 'di snyam du gzings 'di ni bdag la phan pa mang po byed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911572#911579#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2661;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2662# gal te byang chub sems dpa' de lus dang srog la yang mi lta  bar sems can gyi don byed du zin kyang skabs su byang chub kyi sems las bzlog go snyam du sems pa la / /

column3: bdag gzings 'di la brten cing  gzings la gnas nas rgyun las bzlog phyogs su lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol bas bde bar pha rol tu brgal te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911580#911588#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2661;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2662# gal te byang chub sems dpa' de lus dang srog la yang mi lta  bar sems can gyi don byed du zin kyang skabs su byang chub kyi sems las bzlog go snyam du sems pa la / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyi tshogs dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pas byang chub kyi sems las bzlog mi srid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad  pa gnyis smos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911589#911598#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2662;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2663;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2664# byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyi tshogs dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pas byang chub kyi sems las bzlog mi srid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad  pa gnyis smos so // /
column6: 0.025#TD4013E.TXT.r#614629#614629#TD4013E.TXT.r_575;TD4013E.TXT.r_576# der sems ni byang chub kyi sems te / / +bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ram / /
column7: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910483#910483#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2533# bang mdzod kyi nang na 'bru dang nor la sogs pa rnam pa mang po yod pa de bzhin du bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems la yang bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa yod pa dang  ye shes  kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems la yang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa yod pa'i phyir bang mdzod dang 'dra ba'o // /

column3: gang bdag gis gzings 'di ni mgo bo'am phrag pa la khur te gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar bya'o zhes / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911599#911610#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2663;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2664;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2665# des ni chos kun sgyu ma lta bur brtags // / +zhes bya ba la / / +byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyis phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang  rmi lam lta bur rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.017#TD4079E.TXT.r#765905#765905#TD4079E.TXT.r_1598;TD4079E.TXT.r_1599# de nas de rnyed pa'i mtshan ma ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes bya dang khyad par med  pa'i ye shes kyi chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngos dang 'dra bar mthong la / / +de'i rjes las thob pas ni chos thams cad sgyu ma dang  smig rgyu dang  rmi lam dang  mig yor dang  sgra brnyan dang  gzugs brnyan dang  chu zla dang  sprul pa dang mtshungs par mthong ngo zhes gsungs te / /
column6: 0.018#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2947270#2947270#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10997# dag pa  'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis ni chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang  rmi lam lta bur dmigs par byed pa yin par shes pas na / /

column3: dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems / / +skyes bu des phan pa mang po byed  ba skyes bu de de lta de ltar rtog bzhin du gzings de mgo bo 'am phrag pa la khur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911611#911629#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2665;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2666;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2667;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2668;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2669# byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyis phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang  rmi lam lta bur rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2078643#2078643#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14561;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14562# sa 'og mar skyes pa las zhes bya ba ni dper na srid pa'i rtse mo nas 'chi 'pho zhing ci yang med pa'i skye mched  du skye ba nas / / +bsam gtan dang por skye ba na thob pa'i bar lta bu'o // /

column3: gang du 'dod pa der 'gro'am / / +btsun pa ma lags so // / +de nas skyes bu de 'di snyam du gzings 'dis cung zad phan pa mang po byed pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911630#911644#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2668;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2669;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2670# dper na skyed mos tshal ngan pa nas bzang por 'gro bas na / / +mngon par lhag par dga' ba skye ba de bzhin du / /

column3: bdag gzings 'di la brten cing gzings la gnas te rgyun las  bzlog phyogs su lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol bas bde bar pha rol gyi ngos su brgal bar byas kyang bdag gis gzings 'di thang las bskyur ba 'am chu'i rgyun la bskyur bar bya'o zhes des gzings de thang la bskyur ba 'am chu'i rgyun du bskyur te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911645#911654#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2670;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2671# byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan pas mi la sogs pa'i gnas nas shi 'phos te mi'i longs spyod btang nas lha la     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911654#911663#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2671;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2672# sogs pa'i gnas len pas na skyed mos tshal ngan pa bor nas bzang po len pa bzhin du dga' ba'i mchog skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911664#911677#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2671;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2672;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2673# sogs pa'i gnas len pas na skyed mos tshal ngan pa bor nas bzang po len pa bzhin du dga' ba'i mchog skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to // / +'byor pa'i dus dang zhes bya ba la / / +byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gnas su skyes na brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i  bdag por 'gyur ba dang  mi'i nang du skyes na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa mi'i bdag por 'gyur ba ni 'byor pa'i dus zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911677#911685#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2673;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2674# byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gnas su skyes na brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i  bdag por 'gyur ba dang  mi'i nang du skyes na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa mi'i bdag por 'gyur ba ni 'byor pa'i dus zhes bya'o // /

column3: dge slong dag  'di ji snyam du sems / / +skyes bu de gzings de la de lta de ltar rtog pa na bya ba byas pa yin nam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911686#911697#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2673;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2674;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2675;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2676# byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gnas su skyes na brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i  bdag por 'gyur ba dang  mi'i nang du skyes na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa mi'i bdag por 'gyur ba ni 'byor pa'i dus zhes bya'o // / +rgud pa'i dus na yang zhes bya ba la / /

column3: btsun pa de bzhin no // / +dge slong dag de bzhin du ngas bstan pa'i chos rnams kyang nges par 'byung ba'i phyir yin gyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911698#911713#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2675;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2676;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2677;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2678# longs spyod btang nas 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa ni rgud pa'i dus zhes bya'o // / +nyon mongs sdug bsngal  dag gis mi 'jigs so // /

column3: yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no // / +dge slong dag  de lta bas na ngas gzings lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa dag shes nas sngar chos ma yin pa bzhin du chos kyang spang bar bya'o zhes lung bar ma'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa bkra shis pa'i mdo las 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911714#911726#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2678;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2679# byang chub kyi sems ldog pa ni yang na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas bcings par dogs pas byang chub kyi sems bor nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'am / / +yang na skye ba dang rgas pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs nas byang  chub kyi sems 'dor grang na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911727#911736#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2679;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2680# yang na skye ba dang rgas pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs nas byang  chub kyi sems 'dor grang na / / +byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mthong bas skye ba dang rga ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa med la sogs pa'i 'byor pa'i dus na yang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas mi gos pa'i phyir / /

column3: dri med rnam thar sgo gsum mo // / +zhes bya ba la / / +gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa    na'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911737#911748#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2680;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2681;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2682# byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mthong bas skye ba dang rga ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa med la sogs pa'i 'byor pa'i dus na yang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas mi gos pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.019#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603258#2603260#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8416# thob pa dang zhes pas mngon sum du byed pa dag gis zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dus na de dang mthun pa'i rten gyis thob  pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir dang langs pa'i dus na de yang so sor yang dag par myong ba'i shes pas mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.021#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1986300#1986301#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1099;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1100;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1101# ci'i phyir zhe na / / +kha phyir bltas pa'i bya ba'i dus na de med pa'i phyir te / /
column7: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1166929#1166930#TD4047E.TXT.r_6732;TD4047E.TXT.r_6733# snga rol nyid nas kyang yid dga' la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +sbyor ba'i dus na chags pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir  yid dga' ba'o // /
column8: 0.022#TD4019E.TXT.r#2457023#2457025#TD4019E.TXT.r_6584# gzhan yang sngon gyi las ni 'bras bu ma bskyed par 'gags pas phyis 'bras bu skyed pa'i dus na med pa'i phyir las rnams chud zos pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro zhe na / /
column9: 0.022#TD4041E.TXT.r#1275564#1275564#TD4041E.TXT.r_1022;TD4041E.TXT.r_1023# longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gnas lta bur gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +chags par bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.022#TD4018E.TXT.r#3064118#3064119#TD4018E.TXT.r_7816;TD4018E.TXT.r_7817# rtog par mi byed pa'i phyir ro // / +ne yi ya yi ka la sogs pa'i skad cig pa rnams kyang skad cig pa'i dus la de las phyi ma'i skad cig la gzhan gyi dngos po rtog par mi 'gyur ba ni ji ltar yod pa dang 'brel pa dang  gnas pa'i dus dang  yon tan  gzhan 'byung ba'i dus dang  dmigs pa'i dus dang  rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyu bsnyen dus dang  rnam par 'jig pa'o // /
column11: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2950942#2950942#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11457# sems la nyon mongs pa med pa ni sa de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom zhing gnas pa med pas nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po dang ldan pa'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas sems la mi gos pa'i phyir sems la nyon mongs pa  med do // /
column12: 0.024#TD4018E.TXT.r#3071783#3071783#TD4018E.TXT.r_8832# shes pa dang shes par bya ba dus mnyam pas na phan par bya ba dang  phan par byed pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir / /
column13: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#601965#601965#TD4068E.TXT.r_3632# dgra bcom  pas ni khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa'i chos kun ma lus par spangs pas nyon mongs pa'i yid kyang spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa'i dus na nyon mongs pa'i yid med do // /
column14: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#602046#602046#TD4068E.TXT.r_3641# 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de ches zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus na nyon mongs pa'i yid med do // /
column15: 0.027#TD4053E.TXT.r#2965313#2965313#TD4053E.TXT.r_84;TD4053E.TXT.r_85# rjes su 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid ni  'byung ba gyur na de la gnas pa'i rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyang 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +gnas par byed pa'i rgyu nyid ni mtshungs par 'byung ba'i dus na 'byung ba rnams kyi rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyi rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#993044#993044#TD4054E.TXT.r_225;TD4054E.TXT.r_226# rjes su 'gyur pa'i rgyu nyid ni 'byung ba rnams gyur na de la gnas pa nye bar blangs pa'i gzugs rnams mi gnas par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +gnas par byed pa'i  rgyu nyid ni mtshungs par 'byung ba'i dus na 'byung ba rnams kyis nye bar blangs pa'i gzugs kyi rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.027#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1060985#1060985#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1388# de  nyid kyi phyir de ni gzhan gyi don byed par 'os pa'i phyir dang  'dod chags dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa yin no // /
column18: 0.027#TD4097E.TXT.r#2221043#2221043#TD4097E.TXT.r_2364;TD4097E.TXT.r_2365# de spangs na dgra bcom par 'gyur ro //// / +'dod chags dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa'i phyir 'os pa'o // /
column19: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1858308#1858308#TD4039E.TXT.r_5022;TD4039E.TXT.r_5023# de dag kyang ci rigs par rigs pa'i rgyu dang 'brus bu'i rim pas 'jug pa'i phyir te / / +rigs pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i  rim pa de thog ma med pa'i dus nas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i lugs gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do // /
column20: 0.029#TD4095E.TXT.r#83297#83297#TD4095E.TXT.r_4010;TD4095E.TXT.r_4011# de na dge ba'i rnam par smin pa'i skabs med pa'i phyir ro // / +gang las 'dod chags bral brtan pa'i // /

column3: rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni rnam pa gsum ste / / +gsum gang zhe na / / +rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang  mtshan ma med pa dang  smon pa med pa'o zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911747#911767#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2680;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2681;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2682# byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mthong bas skye ba dang rga ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa med la sogs pa'i 'byor pa'i dus na yang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas mi gos pa'i phyir / / +nyon mongs pas mi 'jigs la / / +byang chub sems  dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis tshe gcig tu 'chi zhing skye ba len pas na skyed mos tshal gcig nas gcig tu 'pho ba 'dra bar mthong bas skye ba dang rga ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa med pas byang chub kyi sems ga la ldog ste mi ldog go zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gsum mo zhes bya ba la / / +gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o // /

column3: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang  mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  smon pa med pa smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin no zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911776#911785#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2683;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2684;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2685# skye bas na skyed mos tshal dang  'dra'o zhes bstan pa'i don rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir / /

column3: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / +bzhi gang zhe na / / +ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba yang yod / /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911813#911824#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2690;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2691# lus bkrus nas rgyan la sogs pas brgyan par byed pa dang  sa gzhi bde ba dag tu gnas par byed pa dang  glu gar la sogs pa rtsed mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa ste / /

column3: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na shes rab rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ba yang yod / /

column3: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na zag pa zad par 'gyur ba yang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911837#911848#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2692;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2693# de bzhin    du byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig nas gcig gis skyed mos tshal du rgyu bas na sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang shes rab kyi rgyan la sogs pa rang gi yon tan gyi rgyan yin no // /

column3: ting  nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bstan goms par byas lan mang du byas na mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911849#911856#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2692;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2693;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2694# de bzhin    du byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig nas gcig gis skyed mos tshal du rgyu bas na sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang shes rab kyi rgyan la sogs pa rang gi yon tan gyi rgyan yin no // / +sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar byas pa dga' ba'i sems ni kha zas  bzang po lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911857#911864#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2693;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2694# sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar byas pa dga' ba'i sems ni kha zas  bzang po lta bu'o // / +sems can gyi don du lha dang mi la sogs pa'i gnas de dang de dag tu skye bar bya'o zhes bsam bzhin du skye ba ni skyed mos tshal gyi mchog dang 'dra'o // /

column3: 'di na dge slong lus 'di rab tu dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang  bde bas mngon par gang zhing rgyas la khyab ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911865#911885#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2694;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2695;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2696# sems can gyi don du lha dang mi la sogs pa'i gnas de dang de dag tu skye bar bya'o zhes bsam bzhin du skye ba ni skyed mos tshal gyi mchog dang 'dra'o // /

column3: 'di lta ste rab tu dben pa las skyes pa'i  dga' ba dang  bde ba lus 'di la ma khyab pa'i cha cung zad kyang med par khyab par gnas pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911886#911893#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2695;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2696# sems can gyi don du mngon par shes pa lngas rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams  kyi rtsed mo ste yon tan de bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems las ga la ldog ste mi ldog go zhes bya ba'i don to // / +yon tan de bzhi yang bdag dang gzhan gyi don spangs pa snying rje med pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la mi srid de de med do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: dper na khrus mkhan nam khrus mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas 'dag chal gyi phye ma zhib mo dag zangs gzhong ngam 'khar gzhong ngam nya phyis kyi nang du chu dang bcug nas spangs na gong du de rlan pa dang rlan  pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang  phyi dang nang dag rlan pas khyab cing sla ba dang 'thor bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'di na dge slong lus 'di zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911894#911903#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2696;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2697;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2698# yon tan de bzhi yang bdag dang gzhan gyi don spangs pa snying rje med pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la mi srid de de med do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa bzlog  par tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911904#911914#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2697;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2698# sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa bzlog  par tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa yang med 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa med du zin kyang 'khor ba na sems can gyi don du mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa gtong ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro snyam  pa la ; /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911914#911925#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2698;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2699# de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa yang med 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa med du zin kyang 'khor ba na sems can gyi don du mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa gtong ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro snyam  pa la ; /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911926#911938#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2698;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2699;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2700;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2701# de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa yang med 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa med du zin kyang 'khor ba na sems can gyi don du mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa gtong ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro snyam  pa la ; / +sdug bsngal de yang med par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911997#911998#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2708;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2709# byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can gyi don du 'gyur na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba na gnas na yang dga' zhing bde ba ste /// / +skyo ba med na sems can gyi don du 'khor ba na mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa btang ba tsam gyi sdug bsngal gyis ga la skrag ste mi skrag go zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#939638#939638#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6415# de la sangs rgyas gcig tu yang ma zad  du mar yang med par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
