column5: 0.029#TD4026E.TXT.r#314703#314703#TD4026E.TXT.r_7337;TD4026E.TXT.r_7338# yang zhing la sogs pas lung ston pa ni dus 'di tsam zhig na bskal ba  'di zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bu zhig tu sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya BAR 'GYUR TE / / +'di 'khor ni 'di lta bur 'gyur ro // /

column3: mig gi reg pa'i skye mched kyis sdug bsngal so sor  myong bar 'gyur zhing / / +drag pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba nyid nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913381#913395#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2900;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2901;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2902# sa brgyad pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi  zhing che ge mo zhig tu sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa'i phyir te / / +'di ni don byed pa bcu gcig pa'o // /
column5: 5.960#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2954453#2954458#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11884;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11885;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11886# sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba la / / +sa bcu pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis / /

column3: rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal so sor myong bar 'gyur zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913394#913405#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2902;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2903;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2904# dbang bskur dang zhes bya ba la sa bcu pa'i dus na ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur     // /
column5: 5.960#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2953829#2953831#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11814# sa de thob ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.009#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901296#901296#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1502# byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi  sras su skyas pa de dag kyang sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin thob pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'od zer gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur te / /
column7: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#990357#990358#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12943# phyi ma'i bsgom pa ni sa brgyad nas sa bcu'i bar du bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la bsgom pa thob nas sa bcur phyin pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' de phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba  thob po zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: drag pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba nyid so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro // / +dge  slong dag 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913404#913414#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2902;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2903;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2904;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2905;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2906;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2907# dbang bskur dang zhes bya ba la sa bcu pa'i dus na ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur     // / +bar mdzad de / / +'di ni don byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o // /
column5: 0.028#TD4026E.TXT.r#280235#280236#TD4026E.TXT.r_928;TD4026E.TXT.r_929# rigs su skye dang lung bstan dbang bskur dang / / +de bzhin gshegs mkhyen bla med go 'phang ste // /

column3: gdug pa can la shing ngam shing gi sdong po dag gis snad na sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913415#913424#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2905;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2906;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2907# de bzhin gshegs mkhyen bla med go 'phang dang / / +zhes bya ba la / / +sangs rgyas kyis kun du 'od du me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa ye shes bzhi thob par byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa / /

column3: nad dang bcas pa dang  chu ser dang  rnag 'dzag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'di na skyes bu kha cig gtum zhing ngor smra ba'i rang bzhin can du gyur na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913425#913440#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2907;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2908;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2909;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2910# sangs rgyas kyis kun du 'od du me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa ye shes bzhi thob par byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa / /

column3: de chung ngu dang mi dga' ba chung  dus kyang khro ba dang gnod sems skyed cing yi mug cing gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913441#913450#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2910;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2911;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2912# gzhan don de gsum bcu gsum bdag nyid do // /

column3: khro bar yang dag par byed de / / +de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +dge slong dag skyes bu de'i sems ni mdze can lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913448#913461#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2911;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2912;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2913;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2914# zhes byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don byed ba ni / / +sems can rnam pa gsum la don rnam pa gsum byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: dge slong dag sdom pa ma yin pa dang sdom pa dag bshad par bya ste / / +de legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang  bshad par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913460#913471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2913;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2914;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2915;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2916# gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la  tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +gzhan gyi sgras ni nyan thos kyi rigs can dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can dang  theg pa chen po'i rigs can rnams la bya ste / /

column3: sdom pa ma yin pa gang zhe na / / +dge slong dag byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa dag mig gis gzugs dag mthong nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin la phyis chos rnams la lan mang du rjes su rtog pa dang  rjes su dpyod par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913472#913481#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2915;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2916# sems can de dag gi don sgrub pa la / / +sems can de dag gi bsam pa che chung dang snod che chung las chos kyang de dang 'tsham  par so so'i theg pa 'chad pa ni ci rigs don byed pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913481#913494#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2916;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2917;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2918;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2919# sems can de dag gi bsam pa che chung dang snod che chung las chos kyang de dang 'tsham  par so so'i theg pa 'chad pa ni ci rigs don byed pa ste / /

column3: nyes dmigs  ma mthong zhing nyes dmigs ma mthong bas lus kyis thag sring bar mi byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913495#913503#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2917;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2918;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2919# de bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +skye bo mthun pa zhes bya ba la / / +nyan thos kyi rigs can gyi gang zag rnams ni dbang po rtul zhing snod chung pa yin pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen  po'i chos ma bshad pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab 'bring la snod 'bring yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen po mi bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po'i rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab rno ba snod chen po yin pas theg pa chen po'i  chos nyid bshad kyi / /

column3: dge slong dag byis pa so so skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa dag rna bas sgra dang  snas dri dang  lces ro dang  lus kyis reg bya dang  yid kyis chos rnam par shes nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su  'dzin la phyis chos rnams la lan mang du rjes su rtog pa dang  rjes su dpyod par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913504#913511#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2919# nyan thos kyi rigs can gyi gang zag rnams ni dbang po rtul zhing snod chung pa yin pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen  po'i chos ma bshad pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab 'bring la snod 'bring yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen po mi bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po'i rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab rno ba snod chen po yin pas theg pa chen po'i  chos nyid bshad kyi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913512#913521#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2919# nyan thos kyi rigs can gyi gang zag rnams ni dbang po rtul zhing snod chung pa yin pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen  po'i chos ma bshad pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab 'bring la snod 'bring yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen po mi bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po'i rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab rno ba snod chen po yin pas theg pa chen po'i  chos nyid bshad kyi / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913521#913533#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2919# nyan thos kyi rigs can gyi gang zag rnams ni dbang po rtul zhing snod chung pa yin pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen  po'i chos ma bshad pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab 'bring la snod 'bring yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen po mi bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po'i rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab rno ba snod chen po yin pas theg pa chen po'i  chos nyid bshad kyi / /

column3: nyes dmigs ma mthong zhing nyes dmigs ma mthong bas lus kyis thag sring bar mi byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913532#913541#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2919;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2920# nyan thos kyi rigs can gyi gang zag rnams ni dbang po rtul zhing snod chung pa yin pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen  po'i chos ma bshad pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab 'bring la snod 'bring yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen po mi bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po'i rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab rno ba snod chen po yin pas theg pa chen po'i  chos nyid bshad kyi / /

column3: 'di ni sdom pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o // / +sdom pa gang zhe na / / +dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913542#913551#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2919;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2920;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2921;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2922# nyan thos kyi rigs can gyi gang zag rnams ni dbang po rtul zhing snod chung pa yin pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen  po'i chos ma bshad pa dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab 'bring la snod 'bring yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid bshad kyi theg pa chen po mi bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po'i rigs can gyi skye bo rnams ni shes rab rno ba snod chen po yin pas theg pa chen po'i  chos nyid bshad kyi / / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos mi bshad pa ste / /

column3: thos pa dang ldan pa mig gis gzugs mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin la zhes bya ba nas lus kyis thag bsrings nas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913552#913562#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2921;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2922;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2923;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2924;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2925;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2926# de bas na 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa las kyang / / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos 'chad pa ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913562#913570#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2924;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2925;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2926;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2927# phyin  ci ma log 'chad pa dang / / +zhes bya ba la / / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang theg pa chen po'i rigs can rnams la yang rnam pa gsum yod de / /

column3: 'di ni sdom pa zhes bya'o // / +sdom pa ma yin pa dang sdom pa dag bshad par bya'o  zhes ngas ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913569#913581#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2926;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2927;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2928# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang theg pa chen po'i rigs can rnams la yang rnam pa gsum yod de / / +'dod chags kyi shas che ba dang  zhe sdang gi shas che ba dang  gti mug gi shas che ba ste / /

column3: dge slong dag dper na skyes bu zhig dgon pa'i aa mra'i nags su song ba na srog chags drug rnyed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913582#913593#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2928;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2929;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2930# de dag la yang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul    gyis sems brtags nas bshad pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'dod chags can la mi gtsang ba bsgom pa ston / /

column3: khyi rnyed de khyi bzung nas skra'i thag pa'i 'ching bas legs par brtan par bcings shing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913594#913605#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2930;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2931;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2932# gti mug can la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgom pa ston pa ni phyin ci ma log par 'chad pa zhes bya'o /// /

column3: bya rnyed pa dang bya bzung nas skra'i thag pa'i  'ching pas legs bar bcings shing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913606#913618#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2931;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2933# mi 'gying ba dang zhes bya ba  la ; / +rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis 'bar ba dang  'phur ba la sogs pa bstan nas sems can mgu bar bya ste / /

column3: ce spyang rnyed pa dang ce spyang bzung nas skra'i thag pa'i 'ching bas legs par brten par bcings shing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913619#913630#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2933;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2934# bstan pa la dad pa bskyed kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu zhig gis sems can gyi don byas so zhes lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas 'gying ba med de / /

column3: chu srin byis pa gsod rnyed pa dang chu srin byis pa gsod bzung nas skra'i thag pa'i 'ching bas legs par brtan par bcings shing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913629#913638#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2933;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2934;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2935# bstan pa la dad pa bskyed kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu zhig gis sems can gyi don byas so zhes lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas 'gying ba med de / / +lus kyi sgo nas mi  'gying ba ni lus mi 'chos pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913638#913648#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2935;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2936;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2937# ngag gi sgo nas mi 'gying ba ni ngoms spyod mi byed pa'o // /

column3: sprul rnyed  pa dang sprul bzung nas skra'i thag pa'i 'ching bas legs par brten par bcings shing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913647#913659#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2936;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2937;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2938;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2939# sems kyi sgo nas mi 'gying ba ni nga rgyal che bar mi sems pa'o // / +nga rgyal med cing ces bya ba / /

column3: spre'u rnyed pa dang spre'u bzung nas skra'i thag pa'i 'ching bas legs par brtan par bcings te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913658#913669#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2938;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2939# rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can mgu bar byas nas skyabs su btang ste / / +bslab ba 'dzin du bcug  pa rnams la yang 'di ni bdag gis btul te bdag gi slob ma yin no snyam du sems pas nga rgyal med ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: de dag bar du thag pa gcig gis bcings te btang na spyod yul tha dad pa de dag rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul  'dod cing gzhan dang gzhan gyi spyod yul dang yul mi 'dod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913670#913681#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2939;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2940# bslab ba 'dzin du bcug  pa rnams la yang 'di ni bdag gis btul te bdag gi slob ma yin no snyam du sems pas nga rgyal med ba zhes bya'o // / +mkhas dang zhes bya ba la theg pa gsum gyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pas sems can mi shes pa rnams kyi mi shes pa sel ba dang  log bar shes pa rnams kyi log  par shes pa med par byed pa dang  the tshom du gyur pa rnams kyi the tshom gcod par byed pas na mkhas pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913681#913692#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2940# mkhas dang zhes bya ba la theg pa gsum gyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pas sems can mi shes pa rnams kyi mi shes pa sel ba dang  log bar shes pa rnams kyi log  par shes pa med par byed pa dang  the tshom du gyur pa rnams kyi the tshom gcod par byed pas na mkhas pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: khyi ni grong gi mthar 'jug par 'dod cing / / +bya ni nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'dod la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913691#913700#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2940;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2941;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2942# mkhas dang zhes bya ba la theg pa gsum gyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pas sems can mi shes pa rnams kyi mi shes pa sel ba dang  log bar shes pa rnams kyi log  par shes pa med par byed pa dang  the tshom du gyur pa rnams kyi the tshom gcod par byed pas na mkhas pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: ce spyang ni dur khrod du 'jug par 'dod de / / +chu srin byis pa gsod ni chu'i nang du 'jug par 'dod cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913701#913712#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2942# byang chub sems dpa' sems can sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la dgod pa'i phyir sems can gyi don du grang ba dang  tsha ba la sogs pa nyams su  len cing skyo ba med bas na bzod pa can zhes bya'o // /

column3: sbrul ni khung du 'jug par 'dod la  spre'u ni rigs su 'jug par 'dod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913713#913721#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2942;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2943# byang chub sems dpa' sems can sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la dgod pa'i phyir sems can gyi don du grang ba dang  tsha ba la sogs pa nyams su  len cing skyo ba med bas na bzod pa can zhes bya'o // /

column3: dge slong dag 'on kyang spyod yul tha dad cing yul tha dad pa'i srog chags drug po rnams rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul 'dod cing gzhan dang gzhan gyi spyod yul dang yul mi 'dod mod kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913719#913729#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2943;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2944# dul zhes bya ba la lus bsdams pa dang  ngag bsdams pa dang  yid bsdams pas dul ba zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913729#913744#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2944;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2945;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2946;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2947# bdag de ltar dul na sems can gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas dul bar nus so // /

column3: 'on kyang gang spungs che zhing stobs che bar 'gyur ba de'i rjes su  'gro zhing de'i dbang du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913745#913759#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2946;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2947;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2948;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2949# mdo dag las kyang  bdag ma grol na sems can grol bar mi nus / / +bdag ma zhi na sems can zhi bar bya bar mi nus / /

column3: de bzhin du spyod yul dang yul tha dad pa'i dbang po drug po 'di dag rang rang gi yul 'dod cing gzhan dang gzhan gyi yul mi 'dod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913758#913774#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2948;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2949;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2950# bdag ma dul na sems can gzhan dul bar bya bar mi nus so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te / / +'di yan chad du byang chub sems dpa' sems can sa la zhugs pa rnams la don ji ltar byed pa bstan to //// /

column3: mig gis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs blta bar 'dod cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rjes su mi mthun par    'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913775#913784#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2950;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2951# shin tu ring song zhes bya bas sa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzhan yang sa la 'jog pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi don byed pa ston to // /

column3: rna ba ni yid du 'ong ba'i sgra mnyan par 'dod cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rjes su mi mthun par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913785#913795#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2951;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2952;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2953# sa dang po thob pa nas sangs rgyas kyis man chad sa bcu gcig la zhugs pa'i dus na ni ring du song ba zhes  bya ste ; /

column3: sna ni yid du 'ong ba'i dri mnam bar 'dod cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri rjes su mi mthun par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913794#913805#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2952;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2953;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2954;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2955# ci'i phyir zhe na / / +sa de dag la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang so so'i skye bo rnams kyis 'jug par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.017#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847936#2847936#TD4052E.TXT.r_773# rnam pa gcig tu na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang  so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi  shes pas yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir zab pa'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#596239#596239#TD4068E.TXT.r_3099;TD4068E.TXT.r_3100# kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mi rigs pas na zab pa'o // / +'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi rigs pas na phra ba'o // /
column7: 0.027#TD4025E.TXT.r#2167235#2167235#TD4025E.TXT.r_232;TD4025E.TXT.r_233# byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas ma dag pa'o // / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni shes bya'i sgrib pas dri ma    dang ma bral ba'o // /
column8: 0.029#TD4053E.TXT.r#2994504#2994504#TD4053E.TXT.r_3991# byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir / /

column3: lce ni yid du 'ong ba'i ro myong bar 'dod cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro  dang rjes su mi mthun par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913806#913813#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2954;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2955# de las dang po'i dus na ni byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa zhes bya ste / / +de thob dang sems can gzhan dag sa dang po thob par  bya ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye bar byed pa'i don byed nus so // /

column3: lus ni yid du 'ong ba'i reg bya reg par 'dod cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya rjes su mi mthun par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913814#913824#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2955;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2956;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2957# de thob dang sems can gzhan dag sa dang po thob par  bya ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye bar byed pa'i don byed nus so // /

column3: yid ni yid du 'ong ba'i chos rnam par shes par 'dod cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos dang rjes su mi mthun par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913823#913840#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2956;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2957;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2958;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2959# sa brgyad pa'i dus na ni lung bstan pa thob ces bya ste / / +rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa thob pas bdag de la gnas na sems can gzhan yang de la 'jog par nus so // /

column3: dge slong dag spyod yul  tha dad pa dang  yul tha dad pa'i dbang po drug po 'di dag ni rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul 'dod cing gzhan dang gzhan gyi spyod yul dang yul mi 'dod mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913841#913857#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2958;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2959;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2960;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2961# sa bcu pa'i dus na ni rgyal tshab  tu dbang bskur ba thob ba zhes bya ste / / +bdag de la gnas na sems can gzhan yang gnas te thob par bya bar nus so // /

column3: 'on kyang gang stobs che zhing stobs dang ldan pa de'i rjes su 'gro zhing de'i dbang du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913856#913870#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2961;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2962;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2963;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2964;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2965# bdag gis de thob pas sems can gzhan yang de la dgod par bya bar nus so // /

column3: de nas skyes bu des srog  chags drug po de dag ka ba'am phur pa la legs par bcings te bzhag na pha rol ring du song yang lus ngal ba dang  lus dub pa dang  lus lci bas ka ba 'am phur pa de nyid kyi drung du 'khor zhing 'dug la mngon par gnas par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913869#913888#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2963;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2964;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2965;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2966# byang  chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa ni mi zad pa ste / / +ci'i phyir zhe na / / +rnam pa bzhis mi zad pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913889#913899#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2966# rnam pa bzhi ni byang chub kyi sems kyis bsgral bar bya ba'i sems can mi zad pas sems can gyi don du bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi zad pa dang  byang chub kyi sems mi zad pas bsam pa mi  zad pa dang  bsam pa mi zad pas bsam pa las byung ba'i snying rje mi zad pa dang  snying rje mi zad pas thabs dang shes rab kyang mi zad pa ste de bas na mi zad pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: dge slong dag 'di ni ngas don shes par  bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913898#913915#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2966;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2967;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2968;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2969# rnam pa bzhi ni byang chub kyi sems kyis bsgral bar bya ba'i sems can mi zad pas sems can gyi don du bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems mi zad pa dang  byang chub kyi sems mi zad pas bsam pa mi  zad pa dang  bsam pa mi zad pas bsam pa las byung ba'i snying rje mi zad pa dang  snying rje mi zad pas thabs dang shes rab kyang mi zad pa ste de bas na mi zad pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'di ni gzhan du blta bar bya'o // / +dge slong dag srog chags drug po zhes bya ba 'di ni dbang po drug po rnams kyi tshig bla dags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913916#913923#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2969;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2970# gong du bshad pa lta bu'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'  rnams sems can gyi don byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa ni mchog dam pa ma nor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: ka ba 'am phur pa legs par bcings te zhes bya ba 'di ni lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa'i tshig bla dags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913922#913935#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2969;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2970;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2971;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2972;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2973# gong du bshad pa lta bu'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'  rnams sems can gyi don byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa ni mchog dam pa ma nor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +'gying ba med pas mgu bar byed pa yi // /

column3: dge slong  dag lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na mig gis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs blta bar 'dod pa dang  yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rjes su mi mthun par mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913934#913946#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2972;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2973;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2974;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2975# byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dad pa bskyed de mgu bar byas    na yang 'gying ba med de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913946#913955#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2974;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2975;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2976# nga rgyal med pas ni 'jug pa ste zhes bya ba la / / +rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dad pa bskyed nas skyabs su btang ste / /

column3: rna bas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra mnyan par 'dod cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi  mthun par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913956#913964#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2976;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2977;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2978# bstan pa la 'dzud kyi rdzu 'phrul byas so snyam du sems pa yang med la / /

column3: snas yid du 'ong ba'i dri bsnam par 'dod cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri rjes su mi mthun par mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913965#913976#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2977;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2978;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2979;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2980# 'di dag  ni bdag gi bstan pa la 'jug ste / / +bdag gi slob ma yin no snyam du sems pa'i nga rgyal yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: lces yid du 'ong ba'i ro myong bar 'dod cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro rjes su mi mthun par mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913974#913984#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2978;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2979;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2980;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2981# bdag gi slob ma yin no snyam du sems pa'i nga rgyal yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +mkhas pas ni don la nges par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la / /

column3: lus kyis yid du 'ong ba'i reg bya reg par 'dod cing yid du mi     // / +'ong ba'i reg bya rjes su mi mthun par mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913982#913995#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2980;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2981;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2982# theg pa gsum gyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pas na bdag gis kyang de ni phyin ci ma log par rtogs  la ; / +sems can gzhan gyi yang mi shes pa dang log par shes pa dang  the tshom gcod par byed pas na don la nges pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: yid kyis yid du 'ong ba'i chos rnam par shes par 'dod cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rjes su mi mthun par mi 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#913994#914004#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2981;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2982;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2983# sems can gzhan gyi yang mi shes pa dang log par shes pa dang  the tshom gcod par byed pas na don la nges pa zhes bya'o // / +bzod pas ni dge ba la yongs su smin par byed pa'i sgrub pa zhes bya ba la / /

column3: dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste / / +gang lus su gtogs pa'i dran  pa kun du sten pa dang  goms par byed pa dang lan mang du byed pa de ltar dge slong dag bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914005#914016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2983;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2984# sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang  sa bcu'i dge ba la  bkod nas / / +yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du grang ba dang  tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mi skyo ba ni bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914017#914024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2984;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2985;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2986;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2987# yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du grang ba dang  tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mi skyo ba ni bzod pa zhes bya ba'i don to // / +dul bas ni lung bsgo ba la sogs pa'i sgrub pa ste / /
column6: 0.013#TD4026E.TXT.r#302567#302567#TD4026E.TXT.r_4929# grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mi  'khrugs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mngon par shes par bya ba dang  yongs su shes par bya ba zhes bya ba la / / +skye mched drug gi chogs kyis bsdus pa'i sdom gyi  tshigs su bcad pa dang po'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'i mdo lnga pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas dang por / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914025#914033#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2985;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2986;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2987# dul bas ni lung bsgo ba la sogs pa'i sgrub pa ste / / +zhes BYA BA LA / / +bdag nyid lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sdom pa la gnas pa ni sems  can mi dge ba las bzlog ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914034#914049#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2987;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2988;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2989;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2990# bdag nyid lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sdom pa la gnas pa ni sems  can mi dge ba las bzlog ste / /
column6: 0.028#TD4018E.TXT.r#3060676#3060676#TD4018E.TXT.r_7355;TD4018E.TXT.r_7356;TD4018E.TXT.r_7357# don dam pa'i rang bzhin med pa ni gnyis kyi rnam par rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te / / +de de lta bur dgongs pa'o // / +gang yang brtags pa'i rang bzhin dang   gzhan gyi dbang lta bur grub pa'i rang bzhin med do zhes rtog pa de ni chos kyi gnod pa 'byung ba'i las sgrub par byed / /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520837#520839#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9262;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9263# bdag gi mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // / +gzhan  yang de nyid las bdag gir lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir stong pa'i rnam pa bsgom mo // /

column3: 'du byed phung po bzhi las gzhan // / +zhes bya bar chos gcig mngon par ma shes shing yongs su ma shes na zhes bris zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914050#914065#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2990;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2991;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2992# bdag ma dul bar gzhan gdul bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520837#520839#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9262;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9263# bdag gi mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // / +gzhan  yang de nyid las bdag gir lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir stong pa'i rnam pa bsgom mo // /
column6: 0.020#TD4054E.TXT.r#996084#996084#TD4054E.TXT.r_740;TD4054E.TXT.r_741# dge ba la sbyor ba'o // / +gzhan gyis bdag la yon tan dang ldan par yid ches par bya ba'i phyir te / /
column7: 0.027#TD4041E.TXT.r#1275674#1275675#TD4041E.TXT.r_1035;TD4041E.TXT.r_1036# de'i rgyu las nyes par spyod pa kun tu spyod pa'i phyir bdag la gzhan gyis dbyung pa dang  bsad pa dang  bcing ba dang  brdeg pa dang  spyo ba dang  spyugs pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa skyed pa'i phyir bdag la gnod par  'gyur ba'o // / +bdag la ma yin yang gzhan la skyed pas gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba'o // /

column3: shes rab dang rnam par shes pa dag ni  yul mtshungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la / / +lung bar ma las 'byung bas sngar gnas par bshad cing bstan la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914064#914079#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2992;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2993# sa bcu gcig thob  pas ni sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye ba bsgrub pa dang  lung bstan pa bsgrub pa dang  thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par nus kyi ring du song ba'i sa ma thob par ni mi nus zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.012#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2553934#2553935#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_2220;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_2221# 'on te mngon par go bar nus pa zhig yin zhes bya ba ni gang  zhig don mngon par go bar nus pa de yang don mngon par go bar nus pa zhes brjod par nus te / / +don mngon par go bar 'gyur zhes bya ba skabs su bab pa'i gnas skabs yin par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //// /
column6: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136441#1136442#TD4047E.TXT.r_2193;TD4047E.TXT.r_2194# phyin ci log tu byed mi nus zhes bya ba'i don to // / +zlog par mi byed pa ni ma gus pas mi byed pa'o // /

column3: gsus po che'i mdo las 'di ltar 'don te / / +tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu shes rab shes rab ces brjod pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914078#914089#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2992;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2993;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2994;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2995# sa bcu gcig thob  pas ni sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye ba bsgrub pa dang  lung bstan pa bsgrub pa dang  thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par nus kyi ring du song ba'i sa ma thob par ni mi nus zhes bya ba'i don to // / +sgrub pa'i khyad par tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /

column3: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu shes rab gang zhe na / / +tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che  rab tu shes shing rab tu shes pa de'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914090#914104#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2994;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2995;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2996# 'dod  khams kyi lha dang mi ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga tsam sgrub / / +gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha dag ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba tsam sgrub / /

column3: ci zhig rab tu shes she na / / +dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes shing kha na ma thob dang bcas pa dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa dang  dman pa dang  gya nom pa dang  dkar po dang  nag po  dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914105#914115#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2996;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag gi don du zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa tsam sgrub kyi de dag las byang chub     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914116#914124#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2998;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2999;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3000# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905353#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889761#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892210#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893155#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900164#900164#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1362# 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs su song bas 'phags so zhes glengs pa la kun tu 'gro ba'i don rgyas par bshad par bya ba'i  tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925683#925684#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4482# sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes rgya cher bstan nas da don de nyid mjug bsdu zhing ji  ltar sems can yongs su smin par byas pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896432#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959053#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911265#911265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2624# sems  can gyi don gyi phyir dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pas / / +skyo ba'i 'jigs pa med par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column23: 0.017#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#840431#840431#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12190# rgyu dang bdag po zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i rkyen dang bdag po'i rkyen no zhes bya ba'i  don gang yin pa'o // /
column24: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906650#906652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981018#981019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11612# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhin rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916653#916653#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3328# de bas na bdag dang chos med par yang mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang   'khor bar skye rung bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914161#914177#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3000;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3001;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3002;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3003;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3004;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3005# 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa'i sems can rnams ni rtag tu gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa  lnga'i yon tan la spyod pas de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis tshe 'dir yang bcing ba dang gsad pa la sogs pa'i lus kyi sdug bsngal dang sems la mi bde ba la sogs pa sems kyi sdug bsngal 'byung zhing de'i rgyus tshe rabs gzhan du yang ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur bas na 'jigs pa chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya  ba'i don to // / +srid pa'i bde dga' mi brtan phyin ci log / /

column3: de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +gang rab tu shes pa de rnam par shes shing gang rnam par shes pa de rab tu shes pa de'i  phyir chos 'di gnyis ni yang dag par 'dres pa ste ma 'dres pa ma yin zhing gang yang chos 'di gnyis so so so sor khyad par ram rnam pa tha dad par gdags pa mi rnyed do zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914258#914267#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3015;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3016;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3017;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3018;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3019# zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das par dga'  bar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +rtag tu kun gyis skyed pa zhi ba snying rje bdag / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914267#914294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3016;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3018;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3019;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3017;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3020# rtag tu kun gyis skyed pa zhi ba snying rje bdag / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab dang yang ldan / / +snying rje dang yang ldan pa yin te / /
column6: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096989#3096989#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_747;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_748# de nyid kyis nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs pas na / / +mtshan ma med pa'i shes pa sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i shes pa'i rgyu gyur pa nyon mongs pa spong bar  byed pa gang yin pa de nyid la rgyu 'bras bu gdags pa byas nas sdug bsngal la sogs pa bshes pas nye bar gdags pas nyes pa med do / /
column7: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1858237#1858237#TD4039E.TXT.r_5012;TD4039E.TXT.r_5013# de yang zag pa med pa dang  'phags pa'i rgyu la dmigs pas ni 'phags pa'o // / +nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir nges par 'byung bas na de'i phyir     // /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914294#914305#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3020;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3021# shes rab dang ldan pas 'khor pa'i mtha'i bar du sems can kun gyi don la yod pa'i skye ba dang  rga ba la sogs    pa'i sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa'i rgyu nyon mongs pa zhi bar byas nas snying rje dang ldan pas nyan thos bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings 'ba' zhig tu ma zhugs kyi sems can gyi don du 'khor ba na bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914314#914332#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3021;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3022;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3023# tshigs bcad 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub  pa 'jig rten gyi sgrub pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa las kyang 'phags par ston te / / +shes rab dang ldan pas ni bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i nyon mongs pa sel bas 'jig rten gyi sgrub pas kyang 'phags so // /
column5: 0.028#TD4042E.TXT.r#1678951#1678951#TD4042E.TXT.r_334;TD4042E.TXT.r_335# de la ched du brjod pa'i sde ni gang las kyang ma brten par 'di lta ste / / +nyan  thos rnams byang bar bya ba'i phyir bshad pa gang yin pa dang skye bo phyi ma la thugs brtse ba nye bar gzhag nas tshul bshad pa gang yin pa de ni ched du brjod pa'i sde zhes bya ste / /

column10: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348904#1348904#TD4037E.TXT.r_4477# rnam pa bdun ni phyi phyir zhing bla na med pa yang dag par  rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu shas cher 'dun pa dang  smon pa rjes su 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus 'dun pa dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos rnams la mthun zhing rnal 'byor du gnas par 'gyur la / /
column11: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#623360#623365#TD4069E.TXT.r_197# yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ni zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ba ni yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ni phyin ci ma log pa'i brtson 'grus sgrub pa dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus  sgrub pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te / /
column12: 0.021#TD4026E.TXT.r#302552#302552#TD4026E.TXT.r_4924;TD4026E.TXT.r_4925;TD4026E.TXT.r_4926# sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus ni / / +de bzhin du sbyor ba'i phyir ro // / +ma zhum pa'i brtson 'grus ni / /
column13: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925152#925152#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4412# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar mi byed pa ni nan tan mchog la gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column14: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2904522#2904522#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5120# bzod pa la gnas pa rnams ni grang ba dang tsha ba byung yang dge ba byed pa mi gtong bas brtson 'grus  grub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus dang rjes su mthun no // /
column15: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1137166#1137166#TD4047E.TXT.r_2298;TD4047E.TXT.r_2299# dge ba la sems spro ba ni brtson 'grus so zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na brtson 'grus ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi  gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir / /

column5: 0.028#TD4010E.TXT.r#2271732#2271732#TD4010E.TXT.r_5307;TD4010E.TXT.r_5308# de dag nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'das pa'i dus na  de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i padma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsad gur ji skad gsungs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don byas nas mya ngan las 'das par gyur to // / +bcom ldan 'das de mya ngan las 'das  pa'i dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par gyur pa'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po dpa' bas byin zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo // /

column3: snga ma bzhin du shing ljon pa gzhan zhig gi drung du nyin par gnas pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar du ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914527#914538#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON to // /

column8: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943295#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981741#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889761#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892210#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893155#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922395#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900164#900165#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1362# 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs su song bas 'phags so zhes glengs pa la kun tu 'gro ba'i don rgyas par bshad par bya ba'i  tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925683#925685#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4482# sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes rgya cher bstan nas da don de nyid mjug bsdu zhing ji  ltar sems can yongs su smin par byas pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912955#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896432#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959053#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911265#911265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2624# sems  can gyi don gyi phyir dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pas / / +skyo ba'i 'jigs pa med par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column23: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981019#981019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11612# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhin rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916653#916653#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3328# de bas na bdag dang chos med par yang mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang   'khor bar skye rung bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925283#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925471#925471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column27: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906651#906652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column28: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#971134#971134#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10361# byang chub sems dpas tshig kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas na phun sum tshogs pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom  mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column29: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912825#912825#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2820# ji ltar bdag la de ltar sgrub pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan la yang de dang 'dra bar sgrub par  byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column30: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919666#919666#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3716# da ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa rnams sangs rgyas  kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis dag par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column31: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924892#924892#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4374# de yang bzod pa 'di 'dra bas sems can 'di ltar smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column32: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925103#925103#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4405# de yang brtson 'grus ji lta bus  sems can 'di 'dra bar yongs su smin par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column33: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904478#904478#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1848# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column34: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892385#2892386#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3481;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3482;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3483# snying rje'i shugs kyis gtong bas de ltar btang ba'i sbyin pa la yon tan dang legs pa yod pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column35: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897141#897141#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# skur pa btab na ngan song du lhung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba dang  skrag na yang rgyu gang gi sa skrag pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column36: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2891481#2891483#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3364;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3365# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma chags mi gnas par bstan pa'i phyir / / +tshigs su bcad pa gcig rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column37: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2931208#2931208#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8768# de ngo mtshar du bya ba ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column38: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894819#2894819#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3788# byang chub sems dpa' rnams su thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i 'bras bu de dag pas longs spyod khyad par can 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column39: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2894307#2894307#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3729# de lta bu'i sbyin pa btang ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: dge slong ma brag gang na ba der nye bar song ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914556#914563#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3049;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3050# zhes bya ba la ji lta  ji ltar zhes bya ba ni gang dang gang gi tshe na zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: nye bar song nas dge slong ma brag gi mdun du 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pa smras pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914564#914573#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3050;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3051;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3052# rgyal sras spyod pa zhes bya ba ni don gyis grong la sogs par 'jug pa'am / /

column3: sems can 'di dag gang gis byas // / +sems can rnams kyi byed pa gang // / +sems can gang las rab tu skyes // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914572#914583#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3051;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3052;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3053;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3054# spyod lam bzhis gnas ba la bya'o // / +dbang po'i spyod yul sna tshogs 'jug gyur pa // /

column3: sems  can gang du 'gro bar 'gyur // / +bdud kyi sems can snyam sems nas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914584#914594#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3053;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3054;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3055# zhes bya ba ni mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du drug go // / +de'i spyod yul ni gzugs nas chos kyi bar du drug go // /

column3: 'di ni lta bar gyur pa ste // / +'du byed phung po 'di stong ste // / +'di la sems can rnyed ma yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914593#914602#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3054;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3055;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3056# de'i spyod yul ni gzugs nas chos kyi bar du drug go // / +'jug pa ni mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang  rna bas sgra thos pa nas yid kyis chos shes pa'i bar du'o // /

column3: ji ltar yan lag tshogs la ni // / +shing rta'i 'du shes dran pa 'byung // / +de bzhin phung po'i nyer len las // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914603#914622#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3055;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3056;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3057;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3058;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3059;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3060# 'jug pa ni mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang  rna bas sgra thos pa nas yid kyis chos shes pa'i bar du'o // / +de lta de ltar rigs pa'i mthun tshig gis // /

column3: kun rdzob tu ni sems can brjod // / +'di dag skye ba sdug bsngal te // / +gnas pa nyid kyi sdug bsngal te // /
column4: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2899829#2899829#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4483# myong ba'i  bdag nyid kyi phyir tshor ba'o zhes bya ba tshig bzang pos chos 'chad par byed pa dang  tshig zur chag pa med pas gzhan la chos ston na gzhan dag don myur du go bar 'gyur zhing / /
column5: 0.027#TD4071E.TXT.r#411577#411577#TD4071E.TXT.r_1977# bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gyo bar byed pa'i tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: sdug bsngal nyid ni 'gag 'gyur zhing // / +sdug bsngal tshogs las gzhan du min // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914623#914632#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3060;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3061;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3062# mthun pa'i tshig ni bdag gis ci dang ci mthong ba dang  sems can gyi don du bsngo ba'i tshig 'brel pa ste / /

column3: de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du dge slong ma brag gi sems kyis bdag gi sems  shes so snyam nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914631#914640#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3061;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3062;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3063# ci dang ci mthong ba dang ci thos pa rnams bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas nas sems can gyi don du bsngo bas na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914641#914649#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3062;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3063# sems can  la phan pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed ces bya'o // / +sems can rnams la mi bzod pa dgag ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshe phan brtags na yang slar gnod pa byed ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' la brdeg pa dang  btsog ba ba    la sogs pa'i gnod pa byed par sems pa rnams la mi bzod par bya bar mi rigs kyi / /
column6: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2953576#2953576#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11789# sa dgu pa thob pa'i tshe so so yang dag par rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa thob pa'i blo dang ldan pas rnam pa thams cad du sems can gyi don byed nus pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i gang zag ces bya'o // /
column7: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183944#1183944#TD4047E.TXT.r_9003;TD4047E.TXT.r_9004# ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan sgrub pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +sems can gyi don bya ba'i bsam gtan ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nyid do // /

column3: yid la gcags bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to zhes gsungs so // / +lung phran tshegs las bram ze rgya shug gi dbang du mdzad nas zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914650#914668#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3063;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3064# sems can rnams la mi bzod pa dgag ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshe phan brtags na yang slar gnod pa byed ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' la brdeg pa dang  btsog ba ba    la sogs pa'i gnod pa byed par sems pa rnams la mi bzod par bya bar mi rigs kyi / /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pas ba da ra'i // / +sems ni thugs kyis mkhyen mdzad nas // / +rdzogs sangs steng du rdzu 'phrul gyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914666#914678#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3063;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3064;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3065;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3066# sems can rnams la mi bzod pa dgag ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshe phan brtags na yang slar gnod pa byed ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' la brdeg pa dang  btsog ba ba    la sogs pa'i gnod pa byed par sems pa rnams la mi bzod par bya bar mi rigs kyi / / +dang du blang ba rigs par bstan ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: gshegs nas skyil mo krung bcas bzhugs // / +de nas mtshan gyis yongs brgyan te // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914679#914696#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3065;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3066;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3067;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3068;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3069# rtag tu rang dbang med pa'i skyon sems kyis // / +skye bos nyes pa blo ldan mi sems te // /

column3: skyo bcas rgya shug gis mthong nas // / +stan las rab tu langs nas ni // /
zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te // / +grogs po 'di na ston pa ni // / +gzhon  nu rnams kyis thos nas ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914697#914706#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3069;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3070;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3071# de la shes rab kyis ni sems can gyis byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par byas na yang sems can de dag 'dod chags dang  zhe sdang dang  gti mug gi dbang du song ste / /

column3: pha rol rab tu rgal gyur cing / / +skam sar gnas pa'i chos ston byed // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914705#914716#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3070;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3071# rtag tu yang rang dbang med par byang chub sems dpa' la brdeg  pa dang ; / +bcing ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa byed par sems kyi dbang yod bzhin du nyes ba byed pa ni ma yin no zhes te de ltar thugs su chud pas na nyon mongs pa rnams kyi nyes par dgongs kyi sems can rnams kyi nyes par mi dgongs so zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de nas ping go stan las langs // / +bla gos phrag pa gcig byas shing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914717#914727#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3071;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3072# bcing ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa byed par sems kyi dbang yod bzhin du nyes ba byed pa ni ma yin no zhes te de ltar thugs su chud pas na nyon mongs pa rnams kyi nyes par dgongs kyi sems can rnams kyi nyes par mi dgongs so zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni // / +tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad smras // / +'di ni bram ze rdzogs sangs  rgyas ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914728#914739#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3072;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3073;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3074;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3075# mi 'dod bzhin du shes bar byed  pa'i skye bo yin pas snying rje 'phel phyir ro // /

column3: 'gro ba sems can rab tu 'dzin // / +'di yis 'dod pa rab 'dul zhing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914740#914749#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3074;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3075;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3076# byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thugs rje 'phel te / / +de bas na dper na gyul ngag tu bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga la gnod par 'gyur ba'i 'thab mo la 'gro ba dag // /

column3: the tshom gcod par mdzad pa 'di // / +'di yis 'dod pa rab 'dul bas // / +mkhan po khyed ni dgyes par mdzod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914748#914760#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3075;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3076;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3077# de bas na dper na gyul ngag tu bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga la gnod par 'gyur ba'i 'thab mo la 'gro ba dag // / +jo bo dang rgyal po la sogs pa'i dbang gis mi 'dod  bzhin du 'gro ba de dang 'dra bar skye bo 'di dag gnod pa byed pa yang / /

column3: 'di ni 'jig rten nyi ma ste // / +'di ni 'jig rten sgrol ma yin // / +'di  yis nyon mongs rab spong ba'i // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914759#914778#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3076;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3077;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3078;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3079# jo bo dang rgyal po la sogs pa'i dbang gis mi 'dod  bzhin du 'gro ba de dang 'dra bar skye bo 'di dag gnod pa byed pa yang / / +'dod chags dang  gti mug dang  zhe sdang gi dbang du gyur pas mi 'dod bzhin du nyes pa byed pa yin no zhes thugs su chud nas de dag la thugs rje'i gnas su dgongs kyi / /

column3: thub pas chos ni bstan par mdzad // / +'di ni 'jig rten mchog gyur te // /
'jig rten snang ba 'di yin no // / +sems can grol mdzad 'di yin te // / +sems can gso bar mdzad pa 'di // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914779#914790#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3079;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3080;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3081# 'di yan chad du byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa rgya cher bstan to // /

column3: 'di yis las rab gsal mdzad nas // / +sdug bsngal  kun las grol bar mdzad // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914789#914801#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3081;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3082;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3083# da ni tshigs bcad gcig gis sgrub pa'i don mdor bsdus nas kyang ston / /

column3: 'di yi rigs ni mchog yin te // / +'di ni nyi ma'i rigs su 'khrungs // / +mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914802#914814#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3083;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3084;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3085# che ba'i bdag nyid ni zil gyis gnon pa'i che ba dang  mya ngan las 'das pa dang  yon tan 'phel ba che ba dang  yongs su mi gtong ba che ba'o // /

column3: 'di yi mtshan rnams phun sum tshogs // / +'di dang mnyam pa gzhan med cing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914813#914822#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3084;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3085;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3086;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3087# srid rgyud mtha' dag zil gnon 'gro ba dang / / +zhes bya bas zil gyis gnon pa'i che ba bstan te / /

column3: bla ma dag kyang yod ma yin // / +'di yis ye shes     // / +skyes pa'i phyir // / +ji ltar rgya mtsho bzhi mi gyo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914823#914832#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3086;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3087;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3088# srid pa ni khams gsum la bya'o //// / +rgyud kyi sgras ni 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba la bya ste / /

column3: gzi brjid drag cing mthu che ba // / +dge slong chen po 'di lta bu // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914833#914840#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3088# byang chub sems dpas gnas che ba dang  rtsom pa che ba dang  'bras bu che ba'i sgrub pa dang  gnas pa dang  khams gsum dang 'gro ba'i sems lnga'i rgyud can thams cad zil gyis gnon na mi gnas  pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'di ni 'jig rten thugs brtse can // / +'di ni 'jig rten sman pa yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914841#914848#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3088# byang chub sems dpas gnas che ba dang  rtsom pa che ba dang  'bras bu che ba'i sgrub pa dang  gnas pa dang  khams gsum dang 'gro ba'i sems lnga'i rgyud can thams cad zil gyis gnon na mi gnas  pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'di yis rgol bar ba 'joms shing // / +mu stegs can rnams chos ldan  byed ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914849#914857#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3088;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3089# byang chub sems dpas gnas che ba dang  rtsom pa che ba dang  'bras bu che ba'i sgrub pa dang  gnas pa dang  khams gsum dang 'gro ba'i sems lnga'i rgyud can thams cad zil gyis gnon na mi gnas  pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'di ni 'jig rten bla med de // / +'di ni rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog / / +'di ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren te // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914856#914868#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3089;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3090;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3091# ci'i phyir sems can rnams ni khams gsum na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas gsol / /

column3: sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho yi // / +chu bo 'jigs chen las sgrol 'di // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914866#914877#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3091;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3092;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3093# chos thams cad stong par thugs su chud pas khams  gsum gyi nyis bas mi gos pa'i phyir / /

column3: ston pa pha rol phyin cing rgal // / +'di ni pha rol skam sar gnas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914876#914888#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3092;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3093;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3094;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3095;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3096# khams gsum zil gyis gnon to zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915110#915110#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3127;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3128# srid rgyu mtha' dag zil gnon 'gro ba dang / / +sgrub pa 'di ni zhi ba'i mchog tu 'gro // /

column3: khyed ni nyer song dri byas  na ; / / +dogs pa de yis sel bar 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914887#914896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3094;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3095;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3096# zhes BYA BA LA / / +mya ngan las 'das ba'i che ba bstan te / /

column3: rkang gnyis mchog gyur mthong nas ni // / +rgya shug gzi brjid ldan gyur nas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914893#914906#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3096;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3097# sgrub pa 'di zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas che ba dang  rtsom pa che ba dang  'bras bu che ba'i  sgrub pa la bya bar snyegs te / /

column3: thal mo rab tu sbyar byas nas // / +de la 'di skad tshig gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914905#914914#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3097;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3098# sgrub ba de la gnas na ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bas na zhi ba'i mchog tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2751781#2751781#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7188# longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' dang  'tsho ba'i bgo bsha' rkyen du 'bab pa dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang  de dag mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba'i gnas dag tu yang bsko bar byed la / /

column3: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po yi // / +nang na gnas pa bdag la ni // / +thugs brtse bskyed pa  mdzad nas ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914915#914925#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3098;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3099;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3100;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3101# yon tan rnam pa mang po 'phel byed cing // / +zhes bya bas yon tan 'phel ba'i che ba bstan te / /

column3: mi mchog bdag cag rgal bar mdzod // / +de nas ston pa thugs brtse ba // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914924#914933#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3099;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3100;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3101;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3102# zhes bya bas yon tan 'phel ba'i che ba bstan te / / +sgrub pa de la gnas na stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa  dang ; /

column3: thub pa 'jig rten kun phan mdzad // / +rkang gnyis gtso bo sems can mchog / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914932#914941#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3101;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3102;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3103;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3104# ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i yon tan thos pas yon tan mang po 'phel bar byed pas zhes bya'o // /

column3: rgya shug la ni bka' stsal pa // / +ji ltar sems ni kun nyon mongs // / +de bzhin sems ni rnam par byang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914942#914952#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3103;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3104;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3105# ces bya ba la / / +sems can yongs su mi btang ba'i che ba bstan te / /

column3: mdud pa thams cad grol byed pa'i // / +chos ni rgya shug khyod nyon cig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914953#914963#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3105;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3106;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3107# sgrub pa de la gnas na snying rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams  snying rje'i sems kyis 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du yang sems can yongs su mi gtong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.017#TD4026E.TXT.r#280673#280677#TD4026E.TXT.r_992;TD4026E.TXT.r_993;TD4026E.TXT.r_994;TD4026E.TXT.r_995# srid pa gsum dang 'gro ba lnga po thams cad zil gyis  mnan nas 'gro ba'i phyir te / / +ji skad du / / +shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las / /
column6: 0.018#TD4029E.TXT.r#2126613#2126616#TD4029E.TXT.r_843;TD4029E.TXT.r_844;TD4029E.TXT.r_845# nyon mongs pa nyid len pa yin pas na len pa nyon mongs pa'o // / +ji skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las / / +rab 'byor gal te  gzugs dngos por 'gyur gyi dngos po med pa ma yin na / /

column3: 'di na bdag la bdag med de // / +phyin ci log gis kun du brtags // / +bdag gam sems can med pa ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914961#914972#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3105;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3106;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3107;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3108# sgrub pa de la gnas na snying rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams  snying rje'i sems kyis 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du yang sems can yongs su mi gtong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ji skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las / /

column3: chos 'di dag ni rgyu dang bcas // / +srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang / / +phung po dang ni skye mched khams // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914970#914986#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3107;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3108;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3109# rab 'byor ci ste gzugs dngos por 'gyur zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin na ni / / +theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du  bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bas don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te / /
column5: 2.384#TD4026E.TXT.r#280689#280690#TD4026E.TXT.r_996# dngos po med pa ma yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi     // /
column6: 0.019#TD4029E.TXT.r#2126724#2126725#TD4029E.TXT.r_858# rgyu 'di nyid kyis lha dang  mi dang  lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas  nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.020#TD4029E.TXT.r#2126628#2126628#TD4029E.TXT.r_846# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis lha dang  mi dang  lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'di skad du bshad pa yin te / /

column3: thams cad rab tu bsam byas na // / +gang zag rab tu mi dmigs so // / +nang stong nyid du mthong gyur cing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914986#914995#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3108;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3109# theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du  bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bas don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te / / +gal te gzugs la sogs pa'i chos 'di dag ji ltar byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis brjod cing dbang pos bzung ba de bzhin du yang dag par grub par 'gyur na ni 'di dag yod pa yin    gya med pa ma yin par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2126639#2126640#TD4029E.TXT.r_847# gal te gzugs  la sogs pa'i chos 'di dag ji ltar byis pa rnams kyis mngon par brjod cing 'dzin pa de kho na ltar 'di dag yongs su grub pa nyid du gyur cing dngos por gyur gyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: phyi stong nyid du mthong gyur na // / +de yis cung zad kyang mi rnyed // / +sgom pa po yang stong pa ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914992#915003#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3109;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3110# gal te gzugs la sogs pa'i chos 'di dag ji ltar byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis brjod cing dbang pos bzung ba de bzhin du yang dag par grub par 'gyur na ni 'di dag yod pa yin    gya med pa ma yin par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'jig rten thams cad nyer 'tsho ba // / +stong pa nyid du blta bar gyis // / +mya ngan 'das  pa gnas par skyabs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915002#915013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3109;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3110# gal te gzugs la sogs pa'i chos 'di dag ji ltar byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis brjod cing dbang pos bzung ba de bzhin du yang dag par grub par 'gyur na ni 'di dag yod pa yin    gya med pa ma yin par 'gyur ro // / +de ltar na ni theg ba chen po rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'dis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing khams gsum las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di yi lam ni nyer bstan bya // / +rgya shug sems can bsam byas te // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915012#915022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3110;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3111;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3112# de ltar na ni theg ba chen po rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'dis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing khams gsum las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // /

column3: stan de nyid la gnas bzhin du // / +'dod khams yongs su dag gyur pa'i // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915020#915030#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3110;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3111;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3112;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3113;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3114# de ltar na ni theg ba chen po rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'dis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing khams gsum las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // / +ci'i phyir zhe na / / +byis ba dang mkhas pa gnyis la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob // / +bden pa mthong bar gyur pa ni // / +rgya shug yid rab dga' ba yis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915029#915038#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3112;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3113;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3114# byis ba dang mkhas pa gnyis la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // / +gnyi  gas kyang de kho na mthong ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: thal mo rab tu sbyar byas nas // / +'di skad ces bya'i tshig gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2126694#2126698#TD4029E.TXT.r_853;TD4029E.TXT.r_854;TD4029E.TXT.r_855;TD4029E.TXT.r_856# de ltar mthong de gal te yin // / +thams cad de nyid mthong bar 'gyur // / +zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915039#915048#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3114;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3115;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3116;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3117# de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ji ltar byis pa rnams brtags bzhin du dngos po yod par 'gyur ba dang  ji ltar mthong bzhin yod na ni // /

column3: gang tshe ma las bdag skyes nas // / +bdag gis lo brgya nyi shu lon // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915047#915058#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3115;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3116;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3117;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3118# thams cad de nyid mthong bar 'gyur // / +zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +gang gi phyir gzugs la  sogs pa'i chos 'di dag byis pa kun du brtags pa'i bdag nyid du rang bzhin yod pa ma yin te / /

column3: bram ze blon po rnams las bdag / / +kun gyis pha rol phyin par gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915059#915078#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3117;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3118;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3119;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3120;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3121# gang gi phyir gzugs la  sogs pa'i chos 'di dag byis pa kun du brtags pa'i bdag nyid du rang bzhin yod pa ma yin te / / +de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar tshul bzhin du zhugs na / /

column3: lo 'di rnams su khyad par 'phags // / +bdag gis cung zad kyang  ma rtogs // / +chos can legs par bshad pa yis // /
bdag gis grol ba'i go 'phang thob // / +bdag gis mthong ba dri med cing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915079#915095#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3121;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3122;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3123;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3124;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3125# ye  shes des lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas khams gsum las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2869099#2869100#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_127;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_128# 'khor ba'i mthar yang ma zad pa'i mtshan nyid  sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +thabs dang ldan pa'i las kyi skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// /

column3: bdag gis blo mig yongs dag gyur // / +grol ba spyi bos bkur bya zhes // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912359#912364#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2754;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2755# bskyed pa lhag par bya ba'i skabs rdzogs so //// /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#978176#978180#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11252;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11253;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11254# chos bshad pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +bshad pa'i skabs kyi rjes la / /
column6: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943875#943875#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6922;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6923;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6924# chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs las zhes bya ba la / / +mos pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel pa ci yod ce na / /
column7: 0.016#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2905841#2905842#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5314;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5315# rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa  lnga ste zhes bya ba la / / +yang dag pa'i spong ba'i skabs kyi rjes la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i skabs bshad pa 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column8: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951518#951518#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7863# de kho na tshol ba'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na la sgyu ma lta bur yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column9: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951600#951600#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7874# de'i phyir de kho na nyid tshol ba'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na nyid la sgyu ma lta bur yongs su tshol ba'i skabs bshad par  'brel to // /
column10: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918191#918192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3523;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3524# de kho na'i skabs bshad pa  rdzogs so //// / +de kho na'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / /
column11: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925977#925978#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4528;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4529# yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / /
column12: 0.019#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2869113#2869113#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_130;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_131# thabs dang ldan pa'i las kyi skabs bshad pa'i rjes la / / +pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs bshad pa'i 'brel ba    ci yod ce na / /
column13: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920424#920425#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3823;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3824;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3825# mthu'i skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +mthu'i skabs bshad pa'i  rjes la / /
column14: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#951061#951063#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7799# mdo las sems mnyam par gzhag pa thob na de kho na nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung bas yid la byed pa'i skabs kyi rjes la de kho na'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column15: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#907021#907021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2110# sems bskyed pa la sogs pa la yang rigs yod na 'dod pa 'byung ste gang la rigs yod pa de  gdon mi za bar bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bar 'gyur bas na rigs kyi skabs kyi rjes la sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column16: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920491#920491#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3836# de'i phyir yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad pas ni mthu'i rjes la yongs su smin pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column17: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906910#906910#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2097;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2098;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2099# rigs kyi skabs bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +rigs kyi skabs kyi rjes la / / +sems bskyed pa'i skabs bshad par cis 'brel zhe na / /
column18: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2151112#2151112#TD4029E.TXT.r_3984;TD4029E.TXT.r_3985# de bzhin du brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyang sbyar bar bya'o // / +pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs rdzogs so //// /
column19: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936026#936026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5945# chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag ba la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi'o zhes bya ba la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs kyi rjes la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel ba ci yod ce na / /
column20: 0.027#TD4029E.TXT.r#2144892#2144892#TD4029E.TXT.r_3136;TD4029E.TXT.r_3137# brtson 'grus rgya chen po'i tshul gyis so // / +sgrub pa'i  skabs rdzogs so //// /

column5: 0.009#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2911655#2911656#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6119;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6120# de bas na zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi 'og  tu thabs la mkhas pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i thabs kyang rnam pa lnga'o // /
