column3: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa / / +len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916762#916769#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3342;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3343;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3344;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3345;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3346# 'on kyang dge ba'i las rnams byed pa dag / / +skye ba zad pas zhi ba thob par bshad // /

column3: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba / / +skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga ba dang  na ba dang  'chi ba dang  mya ngan dang  smre sngags 'don pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba dang  'khrug pa rnams yang dag par 'byung zhing  sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916770#916777#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3345;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3346# skye ba ni 'khor ba la bya ste / / +'khor ba ni mi rtag pa la rtag pa la sogs par tshul bzhin ma yin    pa'i yid la byas pa'i phyin ci log las byung ba yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916778#916794#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3346;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3347;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3348# 'khor ba ni mi rtag pa la rtag pa la sogs par tshul bzhin ma yin    pa'i yid la byas pa'i phyin ci log las byung ba yin no // / +mya ngan las 'das ba ni mi rtag pa dang  sdug bsngal la sogs pa tshul bzhin yid la byas bas phyin ci log spangs pa las thob pa yin te / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir lus las srog de nyid dang gzhan du lung ma bstan zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916795#916802#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3347;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3348# mya ngan las 'das ba ni mi rtag pa dang  sdug bsngal la sogs pa tshul bzhin yid la byas bas phyin ci log spangs pa las thob pa yin te / / +bdag dang chos zhes bya ba mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba med kyang mi rtag pa  la sogs pa tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brten nas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi lam bsgom pa'i dge ba byed pa rnams kyis phyin ci log gi mtshan nyid kyi skye ba zad par byas pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bshad de / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916803#916813#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3348# bdag dang chos zhes bya ba mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba med kyang mi rtag pa  la sogs pa tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brten nas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi lam bsgom pa'i dge ba byed pa rnams kyis phyin ci log gi mtshan nyid kyi skye ba zad par byas pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bshad de / /

column3: de'i tshe kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig ces bya ba nas kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916814#916827#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3348;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3349;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3350# bdag dang chos zhes bya ba mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba med kyang mi rtag pa  la sogs pa tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brten nas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi lam bsgom pa'i dge ba byed pa rnams kyis phyin ci log gi mtshan nyid kyi skye ba zad par byas pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bshad de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916828#916839#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3349;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3350;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3351# de las ma gtogs par mya ngan las 'das pa  logs shig na med do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +tshigs su bcad pa 'dis theg pa chen po dang theg pa chung du gnyi ga'i thun mong gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bstan to // /

column3: goo ta ma ci lus de nyid srog yin nam / / +be 'u lus de  nyid srog yin no zhes nga lung mi ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916840#916850#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3350;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3351;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3352# tshigs su bcad pa 'dis theg pa chen po dang theg pa chung du gnyi ga'i thun mong gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bstan to // / +da 'di man chad ni thun mong ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar thob par bya ba'i thabs  bstan to // /

column3: goo ta ma ci lus las gzhan zhig srog yin / / +be'u lus las srog gzhan yin no zhes kyang lung mi ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916848#916860#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3351;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3352# da 'di man chad ni thun mong ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar thob par bya ba'i thabs  bstan to // / +phyin ci log las smad pa byas nas de'i gnyen po don dam pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi'o zhes bya ba la don dam pa rnam pa gnyis las 'di yan chad du de kho na nyid kyi don dam pa bstan nas / /
column5: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#281082#281082#TD4026E.TXT.r_1063# phyin ci log smad pa byas nas de'i gnyen po don dam pa'i ye shes la 'jug par tshigs su bcad pa bzhi ste / /

column3: goo ta ma lus de nyid srog yin nam zhes dris ba na lung bstan par bya ba ma yin no zhes smra zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916859#916868#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3352;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3353# phyin ci log las smad pa byas nas de'i gnyen po don dam pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi'o zhes bya ba la don dam pa rnam pa gnyis las 'di yan chad du de kho na nyid kyi don dam pa bstan nas / /

column3: ci lus las gzhan zhig srog yin zhes dris  pa na yang lung bstan par bya ba ma yin no zhes smra ste / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos 'das pa'i dus na dus las 'das pa dag gnas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916867#916883#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3352;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3353;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3354# phyin ci log las smad pa byas nas de'i gnyen po don dam pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi'o zhes bya ba la don dam pa rnam pa gnyis las 'di yan chad du de kho na nyid kyi don dam pa bstan nas / /

column3: gzhan che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes skye ba lung ston pa ni ngo mtshar ba ma yin no // / +be'u de de bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916884#916891#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3354# gong du sems can 'khrul pa la gnas pa dang  sdug bsngal bas nyon mongs par gyur kyang phyin ci log gis non bas 'khrul pa dang  sdug bsngal bar khong du ma chud kyang zhes phyin ci log la smad nas da de'i gnyen por thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam par mi rtog  pa'i ye shes kyi dbang du byas te / /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i  nyan thos dus las 'das pa dag gnas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so gnas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes skye ba lung bstan pa ni ngo mtshar ba ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916892#916913#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3354;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3355# gong du sems can 'khrul pa la gnas pa dang  sdug bsngal bas nyon mongs par gyur kyang phyin ci log gis non bas 'khrul pa dang  sdug bsngal bar khong du ma chud kyang zhes phyin ci log la smad nas da de'i gnyen por thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam par mi rtog  pa'i ye shes kyi dbang du byas te / /

column3: goo ta ma gang gi tshe lus 'di yongs su btang bar gyur cing yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyi sems can gzhan du skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe lus dang srog gzhan du gyur  to ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916913#916924#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3355;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3356# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes des byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar chos la bdag med par rtogs nas sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 5.960#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911023#911024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2593# dpe'i sgo nas yon tan che bar yang brjod nas byang chub kyi sems dam pa de ma bskyed na skyon yod pa dang bden pa bzhi ma thob par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.011#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#939992#939992#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6448# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981059#981059#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11617# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#928753#928753#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4916# da ni gnas yongs su gyur pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa drug rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2891612#2891612#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3382;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3383# de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje'i rgyus sems can thams cad  la sdug par byed pa sdug pa gzhan dang khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir // / +tshigs su bcad pa gsum rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905063#905063#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1910# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod na rigs gsum la yod pa de la  'khor ba na so so'i skye bo phal pa byed kyang yon tan rnam pa bzhi 'thob par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#975450#975451#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10944# de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa dang ldem po dag la phyi nang du yod bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis rtsom  mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889222#2889223#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3020# byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje la phye na du yod pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i dmigs pa bya ba'i yul gang yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa  gnyis rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2891481#2891483#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3364;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3365# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma chags mi gnas par bstan pa'i phyir / / +tshigs su bcad pa gcig rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2931208#2931208#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8768# de ngo mtshar du bya ba ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914118#914118#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2998# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // / +'dod pa'i skye ba'i 'jigs pa chen po yin // /
column19: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981019#981019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11612# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhin rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905352#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +gser gyi rigs bzhin shes par bya // /
column22: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column25: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981740#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column27: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1146422#1146422#TD4047E.TXT.r_3675;TD4047E.TXT.r_3676# mthu 'di sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mnyam par bstan pa'i phyir / / +'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'am / /

column3: be'u skye ba yang nye bar len pa dang bcas par nga smra'i / / +nye bar len pa med par ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916925#916932#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3356;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3357# 'di man chad tshigs su bcad pa lnga zhig 'byung  ba la tshigs su bcad pa bzhis ni tshogs kyi lam dang  sbyor ba'i lam dang  mthong ba'i lam dang  bsgom pa'i lam ston to // /

column3: goo ta ma ji lta ji ltar na skye pa nye bar len pa dang bcas par smra'i / / +nye bar len pa med par ma yin pa smra zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4020E.TXT.r#2521718#2521721#TD4020E.TXT.r_377;TD4020E.TXT.r_378# byang chub sems dpas  bsod nams ye shes kyi // / +mtha' yas pha rol tshogs rnams legs bsags nas // /
column5: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#281092#281096#TD4026E.TXT.r_1064;TD4026E.TXT.r_1065# byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams ye  shes kyi ; / / +mtha' yas pha rol tshogs rnams legs bsags nas // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916933#916944#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3356;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3357;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3358;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3359# 'di man chad tshigs su bcad pa lnga zhig 'byung  ba la tshigs su bcad pa bzhis ni tshogs kyi lam dang  sbyor ba'i lam dang  mthong ba'i lam dang  bsgom pa'i lam ston to // / +tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas ni mthar thug pa'i lam ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4048E.TXT.r#1692244#1692246#TD4048E.TXT.r_1184;TD4048E.TXT.r_1185# byang chub sems dpas bsod nams ye shes kyi // / +tshogs rnams mtha' yas pha rol med bsags te // /

column3: be'u dper na me ni nye bar len pa dang bcas na 'bar gyis nye bar len pa med pa ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916943#916952#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3358;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3359;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3360;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3361# byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams ye shes kyi // / +mtha' yas pha rol tshogs     // /

column3: goo ta ma me ni nye bar len pa med par yang 'bar ba mthong ngo // / +be'u ji ltar na nye bar len pa med par yang me 'bar / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916951#916962#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3360;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3361# rnams bsags nas su // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa dang po gcig gis bsdus pa'i don ni tshogs chen po bsags pa dang  ting nge 'dzin la brtan te chos la nges ba na sems 'thob pa dang  yid kyi rtog pa las chos rnams snang pa khong du chud  pa de ston to // /

column3: goo ta ma dper na me'i phung po chen po 'ba' zhig kun du 'bar la kun du rab tu 'bar ba 'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916963#916980#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3361;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3362;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3363# zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa dang po gcig gis bsdus pa'i don ni tshogs chen po bsags pa dang  ting nge 'dzin la brtan te chos la nges ba na sems 'thob pa dang  yid kyi rtog pa las chos rnams snang pa khong du chud  pa de ston to // /

column3: 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa de las rlung gi me lce thag ring por  'phangs pa de'i tshe nye bar len pa med par 'bar zhing me lce 'bar ba nye bar len pa med par khyab cing 'bar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916980#916993#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3362;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3363;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3364# de la byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs dang  ye shes kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa ste / / +bskal pa grangs med pa gcig gi bar du bsags nas mthong ba'i lam dang  sa dang po thob pa nas pha rol du son pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: be'u de yang nye bar len pa dang bcas par nga smra'i / / +nye bar len pa med bar ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916992#917001#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3363;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3364;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3365;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3366# bskal pa grangs med pa gcig gi bar du bsags nas mthong ba'i lam dang  sa dang po thob pa nas pha rol du son pa zhes bya ste / / +pha rol gyi sgra ni sa dang po thob pa la bya'o // /

column3: goo ta ma de'i nye bar len pa gang zhig yin par gdags / / +be'u de'i tshe nye bar len pa    rlung yin par gdags te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917002#917015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3365;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3366# 'dis ni tshogs chen po bsags pa bstan te / / +bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la rgyal mtshan dang gdugs la sogs pas bsnyen bkur byas pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang  bsam pa dang bsgom pa byas  pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs so // /

column3: rlung ni nye bar len pas me 'bar zhing rlung gi nye bar len pas me lce khyab par gyur to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917016#917031#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3366;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3367;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3368# bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la rgyal mtshan dang gdugs la sogs pas bsnyen bkur byas pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang  bsam pa dang bsgom pa byas  pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs so // /

column3: goo ta ma gang gi tshe lus 'di yongs su btang bar gyur cing yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus sems can gzhan du skye bar gyur pa de'i tshe nye bar len pa'i nye bar len ba ci zhig yin par  nye bar gdags / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917024#917036#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3366;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3367;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3368;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3369# bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la rgyal mtshan dang gdugs la sogs pas bsnyen bkur byas pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang  bsam pa dang bsgom pa byas  pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs so // / +yang na bskal pa grangs med pa gcig tu sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims dang  bzod pa bsgrubs pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917037#917050#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3368;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3369;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3370;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3371# bsam gtan dang shes rab bsgoms pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs so // / +brtson 'grus ni gnyis ka'i tshogs so // /
column6: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908554#908557#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2308;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2309# sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod  pa gsum ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so // / +bsam gtan dang shes rab gnyis ni ye shes kyi tshogs la brtson 'grus gnyis ka'i tshogs te de gnyis kyang bsgrubs zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: be'u de'i tshe sred pa nye bar len pa yin no zhes nga smra ste / / +srid pa'i nye bar len pas sems can gnas zhing sred pa'i nye bar len pas sems can zhes brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917046#917063#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3370;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3371;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3372;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3373;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3374# yang na sbyin pa  nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bsgrubs pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so // /
column5: 0.029#TD4050E.TXT.r#1112317#1112317#TD4050E.TXT.r_2088;TD4050E.TXT.r_2089# de la sbyin pa la sogs pa la pha rol tu phyin pa gsum ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so // / +shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs so // /

column3: goo ta ma len pa la dga' ba dang  len pas 'bags pa dang  len pa las kun du 'byung ba  dang nye bar len pa don du gnyer ba'i skye dgu las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917062#917084#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3374;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3375# ji ltar bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa de mi rtag pa dang   sdug bsngal ba dang stong ba dang bdag med par bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi chos rnams la mi rtag pa dang  stong pa dang  bdag med par bsam ste / /

column3: goo ta ma bdag cag la bya ba dang bgyi ba mang du mchis kyis mchi'o // / +be'u de'i dus la bab bar shes na song  shig ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917085#917099#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3375;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3376;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3377# gtan la phab nas mi rtag pa dang  stong pa la sogs pa'i don la the tshom med par gyur pa ni  chos la sems pa shin tu nges pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: de nas kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917100#917109#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3376;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3377;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3378# 'dis ni ting nge 'dzin la brten nas chos la nges par sems pa thob pa bstan te / / +'di yan chad tshigs bcad rkang pa gsum gyis tshogs kyi lam bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917110#917117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3377;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3378;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3379;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3380# 'di yan chad tshigs bcad rkang pa gsum gyis tshogs kyi lam bshad do // / +rtogs pa'i rgyu can don gyi rnam par rtog / /

column3: kun dga' bo kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs la bdag yod ces lung bstan na zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917118#917129#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3379;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3380;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3381;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3382# CES BYA BA LA / / +phyi'i dngos po'i    gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dang  snam bu la sogs pa ni don gyi rnam pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: gleng gzhi ni  rgyal po'i khab na'o // / +de nas kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs bcom ldan 'das gang na bder nye bar song ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917128#917143#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3380;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3381;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3382;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3383;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3384# phyi'i dngos po'i    gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dang  snam bu la sogs pa ni don gyi rnam pa zhes bya ste / / +bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags / /

column3: nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' ba dang yang dag par bde bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te zhes bya ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917142#917155#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3383;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3384;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3385# de'i rjes la bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba yin  te ; / +sems las ma gtogs par logs shig na yod pa ma yin no zhes rtogs pa ni rtogs pa'i rgyu can don gyi rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das la  'di skad ces gsol to // / +goo ta ma ci bdag yod dam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917156#917163#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3384;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3385;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3386# sems las ma gtogs par logs shig na yod pa ma yin no zhes rtogs pa ni rtogs pa'i rgyu can don gyi rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ste / / +'dis yid kyi rtog pa las don du snang bar khong du chud pa de ston to // /

column3: de skad ces gsol ba dang  bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung par bzhugs so // / +goo ta ma ci bdag med dam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917164#917174#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3385;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3386;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3387# 'dis yid kyi rtog pa las don du snang bar khong du chud pa de ston to // / +de ltar rtogs pa yang mos pas spyod pa'i sa drod kyi dus snang pa thob pa'i  ting nge 'dzin gyi dus na rtog pa ston to // /

column3: de skad ces gsol pa dang / / +bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so // / +kun du rgyu be'u'i  rigs kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917175#917191#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3386;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3387;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3388;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3389;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3390# de ltar rtogs pa yang mos pas spyod pa'i sa drod kyi dus snang pa thob pa'i  ting nge 'dzin gyi dus na rtog pa ston to // / +rtog pa tsam du don rnams des rig nas // /

column3: goo ta ma ci bdag yod dam / / +de skad ces gsol pa dang  bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917192#917201#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3389;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3390;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3391;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3392# zhes bya ba'i rkang pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i don ni / / +don rnams sems las snang ba mthong ba dang / /

column3: goo ta ma ci bdag med dam / / +de skad ces gsol pa dang  bcom ldan 'das     // / +cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917202#917211#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3391;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3392;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3393# de nas sems tsam la gnas pa de ston to // / +don  rnams zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa gzung ba'i chos rnams la bya ste / /

column3: de nas kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs 'di snyam du sems te / / +dge sbyong goo ta ma la lan gnyis lan gsum du dris kyang lung ma bstan to zhes rig nas stan las langs te song ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917212#917222#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3393;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3394# gzung ba'i chos rnams sems las ji ltar byung zhing skye ba mngon sum du gyur pa ni rtog pa tsam du don rnams des rig byas te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917223#917238#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3393;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3394;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3395;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3396# gzung ba'i chos rnams sems las ji ltar byung zhing skye ba mngon sum du gyur pa ni rtog pa tsam du don rnams des rig byas te / / +tshig des don rnams la snang ba mthong bar bstan to // /

column3: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'  bo rlung yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab na bcom ldan 'das la rlung yab gyob cing 'dug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917238#917247#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3395;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3396;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3397# 'di ni nges  par 'byed pa'i phyogs spyi bo'i dus de snang ba mched pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // / +de snang ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa la snang ba'i gzung ba'i chos rnams la bya ste / /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529940#529940#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10517;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10518# yang na dri ma med pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya ste / / +shin tu rnam par dag pa'i zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung     // /

column3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs song nas ring zhig lon par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917245#917264#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3396;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3397;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3398;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3399# de snang ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa la snang ba'i gzung ba'i chos rnams la bya ste / / +gzung ba'i cha spangs nas gzung ba dang bral ba'i sems tsam gyi chos la gnas pa ni sems tsam la rab tu gnas par  bya ste ; /

column3: kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs  kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du dris kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir lung ma bstan / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917265#917275#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3398;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3399;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3400# 'dis ni sems tsam la gnas pa bstan to // / +'dis ni nges par 'byed pa'i phyogs bzod pa'i dus te de kho na'i phyogs gcig la zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // /

column3: kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs la sdig pa can gyi lta ba mang du rnyed par 'gyur bas nga la lan gsum gyi bar du dris kyang lung ma bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917276#917294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3399;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3400;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3401;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3402;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3403# 'dis ni nges par 'byed pa'i phyogs bzod pa'i dus te de kho na'i phyogs gcig la zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // / +'di yan chad sbyor ba'i lam bstan to // / +chos kyi dbyings kyang shin tu mngon sum du gyur ces bya ba  la ; /

column3: kun dga' bo kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs kyis dris pa la bdag  yong ngo zhes lung bstan na chos thams cad bdag med do zhes bya ba'i tshig mi rigs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917294#917305#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3402;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3403;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3404;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3405;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3406# de nas nges par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cha'i 'og tu sa dang po mthong ba'i lam bskyed nas / / +mthong ba'i lam rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917306#917313#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3404;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3405;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3406;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3407# de nas gnyis kyi mtshan dang rnam par bral // / +zhes bya ba la / / +mthong     // / +ba'i lam la chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du gyur pa dang  de nas gzung ba'i sgrib pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral 'dzin pa'i sgrib pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917419#917422#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3422;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3423# 'jig rten gyi chos mchog gi tshe gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis med par khong du chud nas gzung 'dzin gyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang de ma thag tu mthong ba'i lam bskyed nas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I don to // /
column7: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917760#917761#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3466# de yan chad chos kyi  dbyings mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang  drod dang rtse mo dang  bzod pa skyes pa'i dus la mthong ba'i lam skyes nas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du BYED DO ZHES BYA BA'I don to // /

column3: kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs kyis dris pa la bdag med do zhes lung bstan na kun du rgyu be'u'i rigs sngar bdag med pa las da ltar bdag dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes sngar yang kun du rmongs pa  la kun du rmongs pa ches mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917312#917329#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3407;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3408;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3409;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3410# ba'i lam la chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du gyur pa dang  de nas gzung ba'i sgrib pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral 'dzin pa'i sgrib pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917330#917348#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3409;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3410;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3411;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3412;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3414# 'dis ni mthong ba'i lam  bstan to // / +da ni tshigs su bcad pa gsum pas mthong ba'i lam na chos kyi dbyings ji ltar mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang thabs bstan to // /
column6: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047900#1047900#TD4054E.TXT.r_8978# gang du de kho na'i mtshan nyid las brtsams nas yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang  spong ba'i mtshan nyid dang  mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang  bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid dang  de kho na'i mtshan nyid la  sogs pa 'di dag gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  gnas dang gnas pa 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su shes pa la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang  rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su ma shes pa la sogs pa dang  yongs su shes pa la sogs  pa la nyes dmigs dang phan yon gyi mtshan nyid kyis don ston pa ste // /

column3: kun dga' bo bdag yod ces bya ba 'di ni rtag par 'gyur ro // /
bdag med ces bya ba 'di ni chad par 'gyur te // / +de bzhin gshegs pas mtha' gnyis po de dag spangs nas dbu ma'i lam gyi chos ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917349#917362#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3413;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3414;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3415# de phyir sems kyang med par shin tu rtogs // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i  tshigs su bcad pa gcig smos so // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +'di  yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917363#917373#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3416;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3417# 'di ltar bzod pa'i dus na gzung ba'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang  'jig rten gyi chos mchog gi tshe gzung ba med na 'dzin ba med do zhes rtogs te / /

column3: 'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba nas / / +rgyas par kun du 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917374#917381#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3417;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3418# bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa 'di dag ni sems las logs shig na yod pa  ma yin no zhes khong du chud do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917382#917389#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3417;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3418# bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa 'di dag ni sems las logs shig na yod pa  ma yin no zhes khong du chud do // / +de ltar phyi'i yul med pas 'di la dmigs pa'i sems kyang med do zhes rtogs te gzung ba med na 'dzin pa yod par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'jig rten rtag pa zhes bya ba la 'jig rten na rtag pa dang  mi rtag pa dang  rtag pa  yang ma yin / / +mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos pa bcu bzhi lung ring po'i mdo dgu pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas lnga pa 'di nyid du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917386#917397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3418;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3419;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3420# de ltar phyi'i yul med pas 'di la dmigs pa'i sems kyang med do zhes rtogs te gzung ba med na 'dzin pa yod par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917398#917411#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3419;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3420;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3421;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3422# blo dang ldan pas gnyis po med rig nas // / +zhes bya ba la / / +blo dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'  zhes bya ste / /
column6: 0.027#TD4072E.TXT.r#2099754#2099755#TD4072E.TXT.r_1071;TD4072E.TXT.r_1072;TD4072E.TXT.r_1073# 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid ni sems te / / +gzung ba med pas 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.028#TD4018E.TXT.r#3058107#3058108#TD4018E.TXT.r_7000;TD4018E.TXT.r_7001# 'dzin pa dang gzung ba'i dngos po yang mi rung ngo zhes pa de thams cad mkhyen pas bsgrub par mdzad pa byed pa po dang  las dang  byed pa'i tha snyad mi rung ba ni don ji bzhin pa'i 'dzin pa dang  gzung ba med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: mgo gcig dang ni rnam phye dang / / +zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas par bris zin to // /
de bzhin du kun du rgyu smra ba    zhes bya ba la / / +bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917421#917436#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3422;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3423;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3424;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3425;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3426;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3427# 'jig rten gyi chos mchog gi tshe gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis med par khong du chud nas gzung 'dzin gyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang de ma thag tu mthong ba'i lam bskyed nas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de nas kun du rgyu smra ba bcom ldan 'das gang na bder nye bar song ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917437#917445#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3425;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3426;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3427# de mi ldan pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas // / +zhes bya ba la / / +de ltar 'jig rten gyi chos mchog gi rjes la mthong ba'i lam skyes nas mthong ba'i mthong ba'i mthong lam na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis dang mi ldan pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas te / /

column3: nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig ces bya ba nas / / +bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad  ces gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917446#917456#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3427;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3428# de ltar 'jig rten gyi chos mchog gi rjes la mthong ba'i lam skyes nas mthong ba'i mthong ba'i mthong lam na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis dang mi ldan pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas te / /

column3: goo ta ma ci 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas sam / / +smras pa 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas so zhes bya ba 'di ni ngas lung mi ston to // /

column5: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917799#917799#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3470;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3471# bzhi pas ni bsgom pa'i lam ni gnas yongs su rjes pas don dam pa'i ye  shes la 'jug par ston TO ZHES BYA BA LA / / +tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pas ni bsgom pa'i lam ste sa gnyis pa nas sa bcu man chad bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ste / /

column3: goo ta ma 'jig rten mtha' dang  bcas pas zhes dris pa na lung mi ston to zhes smra zhing 'jig rten mtha' med pa dang  mtha' dang bcas pa yang yin / /

column3: mtha' med pa yang yin pa dang  mtha' dang bcas pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin pa zhig ces dris pa na lung mi ston to zhes smra na / /

column3: gzhan ci zhig  lung ston / / +smra ba ngas mngon par mkhyen cing mngon par mkhyen na sdug bsngal yang dag par zad cing sdug bsngal mthar bya ba'i phyir nyan thos rnams la lam 'chad par mdzad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917526#917541#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3437;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3438;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3439;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3440;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3441# gzung ba la yang mi rtog / / +'dzin pa la yang mi rtog pas mi rtog pa'i ye shes zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#954313#954316#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8224;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8225# rtog pa yang ma yin mi rtog pa yang ma yin pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes las thob pa'i dag pa'i 'jig rten pa'i ye shes la bya ste / / +ye shes de la gzung ba dang  'dzin pa lta bur rtog ba med pas na mi rtog pa zhes bya ste / /
column6: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908430#908430#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2294;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2295# gang gi tshe gang zag dang chos la bdag med par rtogs nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'gro  ba'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud de gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis spangs nas gzung ba la yang mi rtog / / +'dzin pa la yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyes pas na don dam pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: goo ta ma nyid kyis mngon par mkhyen cing mngon par mkhyen nas sdug bsngal yang dag par zad cing sdug bsngal  mthar bya ba'i phyir nyan thos rnams la lam 'chad par mdzad na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917542#917557#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3440;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3441;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3442;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3443;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3444# de gnas nyes pa bsags pas khrod stug po // / +dug sman chen po lta bur dug sel to // /

column3: ci lam 'dis 'jig rten thams cad nges par 'byin tam / / +'on te 'jig rten phyogs gcig / /

column3: de skad ces gsol pa dang  bcom ldan 'das cad mi gsung bar bzhugs so // / +kun du rgyu smra bas bcom ldan 'das la  lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917567#917574#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3445;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3446# nyes pa ni kun gzhi la yod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang gzung 'dzin gyi bag chags la bya'o // /

column6: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#928921#928921#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4936# dus ring zhes bya ba ni bag chags de dag kyang 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917581#917598#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3446;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3447;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3448;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3449# bsags pa ni 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dus nas bag chags sems la zhen par byas pa'o // / +bag chags de yang  shes par bya ba dka' zhing spang bar bya ba dka' ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917597#917607#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3449# dug sman chen po sman gang thigs pa 'ga' tsam dug gi bum par lhung na dug thams cad sman du 'gyur ba dang  bsnams pa tsam gyis kyang dug sel bar byed pa ste / /

column3: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi rgya ba na rlung yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la gyob  cing 'dug pas smras pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917618#917631#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3450# dper na dug sman chen  po bsnams pa dang  myangs pas dug thams cad med par byed pa de bzhin du bsgom pa'i lam gyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa phra mo la sogs pa dug dang 'dra bar bsal nas gzhan du 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.024#TD4069E.TXT.r#637800#637800#TD4069E.TXT.r_2126# 'jal ba dang nye bar rtogs pa nyid kyis ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes ba ston par byed do // /

column3: smra ba khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la dang por dri ba dris pa de nyid da ltar rnam grangs gzhan gyis dris te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917632#917647#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3450;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3451;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3452# dper na dug sman chen  po bsnams pa dang  myangs pas dug thams cad med par byed pa de bzhin du bsgom pa'i lam gyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa phra mo la sogs pa dug dang 'dra bar bsal nas gzhan du 'gyur te / /

column3: des na bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa lung bstan to // / +smra ba de'i phyir skyes bu mkhas pa rnams la dpes rnam par bshad na don shes par 'gyur ba dang nyon  cig ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917648#917657#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3452# yid kyi rtog pas chos de dag gi don rab tu snang bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems las bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa de dag snang bar zad kyi sems las ma gtogs par logs shig na yod pa ma yin no zhes khong du chung cing yid ches pa'i     // /

column3: smra ba 'di lta ste 'di ni rgyal po'i mtha'i grong khyer rtsig pa dang rab brtan pos yongs su bskor ba sgo gcig pa sgo srung ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa gsal ba blo dang ldan pa der 'ong ba dag dpyod pa'i shes rab dang yang dag par ldan pa rag bzhag par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917658#917669#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3452;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3453;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3454# yid kyi rtog pas chos de dag gi don rab tu snang bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems las bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa de dag snang bar zad kyi sems las ma gtogs par logs shig na yod pa ma yin no zhes khong du chung cing yid ches pa'i     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917670#917683#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3452;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3454;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3453;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3455;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3456# yid kyi rtog pas chos de dag gi don rab tu snang bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems las bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa de dag snang bar zad kyi sems las ma gtogs par logs shig na yod pa ma yin no zhes khong du chung cing yid ches pa'i     // / +'di ni drod kyi dus dang sbyar ro // /
column6: 0.025#TD4050E.TXT.r#1115982#1115983#TD4050E.TXT.r_2601;TD4050E.TXT.r_2602# gang gi phyir  'dod pa 'di dag ni log pa yin no zhes de ltar spyod pa'o // / +shes bya'i pha rol tu gnas pa zhes bya ba ni shes bya'i pha rol tu phyin par byas nas gnas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: des grong khyer de'i mtha' kun du bskor zhing  btsal kyang des grong khyer de la sgo gnyis pa cung zad kyang mi rnyed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917684#917699#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3455;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3456;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3457;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3458# grangs med pa rab dbye'i dus kyis de'i pha rol yongs su rdzogs pas na mtha' yas pas pha rol to zhes bya ba la / / +mtha' yas pa'i sgra ni bskal pa'i grangs rab tu dbye ba'i dus dang sbyar te / /

column3: de nas grong khyer de kun du bskor zhing btsal kyang byi la 'jug pa tsam gyi sgo gnyis pa cung zad kyang mi rnyed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917698#917712#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3457;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3458;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3459;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3460;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3461# bskal pa grangs  med pa gcig gi bar du bsgrubs pas na mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o // / +de'i rjes la sa dang po thob pa na pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: smra ba gzhan yang sgo srung ba'i skyes bu de la shes rab 'di lta bu srog chags 'di tsam zhig ni nga'i grong khyer du  zhugs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917713#917726#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3461;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3462;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3463# gzung ba la sogs pa dngos po gzung ba'i cha rnams sems las 'byung bar mngon sum  du mthong zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'di tsam zhig ni byung ngo zhes mthong ba ni ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sgo srung ba'i skyes bu de la yang dag pa'i shes rab 'di lta bu gang cung zad srog chags rags pa rags pa grong khyer du 'jug pa dang 'byung ba de thams cad ni sgo 'di kho na ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917727#917742#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3463;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3464;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3465# 'di lta bur snang ba'i sems tsam la gnas te zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917743#917752#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3464;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3465;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3466# gzung pa dang 'dzin pa lta bur snang ba las gzung ba'i cha spangs nas 'dzin pa'i cha tsam la gnas pa ste / / +'di ni bzod pa'i dus so // / +de yan chad chos kyi  dbyings mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang  drod dang rtse mo dang  bzod pa skyes pa'i dus la mthong ba'i lam skyes nas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: gzhan ni med do zhes shes pa skye'o // / +smra ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la ci lam 'dis 'jig rten thams cad nges par 'byin par byed dam 'on te 'jig rten phyogs gcig ces 'di ltar thugs la rtog pa mi mnga' mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917753#917762#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3466;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3467# de yan chad chos kyi  dbyings mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang  drod dang rtse mo dang  bzod pa skyes pa'i dus la mthong ba'i lam skyes nas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917763#917773#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3466;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3467;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3468# de yan chad chos kyi  dbyings mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang  drod dang rtse mo dang  bzod pa skyes pa'i dus la mthong ba'i lam skyes nas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +gsum pas ni ji ltar chos kyi dbyings de mngon sum du rig pa ston to zhes bya ba la / /
column6: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917297#917297#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3403# mthong ba'i lam rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu gang cung zad sdug bsngal mthar  byas pa dang  byed pa dang  byed par 'gyur ba de thams cad lam 'dis byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917774#917795#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3468;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3469;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3470# tshigs  su bcad pa gsum pas ni thabs gang dang rgyu gang gis mthong ba'i lam skyes na chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du byed pa'i rgyu ston te / /

column3: gzhan ni med do zhes yang dag pa'i ye shes skye'o // / +de nas kun du rgyu smra ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bshad pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs te stan las langs te song ba'i bar du'o zhes    gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917796#917813#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3470;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3471;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3472# bzhi pas ni bsgom pa'i lam ni gnas yongs su rjes pas don dam pa'i ye  shes la 'jug par ston to zhes bya ba la / /
column5: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917469#917471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3430;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3431# mnyam song mi rtog ye shes rtogs dag gis // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pas bsgom pa'i lam ston te / /

column3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917811#917823#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3471;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3472;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3473# tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pas ni bsgom pa'i lam ste sa gnyis pa nas sa bcu man chad bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ste / / +gnas gzhan du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob PAR 'GYUR RO ZHES BYA  ba'i don to // /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936988#936988#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6070# nam nyon mongs pa'i gnas gzhan du gyur nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su gyur pa dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gzhan du gyur nas so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes su gyur te / /

column3: rgyal po dang yang dag par ldan pa'i tshoms kyi bcu pa sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i mdo las 'byung ba gnas  brten ma 'gags pas sngon gyi mtha' las brtsams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917824#917839#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3472;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3473;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3474# gnas gzhan du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya  ba'i don to // / +rtag par zhes bya ba ni sa gnyis pa nas sa bcu man chad rgyun du sgrib pa spong zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: bshad pa mdzod kyi gnas bzhi pa 'di nyid du 'phen par byed pa gcig yin te zhes bya bar bris zin pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917840#917852#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3474;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3475# gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid de la mnyam du song ste zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang  gzung 'dzin gyi bag chags kyis kun gzhi la khyab par gnas zhes bya    pa'i don to // /

column3: phyi ma'i mtha' las brtsams pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te / / +dge slong dag mi rnams kyi tshe la stong  phrag brgyad cu thub pa na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917849#917864#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3474;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3475# gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid de la mnyam du song ste zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang  gzung 'dzin gyi bag chags kyis kun gzhi la khyab par gnas zhes bya    pa'i don to // /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917863#917879#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3475;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3476;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3477;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# ring du zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni bag chags de dag thams cad kyang 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas bsags bsags pa yang spongs shing bsal dka' zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: bde bar gshegs pa / / +bla na med pa / / +skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa / / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byams  pa zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917880#917888#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3477;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# don dam pa'i ye shes ni rnam  par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te / / +ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom MO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column5: 0.028#TD4000E.TXT.r#2796375#2796375#TD4000E.TXT.r_258;TD4000E.TXT.r_259# ces bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +rnam  par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la dbang thob pas na / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917885#917897#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column5: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905350#905353#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914118#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2998# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943295#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981740#981741#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11700# byang chub sems  dpa' sems can gyi don byed pa na zhe sdang gi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar 'gyur gyi 'dod chags kyi sgo nas byas pa rnams ni nyes pa dang ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2889761#2889762#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3096# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892210#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#924254#924254#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4299# de yang tshul khrims ci 'dra bas sems can ji ltar smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900164#900164#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1362# 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skyabs su song bas 'phags so zhes glengs pa la kun tu 'gro ba'i don rgyas par bshad par bya ba'i  tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925683#925684#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4482# sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongs su smin par byed do zhes rgya cher bstan nas da don de nyid mjug bsdu zhing ji  ltar sems can yongs su smin par byas pa'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#912957#912957#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2836# gong du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bshad pa ji ltar na bdag pas gzhan la gces par byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896432#896433#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_926# de'i phyir mtshan  nyid dang mi 'gal bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la de ltar rgol ba rnams la theg pa chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka'i mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#959053#959054#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8905# mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur yin pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.017#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876434#1876435#TD4039E.TXT.r_7150# de la 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i sgo nas lam sgom par byed  cing mthar gyis srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang  yang srid par skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i sgo nas lam sgom par byed cing mthar gyis de ltar srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di ni thun mong ba'i rnam par grol ba ste /// /
column22: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#911265#911265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2623;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2624# sems  can gyi don gyi phyir dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pas / / +skyo ba'i 'jigs pa med par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo // /
column23: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#900383#900383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1395# khas blangs pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.017#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876419#1876420#TD4039E.TXT.r_7150# de la 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i sgo nas lam sgom par byed  cing mthar gyis srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang  yang srid par skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i sgo nas lam sgom par byed cing mthar gyis de ltar srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di ni thun mong ba'i rnam par grol ba ste /// /
column25: 0.018#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2023688#2023689#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_6614# gzugs na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rigs lnga ci rigs par dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o // /
column26: 0.018#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1464867#1464867#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7589# rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas ji ltar sa gong ma pa'i sa 'og ma'i lam dang mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin zhe na / /
column27: 0.018#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183509#1183510#TD4047E.TXT.r_8949# rig pa'i gnas mngon par rtogs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo nas zhugs pa'i phyir dang  de thob par byed pa'i lam nas zhugs  pa nye bar bzung nas tshol ba pa zhes bya'o // /
column28: 0.018#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1464750#1464751#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7575# re zhig mthong ba'i lam la dbang po'i sgo nas lam mnyam pa'am khyad par can yin pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam dang sa 'og ma'i dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i lam de  nyid mnyam pa yin te gnyi ga yang dbang po rtul po yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column29: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#981019#981019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11612# skrag pa de spang pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bzhin rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column30: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916653#916653#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3328# de bas na bdag dang chos med par yang mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang   'khor bar skye rung bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column31: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#906651#906652#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2073# nyan thos kyi rigs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis rang rang gi 'bras bu thob pa bas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis byang  chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa khyad zhugs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column32: 0.020#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2023387#2023388#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_6587# log par lta pa la sogs pa lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i ris zag pa med pa la dmigs pa ni de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems lam mthong bas  spang bar bya ba la mtshungs par ldan pa kho na'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur gyi rtag tu lam la dmigs pa'i phyir dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin te / /
column33: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925285#925285#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4426# bsam gtan ci 'dra bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column34: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925471#925471#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4454# de yang shes rab ji lta bus sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column35: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1464637#1464637#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7558# chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lam ni dbang po'i sgo nas khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column36: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904477#904477#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1848# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column37: 0.022#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#842064#842064#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12456;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_12457# de bzhin du rgyus rgyas pa'i sgo nas kyang yin te / / +sa 'og ma pa'i bsgom pa dang  mi slob pa'i lam dag ni sa gong ma'i    mthong ba'i lam pas rgyus rgyas par byas pa'i sgo nas khyad par can yin no // /
column38: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column39: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1402794#1402794#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_340# phyogs de gnyis rtogs na kun nas nyon mongs  pa'i phyogs yongs su bor ba dang  rnam par byang ba'i phyogs brten pa'i sgo nas nges par legs par 'thob par 'gyur ro // /
column40: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#896716#896716#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_957# da theg pa chen po mu stegs dang rtog ge pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column41: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897141#897141#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1013# skur pa btab na ngan song du lhung ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba dang  skrag na yang rgyu gang gi sa skrag pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column42: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column43: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1203664#1203664#TD4047E.TXT.r_11680;TD4047E.TXT.r_11681# lam yang tshogs dang bcas pa'i lam smos pas rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa yin no // / +theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu'i sgo nyid nas shes rab kyi dmigs pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir smras pa brjod du med pa'i dngos po dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang shes rab de nyid kyi dmigs  pa dang  rnam pa dang  las kyis bstan pa ni de bzhin nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la / /

column3: bde bar gshegs pa / / +skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba lha 'dang mi rnams kyi ston  pa ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917897#917905#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3480# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +thub pas gsungs pa'i chos legs par gzhag pa zhes bya ba de la / /

column3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga 'jig rten du byung ba bzhin no // / +de lha dang bcas pa dang  bdud dang bcas pa dang  tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang  dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu'i lha dang mi'i 'jig rten 'di las mthong ba'i chos nyid las rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pa phun sum  tshogs pa bdag gi skye ba zad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917906#917923#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3479;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3480;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3481;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3483# thub pas gsungs pa'i chos legs par gzhag pa zhes bya ba de la / / +thub pa ni SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS TE / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917923#917934#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3483;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3484;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3485# sdig pa mi dge ba mi mdzad pas thub par thub pa'o // / +thub pa des gsungs pa ni thub pa des bshad ces bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2874608#2874608#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_954# tshul khrims blangs pa dang  lus dang dag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos mi 'byung bar bsdams pa dang  de ltar bsdams pa dang  dge ba'i chos 'ba' zhig 'phel bas na ldan pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan no // /
column7: 0.023#TD4068E.TXT.r#581967#581967#TD4068E.TXT.r_1452# de la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang  gti mug la sogs pa dang ldan zhing de'i rgyus lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi    sgo nas mi dge ba spyod pa ni mi'i chos so // /
column8: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2935080#2935080#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9250;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9251# de ltar chud mi za ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus     // / +dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas las su byed pa rnams ma nor bar byed par 'gyur te / /
column9: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2948229#2948229#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11115# de la bsgrub pa dang ldan pa ni bsam pa de la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams  lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba la 'god par mdzad do // /
column10: 0.029#TD4017E.TXT.r#2694523#2694523#TD4017E.TXT.r_5364# 'du byed ni lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas dge ba dang mi dge bar 'jug pa'o // /

column3: tshangs par spyod pa bsten to // / +bya ba byas so // / +srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes rab tu mkhyen par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917935#917944#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3484;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3485;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3486;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3487;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3488;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3489# chos ni gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis te chos de dag ni thog mar  yang dge // / +bar du yang dge // /

column6: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#893781#893781#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_631;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_632;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_633# gong du bshad pa ltar na sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid theg pa chen po'i  chos nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang thun mong du ma gyur pa de rang bzhin gyis thog mar yang dge / / +bar du yang dge / / +tha mar yang dge / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +de ltar nga lha dang bcas pa dang  bdud dang bcas pa dang  tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu'i lha dang  mi'i 'jig rten 'di las mthong ba'i chos nyid las rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pa phun sum tshogs pa bdag gi skye ba zad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917945#917955#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3488;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3489;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3490;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3491# don bzang po // / +legs par gzhag pa zhes bya ste / / +chos de dag gi don dam pa la blo gros gzhag par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917956#917974#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3490;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3491;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3492;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3493;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3494# chos de dag gi don dam pa la blo gros gzhag par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro // / +rtsa ba'i chos kyi dbyings la blo gros gzhag / /

column3: tshangs par spyod pa bsten to // / +bya ba byas so // / +srid pa 'di las gzhan me shes so zhes mngon sum du byas shing mkhyen par gyur pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917974#917990#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3493;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3494;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3495;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3496# don dam pa'i  ye shes la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po mdo sde thams cad kyi don gcig tu bsdus nas dmigs par byed pa'i sems ni rtsa ba'i sems zhes bya'o // / +sems de la rtsa ba'i sems zhes bya bar ci mngon zhe na / /

column3: de thog mar     // / +dge ba / / +bar du dge ba / / +tha mar dge ba / / +don bzang po // /
tshig 'bru bzang po // / +ma 'dres pa / / +yongs su rdzogs pa / / +yongs su dag pa / / +tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag par gsal ba 'byed pa'i chos ston to // /

column3: don bzang po // / +tshig 'bru bzang po // / +ma 'dres pa / / +yongs su rdzogs pa / / +yongs su dag pa / / +tshongs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag par gsal bar byed ba'i chos ston pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918020#918028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3501;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3502;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3503# zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis sems  rnam pa drug bshad de / / +drug gang zhe na / / +rtsa ba'i sems dang  rjes su dpyod pa'i sems dang  rnam par dpyod pa'i sems dang  rjes su 'dzin pa'i sems dang  kun du bsdus pa'i sems dang  rjes su ston pa'i sems so zhes bshad do // /

column6: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341304#2341306#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3533# rgya che ba'i sems dang mchog tu gyur pa'i sems dang  rtag par byed pa'i sems dang  phyin ci ma log pa'i sems zhes bshad do // /
column7: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#963306#963306#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9434;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9435# bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin  pa la yang bzod pa la gnas na zhe sdang gi mes sems ma dkrugs pas na sems bde ba'o // / +sems bde na sems kyi rjes su lus 'brang ba'i phyir lus kyang bde bas bdag la phan btags so // /
column8: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#296481#296488#TD4026E.TXT.r_3770;TD4026E.TXT.r_3771# rtsa ba'i sems dang  rjes su dpyod pa'i sems dang  rnam par dpyod pa'i sems dang  nges par 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sdom pa'i sems dang  smon pa'i sems so // /
column9: 0.023#TD4029E.TXT.r#2145070#2145077#TD4029E.TXT.r_3168;TD4029E.TXT.r_3169# sems drug ni rtsa ba'i sems dang  rjes su spyod pa'i  sems dang  rnam par dpyod pa'i sems dang  nges par 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sdom pa'i sems dang  smon pa'i sems so // /
column10: 0.024#TD4019E.TXT.r#2496181#2496182#TD4019E.TXT.r_11640# mnyen pa'i sems dang  yid du 'ong ba'i sems dang  las su rung ba'i sems dang  dri ma med pa'i sems su 'dug pa'o zhes mdo las bshad pa'o // /
column11: 0.024#TD4029E.TXT.r#2127549#2127554#TD4029E.TXT.r_976# de la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis sems drug po rtsa ba'i sems dang rjes su dpyod pa'i sems dang  rnam par dpyod pa'i sems dang  nges par 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sdom pa'i sems dang  re ba'i sems zhes 'chad par  'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#1542899#1542903#TD4061E.TXT.r_4112# de las ji skad gsungs she na de'i phyir shes ldan rgyal ba'i sras dag ma chags pa'i sems dang  zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang  las su rung    ba'i sems dang  rnam par ma rmongs pa'i sems dang  zhi ba'i sems dang  rtsub pa med pa'i sems dang  rgyud gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang  dge ba'i sems dang  bye brag phyed pa'i sems dang  gus pa'i sems dang  mos pa'i sems dang  legs par rnam  par gnas pa'i sems dang  le lo med ba'i sems dang  gzung ba'i sems dang  phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sgrub pa'i sems dang  don la lta ba'i sems dang  skyon yid la mi byed pa'i sems dang  don la rton pa'i sems  dang ; /
column13: 0.029#TD4080E.TXT.r#1115#1115#TD4080E.TXT.r_116# sems can de rnams  kun la mnyam pa'i sems dang  phan pa'i sems dang  gnod sems med pa'i sems dang  byams pa'i sems dang  mi smod pa'i sems dang  pha dang ma'i sems dang  bu dang bu mo'i sems dang  mdza' bshes kyi sems dang   snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi sems su bya ba ste / /

column3: de'i nyan thos rnams la byams pa'i rigs zhes  bya ba'i ming 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +da ltar nga'i nyan thos rnams la sh'akya'i bu zhes brjod pa bzhin no // / +des tshogs stong phrag du ma sdud par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918035#918055#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3503;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3504;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3505;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3506;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3507;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3508# rtsa ba'i sems dang  rjes su dpyod pa'i sems dang  rnam par dpyod pa'i sems dang  rjes su 'dzin pa'i sems dang  kun du bsdus pa'i sems dang  rjes su ston pa'i sems so zhes bshad do // / +de la rtsa ba'i sems gang zhe na / /

column3: de ltar nga'i tshegs brgya phrag du ma bzhin no // / +de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa byams pa 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dus  shing 'dug par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918055#918070#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3508;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3509;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3510# mdo sde 'di'i ming ni lang kar gshegs pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983846#983846#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11986;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11987# mdo sde 'di'i ming sa bcu pa zhes bya / / +'di ni lang kar gshegs pa zhes bya / /

column3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar zhing phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918067#918082#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3509;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3510# mdo sde 'di'i ming ni sa bcu pa zhes bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo sde rnams  kyi ming la dmigs pa ni rtsa ba'i sems zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918083#918092#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3510;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3511;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3512# yang na theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams kyi ming dang  tshig dang yi ge rnams la so sor mi dmigs par theg pa chen po'i chos thams cad kyi don thams cad gcig tu bzlums pa nas de la dmigs par byed pa'i sems la rtsa  ba'i sems zhes bya'o // /

column3: btsun pa bdag mi rnams kyi tshe lo stong phrag brgyad  cu thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byams pa zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar  'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918088#918100#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3510;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3511;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3512# yang na theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams kyi ming dang  tshig dang yi ge rnams la so sor mi dmigs par theg pa chen po'i chos thams cad kyi don thams cad gcig tu bzlums pa nas de la dmigs par byed pa'i sems la rtsa  ba'i sems zhes bya'o // / +blo gros zhes bya ba ni shes rab la bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918101#918108#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3512;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3513# rtsa ba'i sems dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyis chos kyi dbyings la dmigs shing chos kyi dbyings la bsgom pa dang  chos kyi dbyings la sems par byed pa ni chos kyi dbyings blos gzhag pa zhes bya ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918109#918127#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3512;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3513;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3514;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3515;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3516# rtsa ba'i sems dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyis chos kyi dbyings la dmigs shing chos kyi dbyings la bsgom pa dang  chos kyi dbyings la sems par byed pa ni chos kyi dbyings blos gzhag pa zhes bya ste / / +dran rgyud  rtog pa tsam rig brtan pa dag / /

column3: 'di lta ste // / +da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung ba bzhin no // / +bdag lha dang bcas pa dang  bdud dang bcas pa dang  tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu'i lha dang mi'i 'jig rten 'di las mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang nyid kyis mngon par  shes pa phun sum tshogs pa bdag gi skye ba zad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918128#918149#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3516;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3517;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3518# sems kyi rgyud las dang po phul du phyin pa dang  byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i chos la sems shing dran pa yang dag sems  las byung ba dang sems tsam du rig nas sems tsam mo snyam du rtog pa de yang spangs te / /

column3: tshangs par spyod pa bsten to // / +bya ba byas so // / +srid pa 'di las gzhan ni mi shes so zhes mngon sum du byas shing mkhyen par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918150#918163#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3517;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3518;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3519;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3520# de la yang mi rtog pa ni brtan pa zhes bya ste / / +de ltar du sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' de mthar 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918160#918173#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3518;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3519;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3520;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3521# de ltar du sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' de mthar 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +myur du yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918173#918191#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3521;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3522;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3523;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3524# yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de myur du stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gro ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983305#983313#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11909;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11910;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11911# ye shes des sgrub par byed pa dang  bsgrub bar bya ba dang  sgrub pa gsum la mi rtog pa'i tshul du bsgrubs nas sa  bcu rim gyis mnan nas sangs rgyas kyi sar byang chub sems dpa' des sgrub pa mchog thob par 'gyur te / / +bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 2.384#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#962903#962906#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9386# mngon par sangs rgyas par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug  spyad nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.015#TD4026E.TXT.r#281367#281367#TD4026E.TXT.r_1100# myur du yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gro // /
column9: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#895778#895778#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_854# sems can gyi don du 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur bas gzhan gyi don du 'gyur  bar 'gal lo // /
column10: 0.021#TD4010E.TXT.r#2258182#2258182#TD4010E.TXT.r_3556# thabs mkhas pa 'di dang yang dag par ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin     // /
column11: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#926160#926160#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4553# de ltar bdag dang sems can yongs su smin pa dang ldan pa rnams ni sha thang dang mi bde ba med par tshogs yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur  te ; /
column12: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#939714#939714#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6422;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6423# gzhan gyis mi bskyed do zhes bya bar mi rigs pa de bzhin du sems can gyi khams nas 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i rigs can bsam  gyis mi khyab pa dag cig yod pa las gcig cig 'tshang rgya'i gzhan ci'i phyir 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te / / +'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur bas smra bar mi rigs so // /
column13: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#991525#991526#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_13101;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_13102# de ltar bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'i sems dpa'i mchog byang chub  sems dpa' des sangs kyi sar yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol du 'gro ste / / +don du na stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa 'tshang rgya ba 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.025#TD4050E.TXT.r#1111150#1111150#TD4050E.TXT.r_1915# ji ltar bdag gi bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus zhes don de lta bur byung ba'o // /
column15: 0.026#TD4020E.TXT.r#2521818#2521818#TD4020E.TXT.r_396# myur du yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gro // /
column16: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#961208#961208#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9193# shes rab rtul ba dang dus ring por bla na med pa'i byang chub 'tshang rgya bar rmongs par zhugs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column16: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2151112#2151114#TD4029E.TXT.r_3984;TD4029E.TXT.r_3985;TD4029E.TXT.r_3986# de bzhin du brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyang sbyar bar bya'o // / +pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs rdzogs so //// /
column17: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2155062#2155062#TD4029E.TXT.r_4538;TD4029E.TXT.r_4539# don thams cad 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang don gcig pa nyid la 'jug pas so // / +ngo tsha ba'i skabs rdzogs so //// /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +da ltar bcom ldan 'das thog mar dge ba / / +bar du dge ba / / +tha mar dge ba / /
