column3: don bzang po / / +tshig 'bru bzang po // / +ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa / / +yongs su dag pa / / +tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag par gsal bar byed  pa'i chos ston pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918230#918251#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3530;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3531;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3532# de la bdag gi don de kho na khong du chud par gyur na sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // / +de nas de kho na khong du chud ba'i 'og tu sems can yongs su  smin par bya ba'i phyir 'phrul gyi mig la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par can bsgrubs pas ni sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur te / /

column3: bdag gi nyan thos rnams la byams pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i ming 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
'di lta ste / / +da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la sh'akya'i sras zhes brjod pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918252#918265#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3532;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3533# 'phrul gyi mig la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par can de yang skabs kyi mngon par rtogs pa dang mthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa  gnyis kyis 'grub ste / /

column3: bdag tshogs stong phrag du ma sdud par 'gyur te / / +'di  lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918260#918268#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3532;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3533;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3534# 'phrul gyi mig la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par can de yang skabs kyi mngon par rtogs pa dang mthar thug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa  gnyis kyis 'grub ste / / +de bas na de kho na'i rjes la mthu'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /
column5: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918299#918300#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3536;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3537# de bas na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba skyo bar mi 'gyur bar thabs bstan pa'i phyir / / +de kho na'i rjes la mthu'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /

column3: da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs brgya phrag du ma bzhin du 'gyur ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918269#918280#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3533;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3534;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3535# de bas na de kho na'i rjes la mthu'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // / +yang na bdag nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i thabs ni de kho na'i don yin par bshad / /

column3: de skad ces gsol ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918279#918288#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3535;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3536# bdag nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pas kyang dbang po ma thob pa dang sems can rnams  gdug cing dgug par mi nus par byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba skyes te / /

column3: byams pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus na tshogs  yongs su bsdu bar bya'o zhes sems kyi smon lam rgya chen po dang bcas pa rab tu legs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918289#918299#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3535;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3536;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3537# bdag nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pas kyang dbang po ma thob pa dang sems can rnams  gdug cing dgug par mi nus par byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba skyes te / / +de bas na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba skyo bar mi 'gyur bar thabs bstan pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.012#TD4047E.TXT.r#1207016#1207019#TD4047E.TXT.r_12225;TD4047E.TXT.r_12226# gcig tu byang chub kyi sems brtan pa'i phyir brtan pa'i bsam pa dang zhes bya ba'o // / +thabs la lhag par mos pa'i phyir mi slu ba'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ste / /
column6: 0.013#TD4047E.TXT.r#1127897#1127898#TD4047E.TXT.r_948;TD4047E.TXT.r_949# bya ba ngan pa la mngon par zhen pa dang  bar ma dor 'jog pa dang  thob par  bya ba thob pa'i thabs la dad pa med pa'o // / +bag med pas ni sgrub par mi byed pa'o // /
column7: 0.014#TD4010E.TXT.r#2248572#2248573#TD4010E.TXT.r_2233# zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'i thabs kyis sems can ma lus pa'i don byed pa'i phyir dang  don dam par nam  mkha' dang 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba'o // /
column8: 0.018#TD4053E.TXT.r#3003545#3003545#TD4053E.TXT.r_5164# 'khrig pa spong ba la gyeng ba ni mi tshangs par  spyod pa spong ba'i thabs la rtog pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#965694#965694#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9725# de    bas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan par bya ba ni mi rtog par 'dod pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o // /
column10: 0.021#TD4035E.TXT.r#153364#153364#TD4035E.TXT.r_4969;TD4035E.TXT.r_4970;TD4035E.TXT.r_4971# de la bud med kyi lus la reg pa nyams su mi len pa'i phyir dring ba med pa'o // / +gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa med pa'i phyir  'khrig pa spangs pa'o // / +lag pas reg pa la sogs pa'i thabs gzhan gyis khu ba 'byin par mi byed pa dang  smon pa med par tshangs bar spyod pa khas len pa'i phyir grong pa'i chos spangs pa ste / /
column11: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1213703#1213703#TD4047E.TXT.r_13155# de bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas smon lam btab pa ma gtogs pa dang  thabs  la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no // /
column12: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1188884#1188884#TD4047E.TXT.r_9678# dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa la gzhan dag gus pa  bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bdag nyid kyi tshig gzung bar 'os par bya ba dang skur pa 'debs pa'i skabs med par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.021#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603071#2603071#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8395# dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba kho na'i phyir spel bar byed kyi de dag la yang yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir nyon  mongs pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ni ma yin no // /
column14: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#218636#218636#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_586# sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs kyis ngan 'gro'i lus yang dag par len par byed do // /
column15: 0.022#TD4041E.TXT.r#1273358#1273361#TD4041E.TXT.r_697;TD4041E.TXT.r_698# yongs su gtang bar bya ba'i phyir bod pa'o // / +rab tu bod par bya ba ni sred pa zad par bya ba'i phyir bod pa'o // /
column16: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2935269#2935269#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9277# gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtha' med pa'i phyir te / /
column17: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#177844#177845#TD4035E.TXT.r_9303# gsum po 'di dag ni bsod nams 'dod nas log par phyi rol gyi me la rim gro bya bar mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi rim gror bya ba don med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir / /
column18: 0.023#TD4043E.TXT.r#362380#362380#TD4043E.TXT.r_924;TD4043E.TXT.r_925# 'das pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni ltos pas gnyis kar yang brjod par mi bya ste / / +mtshan mar bya ba mi gsal ba'i phyir dang  yod pa nyid dang mngon par phrad pa ma yin pa'i phyir te / /
column19: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#859724#859724#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15170;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15171# 'gro ba rnams ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang par bya ba nyid yin la / / +bsgom pas spang bar  bya ba la yang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang  phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams rgyas par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te / /
column20: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#179350#179350#TD4035E.TXT.r_9504# tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang  gzhan dag gi sdig pa spang bar bya ba dang bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir dang  bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.024#TD4009E.TXT.r#325360#325361#TD4009E.TXT.r_783;TD4009E.TXT.r_784# dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par mi byed pas sems can rnams la slu'o // / +bshad pa thabs mi shes pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang   theg pa chung du la mos pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po yongs su 'dor ba dang  zang zing dang bcas pa'i sems kyis 'khor la rjes su ston par sbyor bas bsod nams ma yin pa bskyed de / /
column22: 0.024#TD4009E.TXT.r#348099#348099#TD4009E.TXT.r_3788;TD4009E.TXT.r_3789# gdangs snyan pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni / / +'jigs pas  brtags pa'i nyes pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column23: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#686923#686925#TD4083E.TXT.r_336# byang chub chen por yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir bla na med pa dang  bslab    pa'i gzhi rgya chen po yongs su bzung ba'i phyir gsal ba dang  'dod pa'i bsod nams dang bdag dub par byed pa'i mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i phyir kha na ma tho ba med pa dang  rab tu dga' ba'i gnas dang mthun pa dang  ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa 'bul bar mi byed pa'i phyir  rtag tu byed pa dang  rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang phas kyi rgol ba dang  nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams zil gyis mi non cing mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir brtan pa dang  dregs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  gnas skabs thams cad du tshul  khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang ldan pa srog gcod pa la sogs pa spangs pa'i phyir ldog pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba la sbyor ba'i phyir 'jug pa'i tshul khrims dang rjes su srung ba'i phyir kun nas srung ba'i tshul  khrims dang  skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnam par smin par byed pa dang  lhag pa'i sems rnam par smin par byed ba dang  sdug pa'i 'gro ba rnam par smin par byed pa dang  sems can gyi don rnam par smin par byed pa'o // /
column24: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2071852#2071852#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13582# tshul gnas zhes bya ba la  sogs pa mdzod kyi gnas drug par nyon mongs pa spong ba'i thabs rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa skyed pa'i sbyor ba yang mi brjod do // /
column25: 0.026#TD4049E.TXT.r#2310102#2310102#TD4049E.TXT.r_3803# gdams pa smra ba ni sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par gzhag par bya ba dang  sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa'o // /
column26: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1049687#1049688#TD4054E.TXT.r_9244# sems mnyam par ma gzhag par mnyam par gzhag par bya ba dang  sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa'o // /
column27: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#974000#974000#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10722;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10723# 'dul ba'i bya ba la dus thams cad du gnas pa'i phyir tshang ba'o zhes bya ba la / / +'dul ba'i bya ba ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams bskyed pa  dang  bskyed pa rnams 'phel zhing brtas par bya ba dang  'phel zhing brtas pa rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba ni 'dul ba'i bya ba zhes bya ste / /
column28: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1032682#1032682#TD4054E.TXT.r_6836;TD4054E.TXT.r_6837# de la brten nas mngon par shes pa rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +yang mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyid de / /

column3: byams pa 'di kho na ltar 'byung bar 'gyur te / / +ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi rnams kyi tshe lo stong phrag brgyad cu thub pa na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918298#918310#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3536;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3537;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3538# de bas na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba skyo bar mi 'gyur bar thabs bstan pa'i phyir / / +de kho na'i rjes la mthu'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs  rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs ba / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918311#918321#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3538;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3539# yang na gang la bslab par bya ba la rnam pa bdun du  gzhag pa las de kho na'i skabs kyi rjes la mthu smos pa bzhin te bshad dgos pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.016#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920531#920536#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3840;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3841# de bas na dge ba'i chos rgya cher 'phel bar byed pa'i thabs yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs bshad de / / +de'i phyir mthu'i 'og tu yongs su smin par byed pa'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /

column3: bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur pa / / +lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918322#918329#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3539;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3540;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3541# de kho na'i 'og tu mthu'i skabs bshad par 'brel to // /

column3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byams pa zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918330#918340#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3540;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3542# mthu'i skabs 'di la don rnam pa drug 'byung ste / / +mthu'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba dang  mthu'i rgyu dang  mthu'i 'bras  bu dang ; /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin     // / +gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918336#918350#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3542;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3543;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3544# mthu'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba dang  mthu'i rgyu dang  mthu'i 'bras  bu dang ; / +mthu'i las dang  mthu'i ldan pa dang  mthu'i rab tu dbye ba'o // /

column3: bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba / / +lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa nga 'jig rten du byung ba bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918351#918361#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3543;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3544;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3545# mthu'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / / +mthu ni 'phrul gyi mig nas zag pa zad pa mngon par shes pa'i bar du mngon par shes pa drug la bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919988#919990#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3752# mngon par shes pa drug ni 'phrul gyi mig gi mngon par shes pa nas zag pa zad pa mngon par shes pa'i bar du  drug ste ; /

column3: de lha dang bcas pa dang   bdud dang bcas pa dang  tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu lha dang mi'i 'jig rten 'di las mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pa phun sum tshogs pa bdag gi skye ba zad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918362#918370#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3544;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3545;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3546;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3547# mthu ni 'phrul gyi mig nas zag pa zad pa mngon par shes pa'i bar DU MNGON PAR SHES PA DRUG la bya ste / / +mngon par shes  pa drug gi mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin gang yin pa las brtsams te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918370#918381#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3545;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3546;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3547;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3548;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3549# mngon par shes  pa drug gi mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin gang yin pa las brtsams te / / +tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // / +skye ba zhes bya ba la / /

column3: tshangs par spyod pa bsten to // / +bya ba byas so // / +srid pa 'di  las gzhan mi shes so zhes mngon sum du rab tu mkhyen par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918382#918394#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3549;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3550;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3551# gang na dud pa yod pa de na me yod par gdon mi za ba bzhin du skye ba yod na 'chi ba gdon mi za bar     // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +da ltar nga lha dang bcas pa dang  bdud dang bcas pa dang  tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten 'di las mthong ba'i chos de nyid la rang nyid kyis mngon  par shes pa phun sum tshogs pa bdag gi skye ba zad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918393#918410#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3551;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3552;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3553# 'chi ba yod na yang skye ba gdon mi za bar 'byung bas don gyi shugs kyis 'chi ba yang bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918411#918419#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3552;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3553;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3554# de la sems can thams cad 'di nas shi nas gnas che ge mo zhig tu skye ste / / +de nas shi nas kyang gnas che  ge mo zhig tu skye zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: tshangs par spyod pa bsten to // / +bya ba byas so // / +srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes mngon sum du byas shing mkhyen pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918418#918431#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3553;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3554;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3555;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3556# de nas shi nas kyang gnas che  ge mo zhig tu skye zhes bya ba nas / / +sangs ma rgyas pa dang mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i bar du sems can gyi skye ba dang  'chi ba shes te / /

column3: de thog mar dge ba / / +bar du dge ba / / +tha mar dge ba / / +don bzang po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918432#918439#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3555;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3556# 'di ni 'chi ba dang skye ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'o // / +ngag ces bya ba la sems can shi 'phos nas lha dang mi dang  sems can dmyal ba dang   byol song la sogs pa'i lam rgyud lnga de dang de dag tu skye ba'i tshig ci dang ci smras pa shes shing thos te / /

column3: tshig 'bru bzang po // / +ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa / / +yongs su dag pa / / +tshangs par spyod pa / / +yongs su rdzogs pa / / +yang dag par gsal bar byed pa'i chos ston par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918440#918459#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3556;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3557;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3558;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3559# ngag ces bya ba la sems can shi 'phos nas lha dang mi dang  sems can dmyal ba dang   byol song la sogs pa'i lam rgyud lnga de dang de dag tu skye ba'i tshig ci dang ci smras pa shes shing thos te / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +da ltar nga thog mar dge ba / / +bar du dge ba / / +tha mar dge ba / /
don  bzang po // / +tshig 'bru bzang po // / +ma 'dres pa / / +yongs su rdzogs pa / / +yongs su dag pa / / +tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa / /

column3: yang dag par gsal bar byed pa'i chos ston pa bzhin no // / +de'i nyan thos rnams la byams pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i ming 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918468#918480#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3561# 'di ni zhe sdang dang bcas  'di ni zhe sdang dang bral zhes bya ba la sogs pa sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong shes pa ni sems shes pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.019#TD4048E.TXT.r#1694684#1694684#TD4048E.TXT.r_1569# sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen po dag dang bcad pa dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.021#TD4051E.TXT.r#1258320#1258321#TD4051E.TXT.r_3743;TD4051E.TXT.r_3744# las dang nyon mongs pas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro // / +sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams re  re la yang grangs nyi khri chig stong yod pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +da ltar nga'i nyan thos rnams la sh'akya'i bu zhes brjod pa bzhin no // / +des tshogs stong phrag du ma sdud par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918481#918495#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3561;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3562;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3563;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3564# 'di ni zhe sdang dang bcas  'di ni zhe sdang dang bral zhes bya ba la sogs pa sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong shes pa ni sems shes pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: 'di ltar da ltar nga'i tshogs brgya phrag du ma bzhin no zhes gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918494#918503#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3564;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3565# sems can thams cad kyis 'khor ba thog ma med pa  nas dge ba ci byas pa dang  mi dge ba ci byas pa shes te / /

column3: nyan thos 'das pa'i dus na dus las 'das pa rnams kyis skye ba lung bstan zhes bya    ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918504#918512#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3565;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3566# sems can 'dis tshe rabs snga ma 'di'i tshe na ni sbyin pa byas pas sbyin pa'i bag chags dang ldan / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das chu bo can na mu dze ka'i spyil bu na bzhugs te / / +de'i tshe chu bo can du skye bo mang po dus las 'das par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918513#918528#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3566# tshe rabs snga ma 'di'i tshe na ni tshul khrims bsrungs pas tshul khrims kyi bag chags dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshe  rabs snga ma la ci dang ci byas pa'i bag chags shes pa dang  de bzhin du sems can 'dis tshe snga ma 'di'i tshe na ni srog bcad pa byas pas srog gcod pa'i bag chags dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshe rabs snga ma la mi dge ba ci dang ci byas pa'i bag chags shes pa ni dge ba dang  mi dge ba skyed pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: dge bsnyen kad ka ta dus las 'das shing / / +ka ta ma ka ta dang  kad ka sha dang  spyod pa dang  nyer spyod dang  ltas can dang  nye  ltas can dang  bzang po dang  rab tu bzang po dang  grags pa dang  nye bar grags pa dang  grags sbyin dang  dge bsnyen grags pa'i lha dag dus las 'das par gyur to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918529#918543#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3566# tshe rabs snga ma 'di'i tshe na ni tshul khrims bsrungs pas tshul khrims kyi bag chags dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshe  rabs snga ma la ci dang ci byas pa'i bag chags shes pa dang  de bzhin du sems can 'dis tshe snga ma 'di'i tshe na ni srog bcad pa byas pas srog gcod pa'i bag chags dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshe rabs snga ma la mi dge ba ci dang ci byas pa'i bag chags shes pa ni dge ba dang  mi dge ba skyed pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918544#918552#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3566;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3567# tshe rabs snga ma 'di'i tshe na ni tshul khrims bsrungs pas tshul khrims kyi bag chags dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshe  rabs snga ma la ci dang ci byas pa'i bag chags shes pa dang  de bzhin du sems can 'dis tshe snga ma 'di'i tshe na ni srog bcad pa byas pas srog gcod pa'i bag chags dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshe rabs snga ma la mi dge ba ci dang ci byas pa'i bag chags shes pa ni dge ba dang  mi dge ba skyed pa zhes bya ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918553#918560#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3566;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3567;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3568;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3569# tshe rabs snga ma 'di'i tshe na ni tshul khrims bsrungs pas tshul khrims kyi bag chags dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshe  rabs snga ma la ci dang ci byas pa'i bag chags shes pa dang  de bzhin du sems can 'dis tshe snga ma 'di'i tshe na ni srog bcad pa byas pas srog gcod pa'i bag chags dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshe rabs snga ma la mi dge ba ci dang ci byas pa'i bag chags shes pa ni dge ba dang  mi dge ba skyed pa zhes bya ste / / +'di ni sngon gyi gnas mngon par shes pa'o // / +de'i gnas dang zhes bya ba la / /

column3: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te chu bo can du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918559#918569#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3568;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3569;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3570# de'i gnas dang zhes bya ba la / / +de'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang  sems can rnams gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la bya ste / /

column3: bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te / / +dge slong rab tu mang po de dag chu bo can na bsod snyoms spyod pa na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#918568#918581#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3570# de bzhin gshegs    pa la mchod pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar bya ba shes pa dang  sems can 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro bar bya ba shes pa ni de'i gnas shes pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste / / +'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang  'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang  rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang  gzugs dang  ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug dang  skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa dang  reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang  tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang  sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang  len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang  srid pa'i rkyen  gyis skye ba dang  skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang  mya ngan dang  smre sngags 'don pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba dang  'khrug pa rnams kun du 'byung ste / /

column3: dman pa'am / / +gya nom pa'am / / +gang thag ring ba'am / / +gang thag nye ba'am / / +de thams cad bdag ma yin bdag kyang de dag ma yin zhing de dag bdag gi ma yin no zhes yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919536#919551#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3701;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3702# de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gtso bo tshogs pa'i dbus su theg pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa la snyoms par 'jug pa ston pa ni ting    nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa zhes bya ste / / +dper na 'phags pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dbus su ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang  sus kyang ting nge 'dzin de las bslang bar ma nus pa dang  bu mo legs pa'i  blo gros kyis bslang ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o // /

column3: tshor ba gang ci yang rung ba dang  'du shes gang ci yang rung  ba dang gang yang mthong ba dang thos pa dang rnam par shes pa dang thob pa dang yongs su tshol ba dang yid la yid kyi rjes su rnam par rtog pa dang rjes su dpyod pa de thams cad bdag ma yin la bdag kyang de dag ma yin zhing 'di dag bdag gis bdag ma yin no zhes yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lnga ba bzhin blta bar bya'o zhes  gsungs so // /

column6: 0.028#TD4010E.TXT.r#2267936#2267937#TD4010E.TXT.r_4883# spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos nyid rtogs pa la 'gro ba med pas rtogs pa med pa mngon par byang chub nas byang chub kyi snying po las bzhengs nas gdul bya'i sems can thams cad gdul bar mdzad cing sems can dmigs par mi 'gyur yang sprul pa lta bur chos  rnams rig nas sprul pas sprul pa'i sprul pa lta bur sems can rnams kyi don byed do // /

column13: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920927#920927#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3887# dga' ba smin par gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column14: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2895056#2895056#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3817;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3818;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3819# sbyin pa la sogs pa byed du bcug pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa la snying brtse ba zhes bya ste // / +de bstan par bya ba'i phyir // / +tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column15: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921525#921525#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3965# sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni snying rje ste sems kyi brtse ba ji tsam zhig skyes na snying rje yongs su smin pa yin pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column16: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#922397#922397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4079# mu stegs pa la sogs pas kyang lta ba bsgyur bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#905351#905352#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1932;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1933# byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'di yang yon tan rnam pa bzhi'i gzhi dang rten byed pas gser chen po'i rigs dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914117#914117#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2997# sems dpa'i sgrub pa 'phags so zhes bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column19: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#914542#914542#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3047# spyod yul ni lus kyi sgo nas spyod lam bzhi  la spyod ba dang  mig gi dbang po nas yid kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po drug gis so so'i yul mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs ba byas pa rnams sems can gyi don du bsngo bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#917896#917896#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3478# ye shes de'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i sgo nas mthar thug pa'i lam yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#943294#943294#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6852# mis thob par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas zhum pa dang mis thob nas yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob pas sgrub dka'o snyam nas  zhum pa dang  de ltar dus ring du bsgoms kyang la las thob kyi kun gyis mi thob bo snyam nas zhum pa de dag la rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis na zhum par mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column22: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2892212#2892213#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3460# des 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad las 'phags par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column23: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2893156#2893156#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_3587# sems can gzhan bde  na byang chub sems dpa' ci'ang mi bdog kyang bde bar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rtsom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: ji ltar dran pa bzhin du mdzod la mkho ba yongs su rdzogs par yang dag bsdus // / +mdo gzhan gang yang bdag gis yongs su ma dran 'di ni yang dag ma bsdus pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919680#919688#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3718;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3719;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3720;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3721# zhing rnams 'dod pa bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir // / +ye shes la yang dbang bas  dag pa thob // /

column3: de dag gang zhig dran pas yang dag  bsdu bar mdzod ces gsol ba bdag 'debs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919687#919704#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3720;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3721;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3722;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3723;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3724# ces bya ba 'di snod kyi 'jig rten dag par byed pa ston te / / +de yang gang gis dag par byed pa dang  gang dag par byed pa ste rnam pa gnyis so // /

column3: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi t'i ka nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba dge slong zhi gnas lhas yang dag par sbyar ba rdzogs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919705#919722#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3723;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3724;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3725# dbang bcu la ye shes kyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing     // / +rnams dang shel gyi kha dog tu bstan na dga' ba rnams la shel gyi kha dog tu ston pa dang  gser gyi kha dog tu bstan na dga' ba rnams la gser la sogs pa'i kha dog tu ston / /

column3: gsung rab mdo sde stong gi mdo khungs kyi // / +chos mngon mdzod kyi bstan bcos brgyan pa 'di // /
khams pa ston pas dad pas rab bsgyur las // / +'gro kun mngon pa'i chos kyi don rtogs shog // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919721#919734#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3724;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3725;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3726# rnams dang shel gyi kha dog tu bstan na dga' ba rnams la shel gyi kha dog tu ston pa dang  gser gyi kha dog tu bstan na dga' ba rnams la gser la sogs pa'i kha dog tu ston / /

column3: kha che'i grong khyer chen po dpe med kyi dbus dza ra me'i gtsug lag khang gi byang phyogs kyi bsil khang du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#919733#919750#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3725;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3726;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3727;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3728;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3729;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3730;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3731# de dag thob ces bya ba ni de ltar ston nus zhes bya ba'i tha tshig  go ; / / +sangs rgyas mtshan dag med par sangs rgyas mtshan // /
column5: 0.017#TD4020E.TXT.r#2521961#2521961#TD4020E.TXT.r_426;TD4020E.TXT.r_427# sangs rgyas mtshan mi grags par sangs rgyas mtshan // / +yang dag bsgrags pas de dag khams  gzhan 'gyed // /
